Title: Data Engineer (Work Abroad to Malaysia)
Description: LATAR BELAKANG Klien kami, yang merupakan salah satu Bank Komersial Malaysia terbesar sedang mencari pengembang ETL berpengalaman untuk membantu migrasi data. Kandidat ideal akan memiliki pengalaman pengembangan ETL yang signifikan dan pengetahuan yang baik tentang SSIS dan Informatika. d di SSIS, Informatica juga. PERAN PEKERJAAN  Membangun/menginterpretasikan dokumen desain  Membangun/menginterpretasikan dokumen pemetaan  Membuat/menyelesaikan dokumen uji  Berpartisipasi dalam ulasan desain teknis dan ulasan kode  Memahami dan mematuhi praktik terbaik ETL  Mengembangkan dan memecahkan masalah kode Informatica  Menulis SQL tingkat lanjut termasuk beberapa penyetelan kueri PERSYARATAN  Pengalaman merancang dan membangun ETL lengkap (memindahkan dan mengubah data) di salah satu dari teknologi ini: SSIS/Informatica  Menulis SQL tingkat lanjut termasuk beberapa penyetelan kueri  Pengalaman dalam identifikasi kualitas data  Beberapa pengalaman desain database dan pengetahuan tentang model data sangat membantu  Mahir dalam merancang alur kerja ETL yang efisien dan kuat  Memanfaatkan teknik ad-hoc untuk melakukan analisis data secara langsung  Mahir dalam cara menerapkan dan men-debug lingkungan produksi  Pengalaman dengan kerangka kerja penyerapan data real-time dan batch  Pengalaman dengan pengembangan API dan penggunaan format data JSON/XML/Hypermedia  Lebih suka pengalaman manajemen data atau pemodelan data dalam Big Data  (Sarang/Impala/Hbase)  Kemahiran dalam teknik arsitektur pergudangan,  termasuk MOLAP, ROLAP, ODS, DM, dan EDW.  Pengalaman Pemrograman Python  Pengalaman Langsung dengan platform perangkat lunak open source Linux  Proses pengembangan yang gesit mengalami nilai tambah  Kepemimpinan yang kuat, interpersonal, pengaruh, negosiasi, dan tertulis dan lisan  keterampilan komunikasi yang dibutuhkan. Kualifikasi  Minimal 5 tahun pengalaman ETL dengan SSIS dan Informatica  Pengalaman dengan migrasi basis data (oracle, teradata).  Latar Belakang Perbankan, Asuransi, Jasa Keuangan menjadi nilai tambah  Latar Belakang Ilmu Komputer atau Teknik  Warga Negara Malaysia, PR, Asing dengan EP  Bonus Tahunan dan Manfaat Kompetitif

Title: HR & Data Analyst, Executive
Description: Company Description Qraved  is the fastest growing startup in F&B technology based in Indonesia. Our mission is to make life tasty and help everybody have a great time with their friends, family, and loved ones. Whatever the place, we know that people are always going out, and we are focused on making that experience great by focusing on personalized recommendations based on context via machine learning and data. We further help brands and restaurants to promote themselves on our platform through advertisement and branded content to reach millions of users interested in food and lifestyle. YOBO  by Qraved Since the pandemic, people's habits have started to change. Not only daily habits have changed, habits when leaving the house & interacting with other people have changed. Starting from zoom calls that replace offline meetings, to habits when eating at restaurants too. People want the process of eating at a restaurant to be more contactless so it's safer & more convenient. Introducing YOBO, our most game-changing product yet. YOBO is our specialized F&B platform that enhances the customer experience and provides your business with operations solutions that are effective and profitable. YOBO is made especially for your end-to-end F&B solutions, from QR code ordering systems, transaction management, and also the payment systems using various online payment methods, we will find the right match of features that fits your business needs. Not only that your business also can track and get in-depth insight about the business using the big data that we provide through report and our VIP management. Our CRM service can also grow your sales with the upselling method, which is done by updating directly to customers about your F&B business. Job Description As a HR & Data Analyst you will be handling: HR Recruitment from sourcing, screening, interviews, offering, reference checks, and onboarding Managing and maintaining HRIS employee data Managing and documenting HR team documents Initiating HR improvement projects Data Analyst Collaborating with Business Analyst to create and manage company's data and reporting Collaborating and assisting with Business Analyst in creating and managing company's dashboard  Qualifications Are you the  ideal  candidate? High proficiency in MS Excel High willingness to learn Fresh graduate or with 1 year of experience in HR and/or Data Analyst role Majoring in management and/or other related major Good communication in both oral in written in Bahasa Indonesia and English Is comfortable in working at a dynamic environment

Title: Manager, Data Analyst
Description: About you You're a go-getter with mad juggling skills (or multiple hats) who can thrive in a fast-paced, agile environment. You have a strong thirst for knowledge and are driven to find solutions that don't exist yet. You are comfortable with ambiguity and extremely resourceful (in your past life you could've been a detective) You always find a way to get things done without sacrificing the quality of your work, integrity and values. No task is off limits for you. You are humble and prioritize the success of the team over your own with an eagerness to help those around you. You don't shy away from challenges and have the ability to bounce back from setbacks. About This Role Build dashboards and develop insights for business units, including management dashboards, regular reports, and ad-hoc analysis. Develop statistical and propensity models in customer segmentation and retention strategies for maximizing the sales and revenue growth, product profitability analysis etc. Retrieve and collect unstructured and structured data sources to build up the ‘customer 360 view’ (including 3rd party solutions/ platforms integrations) to perform data processing, cleansing and verification. Provide first line support for local data issues, maintain best practices for Data Management and provide support where necessary for the data projects Implement and support the Data Governance roadmap, focusing on data handling, data usage, data curation, and data quality through policy, auditing, and collaboration. Design and maintain data dictionary/catalog documents. Identify and maintain data owners and stewards of the company’s information assets. Collaborate with the Tech team in creating technology platforms across Data Lake / Data Visualization / Data Analytics Solutions What is required and what we’re looking for Minimum 3 years in an analytics role in digital banking, product or marketing. Degree holder in Data Science, Information Technology, Statistics or other related disciplines. Familiar with big data platform including Data Lake, HDInsight, Hadoop, Spark, etc., have experiences of developing data warehouse. Excellent skills on SQL, with understanding of database structure, model design and segmentation techniques. Proficiency in Python or R and its application in data analysis Work experience of modern programming languages (e.g. Python, R, Scala, etc…), databases (e.g. PostgreSQL), data management, visualization tools and reporting services. Demonstrated ability in implementing Data Governance programs: heavy emphasis on developing and implementing data standards, policies, practices, and procedures that lead to substantive improvements in data management and quality.. Being familiar with CRM and digital analytics tools (e.g. google analytics) would be an advantage. Ability to work independently and strategically, open to tackling new issues and sounding out new ideas. A proactive and can-do attitude. Experience in fin-tech and/or digitalization projects in financial institution is a plus. Excellent command of written and spoken Bahasa and English is preferred.

Title: MIS Analyst
Description: About Collectius   Collectius is one of South East Asia’s leading Fintech company in the debt management industry, with operations in Indonesia, Philippines, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam and India. We are using technology and empathy to create the best customer experience and operational excellence to support our 5,5 million customers in becoming debt free. Together with IFC (a member of the World Bank Group and minority shareholder in Collectius), Collectius is actively working on improving industry practices and promoting best resolution practices. As an example, Collectius has implemented a company policy that replaced the word 'debtor' – a term that has been traditionally perceived to be negative – with 'customer’. Currently Collectius manages 6.6 billion USD outstanding debt from 100+ clients across banking and financial institutions. To support our hyper- growth ambitions we are looking for high-performers who want to grow the business with us! OVERVIEW We are looking for a hands-on, proactive  MIS Analyst  who is enthusiastic about making a difference in an ever-growing organization and always hungry for growth!  RESPONSIBILITIES: Analyze data to better understand potential risks, concerns and outcomes of decisions  Aggregate data from multiple sources to provide a comprehensive assessment  Create reports, summaries, presentations and process documents to display results  Collaborate with other team members to effectively analyze and present data  Develop systems and processes for gathering and storing data for future analytic projects  REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor’s degree in MIS, BIS or IT, or related fields from a reputable institution  1-3 years of relevant experience as an analyst in a similar company or related field  Demonstrated ability to prioritize tasks and meet daily deadlines for projects  Strong written and verbal communication skills to inform managers and other stakeholders of results  Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, Access, Visio and other analysis programs  Ability to manage multiple projects and programs at the same time to complete work  Critical thinking skills with the ability to independently solve problems with data  Quantitative and analytical skills with a demonstrated ability to understand new analytical concepts  Basic knowledge of programming languages, such as SQL and Python  Presentation skills, including public speaking and presentation creation using PowerPoint or a similar program

Title: Data Analyst
Description: A US-based member-only company that supplies superior quality natural and organic food products is looking for a Data Analyst. The selected candidate will be taking ownership of the company's merchandising analysis and providing in-depth insights on how to improve the user experience and member engagement. The company is bringing the benefits of healthy and fresh eating to the customer’s doorsteps with the click of a few buttons. They have managed to successfully raise $200mn+ in funding so far. This role requires 6-8+ hours of overlap with the PST time zone. Job Responsibilities: Assist Product Management, Data Science, Marketing, and Technology teams to gather, manipulate, evaluate, and documenting new, complex data and sharing cohesive data stories  Drive member acquisition growth through sponsored social marketing platforms Use the scientific method to create A/B tests and MVA experiments, encompassing ad creatives, targeting tactics, and onsite experiences, among other things Monitor key performance indicators, offer data-driven recommendations, and lobby for the internal resources needed to keep member growth going Deliver ideas and insights based on both competitive and online analytics Define critical success criteria and establish data-driven and prioritized roadmaps to produce solutions to break down unclear situations Collaborate with internal stakeholders in business development, product development, design, and engineering to develop and implement the most innovative growth ideas Gather, manipulate, analyze, and document raw, complicated data, and then present coherent data stories to business and technical audiences Develop a thorough grasp of user activity patterns and insights, as well as the relationship between engagement measures and conversion rates, customer lifetime value, and financial success Create dashboards, visualizations, and detailed datasets to give meaningful merchandising, category activity, and profit potential insights. Serve as a tactical liaison with Product Management teams to give the most accurate and timely information possible that'll help drive business decisions Job Requirements: Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience) At least 4+ years of relevant experience as a marketing data analyst Demonstrable experience working with SQL, Python/R, Tableau, Looker, and Domo Nice to have some experience with Google Analytics, Amplitude, or Mixpanel  Prior experience with A/B testing, cohort analysis, conversion optimization, and customer segmentation is desirable Good leadership abilities, a positive attitude, and an active / self-starter mindset Enthusiasm for turning data into insights and helping others uncover the power of their data Help develop a healthy team environment by being a team player with character, humility, and honesty Ability to communicate data stories to business and technical audiences in a clear and concise manner Proficiency and solid foundation in statistics

Title: Data Analyst
Description: Requirements Bachelor’s degree from an accredited university or college in Computer Science, Business, Finance, Economics, Statistics, or Industrial Engineering or similar expertise. At least 1 year of working experience in the related field is required for this position. Very strong analytical skills with the ability to identify trends, draw conclusions and develop actionable recommendations from data. Very strong written and verbal communication skills (Bahasa & English); ability to effectively communicate and present data and insights to both internal and external teams. Very strong knowledge of and experience with query (SQL) and data visualization tools. Self-starter with strong attention to detail and ability to drive insights in a fast-paced environment. Provides analytical support to track and analyze critical metrics. Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports. Maintain the data model to support self-serve BI Tools. Act as data domain expert for several key services.

Minimum Qualifications What you need to have (Minimum Qualifications): Bachelor's degree from computer science or related fields, or equivalent software engineering experience. Title: System Engineer
Description: Responsibilities: Responsible for end-to-end logistics network system and process improvement, and transformation Establish full view of end-to-end logistics network system (incl. processes, people, procedures, data, information, software and hardware, and other support elements) and identify all critical elements in the system Represent end-to-end logistics network and other business processes by adopting model-based system engineering (MBSE) approach Construct necessary simulation models (discrete-event and/or agent-based) to simulate cost and service level performance, and to analyze and ascertain robustness of end-to-end network Carry out necessary data ETL and maintain all data, inputs and assumptions necessary for simulation and MBSE Identify opportunities for continuous improvement to improve robustness of logistics network Collaborate with internal/external stakeholders to establish standard process and procedures to minimize system deviation and noises Project management related to logistics network transformation from ideation to implementation phase Requirements/Qualifications(must have): An individual contributor with 2 to 3 years of process improvement, and MBSE experience Strong and proven ability in constructing simulation models (discrete-event and agent-based) in tackling business problems which involve stochasticity and uncertainties Prior experience in using simulation tools and packages (e.g. AnyLogic, Simio, ARENA, Simulink, and/or other open-source simulation engine such as SimPy) Mastery of at least one object-oriented programming language (either Python, Java, C++, C# or JavaScript) and comfortable with data ETL (SQL skill is a must) Extremely strong business acumen and system thinking, including ability to think strategically and drill into details when necessary, plus highly motivated self-starter and team player Degree in Industrial Engineering, System Engineering, Computer Science, Mathematics/Statistics, Operations Research, or equivalent practical experience

At least 2 year experienced in data engineering pipeline end to end development life cycle development of server-client interfaces and APIs and experienced python language. With good working knowledge data models and data flows with a good understanding of databases With Good knowledge on data analytics life cycle, data collection, analysis, modelling to deployment Experience with AirFlow is likeable. Familiar with database systems like Microsoft SQL Server, Preferably hands-on experience with Big Data Analytics Experience with various messaging systems, such as Kafka, RabbitMQ and others Web technologies including Apache HTTP server, LDAP server, SSO, SAML, OIDC Knowledgeable with Linux shell and security Familiar with agile methodology, source control management Familiar with Cloud infrastructure like Azure, AWS, GCP and its services, and on-premises deployment technology like docker and container virtualization configuration Familiar with web development technology like Node.JS and REACT framework is a plus Familiar with industrial automation and Industrial IoT architecture is a plus Familiar with Tableau is a plus

Title: Data Engineer
Description: We are looking for a savvy Data Engineer to join our growing team of analytics experts. The hire will be responsible for expanding and optimizing our data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data flow and collection for cross functional teams. The ideal candidate is an experienced data pipeline builder and data wrangler who enjoys optimizing data systems and building them from the ground up. The Data Engineer will support our software developers, database architects, data analysts and data scientists on data initiatives and will ensure optimal data delivery architecture is consistent throughout ongoing projects. They must be self-directed and comfortable supporting the data needs of multiple teams, systems and products. The right candidate will be excited by the prospect of optimizing or even re-designing our company’s data architecture to support our next generation of products and data initiatives. Responsibilities Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture, Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements. Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc. Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and ‘big data’s technologies such as Google, AWS and Open Source Platform. Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into employee engagement, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics. Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs. Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader. Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems. Qualifications Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases such as PostgreSQL and Maria DB. Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets. Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement. Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets. Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management. A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets. Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores. Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment. We are looking for a candidate with 2+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field.

Title: Business Intelligence Senior Analyst
Description: Ninja Van is a tech-enabled logistics company on a mission to provide hassle-free delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region's largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries. At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimisation, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers. But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry. Job Descriptions Performing raw data withdrawal or data that has been processed from the database needed for internal and external team analysis through BI tools or queries, such as Redash or Periscope. Making an analysis or report based on data that has been processed for the purposes of improvement in the form of presentations or e-mail Designing automation / reporting tools outside of BI tools needed for integration with other projects, such as: email automation using google script Perform software development, production support and provides overall expertise in the area of Data Warehouse and Reporting Application, which include report design, trigger and alerts, data processing, report automation, visualization and dashboards for operational improvements Provide insights, recommendations, and strategies to enhance the operational delivery of BI solutions, and technical directions Job Requirements Min. Bachelor Degree majoring Computer Science, IT, Statistics. or Engineering Preferably 3 years of experience as BI developer/analyst or related position. Understand and experience in SQL Server, Oracle, BI and Data Warehousing Principles. Qlik View or Power BI is an advantage. Passion in data analytics, mathematics, statistics and modeling Excellent problem solving, critical thinking and conceptual skill Highly flexible, easy to adapt with new environment, project management, teamwork, customer-centric and eager to self-learn under minimal direction Submit a job application By applying to the job, you acknowledge that you have read, understood and agreed to our Privacy Policy Notice (the “Notice”) and consent to the collection, use and/or disclosure of your personal data by Ninja Logistics Pte Ltd (the “Company”) for the purposes set out in the Notice. In the event that your job application or personal data was received from any third party pursuant to the purposes set out in the Notice, you warrant that such third party has been duly authorised by you to disclose your personal data to us for the purposes set out in the the Notice.

Title: Mine Analyst
Description: Company Profile: PT Darma Henwa Tbk, leading the way in integrated mining services. With over a decade of experience in the industry, we have established ourselves as a trusted and reliable partner for companies across the mining sector. Coordinate with mine operations regarding the implementation of mine planning in order to guide the achievement of project targets and production efficiency Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Mining Engineering/ Geology, or a related field. At least 2 years of experience in Mine Engineer/ Mine Analyst/ Dispatch Engineer. Max.35 years old Strong leadership, interpersonal, and communication skills. Experience in data analysis Familiar with minex/surpac is preferred. Strong analytical thinking and excellent problem-solving and decision-making skills. What We Offer: Transport & Housing Allowance Private Medical Insurance (Unlimited) Lunch Shuttle Bus Flight Ticket provided for Non-Local Hiring Training & Development Program Career Progression Gym & Sport Facilities Entertainment Facilities on Sites

Title: Data Engineer (for AMAAN Project)
Description: Job Description We are seeking a hands-on data engineer for our business unit in Amaan to help us build out and manage our data infrastructure, which will need to operate reliably at scale using a high degree of automation in setup and maintenance. The role will involve both setting up and managing the data infrastructure, as well as building and optimizing key ETL pipelines on both batch and streaming data. The ability to work with the teams from product, engineering and BI/analytics is essential. Ownership needs to be taken of data model design and data quality. Automation and the use of data science to manage and improve data quality would be valued. The individual will also play active roles in ensuring data governance policies and tooling are implemented and adhered to A high degree of empathy is required for the needs of the downstream consumers of the data artefacts produced by the data engineering team, i.e. the software engineers, data scientists, business intelligence analysts, etc and the individual needs to be able to produce transparent and easily navigable data pipelines. Value should be assigned to consistently producing high quality metadata to support discoverability and consistency of calculation and interpretation. Developer who is interested in Data Engineering are welcome to apply. Candidates should have a set of experience across the following systems and languages: Apache Kafka Apache Flink Apache Airflow PostgreSQL Docker Python and Java

Main Purpose Of The Role  - To perform Calls to study and gather information about current processes  - To strategize and create implementation plans that generate time savings and process efficiencies through project management systems, automation, SOPs, and KPI trackers.  - To dedicate 10% of their work time developing new systems and staying updated with the industry.  - Be the subject matter expert on all things project management and agency workflows Other Responsibilities Of The Role  -Troubleshoot system issues that we encounter  -Quality control of the systems   -Attend weekly team meetings  -Tracking internal metrics on a weekly basis and taking corrective actions when necessary. Believes that everything in the world can be systematized and/or automated.  Enthusiasm. Exhibits passion and excitement over the job. Find organizing & improving processes a joy.  Communication & Integrity. Honest and transparent communicator to both the client and team. Speaks and writes clearly and articulately without being overly verbose or talkative.  Efficiency. Able to produce significant output with minimal wasted effort.  Analytical skills. Able to structure and process qualitative or quantitative data and draw insightful conclusions from it. Exhibits a probing mind and achieves penetrating insights.  Attention to detail. Never let important details slip through the cracks or derail a project. If you don't resonate with the key competencies above, please do NOT apply. We'll be wasting each other's time. We only want to partner with people who know deep down who they are. Responsibilities - Meet and coordinate with team to establish project scope, system goals, and requirements - Develop, analyze, prioritize, and organize requirement specifications, data mapping, diagrams, and flowcharts for developers and testers to follow - Translate highly technical specifications into clear non-technical requirements - Manage the set-up and configuration of systems - Define and coordinate the execution of testing procedures, and develop test cases to serve the overall quality assurance process Qualifications - Minimum Bachelor's degree in Computer Science/Information Technology, Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication) or equivalent - With at least 3 years relevant experience - With experience in requirements gathering, writing design documents, testing, working directly with end customer - Ability to effectively manage multiple tasks of varying complexities - Analytical, acceptable comprehension. Able to conduct needs assessments with clients to identify business requirements to translate into functional specs, technical specs and project plans - High attention to detail, critical, communicative, able to work independently

Title: Course Developer
Description: Job Descriptions: Develop of course materials from a given set of objectives in the form of research, lesson plan, presentations, handouts & assessments. Ensuring the quality control of the course materials for their grammatical accuracy, validity and reliability to the present context, and usability for the current user demographics according to the set content evaluation criteria Coordinate & collaborate with subject matter experts in developing materials Requirements And Specification: Minimum bachelor degree in Education/Education Technology - Experience in creating a curriculum and course content is a must. A portfolio of this content development will be requested during the interview process Understand the term and allignment with Kemnaker/BNSP such as SKKNI, KKNI (BNSP certified trainer and assessor prefered) Detail oriented, self-starter, and able to work under minimum supervision Experiences in designing digital-based learning curriculum, syllabus, and lessons, along with assessment tools. Freshgraduate are welcome to apply Connect with us: Make yourself updated with Cakap & Cakap Squad activities by follow our social media at: IG: @lifeatcakap @cakapcom Twitter: @cakapcom TikTok: @cakapcom

Title: Security Engineer Intern (Next Level Internship)
Description: The  Next Level   Internship  program by Mekari is a highway for achievement-oriented young talents to create their #BiggestImpact and #InnovateLeadWin in a competitive and encouraging environment, where they get to choose their own preferred teams and bring themselves and their team to the next level. If You Are An Indonesian student, studying in Indonesia or abroad (this program is fully remote, you can apply from anywhere in the world!); At least in your 3rd semester of study, OR An alumnus, max. 1 year after graduation Send in your application now and start your journey to: Experience working at Indonesia's no. 1 SaaS company Get a min. 3-month period internship experience with your preferred team and role Receive monthly evaluations to keep your Next Level journey on track Attend an exclusive graduation ceremony with leaders of Mekari Join an exclusive community of A-list interns and receive specially-curated insights By applying through this opening, you are applying specifically for the role of  Security Engineer  Intern : Requirements  Final year student in Finance/Accounting (fresh graduates are welcome)  Willing to start as soon as possible for a 6 months period of internship Job Description Final year student from computer science or similiar major (pursuing bachelor degree) Have a penchant for solving complex and interesting problems Ability to do deep problem solving and build elegant, maintainable solutions to complex problems Able to communicate effectively with other engineers, stakeholders, and management Proficient in at least 1 scripting language such as Python Previous experience in cybersecurity/security engineering-related field would be preferred Important Before going ahead with your application, make sure you have these items ready to submit:  An updated CV  Self-introduction video (max. duration 3 minutes), in which you need to mention: Name, City, University Semester / Graduation Date An accomplishment you're most proud of Reasons behind applying to Mekari's Next Level Internship If you were a game character, what skills would you be chosen for? Note: You may use either English or Bahasa Indonesia for your Self-Introduction video. If you face any difficulties / errors when uploading your Self-Introduction video, please try the following method: Upload your Self-Introduction Video onto Google Drive. Insert the Google Drive link into a Google Docs file. Download the Google Docs file as PDF. Attach the PDF file in your Next Level Internship application's “Self-Introduction Video” section. Stii got any questions? Shoot us a DM on Instagram at @lifeatmekari Good luck and we hope you make it to the Next Level of your journey with Mekari! Mekari Next Level Internship Program: Pick Your Team, Pave Your Way

Title: Senior Data Analyst (Bangkok Based, Relocation Provided)
Data Analytics Consultant (Senior - Manager - Senior Manager)
SQL Developer
Description: A rapidly-growing company that offers high-quality, scalable solutions to support the future of energy markets and consumers, is looking for a SQL Developer. The selected candidate will be tasked with performing peer reviews of code and taking shared responsibility for the overall efforts that the team has committed to. The company serves leading businesses in the electricity, gas, renewables, and non-commodities industries. Job Responsibilities: Work as a part of an agile team for supporting and implementing changes to the company’s software Work on maintaining and providing support for client-related tasks Take part in every aspect of agile software development including planning, designing, building, testing, releasing, and feedback Collaborate with different teams to build or scale modern utility billing solutions Analyze and enhance the performance of the applications Job Requirements: Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience) At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a SQL developer Minimum 3 years of experience in building and supporting software development processes 3+ years of experience working with T-SQL 2+ years of experience with C# Thorough knowledge of working on SQL database development  Ability to start contributing to project from the get-go Past knowledge of working on utility billing software Well-versed in .Net development methodologies and best practices Thorough understanding of Agile technical practices and techniques

Title: TS Implementation Engineer (L2)
Description: Want to be a part of our team? Responsible for setup and installation of technical systems, applications, or process designs for client’s purchased or outsourced technology and business process solutions. Works directly with client to manage initial access, map and transfer data, create process documentation, and train or coordinate training for client users. Tests and troubleshoots functionality of installed systems; identifies and documents technical issues to be escalated to product and system integration teams for resolution. Provides feedback based on client experiences to product and professional services teams for product and process improvements. May work directly with clients on-site or provide installation support remotely Working at NTT The primary responsibility of the TS Implementation Engineer is to provide technical support to NTT (Ltd) clients. This includes remotely supporting clients within service level agreements (SLAs), to install and configure software and hardware, resolve incidents, perform root cause analysis and adhere to any related processes such as change management. The TS Implementation Engineer (L3) is involved in more complex environments for installation, configuration and fault management. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Interact with clients on site to meet complex requirements of a solution.  Escalate unresolved problems and issues to the relevant third parties.  Respond to escalated client requests and support client applications to a first line resolution.  Escalate complex problems to the relevant third parties.  Write reports and proposals and complete and maintain project documentation.  Assist with the documentation of standard operating procedures relating to installations and fixes.  Act as coach and mentor to more junior Implementation Engineers and Technicians.  Assume responsibility for the co-ordination of the activities of the Engineers, in line with performance targets.  May be required to serve periodically on the customer service desk, providing third line telephonic, remote and on-site support and problem management.  Included in higher complexity design work, with input to the design expected.  Expected to take ownership of relevant technologies according to domain or specialization.  Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Good understanding and appreciation of technical design and business principles Demonstrates project management and administration ability Good project skills which are demonstrated in the execution of installations and other assignments Demonstrate customer engagement skills Demonstrate relevant domain specialist knowledge Good verbal communication skills Client focused and display a proactive approach to solving problems Ability to work under pressure Ability to coach, mentor and provide guidance to team members Good understanding of project management principles Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Computer Science / Information Technology Degree or equivalent together with specialised training in new technologies and legacy systems or equivalent Project management certification Required Experience: Solid work experience in a technical implementation engineering or similar role Experience engaging with clients and conducting presentations Good project administration and documentation experience Report writing experience Basic project management What will make you a good fit for the role?

Title: System Engineer
Description: Responsibilities Membangun High Avaiblility dan Scalability infrastructure untuk mendukung large-scale web/apps. Melakukan riset platform dan tools yang digunakan untuk pengembangan platform Aku Pintar. Melakukan maintain dan optimalisasi pada infrastruktur Aku Pintar. Melakukan integrasi dengan Platform atau Third Party lain untuk mendukung pengembangan backend Qualifications Lulusan D3/S1/sederajat Jurusan Teknik Informatika/Sistem Informasi/Teknik Komputer/sejenisnya. Memiliki kemauan untuk belajar dan berkembang. Mampu bekerja dalam tim ataupun individu dan komunikatif. Mengetahui dasar linux dan networking Memiliki pengetahuan tentang AWS akan menjadi nilai tambah. Memahami version control Git

Title: Infosec Engineer - Indonesia
Description: Overview BukuWarung is SEA’s fastest growing startup and we are building the digital infrastructure for 60 million MSMEs in Indonesia, enabling them to efficiently manage and grow their business, starting with digital bookkeeping, online storefront & payments. BukuWarung’s vision is to empower 60 million MSMEs in Indonesia to become financially aware and enable them to manage and grow their business using technology. BukuWarung is backed by top tier VCs globally: Peter Thiel’s Valar Ventures, Goodwater Capital, Y-Combinator, AC Ventures, Quona Capital, East Ventures, Golden Gate Ventures, Rocketship.vc, Tanglin Venture Partners and strategic angel investors from Stripe, PayPal, Plaid, Grab, Gojek, Facebook, AirBnB, Fast, Mastercard etc.Key Responsibilities Build, lead, and manage the Information Security function at BukuWarung Liaise closely with the IT and Engineering teams to implement best-in-class information/data security/privacy controls across all operations in India, Indonesia, and Singapore Perform Security review, threat modeling, and analysis of engineering modules and components. Identify weaknesses and recommend fixes Create detection rules, SOPs, and automation for analyzing application and cloud logs Manage and continuously improve the Bug Bounty program Leverage tools and scanners to identify and test weaknesses in the organization’s infrastructure and assets. Perform RCA as needed Contribute to ideas in automating security processes in collaboration with internal stakeholders as well as third parties Provide technical guidance in product, component, and vendor selection as appropriate for specific Information Security projects across various departments Ensure that the company is compliant with local regulatory requirements with regard to Information Security. As required, align the overall company IT processes with global standards such as ISO 27001 and SOC 2 Protect the company from external as well as internal security threats by establishing people, processes, and technology structures.  Work with internal business units to ensure that the management and execution of all systems are operating in compliance with security requirements, and facilitate information security risk assessment and risk management processes Ensure that data privacy requirements are included in processes, develop and oversee effective disaster recovery policies and standards, and facilitate and support the development of asset inventories Act as an advisor to business stakeholders, project managers, and IT partners to educate them on security risks to information assets and provide guidance on standards and practices Continuously assess and recommend requirements to establish new or enhance existing Information Security standards and Standard Operating Procedures to meet emerging threats What We Are Looking For (Technical): A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Information Systems or a related discipline, or equivalent experience, is preferred At least 2 years of experience in an Information Security role Have basic knowledge of system security, cryptography, network security, OS fundamentals, OSINT, OWASP top 10, and standard security frameworks Familiarity with threat modeling tools like Microsoft Threat Modeling Tool, OWASP Threat Dragon, etc Familiarity with open-source scanners for SAST and DAST Understanding of security technologies like EDR, PAM, SOAR, DLP, and security operations Information Security certifications such as OSCP, GSEC, CompTIA Pentest+, etc. are a solid plus Knowledge of, and exposure to privacy and data security laws and regulations is a big plus  What We Are Looking For (Intangible): Process-driven outlook towards resolving problems Proven experience working in a Lean/Agile environment Clear and concise communication Ability to interact and build relationships at different levels of the organization."Do what it takes to ensure success" attitude, willing to step into multiple disciplines and responsibilities as needed Ability to work in small organizations, and a highly flexible work environment Self-directed, resourceful, and comfortable with operating in ambiguity Experience in prioritizing from a long list of requirements ensuring maximization of ROI Passionate about service and customer focus If this sounds like you, please apply!

Title: Open sollicitatie Business Intelligence Consultant
Description: FunctionDescription:   Over Axians Axians is een netwerkorganisatie bestaande uit gespecialiseerde IT units. De unit in Laren (NH), bestaande uit zo’n 70 collega’s, is gespecialiseerd in Data Analytics en Business Intelligence. We houden ons onder andere bezig met datavirtualisatie, datawarehouse automation, moderne (cloud) data-architecturen, data visualisaties en data governance. We werken met een duidelijke  visie  en nemen onze klanten daarin mee. Wat wij doen Wij adviseren en helpen klanten om het maximale uit hun data en mogelijkheden te halen en werken daarom tool onafhankelijk. Al hebben we wel een voorkeur voor innovatieve, schaalbare en toekomstbestendige oplossingen. We werken bijvoorbeeld graag met Snowflake, Denodo, Data Virtuality, OneStream, Board, Collibra, IBM Cognos, Tableau en de Microsoft stack waaronder Azure en PowerBI. Wij werken samen met grote, innovatieve organisaties zoals Landal, LeasePlan, Transavia, PGGM, Ten Cate Grass, Agrifirm en Pathé. Lees hier meer over Axians Business Analytics in Laren  en over onze Smart Data, Smart Analytics en Smart Finance teams. Onze cultuur Als jij lekker in je vel zit, komen jouw kwaliteiten op je werk ook het beste tot zijn recht. Wij creëren een professionele werksfeer waar jij jezelf kan en mag zijn. Onze consultants beschrijven de cultuur in Laren als open, met een familiegevoel en professioneel. Met onze eigen academy en uitgebreide leerprogramma’s, zoals het Consultant Development Programma en het Consultant Positioning Programma, faciliteren we jouw professionele ontwikkeling. Naast het werk organiseren we regelmatig leuke activiteiten om samen met je collega’s te doen. Zoals een pub quiz, een beach clean up, fietstochten, midgetgolfen of escape rooms. Onze werkwijze is gebaseerd op onze Axians kernwaarden: empowered, verantwoordelijk, ondernemend, vertrouwend & transparant en solidair. ContactInfo:  We maken graag een keer kennis. Schroom niet om contact op te nemen als je misschien (nog) niet in het profiel past. Wij worden graag verrast door jouw motivatie en unieke kwaliteiten en kijken samen met jou naar de mogelijkheden! Wil je meer weten over werken bij Axians? Laat jouw gegevens en bericht achter via de ‘solliciteer direct’ button. Of neem contact op met onze HR collega Maxime Wesel via  Maxime.Wesel@axians.com  of 06-19630634. (WhatsApp is ook een optie!) Voor meer informatie over ons, check en volg onze LinkedIn pagina https://www.linkedin.com/company/axians-business-analytics/

Title: Senior Data Engineer
Description: Company Description Orange provides your personalized go-to pool of strategy planners, creatives, and technologists for your brand and campaign that aren't part of your daily routine. Strategic managers, content specialists, conceptual creatives, producers, SEO experts, product managers, and others are among the impact players who are held match-fit for your brand. Job Description Design and build highly scalable pipeline (end-to-end) for large volumes of complex data processing and analysis Build and develop large data warehouses, high performance data processing pipelines, and ETL tools Ensure high data integrity and quality from various data sources Design and implement process improvements, build automated processes, optimize data delivery and re-designing infrastructure for larger scalability Work with machine learning systems in production Understanding of software design principles and best practices (test driven development, source control management etc.) Able to clearly articulate pros and cons of different technologies, solutions and platforms Able to document use cases, solutions and recommendations Qualifications Solid experience and knowledge on Google Cloud Platform (or any of the major cloud solution providers such as AWS, Azure, AliCloud) for data management: Composer, Pubsub, Google Storage, Dataflow, Big Query and Data Fusion, or equivalent Savvy with Airflow, or a diverse set of data technologies: Redshift, Elastic Search, PostgreSQL, Spark, Hadoop, Kubernetes Fluency in Python, SQL, Java or equivalent Understanding of SQL & NoSQL databases and other manipulation tools Ability to work with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-streaming, etc. Able to benchmark systems, analyse performance and bottlenecks and propose solutions to resolve them Excellent written and verbal communication, able to switch between technical and plain language when discussing work Able to work in teams, understand and empathize with all major stakeholders, take the lead on initiatives and direct and manage data engineers Able to work in a fast-paced agile development environment Powered by JazzHR IUzWcYniZA

Familiar with create documentation for project (FSD / TSD / BRD, MOM, etc. Responsibilites Analyze business requirements and prepare project deliverables (BRD, MoM, etc). Title: Junior IT Developer
Description: Apakah anda seorang senang dengan pengembangan Web dan Mobile Application..? Apakah anda seorang yang punya passion di bidang IT.? Jika anda orang yang kami cari, jadilah Talenta yang terbaik dan Bergabunglah bersama kami sebagai Staff Junior IT Developer jika anda..  Menyukai bidang IT  Memiliki kemampuan berpikir logic yang baik  Teliti  Detail  Percaya diri Kami adalah salah satu perusahaan terbesar di Indonesia yang memproduksi liquid untuk rokok elektrik di dalam negeri dan kami juga sudah meng-ekspor produk kami ke berbagai negara (Asia, Eropa dan Amerika). Dengan memperkerjakan tenaga professional di segala bidang untuk mengembangkan perusahaan kami. Kami memiliki lingkungan kerja yang baik dan mengedepankan work life balance. Junior IT Developer Requirements  Pendidikan min. D3 atau S1 Sistem Informasi  Memiliki pengalaman sebagai IT Developer min. 1 tahun, Fresh Graduate boleh melamar  Menguasai Java, JavaScript  Menguasai HTML, CSS, PHP, Laravel (nilai Plus)  Menguasai mobile programming (nilai Plus)  Mengerti Query SQL, My Sql, PostgreSQL  Passion di bidang IT, good logic, berinisiatif tinggi  Dapat bekerja dengan tim dan mandiri  Pekerja keras, teliti dan detail serta bisa belajar secara otodidak  Dapat menulis kode dengan rapih dan efektif  Terbiasa menggunakan Version Control seperti Git Job Descriptions  Terlibat langsung dalam pengembangan aplikasi/system internal Perusahaan  Me-maintan system yang sudah ada di perusahaan  Sebagai IT support perusahaan Jika anda tertarik pada posisi diatas, Segera daftarkan dan kirim CV terbaru anda

Title: Talend Developer
Description: We are an end-to-end information technology services and solutions provider, working with leading organizations from the Financial Services, Technology, Communications & Media, Manufacturing & Retail, Energy and Utilities and various other domains. Abhidi delivers highly responsive and innovative solutions that help clients to align their IT strategy with their business goals and address the most important IT needs today. We deliver a full portfolio of services that include IT Consulting, Application Development and Management, Independent Testing, Outsourced Product Development, Enterprise Software Solutions, Business Intelligence & Data Warehousing as well as Resource Augmentation. Also we engage in providing Training, Managed and Infrastructural Services. Our focus is on delivering superior returns to clients through our cost-effective, efficient, high-value services that run on excellent in-house processes. We are deeply committed to the steady pursuit of our long-term goals and aspirations through service excellence and industry expertise. We strive to consistently deliver on commitments and exceed customer expectations by addressing organizations' business-specific needs using our superior technical expertise and world class infrastructure. The Role Your Responsibilities Will Include Deliver high quality code deliverables for a module, lead validation for all types of testing and support activities related to implementation, transition, and warranty.  part of a learning culture, where teamwork and collaboration are encouraged, excellence is rewarded, and diversity is respected and valued. interface with key stakeholders and apply your technical proficiency across different stages of the Software Development Life Cycle including Requirements Elicitation from Client, Design and provide Talend solutions.  Ideal Profile Skills Required Good in writing complex Talend programs Knowledge of developing joblets Should have strong communication skills & should be able to lead a team. Work closely with client and share daily/weekly status Should have experience on working with Scrum methodology projects and able to deliver work on time with good quality. Individual contributor to the project. Knowledge and experience of good practice for design, build, test and deployment You possess a Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Engineering or related field. At least 3+ experience in working as a Talend developer You have strong communication and interpersonal skills and a solid track record in IT business partnering roles and driving technology initiatives and programms across the business. You are highly goal driven and work well in fast paced environments You pay strong attention to detail and deliver work that is of a high standard You possess strong analytical skills and are comfortable dealing with numerical data What's on Offer? Work within a company with a solid track record of success Excellent career development opportunities Join a well known brand within IT Software

Title: System Developer
Description: Infoglobal adalah perusahaan yang bergerak di bidang industri pertahanan selama lebih dari 20 tahun, dan menjadi salah satu pioneer dalam pengembangan avionic dalam negeri. Kualifikasi Umum Pengalaman kerja minimal 2 tahun/Fresh graduate + Portofolio project D3/S1 Informatika/Komputer/Sejenisnya. Memiliki kemampuan analitik dan algoritma yang baik. Memahami konsep struktur data, PBO, dan/atau komputasi numerik. Menguasai salah satu bidang/bahasa pemrograman berikut: Desktop: C/C++,Java, C# Web: HTML, CSS, Javascript Mobile: Android/IOS Mampu berkomunikasi dengan baik dan dapat bekerjasama dengan tim. Bersedia untuk bekerja  On-Site  (jika dibutuhkan) Penempatan Surabaya Kualifikasi Khusus (Direkomendasikan) Jika memiliki pengalaman salah satu dari  system, framework, library  berikut: OpenGL/OpenGLES GIS Linux Environment Embedded System Rest API/SOAP React, Vue, Xamarin, Flutter Matlab, Python, OpenCV, Tensorflow UI/UX Design

Title: Business Analyst (IT)
Description: Duties and Responsibilities  Act as a point of contact for Finance users in the country and Regional offices with regard to any system changes and new implementations for Finance.  Conduct requirements gathering for system enhancement and new implementation with Finance users.  Document user requirements in a Business Requirements Document and obtain signoffs from relevant stakeholders.  Act as a bridge between users and the IT application team, translating business requirements into technical spec requirements.  Liaise with the local IT team and Regional Office for IT security and compliance requirements needed to roll out the system implementation.  Coordinate with users to conduct UAT.  Organize UAT, track and document testing results and coordinate with the IT development team for required fixes  Obtain UAT signoffs from relevant stakeholders and arrange for go-live execution.

Title: Lead Data Engineer
Description: Job Description Lead and mentor junior engineers to develop their skills and grow their careers Understand and improve company business with the help of your engineering team Hire and help the company find new engineering talent Responsible for managing, and growing your team as well as your team member's promotions, demotions, hiring, firing, etc. Ensure that your team is happy, motivated, and productive at Cermati Fintech Group Work with your team to build features, maintain old code, improve and clean the code that your team owns Contribute to design decisions and review each other's code Make sure the code that your team owns will be available 24/7 and you're willing to troubleshoot and maintain the services that your team owns Work together with product manager to set the feature specs and set the target deadline. Drive the projects so you can meet the deadline with your team Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree (S1) in Computer Science or related field. Or if you don't have a Bachelor's degree, prove to us that you can code at the same level as other software engineer Should have a minimum of 5+ yrs of experience in a data engineering / data architect / software engineering role.  Had as lead, managing and handling people in a team Proven record of good mentorship and leadership in delivering high quality projects Strong hands-on experience in java, python is required. Must have shipped multiple projects with a major hands-on contribution to each project. Experience in Big data technologies: Hadoop ecosystem (map-reduce, spark, Kafka) Experience in different storage technologies: OLTP like Postgres, OLAP like Redshift, Google BigQuery, NoSQL like Redis, HBase, Kafka Familiarity with machine learning algorithms and concepts (gradient descent, logistic regression) and software libraries like pandas, TensorFlow, etc. Fluent in English (both spoken and written).

Title: Security Engineer

Works directly with client to manage initial access, map and transfer data, create process documentation, and train or coordinate training for client users. Tests and troubleshoots functionality of installed systems; identifies and documents technical issues to be escalated to product and system integration teams for resolution. Provides feedback based on client experiences to product and professional services teams for product and process improvements. May work directly with clients on-site or provide installation support remotely. Working at NTT The primary responsibility of the TS Implementation Engineer is to provide technical support to NTT (Ltd) clients. This includes remotely supporting clients within service level agreements (SLAs), to install and configure software and hardware, resolve incidents, perform root cause analysis and adhere to any related processes such as change management. The TS Implementation Engineer (L3) is involved in more complex environments for installation, configuration and fault management. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Interact with clients on site to meet complex requirements of a solution.  Escalate unresolved problems and issues to the relevant third parties.  Respond to escalated client requests and support client applications to a first line resolution.  Escalate complex problems to the relevant third parties.  Write reports and proposals and complete and maintain project documentation.  Assist with the documentation of standard operating procedures relating to installations and fixes.  Act as coach and mentor to more junior Implementation Engineers and Technicians.  Assume responsibility for the co-ordination of the activities of the Engineers, in line with performance targets.  May be required to serve periodically on the customer service desk, providing third line telephonic, remote and on-site support and problem management.  Included in higher complexity design work, with input to the design expected.  Expected to take ownership of relevant technologies according to domain or specialization.  Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Good understanding and appreciation of technical design and business principles Demonstrates project management and administration ability Good project skills which are demonstrated in the execution of installations and other assignments Demonstrate customer engagement skills Demonstrate relevant domain specialist knowledge Good verbal communication skills Client focused and display a proactive approach to solving problems Ability to work under pressure Ability to coach, mentor and provide guidance to team members Good understanding of project management principles Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Computer Science / Information Technology Degree or equivalent together with specialised training in new technologies and legacy systems or equivalent Project management certification Required Experience: Solid work experience in a technical implementation engineering or similar role Experience engaging with clients and conducting presentations Good project administration and documentation experience Report writing experience Basic project management What will make you a good fit for the role?

Title: Geospatial Engineer & Programmer
Description: · Hands-on experience with programming tools such as R, Python, JavaScript, PHP, HTML, VB etc.  · Excellent command on deep/machine learning model development using geo-spatial data through open source tools for spatial data analysis, visualization, and interpretations for effective business decisions. · Able to analyze data acquired from multiple platforms such as UAV, Aircraft & Satellites or ground based platforms, using statistical models with artificial intelligence, deep/machine learning models. · Knowledge of forestry applications such as Tissue Culture & Silviculture practices is a plus · Experience in big data management with demonstrated skills in processing, automation, compilation/integration and deployment in the processing/production server. · Develop/build and manage spatial database linking with other organizational database management systems and create channels for user interaction  · Excellent communication (English), interpersonal and presentation skills. Able to relate technical information to all levels of the organization.

Title: Linux System Engineer
Description: Requirement Minimum D3/S1 majoring in Computer Science/Computer Engineering/Informatics At least 1 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. Having basic knowledge in Server, Linux (CentOS, Red Hat, Ubuntu), Have basic knowledge OS Linux (Installation, Configuration, Troubleshoot) Have a Knowledge in Patch Management/ Patching Handle Vmware & Vsphere Have a knowledge in Scripting Automation Fammiliar with all command line in Linux

Title: Open sollicitatie Business Intelligence Consultant
Description: Wil jij aan de slag als Business Intelligence consultant? Bij Axians zoeken wij regelmatig collega’s met een passie voor data en de skills om als data engineer, data analist, data governance specialist, EPM consultant of data-architect aan de slag te gaan. Hoe ziet jouw uitdaging eruit? Over Axians Axians is een netwerkorganisatie bestaande uit gespecialiseerde IT units. De unit in Laren (NH), bestaande uit zo’n 70 collega’s, is gespecialiseerd in Data Analytics en Business Intelligence. We houden ons onder andere bezig met datavirtualisatie, datawarehouse automation, moderne (cloud) data-architecturen, data visualisaties en data governance. We werken met een duidelijke   visie   en nemen onze klanten daarin mee. Wat wij doen Wij adviseren en helpen klanten om het maximale uit hun data en mogelijkheden te halen en werken daarom tool onafhankelijk. Al hebben we wel een voorkeur voor innovatieve, schaalbare en toekomstbestendige oplossingen. We werken bijvoorbeeld graag met Snowflake, Denodo, Data Virtuality, OneStream, Board, Collibra, IBM Cognos, Tableau en de Microsoft stack waaronder Azure en PowerBI. Wij werken samen met grote, innovatieve organisaties zoals Landal, LeasePlan, Transavia, PGGM, Ten Cate Grass, Agrifirm en Pathé.  Lees hier meer over Axians Business Analytics in Laren   en over onze Smart Data, Smart Analytics en Smart Finance teams. Onze cultuur Als jij lekker in je vel zit, komen jouw kwaliteiten op je werk ook het beste tot zijn recht. Wij creëren een professionele werksfeer waar jij jezelf kan en mag zijn. Onze consultants beschrijven de cultuur in Laren als open, met een familiegevoel en professioneel. Met onze eigen academy en uitgebreide leerprogramma’s, zoals het Consultant Development Programma en het Consultant Positioning Programma, faciliteren we jouw professionele ontwikkeling. Naast het werk organiseren we regelmatig leuke activiteiten om samen met je collega’s te doen. Zoals een pub quiz, een beach clean up, fietstochten, midgetgolfen of escape rooms. Onze werkwijze is gebaseerd op onze Axians kernwaarden: empowered, verantwoordelijk, ondernemend, vertrouwend & transparant en solidair. Wat als ik deze baan graag wil? We maken graag een keer kennis. Schroom niet om contact op te nemen als je misschien (nog) niet in het profiel past. Wij worden graag verrast door jouw motivatie en unieke kwaliteiten en kijken samen met jou naar de mogelijkheden! Wil je meer weten over werken bij Axians? Laat jouw gegevens en bericht achter via de ‘solliciteer direct’ button. Of neem contact op met onze HR collega Maxime Wesel via   Maxime.Wesel@axians.com  of 06-19630634. (WhatsApp is ook een optie!) Voor meer informatie over ons, check en volg onze LinkedIn pagina  https://www.linkedin.com/company/axians-business-analytics/

Title: Senior System Analyst
Description: About you You're a go-getter with mad juggling skills (or multiple hats) who can thrive in a fast-paced, agile environment. You have a strong thirst for knowledge and are driven to find solutions that don't exist yet. You are comfortable with ambiguity and extremely resourceful (in your past life you could've been a detective) You always find a way to get things done without sacrificing the quality of your work, integrity and values. No task is off limits for you. You are humble and prioritize the success of the team over your own with an eagerness to help those around you. You don't shy away from challenges and have the ability to bounce back from setbacks. About This Role Responsible for the software development lifecycle. Provide best solution by conferring with Product manager and both foreign and local developers. Collaborate with the development team to ensure that the technical solution aligns with the business requirements. To work closely with the Application Tester to ensure that the result complies with the designed solution. Responsible for functional Specification Document and Technical Specification Document including ERD. What is required and what we’re looking for Minimum of 5 years of experience. Must be experienced in Software Development, at least 3 cycles (or more than 3 years) of Software Development to support analytical thinking and problem solving. Must be experienced in FSD (Functional Specification Design) and TSD (Technical Specification Design) document. Must be experienced in various diagram design, e.g.: UML (Unified Model Language), ArchiMate, BPM (Business Process Model), etc. Must be experienced in data flow design & database design (ERD) to provide dynamic and scalable system. Experienced in system integration and API design related. To have knowledge in K8s, Google Cloud Platform, API description, mocking and testing related, e.g.: Swagger, Apiary, etc. To have knowledge in Apigee, Open API Specification, Middleware, e.g.: EAI, ESB, OSB (preferably). Practical experienced in Scrum or other agile methodology (preferably) To have background as Developer (plus value) To Have knowledge in MSSQL DB, PostGre DB To have previous working industry in FSI (Financial Services Institution), e.g.: Bank, Insurance, Consumer Financing, etc. Able to communicate in English.

Title: MS Engineer
Description: Want to be a part of our team? Provides technical support to field engineers, technicians, and product support personnel who are diagnosing, troubleshooting, repairing, and debugging complex electro/mechanical equipment, computer systems, complex software, or networked and/or wireless systems. Responds to situations where first-line product support has failed to isolate or fix problems in malfunctioning equipment or software. Reports design, reliability, and maintenance problems or bugs to design engineering/software engineering. May be involved in customer installation and training. Provides support to customers/users where the product is highly technical or sophisticated in nature. Working at NTT The MS Engineer is responsible for providing a service to clients by proactively identifying and resolving technical incidents and problems. Through preemptive service incident and resolution activities, as well as product reviews, operational improvements, operational practices, and quality assurance this role will maintain a high level of service to clients. Their primary objective is to ensure zero missed service level agreement (SLA) conditions .The MS Engineer s responsible for managing tickets of low to high complexity. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Ensure that assigned infrastructure at the client site is configured, installed, tested, and operational Perform necessary checks, apply monitoring tools and respond to alerts Identify problems and errors prior to or when it occurs and log all such incidents in a timely manner with the required level of detail Assist in analyzing, assigning, and escalating support calls Investigate third line support calls assigned and identify the root cause of incidents and problems Report and escalate issues to 3rd party vendors if necessary Provide onsite technical support to clients and provide field engineering services to clients Conduct a monthly random review of incidents and service requests, analyze and recommend improvement in quality Provide continuous feedback to clients and affected parties and update all systems and/or portals as prescribed by NTT Proactively identify opportunities for work optimization including opportunities for automation of work Knowledge, Skills, and Attributes: Ability to communicate and work across different cultures and social groups Ability to plan activities and projects well in advance, and takes into account possible changing circumstances Ability to maintain a positive outlook at work Ability to work well in a pressurized environment Ability to work hard and put in longer hours when it is necessary Ability to apply active listening techniques such as paraphrasing the message to confirm understanding, probing for further relevant information, and refraining from interrupting Ability to adapt to changing circumstances Ability to place clients at the forefront of all interactions, understanding their requirements, and creating a positive client experience throughout the total client journey Academic Qualifications Advanced diploma, degree, or relevant qualification in IT/Computing (or demonstrated equivalent work experience) Required Experience: Demonstrated work experience Demonstrated experience required in Engineering function within a medium to large ICT organization Demonstrated experience of Managed Services Demonstrated working knowledge of ITIL processes Demonstrated experience working with vendors and/or 3rd parties What will make you a good fit for the role?

Title: IT Programmer
Description: Hai LinkedInera! PT Voksel Electric Tbk is looking for IT Programmer. 1. Candidate possess at least Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication) or equivalent. 2. At least 2 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. 3. Experience in IoT technology : sensors, gateways, protocols, cloud, application development 4. Have knowlegde ini wireless radio systems, satellite communication systems, broadband wireless access 5. Experince ini microcontroller and Mini PC 6. Expert in Programming language preferable for Phyton and C++ 6. Fast and effective coding 7. Have a strong programming and analytical skills 8. Willing to be located in Cileungsi (Near Kota Wisata – Cibubur) Send your resume  recruitment@voksel.co.id Subject Name-IT Programmer

Title: Geospatial Engineer & Programmer
Description: · Hands-on experience with programming tools such as R, Python, JavaScript, PHP, HTML, VB etc.  · Excellent command on deep/machine learning model development using geo-spatial data through open source tools for spatial data analysis, visualization, and interpretations for effective business decisions. · Able to analyze data acquired from multiple platforms such as UAV, Aircraft & Satellites or ground based platforms, using statistical models with artificial intelligence, deep/machine learning models. · Knowledge of forestry applications such as Tissue Culture & Silviculture practices is a plus · Experience in big data management with demonstrated skills in processing, automation, compilation/integration and deployment in the processing/production server. · Develop/build and manage spatial database linking with other organizational database management systems and create channels for user interaction  · Excellent communication (English), interpersonal and presentation skills. Able to relate technical information to all levels of the organization.

Title: Computer Vision Engineer
Description: Job Description Transform the technical requirements into application features. Develop the application using traditional and modern computer vision stacks. Work together to set specifications, integrate, and test the application. Present technical information and hold discussions with clients and business partners. Evaluate existing application’s features. Develop technical documentation and handbooks of the application. Requirements A Bachelor or Master in Computer Science, Mathematics, Computer Engineering, Mechatronics, or related fields. Familiar with various video stream methods (WebRTC, RTMP, and RTSP) and data communication protocols (WebSocket and REST API). Strong experience in using computer vision libraries such as OpenCV, PIL, etc. Good understanding and hands-on experience of Deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow, PyTorch, etc. Experience working with cloud services platform (AWS or GCP) to build ML/DL pipelines is a plus. Experience in developing computer vision stacks for edge devices or mobile platforms are preferred. Experience in various deployment scenarios using containerization systems and microservices are preferred. Hands-on experience in building ML models deployed into real-world business applications or research is a plus. Good MLOps knowledge is preferable. Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English are preferred. Relevant certifications in machine learning and cloud technologies (e.g., AWS, Coursera) would be a plus. Willing to be based in Bandung and willing to travel to some places in Asia-Pacific region (post-pandemic).
