Title: Senior Security Analyst
Description: Job Description: IT security management and maintaining the best practice for information security standard in both internal organization and external customers. Periodical evaluation of security breaching for internal and external network environment. Frequent combating with latest threats from APT, zero-day attack, malware outbreak. Requirements: Minimum S1 Have knowledge about SIEM will be added advantage. Familiar with IBM Security tools, forensic investigation, cybersecurity, ethical hacking, network security, etc. Familiar with and have done log monitoring, management, and reporting. Can handle pressure at work especially with higher management. Having a high interest in IT Security and a fast learner.

Title: Senior Data Engineer
Description: Company Description Orange provides your personalized go-to pool of strategy planners, creatives, and technologists for your brand and campaign that aren't part of your daily routine. Strategic managers, content specialists, conceptual creatives, producers, SEO experts, product managers, and others are among the impact players who are held match-fit for your brand. Job Description Design and build highly scalable pipeline (end-to-end) for large volumes of complex data processing and analysis Build and develop large data warehouses, high performance data processing pipelines, and ETL tools Ensure high data integrity and quality from various data sources Design and implement process improvements, build automated processes, optimize data delivery and re-designing infrastructure for larger scalability Work with machine learning systems in production Understanding of software design principles and best practices (test driven development, source control management etc.) Able to clearly articulate pros and cons of different technologies, solutions and platforms Able to document use cases, solutions and recommendations Qualifications Solid experience and knowledge on Google Cloud Platform (or any of the major cloud solution providers such as AWS, Azure, AliCloud) for data management: Composer, Pubsub, Google Storage, Dataflow, Big Query and Data Fusion, or equivalent Savvy with Airflow, or a diverse set of data technologies: Redshift, Elastic Search, PostgreSQL, Spark, Hadoop, Kubernetes Fluency in Python, SQL, Java or equivalent Understanding of SQL & NoSQL databases and other manipulation tools Ability to work with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-streaming, etc. Able to benchmark systems, analyse performance and bottlenecks and propose solutions to resolve them Excellent written and verbal communication, able to switch between technical and plain language when discussing work Able to work in teams, understand and empathize with all major stakeholders, take the lead on initiatives and direct and manage data engineers Able to work in a fast-paced agile development environment Powered by JazzHR IUzWcYniZA

Title: Data Engineer/Architect (AI/ML)
Description: At Snaphunt, we believe that the future of work is remote. We specialize in helping our highly-skilled, global specialist talent community around the world, connect with innovative companies looking scale their global teams quickly and cost-effectively. The Role Developing high-quality code to build and deploy machine learning models. Extraction, transformation, loading and integration of data from various sources. Supporting translation of data business needs into technical system requirements. Working with stakeholders to understand needs regarding data structure, availability, scalability and accessibility. Providing secure, stable, scalable and cost-effective solutions to facilitate storage, integration, usage, access, and delivery of data assets across the business. Recommending, developing and implementing ways to improve data reliability, efficiency, and quality. Ideal Profile You possess a degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Engineering or related field. You have at least 4 years experience within a Data Engineer/ Architect role. Ability to conceive the data picture from an organisational perspective, and bridge gap between current state and future goals. Demonstrated experience working with large and complex data sets as well as experience analyzing volumes of data. Exposure/expertise in one or more of emerging tools like columnar and NoSQL databases, predictive analytics, data visualization, and unstructured data. Strong expertise in data modelling & database design. You possess strong knowledge of Python. Expertise in Data Modeling / Statistical Modeling, Extraction, Transformation & Load (ETL) and Machine Learning would be highly valuable. You possess strong analytical skills and are comfortable dealing with numerical data You are a strong team player who can manage multiple stakeholders You are highly goal driven and work well in fast paced environments What's on Offer? Join a fast growing startup that is disrupting the way employers discover & hire talent globally Work closely with the founding team on developing & deploying machine learning models

Title: Senior System Analyst
Description: Qualifications Bachelor's degree in computer science or information technology, or equivalent experience 4-6 years experience working with information technologies and systems analysis Strong computer, hardware, software, and analytical skills Proven ability to assess business needs and translate them into relevant solutions Strong understanding and knowledge of the principles and practices associated with database maintenance and administration Experience installing, configuring, documenting, testing, training, and implementing new applications and systems Working knowledge of Java programming languages  Excellent analytical skills

Title: IT Engineer
Description: Job Description Merancang, mengembangkan, melaksanakan dan memelihara IT (Infrasturcture) sehingga seluruh perangkat teknologi informasi yang ada dapat berfungsi optimal sesuai kebutuhan Minimum Qualifications Menguasai Jaringan TCP/IP Mampu mengkonfigurasi switch layer dan layer 3 Cisco Mampu mengkonfigurasi peralatan berbasis Mikrotik Menguasai jaringan wireless Menguasai sistem operasi windows dan linux server Paham bahasa pemrograman bisa menjadi nilai tambah Mampu setup dan manage infrastruktur server berbasis Google cloud dan AWS Mampu setup dan manage VMware atau Hypervisor server Berpengalaman untuk setup dan trouble shooting di cloud yang digunakan saat ini yaitu Amazon Web Service (AWS) dan Google Cloud Platform (GCP) About Kompas Gramedia Kompas Gramedia, through its more than 50 years of history, is striving for one goal: enlightening and empowering Indonesia. To ensure that we are able to serve the nation for another 50 years, we are undergoing a digital transformation; strengthening and expanding our solid business pillars by developing new digital business initiatives. Our vision is to enlight all the people in Indonesia with all the knowledge we have.

Title: Vmware Engineer
Description: Bachelor’s degree from Comp Science / electrical engineering / informatics engineering (Min GPA. 3.0)  Having good knowledge with Operating System Windows and Linux  Having experience min 1 year in same field will be advantages.  Having basic knowledge Networking technologies (LAN, WAN, Cisco, Mikrotik)  Having good knowledge about Active Directory  Having knowledge with Server, Vmware , Storage.  Must have Good Communication skills.

Title: IT Business System Analyst
Description: Job Descriptions Analyzing business structures, systems and processes, as well as reviewing references and other related supporting documents Provide proposed solutions to improve the performance of a business process Prioritizing initiatives based on business needs and requirements. Establishing communication and providing support to other work units in order to achieve effective cross-division cooperation Perform ad-hoc tasks requested by the supervisor Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for the execution of projects, report and escalate as needed. Assisting the sales team / project management team in meeting with clients on technical aspect Understand the basic knowledge of all the company's products Understand knowledge on basic hardware architecture to support sales and service delivery Requirements At least 2 years of experience in Business / System Analyst work or equivalent Bachelor's degree preferably in Information Technology or Information System Has experience in banking/insurance/finance is a must Experienced in complex business process analysis & mapping by using various kind of diagram such as Use Case, Flowchart, Sequence Diagram, etc. Familiar with AS400 Familiar with Unified Modeling Language (UML). Familiar with SDLC, Object Oriented Design Patterns. Having knowledge in business intelligence would be an advantage The ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine acceptable solutions Excellent planning, organizational, and time management skills Excellent documentation skills Willing to Work from Office in Jakarta Area

Title: IT Performance Management
Description: This position will develop, evaluate and monitor the implementation and performance of IT services including service desk, IT’s performance, and IT compliance in order to meet standards of the rules and procedures to all of the internal stakeholders. Responsibilities Monitor high level service level and identify areas for service improvement Assist to ensure each of the service understands and does all of standart and rules from the company about ethics or procedures in every customer's handling. Regularly collect, analyse, and share data to help agents, internal/business teams and management to drive improvement in key business metrics, customer experience, and business results Utilise database and/or technologies to design, develop, enhance and evaluate innovative report/business through intelligence tools and automated reports Perform data conversions, imports, and exports of data within and between internal and external systems Train users to transform data into action-oriented information and to use that information correctly Providing recommendations for service improvements Giving inputs / suggestions to each agent/unit in increasing service capabilities in service customers. Setting system performance objectives foreach systems in place and perform audit as when necessary Perform analysis of benefit of the system perceived by business users in accordance with committed success criteria / business case at the initiation phase. Perform data analysis pertaining to system usage in periodic basis, and provide suggestion for improvement Requirements Min S1 in Information Systems, Information Technology, Computer Science, or other related disciplines Min 3-5 years on Data Analyst / Engineer / Service Management  Have a solid background and technical skills in their area of specialisation. They must also understand business metric performance, and target setting. Have an experiences developing data dashboard from the beginning, maintaining the data performance and data framework Require the ability to analyse large amounts of data and provide recommendations to support the development of long and short-term IT management performance strategies.

Title: Sr Corp Secretary & Investor RelationsÂ officer
Description: Gambaran Pekerjaan  Mengatur proses pertemuan investor/analis sekuritas/komunitas pasar modal dengan perusahaan (termasuk penyelenggaraan RUPS) sesuai dengan kebutuhan informasi sehingga informasi dapat tersampaikan secara optimal.  Mempersiapkan materi pelaporan, presentasi dan press release terkait dengan kondisi bisnis perusahaan secara berkala (termasuk Financial Report) sehingga dapat digunakan oleh investor/analis sekuritas/komunitas pasar modal dalam mengevaluasi kondisi perusahaan.  Mendistribusikan materi publikasi perusahaan kepada shareholder dan stakeolder terkait untuk mewujudkan proses transparansi sesuai kaidah Good Corporate Governance.  Memonitor pergerakan dan kepemilikan saham perusahaan di pasar modal sehingga dapat digunakan sebagai bahan evaluasi tingkat kepercayaan investor terhadap kondisi perusahaan.  Mendokumentasikan seluruh berita/press release/publikasi dari komunitas pasar modal terkait dengan kinerja perusahaan sehingga dapat dijadikan bahan evaluasi terhadap kondisi perusahaan.  Melakukan dan mempersiapkan analisis data terkait perusahaan yang dapat memengaruhi pemegang saham. Mencakup data yang bersumber secara internal mengenai keuangan triwulanan perusahaan hingga tren yang ditemukan oleh analis pihak ketiga tentang industri secara keseluruhan. Kualifikasi Sarjana, jurusan Bisnis & Manajemen lebih diutamakan Pengalaman 3 tahun lebih diutamakan Skill yang Dibutuhkan Database Management & Administration Statstical Skill Reporting Skill Business & Market Analyst

Title: Corporate IT Business Analyst
Description: It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing! Job Description General Responsibilities Manage transformational IT projects such as organizational process and system improvement, multi-country implementation, cost optimization, company-wide IT service, etc. Maintain effective communication and working relationships with various stakeholders and peers on the project performance. Collect feedback from stakeholders to identify potential improvements in the Information Technology context. Provide recommendations to the development of processes & tools across departments. Prepare and implement monthly PDCA/ improvement ideas Deliver effective presentations of assessment findings & recommendations to high-level management. Specialized Responsibilities Manage IT Service Management (ITSM), IT Asset Management (ITAM), and IT Operation Management (ITOM) projects, such as Incident, Problem, Change, Release, Deployment, Access, Service Request and Service Level Management initiatives as a Project Manager and create documentation relevant to their scope. Identify the current state of ITSM, ITAM, ITOM processes & procedures (such as invoicing process and reports alignment with the product team), and facilitate the implementation of all necessary improvements. Identify and collect inefficiency and cost-saving opportunities, and provide recommendations. Coordinate the creation and review of IT related guidelines and relevant documentation and the rollout, including the socialization. Lead the development of documentation templates (weekly/ monthly reports, announcement, postmortem, project review, etc) in the IT Service Management context. Coordinate and plan the regular reviews or audits or assessments on the current IT processes and technologies. Lead the IT Work Intake process as an IT Portfolio Manager and ensure that all new project request processed via the defined process and preliminary scopes or budget identified Design and maintain the technology business case/ work intake template. Requirements General Requirements Strong educational background with a minimum of Bachelor’s degree from a well-known and accredited university. 5 years of experience as an IT Business Analyst, IT Strategy, IT Portfolio, or IT Governance (for the senior role). 2 years of experience as an IT Business Analyst, IT Strategy, IT Portfolio, or IT Governance (for the junior role). Must have a mix of technical IT knowledge and general business knowledge to locate business problems and potential solutions. Excellent command of spoken and written English and Bahasa Indonesia and the ability to work across multiple countries. Strong presentation and communication skills to deliver findings and recommendations. Willingness to travel extensively to all Traveloka offices. Specialized Requirements Experience in Project Management or Program Management roles with demonstrated knowledge of both traditional Waterfall and Agile methodologies. Strong knowledge of ITSM/ITIL frameworks, ITGC, ITELC, or other relevant frameworks/ standards. Must be familiar with the technology and the business implication of technology. Strong experience in reviewing and optimizing the business & IT operational processes. Understanding of general business concepts such as TCO, timeline, cost & expense, etc, including apply these skills to practical business decision-making. Experience in creating Business Cases with a structured and factual approach. Exceptional documentation skills and attention to detail for documentation (document versioning & storage, processes/procedures/ policy documentation, cash flow documentation, etc.) Experience in designing and implementing ITSM initiatives, not only on the process but also on the tools. If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Title: TS Implementation Engineer (L1)

Title: Linux Engineer
Description: Want to be a part of our team? MS Engineer (L2) is responsible for providing a managed service to clients to ensure that their IT infrastructure and systems remain operational. Through the proactive monitoring, identifying, investigating and resolving of technical incidents and problems, the MS Engineer (L2) are able to restore service to clients. Their primary objective is to proactively review client requests or tickets and apply technical/process knowledge to resolve them without breaching service level agreement (SLA). The MS Engineer (L2) focuses on second line support for incidents and requests with medium level of complexity. Radford reference: "Performs IT functions such as design, analysis, evaluation, testing, debugging and implementation of applications programs supporting the company infrastructure business processes and operations and/or network-based (cloud) product systems. Analyzes, installs, acquires, modifies and supports operating systems, database or utilities software. Plans, conducts and directs the analysis of business problems with automated systems solutions. Analyzes, designs, acquires and implements projects for LAN and/or WAN systems. Plans, designs, acquires and implements telecommunications voice/wire systems. At higher job levels, may contribute to the development, testing, evaluation or design of system or infrastructure architecture used throughout the IT solution set." Working at NTT Key Roles and Responsibilities:  Proactively monitors the work queues.  Perform operational tasks to resolve all incidents / requests in a timely manner and within agreed SLA.  Update tickets with resolution tasks performed Identify, Investigate, analyse issues and errors prior to or when they occur and log all such incidents in a timely manner. Capture all required and relevant information for immediate resolution Provide second level support to all incidents, requests and identify the root cause of incidents and problems Communicate with other teams and clients for extending support Execute changes with clear identification of risks and mitigation plans to be captured into the change record Follow the shift hand over process highlighting any key tickets to be focussed along with a handover of upcoming critical tasks to be carried out in the next shift Escalate all tickets to seek right focus from CoE and other teams, if needed continue the escalations to management Work with automation teams for effort optimization and automating routine tasks Coach Service Desk and L1 teams for technical and behavioural skills Establish monitoring for client infrastructure Identify problems and errors before they impact a client’s service Lead and manages all initial client escalation for operational issues.  Contribute to the change management process by logging all change requests with complete details for standard and non-standard including patching and any other changes to Configuration Items. Ensures all changes are carried out with proper change approvals Plan and execute approved maintenance activities Audit and analyse incident and request tickets for quality and recommends improvements with updates to knowledge articles.  Produce trend analysis reports for identifying tasks for automation, leading to reduction in tickets and optimization of effort Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Have Experience in Linux Redhat Family Have Experience in Virtualization and Container Technology (Kubernetes) Having Linux Certification is an advantage Having Certification in VM or container (CKA) is an advantage Ability to communicate and work across different cultures and social groups Ability to maintain a positive outlook at work Ability to work well in a high-pressure environment Ability to work hard and put in longer hours when it is necessary Ability to apply active listening techniques such as paraphrasing the message to confirm understanding, probing for further relevant information and refraining from interrupting Ability to adapt to changing circumstances Ability to place client at the forefront of all interactions, understanding their requirements and creating a positive client experience throughout the total client journey Eager to learn new technologies and developing skills Academic Qualifications: Diploma, degree or relevant qualification in IT/Computing (or demonstrated equivalent work experience) Advantageous Certifications: RHEL, VCP, CKA, MCSA, MCSE Any of the above certifications is a plus. The MS – Services Engineer (L2) is expected to gain certifications relevant to services supported. Certifications carry additional weightage on candidate’s qualification for the role. Required Experience: At least 3 years experience in managing Linux Redhat Systems At least 1 year experience in Kubernetes or any open-source container technology What will make you a good fit for the role? Standard career level descriptor for job level:  Seasoned and experienced professional  Has full understanding of specialisation area  Resolves wide range of issues in creative ways  Fully qualified, career level, career journey-orientated  Uses good judgement in selecting tools and methods to solve problems  Networks with senior internal and external people in own area of expertise  Receives little instruction on day-to-day work, receives general instructions on new assignments  Typically requires demonstrable related experience with a Bachelor’s or equivalent degree; or moderate level experience and a Master’s or equivalent degree; or a PhD or equivalent degree without experience; or equivalent work experience

Title: Sr. Database Engineer
Description: Pioneering Database team in the company|Maintain and manage highly scalable and large-sized database About Our Client Our client is a local homegrown financial services startup with multiple lines of product. Job Description A Senior Database Engineer will be responsible for: Analyze and improve efficiency, scalability, and stability of application relational databases. Build, secure, and scale various types of data stores for upcoming new services and applications. Apply modern engineering methodologies such as infrastructure as code, encrypting sensitive data, and automated tests. Regularly review database schema design Build and execute backup and archival strategies for the databases. Build and execute replication, HA, and clustering strategies for optimal performance and failovers. Regularly monitor and quickly respond to any database related issues both during working hours as well as scheduled on call times. Develop simple and complex stored procedures, functions and views to meet enhancement requirements. The Successful Applicant A successful candidate will have: Possess more than 4 years of experience designing, building, and scaling RDBMs for large and high throughput OLTP database systems. Possess proficiency in Linux based OS and open source tools. Have a great knowledge of SQL and database design skills. Have good understanding and knowledge of performance tuning of the queries, database indexing and internals of the databases like PostgreSQL. Good knowledge of tooling for close monitoring and alerting of database systems. Experience with replication strategies, secure backup and building HA systems with tools like Patroni. Deep expertise in Postgresql preferred. Able to communicate using English both verbally and in writing. Experience with other databases (relational, NoSQL, document, graph etc) and cloud native will be a plus. What's on Offer Flexible working arrangement Opportunity to develop database administration practices Contact: Dyah Alya Gretiana Quote job ref: JN-092022-5749295

We aim to deliver a cutting-edge, seamless, effective, and efficient system for our clients. Job description: Perform L3 support to clients Design, development, and testing of Odoo modules Complete and clear documentation for every performed task Perform testing of new functions/ modifications Perform System Integration Testing, Unit Testing, assist users in User Acceptance Testing, and conduct user training Perform Data Migration Configuration, installation, and maintenance of the server and multi-database Odoo environments Provide the best possible solutions for client needs Candidate Requirements: Proficient in written & spoken English Eager to learn a new programming language and technology Passionate about working in an IT System Developer Team Able to work under pressure Ability to work on a dynamic and fast-paced team Ability to work and communicate with the whole company Open-minded Data-driven, growth mindset, ability to think outside the box and identify the real pain point, and come up with the best practical solutions Quick learner A Glimpse of Working with PT BION DIGITAL INDONESIA: Working on a fun team that will welcome you as a family instead of an employee Chance to collaborate with other big companies (national and international) across Indonesia and the globe Dynamic working conditions and environment Direct communication and discussion with anyone within the company Transparent company inside out Fixed salary And more company benefits, which will be explained in the later recruitment stage! Job Requirements: Deep understanding of ERP (Odoo) and Python Understanding of PostgreSQL, Javascript, XML, SCSS, HTML, Java, Qweb Able to operate Linux, Git Familiar with the Ubuntu environment Write clean code to develop functional web application Build reusable code and libraries for future use Troubleshoot and debug applications Creating software documentation Gather and address technical and design requirements Provide training and support to the internal teams Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related fields, with a minimum GPA of 3.00/4.00 or equivalent Working experience: 2-5 years in Odoo ERP Please note that this is a full-time role This role will start approximately in May 2023 Job Location (WFO, On-site): Jakarta Head Office Ruko Puri Mansion, West Jakarta If you are interested in this job, please apply via LinkedIn. Our team will contact you if you are shortlisted for the interview process. Industry: IT Employment type: On-time, 4 days of WFO, and 1 day of WFH

Title: Senior Data Analyst (Bangkok Based, Relocation Provided)
DATA SCIENTIST - Dubai, UAE
Description: Location:  Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance) Annual Base Salary range of  $75,000 - $100,000 per annum  + performance-based bonus - 0% tax environment + an opportunity to join our employee share scheme About Cobblestone Energy Cobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading. We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business. At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people alongside constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways. With the right performance and potential, you could be managing the power desk for an entire country within eighteen months in your role. Come join our dream team! Cobblestone Values Lifelong learning with continuous reflection  Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas  The team is more important than the individual Being the best in any market we enter Hiring and keeping only the most effective people  Others must benefit from our existence.  What We Offer In This Role A full-time position on our Commercial team Committed and remarkably talented colleagues.  Highly competitive compensation dependent on performance  An exciting, challenging and fulfilling career.  Investment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in business.  Equity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long term.  Summary:  We are seeking a highly motivated and talented Data Scientist to join our dynamic team. With a passion for data-driven solutions and a strong academic background, the successful candidate will play a key role in supporting our business decisions and driving operational efficiencies through the use of advanced analytics and predictive modelling techniques. Key Responsibilities: Analyse large and complex datasets to uncover key insights and inform business decisions.  Design and implement predictive models to support the optimization of trading strategies and market forecasting.  Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business needs and develop data-driven solutions Stay up to date with the latest advancements in data science and machine learning and apply these to the power trading domain  Communicate findings and insights to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.  Requirements: 2-3 years of experience in data science or a related field, with a proven track record of success  Strong academic background in computer science, mathematics, statistics, or a related field  Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills  Proficiency in python programming language.  Knowledge of machine learning algorithms and data visualization tools  Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, cross-functional team environment.  This is an outstanding opportunity for a driven and talented Data Scientist to join a market-leading power trading company and make a significant impact on our business operations. If you possess a passion for data science and a proven track record of success, we encourage you to apply. Note: While previous work experience in the power trading domain is highly desirable, it is not a requirement for this role.

Title: Application Engineer
Description: Tanggung Jawab : Membuat desain teknis sesuai permintaan tender Pantau kinerja produksi, diagnosis anomali apa pun, dan rekomendasikan solusi teknik. Melakukan kegiatan optimalisasi produksi untuk memastikan keandalan dan kinerja sumur yang optimal. Merekomendasikan desain ESP & HPS menggunakan perangkat lunak desain Kualifikasi : Pendidikan S1 Teknik Perminyakan Pengalaman min 2 tahun di bidang Tender Memahami proses tender Memahami tentang Electrical Submersible Pump (ESP) dan Horizontal Pumping System (HPS) Mengerti proses design ESP dan HPS Bersedia penempatan Cikarang, Jawa Barat

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Who are we? Amar Bank is one of the most technologically advanced digital banks in Indonesia. Our leading digital lending product, Tunaiku has the distinction of being the first FinTech product in Indonesia. We are also the first digital bank on the cloud. As the first profitable digital bank, we managed to get listed on the Indonesian Stock Exchange. How did we manage to do that? We are changing people’s perception of a bank. We believe we are the innovators who combine customer focus principles with creating technology-based impact. We incorporate freedom and flexibility as part of our startup working culture DNA to encourage innovation in creating better financial solutions for the banking industry. We think of ourselves as, ‘A technology company with a banking license’. For this reason, we ‘Act like a FinTech, and think like a Bank.’ How did it all start? Founded on March 15, 1991, in Surabaya as PT Anglomas International Bank (Amin Bank), the bank was acquired by Tolaram Group and transformed to PT Bank Amar Indonesia (Amar Bank) in 2014. It has then undergone a significant digital transformation to become one of the country's forerunning fintech institutions through its award-winning digital lending platform, Tunaiku. Our philosophy, mission, and vision Technology must impact lives, must improve lives. We exist to provide banking to those who ‘need’ and not only to those who ‘want’. Services when provided to those who need at the time of their need brings smiles. Our vision is to bring 200 million smiles. More about the bank with startup culture environment Consist of 1000+ people, you will meet people who love to grow, dream big, and actually have fun at the workplace! We provide a great working environment that pushes people to grow outside their comfort zone. People with high drive and ambition find us a very attractive place to work as their career growth matches their own drive and not any staid policies. Thus we hold the honor of being awarded “Best Place to Work in Indonesia”. Recently Amar Bank was awarded as Inspirational Brand from APEA (Asia Pacific Enterprise Awards) 2022. Of course, our innovation won't stop here. So if you would love to be a part of it, have a growth mindset, and are constantly hungry for challenges, we invite you to join us in our journey to ‘Impact Lives’. Join us today and create #unlimitedinnovations! Business Analyst staff will be directly reporting to Business Analyst Circle Lead and also EVP Finance. He/She will have a great deal of exposure about the company’s businesses especially its flagship product, Tunaiku and Finance related matters. Will be involved in various stage of business process along with other team members and other functions. Due to the nature of the job, it is also expected that the team member is committed to the position. Responsibilities: Analyze the current processes Assist and coordinate with related parties in designing an effective and efficient workflows Implements and monitors the progress of development projects to ensure the smooth running of business and compliance within the industry environment Collect data and analyze the Bank's performance, including financial reports, in accordance with predetermined deadlines Provide proposed solutions to improve the performance of a business process Establish communication and provide support to other work units in order to achieve effective cross-division cooperation Perform ad-hoc tasks requested by the supervisor Requirements: 2-3 years working experience Experience in working in a team-oriented and collaborative environment Experienced candidates is expected to have experience or exposure in the related field, experience in the fintech industry is a plus Analytics and detail-oriented are must Eagerness to learn and share with others Have good critical thinking and detail-oriented is a must Language proficiency: Bahasa and English Strong in numbers is a plus point Bonus Point: Proficient in excel Familiar with BI tools such as Looker Our keen eye for finance won't go unnoticed at Amar Bank. We do budgeting, investor relations-managing, and assisting executives in making decisions that affect the organization. It's our job to take responsibility for the financial health of the organization. We act as the floodgates when money comes in and goes out. We also collaborate closely with top executives and departments to innovate an idea-friendly organizational financial culture. Our keen eye for finance won't go unnoticed at Amar Bank. We do budgeting, investor relations-managing, and assisting executives in making decisions that affect the organization. It's our job to take responsibility for the financial health of the organization. We act as the floodgates when money comes in and goes out. We also collaborate closely with top executives and departments to innovate an idea-friendly organizational financial culture.

Title: Odoo Developer
Description: We are seeking a talented Odoo Developer to join our team. As an Odoo Developer, you will be responsible for developing and customizing Odoo modules and applications, as well as maintaining and upgrading existing ones. Responsibilities: Developing and customizing Odoo modules and applications according to client requirements Troubleshooting and debugging Odoo applications Maintaining and upgrading existing Odoo applications Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement new features Creating technical documentation for developed modules and applications Participating in code reviews and ensuring code quality Staying up-to-date with new Odoo releases and updates Assisting in the development of new integrations between Odoo and other systems Requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field Proven experience as an Odoo Developer (minimum 2 years) Strong programming skills in Python and JavaScript Experience with PostgreSQL, XML, and web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) Experience in the development and customization of Odoo modules Knowledge of software development methodologies (Agile, Scrum) Excellent communication and collaboration skills Ability to work independently as well as in a team

Title: Oracle Application Developer
Description: As an  Oracle Application Developer , you will assist in developing the project schedule and post-implementation review activities. Undertaking comprehensive unit and integration testing in accordance with SDLC standards. Coordinating User Acceptance Testing (UAT) as well as ensuring proper and complete UAT sign-off on business applications. Develop test plan, and data and undertake complete unit and modular testing activities  Ensure all documentation of all coding changes and enhancements is in compliance with existing procedures  Ensure UAT completion and sign-off by users  Qualifications Complete Diploma/Bachelor's Degree in IT, Computer Science, or equivalent Have 4 years of experience in JAVA Application Development Framework (ADF)  Excellent communication skills in English both Verbal and Written Ability to work in fast faces environment, multi-task, prioritize in managing workloads, and meet deadlines  Technical Skills Required: Oracle Application Developer (prefer version 10g,11g, and above), ADF faces (Taskflows), ADF Business Components ( AM, VO, EO) Location: Malaysia (On-site) During the recruitment  processes , only shortlisted candidates will be contacted

Title: IT Business Analyst
Description: Analyze and design effective & efficient designs for User requests related to technical needs for application development according to User needs Coordinate with internal and external parties to determine functional needs and scope Searching for solutions or vendors and assessing those solutions or vendors related to the technical needs of application development using digital technology Translating User needs into functional requirements Perform development and maintenance of functional documents (FSD), Test Scenario Ensuring that the implemented solutions meet with User needs Sharing knowledge related to the application development and implementation process to the teams involved, from the business team to the operations team Provide assistance for the consultation process during the testing process if needed. Title: Data Engineer Instructor (Part-Time)
Description: As an Instructor, you will help in teaching and guiding students through their learning process. You will be expected to review, explain the project, and help students with project work. The Instructor will also guide the students to understand what they should be working on, reach their project goals, and are understanding concepts in the curriculum for being able to teach. J ob Title : Data Engineering Part-Time Instructor Category : Part Time Responsibilities  Be able to teach the course content  Lead in-class exercises, and project time, and participate in lecture discussions  Motivate students to move through the challenges of learning a new skill Skills Bachelor's Degree or above in Information Systems, Computer Science, or related fields Min. 3 years of experience in Data Engineering Experiencing data engineering and cloud data processing services (AWS and Google Cloud Platform) Knowledge of SQL and Python, other languages are preferred (PySpark, Java) Good understanding of ETL tools (Airflow, Glue, Dataflow, and data modeling) Able to create data visualization with Tableau  Interest or experience in Big Data technologies (Hadoop, Talend, Hive, Spark, Data Bricks, Snowflake)   Experience with Data Warehousing and Analytics Solution Architecture

Title: Data Engineer
Description: An emerging company that works with financial institutions, banks, NBFCs, and digital lending organizations to increase the efficiency of their collection efforts is looking for a Data Engineer. The selected candidate will be responsible for ensuring that the developed platforms meet standards set for reliability, security, scalability, and cost-effectiveness. Major banks and NBFCs are among the company's clients, allowing them to increase their NPA, geographic reach, and customer experience in a cost-effective manner. The company uses technology, automated intelligence, and the most efficient legal channels to resolve stressed assets. During their Series A round, the company managed to raise more than $28mn in funding. Job Responsibilities: Work with functional programming languages like SQL and Python to conduct data analysis  Build and maintain modern machine learning production systems Extract, transform, and stage data for data scientists using data querying tools Update senior team members and junior business partners about moderately complex business analytics Work with limited mentorship of data scientists on feature generation Thoroughly test checks and balances to ensure data accuracy Build ongoing mechanisms for visualizing results of the model Job Requirements: Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience) At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a Data Engineer Must possess experience in working with database technology such as Hadoop, EMR, Redshift, Spark, or Scala and one ML model implementation Expertise in coding using Python, Shell, or SQL Must have a thorough understanding of scalable model training leveraging big data platforms Strong base in working with ML libraries/frameworks like Tensorflow, AWS Sagemaker, Keras, etc. Should be able to script ETL jobs and configure real-time data pipelines Professional experience of working with parallel processing data technologies like Spark or Hadoop  Understanding of orchestration tools like Apache Airflow Prior experience of working on highly available distributed systems of data extraction, ingestion, and processing of large data sets Excellent business and interpersonal skills to collaborate with major stakeholders

Track all development tasks, bug fixing and enhancements Write Unit Testing, API, and component tests to ensure safety net of regression tests for effective refactoring Write documentation of project & code Participate in the entire application lifecycle, focusing on coding and debugging Work closely with Product Manager & Engineering teams and other stakeholders to deeply understand customer’s problems, business & product requirements Work on bug fixing and improving application performance Be up-to-date and knowledgeable about back-end technology Experience working remotely and good communication. Requirements At least 1-3 years of experience as Golang Developer or Back End Developer. Experience developing well-engineered, testable code in a modern programming language Experience with microservice architecture Experience with TDD, BDD Experience with Database RDBMS or NoSQL Familiarity with design REST API Experience with GRPC or MQ (kafka, RabbitMQ, etc).

Title: Open sollicitatie Business Intelligence Consultant
Description: Wil jij aan de slag als Business Intelligence consultant? Bij Axians zoeken wij regelmatig collega’s met een passie voor data en de skills om als data engineer, data analist, data governance specialist, EPM consultant of data-architect aan de slag te gaan. Hoe ziet jouw uitdaging eruit? Over Axians Axians is een netwerkorganisatie bestaande uit gespecialiseerde IT units. De unit in Laren (NH), bestaande uit zo’n 70 collega’s, is gespecialiseerd in Data Analytics en Business Intelligence. We houden ons onder andere bezig met datavirtualisatie, datawarehouse automation, moderne (cloud) data-architecturen, data visualisaties en data governance. We werken met een duidelijke   visie   en nemen onze klanten daarin mee. Wat wij doen Wij adviseren en helpen klanten om het maximale uit hun data en mogelijkheden te halen en werken daarom tool onafhankelijk. Al hebben we wel een voorkeur voor innovatieve, schaalbare en toekomstbestendige oplossingen. We werken bijvoorbeeld graag met Snowflake, Denodo, Data Virtuality, OneStream, Board, Collibra, IBM Cognos, Tableau en de Microsoft stack waaronder Azure en PowerBI. Wij werken samen met grote, innovatieve organisaties zoals Landal, LeasePlan, Transavia, PGGM, Ten Cate Grass, Agrifirm en Pathé.  Lees hier meer over Axians Business Analytics in Laren   en over onze Smart Data, Smart Analytics en Smart Finance teams. Onze cultuur Als jij lekker in je vel zit, komen jouw kwaliteiten op je werk ook het beste tot zijn recht. Wij creëren een professionele werksfeer waar jij jezelf kan en mag zijn. Onze consultants beschrijven de cultuur in Laren als open, met een familiegevoel en professioneel. Met onze eigen academy en uitgebreide leerprogramma’s, zoals het Consultant Development Programma en het Consultant Positioning Programma, faciliteren we jouw professionele ontwikkeling. Naast het werk organiseren we regelmatig leuke activiteiten om samen met je collega’s te doen. Zoals een pub quiz, een beach clean up, fietstochten, midgetgolfen of escape rooms. Onze werkwijze is gebaseerd op onze Axians kernwaarden: empowered, verantwoordelijk, ondernemend, vertrouwend & transparant en solidair. Wat als ik deze baan graag wil? We maken graag een keer kennis. Schroom niet om contact op te nemen als je misschien (nog) niet in het profiel past. Wij worden graag verrast door jouw motivatie en unieke kwaliteiten en kijken samen met jou naar de mogelijkheden! Wil je meer weten over werken bij Axians? Laat jouw gegevens en bericht achter via de ‘solliciteer direct’ button. Of neem contact op met onze HR collega Maxime Wesel via   Maxime.Wesel@axians.com  of 06-19630634. (WhatsApp is ook een optie!) Voor meer informatie over ons, check en volg onze LinkedIn pagina  https://www.linkedin.com/company/axians-business-analytics/

Title: Shopify Developer
Description: Reel Unlimited is a global creative services solution offering startups and SMBs unlimited design and content writing at a flat rate. Launched in 2021 as a remote-first company, Reel Unlimited is pursuing its missing of delivering reliable, scalable, affordable, and better creative content to any startup. Today, Reel Unlimited serves over 300 startups and agencies, from bootstrapped or VC-backed. Check us out at www.reelunlimited.com. About The Role Reel Unlimited is looking for talented and motivated Shopify Developers to join our e-commerce team and get flat daily pay to build and optimize Shopify websites for our clients. As a freelance position, you will be compensated based on the number of Shopify projects you deliver. Your Responsibilities Will Include The Following Use Shopify to build responsive, modular, robust, and secure Shopify websites and web apps. Optimizing and updating existing Shopify website performance and responsiveness. Develop and maintain clients Shopify stores, ensuring they are functional, efficient, and up-to-date. Work closely with the design team to implement creative solutions for customizing and enhancing clients' online stores. Troubleshoot and resolve any technical difficulties that arise with client stores. Stay current on new Shopify features and updates, and advise clients on best practices. Communicate effectively with clients to understand their needs and provide solutions to meet those needs. How It Works Once accepted into our network, you get daily notifications about orders matching your skills. You will have access to our dashboard to review project details, including deadlines, and will also have access to a private Slack channel for communication and collaboration with clients.  Every 2 weeks, you bill us for all your completed orders, and we direct deposit amounts owed to your bank account within 2 business days. Compensations Compensation includes a flat rate of $30—$60 per Shopify task/hour, bi-weekly payouts for completed tasks, and bonuses and incentives. So, there is no need to fight for clients or pitch without the promise of pay. The Minimum Requirements For This Position Include The Following 200+ hours of experience in Shopify/Liquid Development Proficiency with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Write well-structured (Vanilla) JavaScript Familiarity with headless development and Shopify stores (Hydrogen/Tailwind) Fluent or native English speaker Experience with Shopify Apps and APIs Comfortable building front-end templates using JSON APIs Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment Respect the average project turnaround of 24–48 hours per order Remote, freelance position with the freedom to choose when and where you work Strong communication, conceptual thinking, typography skills, and design skills Good interpersonal skills and client-handling experience Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite and other design software such as Sketch, Canva, and Figma Team player with a sense of humor Pluses Solid backend full-stack dev experience. Digital agency experience Created Shopify apps (public or private) in the past How To Apply Please send a portfolio of at least 5 completed Shopify live projects with public access to apply. If your style matches our needs, we will contact you for the next steps. We prioritize applicants who are ready to start immediately.

Title: Security Engineer
Company: PT Bank Multiarta Sentosa Tbk (Bank MAS)
Description: Pengalaman melakukan pemindaian kerentanan dan penetration test pada infrastruktur IT, aplikasi mobile, dan aplikasi web.  Memiliki pengetahuan tentang teknik peretasan pada infrastruktur IT, aplikasi mobile, dan aplikasi web.  Memiliki pemahaman tentang teknik hacking tidak hanya sebatas penggunaan tools, namun mampu memahami proses hacking secara manual.  Memahami standar dan kerangka kerja untuk pemindaian kerentanan dan proses penetration test seperti OSSTMM, OWASP, PTES, dll.

Title: IT Business Analyst
Description: Requirements Minimum Bachelor Computer Science, Information Management, or other relevant fields Minimum 2-5 years experience in Business Analyst position Prefer to have knowledge in product banking, life asia/group Asia Ability to work independently and with others (team work) Experience in banking and insurance Having knowledge in: Jira, Visio, MS. Project, Agile, Scrum

Title: Senior Data Engineer - Data lakehouse
Description: Xendit provides payment infrastructure across Southeast Asia, with a focus on Indonesia and the Philippines. We process payments, power marketplaces, disburse payroll and loans, provide KYC solutions, prevent fraud, and help businesses grow exponentially. We serve our customers by providing a suite of world-class APIs, eCommerce platform integrations, and easy to use applications for individual entrepreneurs, SMEs, and enterprises alike. Our main focus is building the most advanced payment rails for Southeast Asia, with a clear goal in mind — to make payments across in SEA simple, secure and easy for everyone. We serve thousands of businesses ranging from SMEs to multinational enterprises, and process millions of transactions monthly. We’ve been growing rapidly since our inception in 2015, onboarding hundreds of new customers every month, and backed by global top-10 VCs. We’re proud to be featured on among the fastest growing companies by Y-Combinator. The Role You will be part of the Data engineering team and work on building a self-serve Data platform that enables internal stakeholders to generate value from data. Specifically you will join the Data lakehouse pod that owns the entire logic for processing data from various sources into the Data lakehouse, ensuring data quality, enabling data modeling, and similar. This role has potential to grow into a tech lead for the Data lakehouse pod. Outcomes Allow internal stakeholders to leverage data in a secure, reliable, and cost-efficient manner by providing easy-to-use tools and detailed documentation. Improve data pipeline logic to scale the number of concurrent jobs (Python, Spark, Airflow). Automate common data requests and unlock self-service (Retool, Flask) Simplify access to real-time data for various use-cases (Kafka, Spark Streaming, Delta). Ensure high data quality through automated tests and data contracts (Great expectations) Improve and maintain the Data lakehouse setup (S3, Trino, Delta). Collaborate with analysts, engineers, and business users to design solutions. Guide junior engineers and set engineering standards for the team.  Research innovative technologies and integrate it into our data infrastructure. What we’re looking for Behaviors You are willing and able to… You’re hungrier than your peers to succeed. You enjoy solving complex, challenging problems that drive meaningful results. You thrive on autonomy and can push towards a goal independently. You are organized and can manage your time well, meeting deadlines. You are a team player and willing to go the extra mile to ensure success. You are willing to learn - developing and honing your data engineering skills. You are coachable. Able to own mistakes, reflect, and take feedback with maturity and a willingness to improve. Experience 4+ years of relevant experience as a data engineer. Demonstrated ability to integrate various data sources into a data warehouse/lakehouse. Working experience in transforming big datasets into clean, easy-to-use tables for further usage. Demonstrated ability to build high-volume batch and streaming pipelines (e.g. Spark, Kafka, Trino). Previous experience with designing and implementing data quality checks and alerting systems. Working experience in optimizing SQL queries (e.g. data partitioning, bucketing, indexing). Bachelor's degree in a technical field or equivalent work experience. Bonus points if you have worked on building a Data platform that enables stakeholders to self-serve. Relevant Skills Excellent knowledge of Python and SQL. Excellent knowledge of Apache Spark. You have experience with modern data tools such as Airflow, dbt, Kafka, Datahub, Trino, Databricks, Looker or similar. You have experience with different databases/data storages and understand their trade-offs (e.g. S3, RDS, MongoDB, etc.). You have built data products that have scaled on AWS or another cloud. Strong written and verbal communication skills.

Title: API Developer
Description: The API Developer is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining application programming interfaces (APIs) for the organization. This includes analyzing business requirements, developing API solutions, and integrating APIs with other systems and applications. Key Responsibilities: • Design, develop, and maintain APIs using programming languages such as .Net C#, Java, Node.JS, or Python. • Work closely with business analysts and stakeholders to understand business requirements and develop API solutions that meet their needs. • Implement APIs using best practices for security, scalability, and maintainability. • Develop and maintain technical documentation for APIs. • Integrate APIs with other systems and applications using technologies such as REST, SOAP, and JSON. • Collaborate with other IT teams to ensure seamless integration of APIs with other systems. • Participate in project planning and estimation activities. • Stay current with emerging trends and technologies in API development. Qualifications: • Having a minimum bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. • 2+ years of experience developing and implementing APIs using .Net C# Java, Node.JS, or Python. • Knowledge of REST, SOAP, and JSON. • Understanding of API security, API Gateway and authentication protocols. • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. • Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Title: Managed Service Security Engineer
Description: Responsibilities Willing to be placed on customer site Responsible for monitoring, maintenance, and troubleshooting of network security device Manage and configuration firewall rules Monitoring Security threat Plan, deploy and monitor security devices to ensure system hardening and network security Understand and maximize the need for Service Level Agreement (SLA) Communicate and collaborate with internal, 3rd party, and customer Provide advice on improving operational system performance, capacity, and scalability of the customer Responsible for monitoring, maintenance, and troubleshooting security-related infrastructure Provide security operation support, issue isolation, and troubleshooting for the incident Requirements Male, max 30 years old SMK or Diploma or Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related field 2+ years of professional experience in security engineering Expertise in NGFW technology, mainly Palo Alto Network products Security vendor certification is a plus Strong communication, could elaborate on user requirements, and have project team member skill Good analytical and strategic thinking skills Taking initiative and willing to learn more (Communicative; Initiative) Knowledge of best practices of IT security especially for networks, servers, and applications. Title: Cloud Engineer
Description: Key Roles and Responsibilities: Responsible for setup and installation of technical systems, applications, or process designs for client’s purchased or outsourced technology and business process solutions. Works directly with client to manage initial access, map and transfer data, create process documentation, and train or coordinate training for client users. Tests and troubleshoots functionality of installed systems; identifies and documents technical issues to be escalated to product and system integration teams for resolution. Provides feedback based on client experiences to product and professional services teams for product and process improvements. May work directly with clients on-site or provide installation support remotely. Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Must possess at least a Bachelor of Information Technology/Computer Science/ or other related field Microsoft Cloud Professional certification or Google Cloud Professional related field. Required skills and experience: 3-5 years of Active Directory, Hyper-V, Microsoft Exchange, Microsoft 365. Experience with Public Cloud (Azure, AWS, GCP, etc.) is compulsory Experience with on-premise Infrastructure and cloud-based mail delivery, routing, and filtering technologies. Ability to work cooperatively with all levels of staff and establishes rapport with users. Demonstrates capacity for organization, prioritization, and management good interpersonal, verbal/written, project management, and decisions making skills. Able to work with stringent process & minimun supervision. Experience with OS Administration (e.g., Linux, Windows, OS, other)

Title: Expression of Interest: Data Scientist
Description: Fingerprint for Success  helps the world’s best workplaces, including Canva, Athena and Baraja find, hire and nurture talent. Companies  that hire through us include: Canva Baraja Athena R3i Ventures & more In preparation for our hiring partners’ current and future hiring needs, we are taking expressions of interest for the  Data Scientist  role to help them find the right people! About you Possess the following attributes: Grit, Desire to Learn, Collaboration, Passion, Thrive in Ambiguity Previous experience working in a startup/scaleup environment is preferred but not required Ability to wear multiple hats - jump, flex and pivot at the drop of a hat A great attitude. The right attitude towards a sense of urgency, risk, and uncertainty about the future that comes with working at a startup Application To register your interest fill in your details and  complete the work-style assessment  that will be emailed to you. If your motivations and traits match our hiring partners’ needs, they’ll get in touch directly. About F4S F4S helps companies discover talent, beyond just their resumes. Through our motivations and traits assessment, we help people find roles that they enjoy and excel in and help companies find great candidates. “We’ve been using F4S since Oct 2017, and have implemented it across our entire organization in onboarding, as well as when forming new teams to help us understand our team and dynamic between them” - Melanie Perkins,  CEO Canva

Title: Senior People Data Analyst (Bangkok Based, relocation provided)
Customer Insights Analyst (Bangkok Based, Relocation Provided)
Senior People Data Analyst (Bangkok Based, relocation provided)
Lead Data Engineer
Description: Aliz is a  global solution provider for the Google Cloud Platform (GCP)  focusing on Europe and Asia. We are building scalable applications, IT infrastructures, Big Data, and machine learning solutions as a certified Google partner. We have offices in Budapest, Singapore, Berlin, and Milan. Today, we are looking for our first  Lead Data Engineer colleague in Jakarta , Indonesia who will create an amazing experience for our customers as they build and maintain solutions in the Google Cloud. Are you also passionate about big data and the cloud? You are looking for us if... a  dynamic project environment  excites you more than painfully slow development. building things from scratch  motivates you more than refactoring legacy codes. working with different people on  different problems  is refreshing for you. solely  designing complex solution s doesn’t satisfy you because you also want to actively take part in the  implementation  of your plans. keeping your knowledge up-to-date  is just as important to you as  sharing it. We are looking for you if...  you are a software or data  architect  with  hands-on coding experience  (preferably in Java/Python and SQL), at least  5 years . finding the right tools for each problem  is more important to you than becoming an expert in one specific tool. talking directly to clients  to understand their business needs is not outside your comfort zone. you want to use your  technical   leadership skills  to guide both our engineers and our clients’ engineers on their cloud journey. you have good communication skills in  English . Your diverse role will include... being responsible for the  end-to-end development lifecycle. presales  activities   and  proof-of-concept  delivery. architecting and creating  data pipelines, data platforms,  and  data warehouses  on Google Cloud Platform. tech  leadership  and  mentorship . being a trusted technical  consultant  and  trainer for  our clients’ tech teams. You will enjoy... using  cutting-edge technologies . learning  from A+ Big Data and Google Cloud experts and  mentoring  talented juniors . working anywhere  you feel comfortable and productive . visiting cool places  such as Singapore, Germany, or Hungary. Aliz was founded by a group of talented software engineers with one vision in mind: to  build a company where they could solve interesting problems with the most modern cloud tech stack.  Our team includes  engineers, industry experts, and digital professionals  that ensure our clients are ready to face the challenges of the ever-changing digital world. Life has become pretty exciting at Aliz recently: We built a team in Singapore and Berlin, launched a business in Milan, grew 30% in 2020 and 2021 despite COVID, and became Google Cloud’s Breakthrough Partner of the Year in Asia. You couldn’t pick a better time to join this world-class team of cloud experts and build your career.

Title: User Experience Engineer
Description: Requirements : Min. Bachelor Degree Max. 35 Years Old Individuals must have minimum 2 years of UX Engineer Knowledge and Experience with modern JavaScript, frameworks (e.g., React, Backbone, Angular, Ember, Vue.js), CSS frameworks (e.g. Sass), and React Native Experience with vector and motion graphics, including SVG, HTML5 Canvas, and animation using Javascript and CSS Experience with data-driven product development: analytics, A/B testing, etc Must be willing to bring own Laptop Must be willing to worki in a Banking/Finance Industry Will be working on-site (WFO) daily in Central Jakarta Willing to join immediately

Title: MS Engineer (L2)
Description: Want to be a part of our team? Provides technical support to field engineers, technicians, and product support personnel who are diagnosing, troubleshooting, repairing, and debugging complex electro/mechanical equipment, computer systems, complex software, or networked and/or wireless systems. Responds to situations where first-line product support has failed to isolate or fix problems in malfunctioning equipment or software. Reports design, reliability, and maintenance problems or bugs to design engineering/software engineering. May be involved in customer installation and training. Provides support to customers/users where the product is highly technical or sophisticated in nature. Working at NTT Essential Duty and Responsibilities:  Support Device Management Lifecycle, including: Healthcheck & availability: Identify, Troubleshoot, Resolve Incident Escalation: Level 2 support and other advanced skillset needs Proactively monitors the work queues.  Perform operational tasks to resolve all incidents / requests in a timely manner and within agreed SLA.  Execute changes with clear identification of risks and mitigation plans to be captured into the change record Follow the shift hand over process highlighting any key tickets to be focussed along with a handover of upcoming critical tasks to be carried out in the next shift Escalate all tickets to seek right focus from CoE and other teams, if needed continue the escalations to management Coach Service Desk and L1 teams for technical and behavioural skills Lead and manages all initial client escalation for operational issues.  Contribute to the change management process by logging all change requests with complete details for standard and non-standard including patching and any other changes to Configuration Items. Ensures all changes are carried out with proper change approvals Plan and execute approved maintenance activities Audit and analyse incident and request tickets for quality and recommends improvements with updates to knowledge articles.  Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Ability to communicate and work across different cultures and social groups Ability to plans activities and projects well in advance, and takes into account possible changing circumstances Ability to work well in a pressurized environment Ability to work hard and put in longer hours when it is necessary Ability to apply active listening techniques such as paraphrasing the message to confirm understanding, probing for further relevant information and refraining from interrupting Ability to adapt to changing circumstances Ability to place client at the forefront of all interactions, understanding their requirements and creating a positive client experience throughout the total client journey Ability to create, modify & troubleshoot iRules Ability to operate & troubleshoot F5 GTM, LTM, & ASM Experience in handling 10 OWASP protection Advantageous Certifications: Up to date and relevant ITIL certification At least one mid-Level certification relevant to CoE - Ex – F5 - 301 Good to have scripting knowledge such as Python, PERL Any of the above certifications is a plus. The MS – Services Engineer (L2) is expected to gain certifications relevant to services supported. Certifications carry additional weightage on candidate’s qualification for the role. What will make you a good fit for the role? MS-Engineer L2 requirement:  Minimum 3 years professional experience of relevant experience  Experienced with F5 products (GTM, LTM, ASM)  Experience creating & modifying VS, NAT, iRule, iApps  Held at least 2 F5 certification Familiar with the following platform:  F5  Citrix  Infoblox
