Title: Strategist (SAC Indonesia)
Description: Job Descriptions Develop digital strategist based on trends, consumer behavior and business objective for the clients Research and monitoring market trends Collect data that will inspire creative concept Prepare presentations of the digital strategies that well suited for the clients Analyse and control the executions Requirement Bachelor’s Degree, majoring Advertising/ Media, Mass Communications, Marketing, Business Analyst or other related major At Least minimal 1 year(s) of working experience as a Digital Strategist Preferably specializing in digital strategies/market research or equivalent Have a broad knowledge about advertising and market research Able to create a good presentation Have a good communication skill Creative, passionate and fast learner

Title: Infrastructure Engineer
Description: Are you excited about transforming the way we bank by using the latest technology? We are too! About the job: Synpulse is a fast-growing financial services company! With a new strategy to expand our management consultancy services to provide innovative digital solutions under our new brand, Synpulse8, we are driving client success with business and technology know-how. We have offices around the world and are a valued partner to many of the largest financial institutions. Synpulse provides end to end services to our clients from strategic planning to managed services. Our broad expertise in banking and insurance enables us to accompany our clients on their digital journeys and create sustainable added value for them. We also take pride in our OneSpirit which drives everything we do and makes Synpulse a great place to work and develop your career! Job Description Deploy, and maintain infrastructure softwares, including servers, networking, and cloud solutions Collaborate with development team to deploy and maintain installation of application softwares Collaborate with other teams to identify and resolve technical issues, and ensure the smooth operation of systems. Automate routine tasks using scripting  Participate in the planning of business continuity initiatives. You: Qualifications Proficiency in Linux is a must Proficiency in scripting languages such as Bash, or PowerShell is a must Experience in Oracle Database Administration and Open Shift is a plus point We: Want to transform what banking means with you! Are inclusive and diverse Will guide you Are committed to creating a flexible, supportive work environment that helps you effectively manage your work and family commitments Embrace innovate-thinking and entrepreneurship in everything we do Are award winning and known for our commitment to outcomes Apply the latest tech and new ways of working Support your personal growth Your documents to start the process: Your link to your git/code repo A short summary of you Resume or CV We look forward to hearing from you soon. Should you have any queries, feel free to contact our local HR representative.

Title: JUNIOR DATA SCIENTIST - Dubai, UAE
Description: Location: Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance) Starting salary of USD 60,000 per annum + performance based bonus - 0% tax environment. About Cobblestone Energy Cobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading. We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business. At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people alongside constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways. With the right performance and potential, you could be managing the power desk for an entire country within eighteen months in your role. Come join our dream team! Cobblestone Values Lifelong learning with continuous reflection Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas The team is more important than the individual.  Being the best in any market we enter Hiring and keeping only the most effective people Others must benefit from our existence.  What We Offer In This Role A full-time position on our Commercial team Committed and remarkably talented colleagues.  Highly competitive compensation dependent on performance An exciting, challenging and fulfilling career.  Investment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in business.  Equity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long term.  Do you have a passion for data and a solid foundation in mathematics and computer science? If you are a recent graduate or early career professional, Cobblestone Energy, a high-speed energy trading company in Dubai, is looking for you to join us as a Junior Data Scientist. Help drive informed decision making throughout the organization. As a Junior Data Scientist at Cobblestone Energy, you will play a critical role in supporting our energy trading operations. You will be responsible for collecting, cleaning, analysing, and interpreting large datasets to uncover trends, patterns, and insights that will drive our business decisions. You will also have the opportunity to develop predictive models to forecast energy prices and trends and collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement data-driven solutions. Key Responsibilities: Developing deep understanding of the industry and delivering key insights by analysing data Forecasting different fundamentals such as wind power generation and demand Researching and implementing new trading strategies Building and developing new or existing data infrastructure Your background: Bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python and R Experience with data analysis and manipulation tools such as Pandas, NumPy, and SQL Knowledge of data visualization tools such as Matplotlib and Seaborn Experience that demonstrates your team-oriented, innovative, and strategic working styles.  Pro-active and flexible work mentality Interest in data-driven trading Fluency in English, both written and spoken.  About the Role:  This is an exciting opportunity for a Junior Data Scientist to join a growing and innovative energy trading company. You will have the opportunity to work on challenging projects, gain valuable industry experience, and develop your skills in a supportive and dynamic environment. The Hiring Process Your application will undergo evaluation, followed by psychometric tests, a trading simulation, a research project, and remote interviews. Successful candidates will then be extended an offer to join our Dubai office as full-time Commercial Graduates through our Commercial Development Program (CDP). We will cover all relocation expenses, including flights, visas, housing, and necessary paperwork. The CDP provides a comprehensive rotational experience in data science, trading, and analytics, with guidance from our experienced commercial team. Throughout the program, you will receive mentorship and training in market fundamentals, leading to the development of strong analytical skills. Upon completion of the program, you will be a Junior Data Scientist If you are eager to learn, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and are passionate about using data to drive business decisions, we want to hear from you! Apply now and take the first step in your career as a Junior Data Scientist at Cobblestone Energy.

Title: System Integrator
Description: Andal at Glance Andal Software was introduced in 1988, our product is Andal PayMaster, a software package for HR, Payroll, Income Tax and Attendance for Indonesian Market. We are currently has almost 500 clients ranging from Services companies, Manufacturing, Financial institution and Hospitality industries. Our Team We’re a company that focuses on people and process. Regardless of your experience or your background, we have company values to encourage you do what you do best. You’re free to be passionate, innovate, collaborate, explore anything and care for those you work with. Other than the challenges, we also believe a productive worker is a worker who has healthy work-life balance. Responsibilities Carry out the implementation process starting from the requirements phase to the handover in accordance with the agreed timeline, including:  URD & finalization  Kickoff Meeting  Data Migration  Design report  Training & socialization  UAT  PreLive  LIVE Ensuring the implementation process is known by all interested parties, through activities  Preparation of detailed implementation progress reports.  Update the timeline if there are changes during implementation.  Submission of regular reports both by telephone and/or online (on the network) Perform site visit maintenance work when required by the customer Requirements Strong analytical skills and ability to use data to inform decision-making. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to build relationships with client Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities simultaneously. We Are Looking For Individuals Who Are/have Empathy with users Technical, logical thought process. Keen to detail An ability to prioritise and delegate. Able to stick to strict deadlines Willingness to learn & ability to adapt is MUST HAVE

Title: System Engineer
Description: Job Description We are looking for a System Engineer to manage infrastructures to produce scalable AI solutions. You'll be working with other AI engineers and software developers, collaborating to create the best solutions for many of our challenging AI solution projects. Responsibilities  Managing and monitoring systems and infrastructure, both on premise and cloud  Developing automation tools for infrastructure operations  Developing monitoring tools for IT operations  Ensuring the highest level of system and infrastructure availability Requirements  Degree in Computer Science  Experience with cloud computing environments (GCP/AWS)  Fluency with Linux/Network System Administration  Experience with the administration and performance tuning of application stacks (e.g. nginx, various python frameworks, postgres)  Experience with virtualization and containerization (docker, kubernetes)  Experience with automation software (e.g. ansible, terraform)  Excellent communication and teamwork skills Benefits Continuous Learning about Technology, Business, Leadership & Management Work with some of the best AI Product Development teams in Indonesia Mentoring BPJS Kesehatan and BPJS Ketenagakerjaan Annual leave THR Tax Allowance Competitive salary Able to work remotely Flexible time

Title: MS Engineer (L2)
Description: Want to be a part of our team? Provides technical support to field engineers, technicians, and product support personnel who are diagnosing, troubleshooting, repairing, and debugging complex electro/mechanical equipment, computer systems, complex software, or networked and/or wireless systems. Responds to situations where first-line product support has failed to isolate or fix problems in malfunctioning equipment or software. Reports design, reliability, and maintenance problems or bugs to design engineering/software engineering. May be involved in customer installation and training. Provides support to customers/users where the product is highly technical or sophisticated in nature. Working at NTT Essential Duty and Responsibilities:  Support Device Management Lifecycle, including: Healthcheck & availability: Identify, Troubleshoot, Resolve Incident Escalation: Level 2 support and other advanced skillset needs Proactively monitors the work queues.  Perform operational tasks to resolve all incidents / requests in a timely manner and within agreed SLA.  Execute changes with clear identification of risks and mitigation plans to be captured into the change record Follow the shift hand over process highlighting any key tickets to be focussed along with a handover of upcoming critical tasks to be carried out in the next shift Escalate all tickets to seek right focus from CoE and other teams, if needed continue the escalations to management Coach Service Desk and L1 teams for technical and behavioural skills Lead and manages all initial client escalation for operational issues.  Contribute to the change management process by logging all change requests with complete details for standard and non-standard including patching and any other changes to Configuration Items. Ensures all changes are carried out with proper change approvals Plan and execute approved maintenance activities Audit and analyse incident and request tickets for quality and recommends improvements with updates to knowledge articles.  Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Ability to communicate and work across different cultures and social groups Ability to plans activities and projects well in advance, and takes into account possible changing circumstances Ability to work well in a pressurized environment Ability to work hard and put in longer hours when it is necessary Ability to apply active listening techniques such as paraphrasing the message to confirm understanding, probing for further relevant information and refraining from interrupting Ability to adapt to changing circumstances Ability to place client at the forefront of all interactions, understanding their requirements and creating a positive client experience throughout the total client journey Ability to create, modify & troubleshoot iRules Ability to operate & troubleshoot F5 GTM, LTM, & ASM Experience in handling 10 OWASP protection Advantageous Certifications: Up to date and relevant ITIL certification At least one mid-Level certification relevant to CoE - Ex – F5 - 301 Good to have scripting knowledge such as Python, PERL Any of the above certifications is a plus. The MS – Services Engineer (L2) is expected to gain certifications relevant to services supported. Certifications carry additional weightage on candidate’s qualification for the role. What will make you a good fit for the role? MS-Engineer L2 requirement:  Minimum 3 years professional experience of relevant experience  Experienced with F5 products (GTM, LTM, ASM)  Experience creating & modifying VS, NAT, iRule, iApps  Held at least 2 F5 certification Familiar with the following platform:  F5  Citrix  Infoblox

to clients and provide field engineering services to clients Conduct a monthly random review of incidents and service requests, analyze and recommend improvement in quality Provide continuous feedback Description: Job Descriptions Develop digital strategist based on trends, consumer behavior and business objective for the clients Research and monitoring market trends Collect data that will inspire creative concept Prepare presentations of the digital strategies that well suited for the clients Analyse and control the executions Requirement Bachelor’s Degree, majoring Advertising/ Media, Mass Communications, Marketing, Business Analyst or other related major At Least minimal 1 year(s) of working experience as a Digital Strategist Preferably specializing in digital strategies/market research or equivalent Have a broad knowledge about advertising and market research Able to create a good presentation Have a good communication skill Creative, passionate and fast learner

Title: Senior Data Engineer
Description: At Catalyst, People are the heartbeat of our company. We believe that good quality people will have a positive impact on our business. We are looking for a  Senior Data Engineer  to join our growing team.  If you are passionate about being part of the team, building some of the most critical products and working alongside teams in the industry across product, engineering, and design, Let’s join us!  Job Description: Develop data model and maintain company metrics and dashboard Develop ETL data pipelines Integrate data from 3rd party APIs (e.g. Moengage, Facebook) Do automate testing to ensure data quality Collaborate with management, business partners, analysts, developers, architects, and engineers to support data quality efforts. Translates complex functional and technical requirements into detailed design and high performing data applications Research or explore any new technologies to complement or improve requirements and current technologies Requirements: Bachelor or Master Degree Proven working experience as a Data Engineer at least 2 years. Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, IT, Mathematics or related field Strong proficiency in Python, R, and SQL Experience working with complex ETL and Datawarehouse will be a bonus Strong foundation in Data Query/Manipulation Have experience managing and designing data pipelines, debugging data issues. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills Able to communicate with clarity and precision Ability to effectively present results. Passionate about startup, innovation and technology Adaptable to dynamic environment, lean and fast-paced environment

Title: Infrastructure Developer Onboarding
Description: Job Description WE ARE SEEKING Infrastructure Developer Onboarding (m/f/d) What We Do And Why The global TV Broadcast and Video Entertainment Market is currently in a phase of fundamental change requiring the development of new ad-driven monetization models. We believe that our solution significantly changes the video ad-business long-term by opening up new distribution platforms into a global, programmatic ad-market. What We’ve Built Our Serverside.ai product is a cloud-based software-as-a-service solution offering in the B2B field, that enables dynamic ad insertion and ad substitution for OTT streaming, IP TV and HbbTV operators. Your Role Become an important part of our Software-as-a-Service platform team and take responsibility for frontend and backend development tasks in our modern tech stack. You will be working in a growing and very committed and experienced team with great team spirit. You will be using state of the art technologies like HLS, DASH, Low Latency Streaming, HbbTV, ATSC 3.0 Current Video Codecs, Cloud/ Edge Computing and more. As Nowtilus, we support your participation in industrial events, workshops, and advanced trainings. We offer flexible working hours and up to 100% remote conditions (freelance) with the potential to work from any place in the world. We are constantly improving our ways of cooperation. Your ideas, feedback and suggestions are much appreciated and taken seriously. Your Responsibilities Working closely with our product management and customer onboarding team to specify features and continuously improve our software system. With your deep knowledge in backend and frontend development, you support the team in improving and stabilizing our Server-Side Ad Insertion platform based on Node.js micro services and ReactJS frontend. Direct collaboration with the operation and development tea Maintain and improve the automated cloud resource provisioning and management Secure and monitor cloud infrastructure Design and implement tools to provide scalable and reliable services Optimize performance of cloud-based applications Manage cost-effective use of cloud resources Troubleshoot issues with infrastructure and applications at runtime Your Qualification Experience 5+ years of experience of running services in a cloud infrastructure English language skills both written and verbal is required Working knowledge in designing, deploying, and managing cloud solutions Solid experience with monitoring and logging tools (Prometheus, ELK stack, etc.) Experience with performance tuning Familiarity with network management tools and protocols Experience with troubleshooting complex technical issues Familiarity with DevOps tools and methodologies for automating deployments In-depth knowledge of at least one major public cloud provider (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, etc.) Skills Experience with a variety of infrastructure technologies, including compute, storage, network, and security A deep understanding of software architecture in cloud environments Experience with scripting languages (e.g., PowerShell, Python. Bash) Knowledge of automation and configuration management technologies (e.g., Ansible, Terraform, Puppet, Chef) Strong customer service orientation Ability to migrate workloads to the cloud and optimize them for performance and cost Good understanding of security best practices in the cloud Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Basic knowledge in front-end (HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, ...) and back-end (node.js) is a plus

Title: IT Business Analyst
Description: Responsibilities: Act as point of contact for Customer Service users in country and Regional offices with regards to any system changes and new implementations for CRM (Customer Relationship Management).  Act as a bridge between users and the IT Infrastructure team, translate business requirements into technical spec requirements.  Assist the business owner to outline the target business operating model, and deliver its processes/SOP, resources estimation and requirement, governance structure, reporting requirement, environment requirement, IT systems requirement. Title: Senior Data Engineer
Description: At Argus Labs, we are shaping the future of video games through applied research in distributed systems and game design. We believe online game worlds should be open and interconnected, rather than closed siloes controlled by platform giants. We are creating a game technology architecture that allows games, marketplaces, public good infrastructures, and user-generated content/platforms to communicate and interoperate seamlessly. As a result, we give game developers more control over their creations and allow players to create content and platform that directly integrates with the game's logic and data. As an applied research lab with an integrated game studio/publisher, we are uniquely positioned to lead the way. We build our own games that are native to our infrastructure. This allows us to fully understand and utilize the capabilities of our platform, resulting in novel game designs built around the platform's unique power and quirks. Backed by the best We recently raised $10 million in seed funding led by Haun Ventures ($1.5B crypto fund founded by ex-a16z GP Katie Haun) with participation from angels in tech and gaming such as Elad Gil, Balaji Srinivasan, Siqi Chen, etc. Responsibilities Design, develop, and maintain our data pipeline infrastructure to ensure data accuracy and reliability.  Develop and maintain ETL processes for large-scale data sets from various sources.  Create and manage real-time data processing systems.  Work closely with game designers and game developers to provide insights and data-driven solutions for game development and business decisions.  Optimize and tune database performance and query processing.  Develop and maintain documentation and knowledge base for data systems.  Requirements Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.  At least 5 years of experience in data engineering, with a strong focus on ETL and data processing systems.  Experience with big data technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka.  Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis.  Proficient in Go or other object-oriented programming languages.  Familiarity with data modeling and data warehousing concepts.  Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.  Strong communication and collaboration skills.  Nice to have Experience working in the gaming industry Knowledge of cloud-based services such as AWS or Google Cloud.  Familiarity with machine learning and data science concepts.  Perks & benefits For full-time employees A note for the game industry veterans: no crunch :-) Flexible PTO (2 weeks required) + holidays 100% employer-covered medical, dental, and vision insurance 401k matching $1500 desk set-up stipend Company retreats We’re an equal-opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, or disability status.

Title: AI Business Analyst
Description: In this role, you will act as a bridge between domain/function and data scientists. Actively participating in the analysis of domain problems/needs and seeking suitable digitalization/ AI solutions. In your new role you will: Gather and translate requirements for functional solutions into clear AI scope and objectives. Develop and evaluate algorithms according to the expected problem solution. Harmonize business process/work method to enable analytics/ AI solutions into implementation. Prove concepts, prototypes, and implementations, mainly pertaining to the solutions and services in Business Analytics encompassing Computer Vision; Natural Language Processing; Reinforcement Learning; Machine learning & Deep Neural Networks; and Predictive & Prescriptive modeling. Collect, analyze, and interpret qualitative & quantitative data with statistical methods (e.g. data sampling/ re-sampling, ANOVA analysis, distributions, etc). Apply standard processes such as CRISP-DM (business understanding, data understanding, data preparation, modeling, evaluation, deployment); Machine Learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, and PyTorch; and Agile Methodologies for Business Analytics projects. Create and review technical design documentation, research and proposals, white papers, presentations, formal recommendations, and reports.  You are best equipped for this task if you have: Master's / Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science / Mathematics / Statistics. >3 years of relevant working experience in the semiconductor or electronics manufacturing industry. Understands complex issues and puts them in context. Hands-on working knowledge using Data Science and Statistical methods for AI / ML including Deep Learning methods (Convolutional Neural Networks, Recurrent Neural Networks, and Generative Adversarial Networks). Working experience in Text Mining and Natural Language Processing. Programming skills with scripting languages & frameworks such as Python, R, Matlab, Scala, Java, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Familiar with microservice and/or big data technologies such as Openshift, Cloudera (CDH), Elasticsearch, and CEPH. Good knowledge of Agile Methodologies. Experienced in best practice adaption and external benchmarking. Strong proficiency in English with excellent communication and presentation skills.   Part of your life. Part of tomorrow. Infineon is a world leader in semiconductor solutions that make life easier, safer, and greener. Our solutions for efficient energy management, smart mobility, and secure, seamless communications link the real and the digital world.

Title: Back End Engineer
Description: Who are we? Amar Bank is one of the most technologically advanced digital banks in Indonesia. Our leading digital lending product, Tunaiku has the distinction of being the first FinTech product in Indonesia. We are also the first digital bank on the cloud. As the first profitable digital bank, we managed to get listed on the Indonesian Stock Exchange. How did we manage to do that? We are changing people’s perception of a bank. We believe we are the innovators who combine customer focus principles with creating technology-based impact. We incorporate freedom and flexibility as part of our startup working culture DNA to encourage innovation in creating better financial solutions for the banking industry. We think of ourselves as, ‘A technology company with a banking license’. For this reason, we ‘Act like a FinTech, and think like a Bank.’ How did it all start? Founded on March 15, 1991, in Surabaya as PT Anglomas International Bank (Amin Bank), the bank was acquired by Tolaram Group and transformed to PT Bank Amar Indonesia (Amar Bank) in 2014. It has then undergone a significant digital transformation to become one of the country's forerunning fintech institutions through its award-winning digital lending platform, Tunaiku. Our philosophy, mission, and vision Technology must impact lives, must improve lives. We exist to provide banking to those who ‘need’ and not only to those who ‘want’. Services when provided to those who need at the time of their need brings smiles. Our vision is to bring 200 million smiles. More about the bank with startup culture environment Consist of 1000+ people, you will meet people who love to grow, dream big, and actually have fun at the workplace! We provide a great working environment that pushes people to grow outside their comfort zone. People with high drive and ambition find us a very attractive place to work as their career growth matches their own drive and not any staid policies. Thus we hold the honor of being awarded “Best Place to Work in Indonesia”. Recently Amar Bank was awarded as Inspirational Brand from APEA (Asia Pacific Enterprise Awards) 2022. Of course, our innovation won't stop here. So if you would love to be a part of it, have a growth mindset, and are constantly hungry for challenges, we invite you to join us in our journey to ‘Impact Lives’. Join us today and create #unlimitedinnovations!Responsibilities Write high-quality, clean, maintainable code using engineering best practices (unit testing, source control, continuous integration, automation, design patterns, etc.) Collaborate with other software engineers, product owners, user experience designers, and operations engineers to build new products Design and maintain the relational database and its schemas Tests the product in controlled and real situations before deployment Accomplishes engineering and organization goals by completing related tasks Develops software solutions by conferring with users, studying information needs, system flow, data usage, and work processes, investigating problem areas, and following the software development life cycle Bringing forward technology ideas for continuous improvements to products and processes Presents ideas for system improvements, produce detailed specifications, and writes program codes Regularly maintains the systems once they are up and running Regularly do application optimizing Requirements 1-3 Year experience in Backend Development Having technical knowledge of Source Code Management Revision Control such as Subversion, Git Knowledge of PHP, NodeJS, Java, C. Knowledge in Go is a plus factor Familiarity with unit testing, integration testing, and test-driven development Experience implementing web services (RESTful APIs) Knowledge of SQL / NoSQL Knowledge of Unix/Linux environments Have knowledge about monitoring systems (New Relic, etc) Have knowledge about container orchestration (Docker) Passion for software engineering, especially in building rich applications Experience in application optimizing for security, maximum speed, compatibility, and scalability Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Good interpersonal skills, self-motivated, creative, independent, quick learner, and result oriented Good communication skills and comfortable collaborating with a cross-functional team Bonus Point If Speaking in english fluently Contributions to open-source projects (A link to GitHub profile gets extra points) We exist to innovate and maintain the architecture of Amar Bank's products. As part of our main focus to create through technology we ensure the process and technology we use helps maintain and build human connection at scale. It’s our job to plan, monitor, and control the technology growth so we can provide a faster, more convenient, and more efficient way of performing business transactions.

Title: Financial Planning and Analysis Senior Analyst
Description: About the Role  As a FP&A Senior Analyst in the consolidation & reporting team, you will support consolidation of all business unit’s business and financial metrics within GTL, as well as on cost control reporting and analysis.  What You Will Do Consolidation and Reporting Provide support on the consolidation of budgets / actuals / forecasts across all business units within GTL  Support monthly business review processes, including preparation of consolidated reports and analysis.  Oversee the rolling forecast process within GTL and provide consolidated insights to the leadership team on business unit forecasts  Liaise with key stakeholders including GoTo’s FP&A team, Investor Relations to provide support on GTL-centric information requests and analysis  Budgeting and forecasting Drive the overall budgeting process within GTL  Manage the annual budgeting and monthly rolling forecast for operating expenses by liaising with key business stakeholders for valuable input.  Cost control and performance management  Exercise robust analytics on P/L report particularly cost and expenses, understand the cost and expenses trends on month to month basis Monitor and control the actual cost and expenses disbursement, including the daily PO execution.  Work closely with GTL’s Head(s) of Function (HoF) to monitor and control the actual performance against budget, and to drive rolling forecasts for operating expenses. Prepare expense reports on a monthly basis including the fluctuation analysis and variance analysis against budget. Provide recommendations to improve cost efficiency and the effectiveness of our spending.  Identify, aggregating and assigning cost and expenses under function to product by using relevant key-drivers in order to generate calculation of profitability report by product  Support the reporting process for management decision making What You Will Need Degree level qualification in Accounting / Finance / Business / quantitative degree 3-years experience in in an FPA role  Expert in SQL and strong experience with a data visualization and dashboarding tool (e.g. Tableau, Metabase, etc) Comfortable working with minimal guidance and closely in a team setting Ability to use critical thinking daily to manage daily tasks while being goal-oriented  Ability to transform an ambiguous business or product problem into a well-scoped and impactful analysis; able to design simple experiments

Title: Application/ Cloud Support and Development (Semarang)
Description: Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology, and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. We combine unmatched experience and specialized capabilities across more than 40 industries – powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. With 505,000 people serving clients in more than 120 countries, Accenture brings continuous innovation to help clients improve their performance and create lasting value across their enterprises. Visit us at www.accenture.com. People in our Client Delivery & Operations career track drive delivery and capability excellence through the design, development, and/or delivery of a solution, service, capability, or offer. They grow into delivery-focused roles and can progress within their current role, laterally or upward. Application Support and Architecture professionals work across the Service Delivery Lifecycle to analyze, design, build, test, implement and/or maintain multiple system components or applications for Accenture or our clients. Delivery Lifecycle professionals envision, estimate, define, build and deploy Accenture's solutions using standard delivery assets to improve the client´s delivery approach. Responsibilities: For Application Development Roles: Analyzes and solves problems that are low complexity and may be routine in nature where answers can be readily obtained. Interacts with peers within Accenture before updating supervisors. Likely has limited direct exposure with non-management levels at a client and/or within Accenture. Receives moderate-level instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instructions on new assignments. Decisions impact own work and may impact the work of others. Individual contributor as a part of a team, with a focused scope of work. We are looking for people who are passionate about software programming and bring with them an understanding of object-oriented programming. Relevant degree or masters from an internationally recognized university Ability to work creatively and analytically in a problem-solving environment Strong interpersonal and communication skills Key responsibilities may include: Develops information systems by developing and installing software solutions. Prepares and installs solutions Designing, coding and debugging applications. Integrate software with existing systems Maintain standards compliance Research and recommend software tools to management. Provide assistance to testers and support personnel as needed to determine system problems. As new technologies emerge and impact our systems, expected to learn these technologies very quickly and resolve any problems involved in integrating new technologies with our systems. Provide technical leadership to teammates through coaching and mentorship. For Application Support Roles Level-1 Support: Able to read and understand the ticket escalated from users Able to translation the ticket into problem statement and perform impact analysis within the impacted application/System Understand the support structured and distribute/escalate the ticket to the related support team (job dec for L1 support) Understand the user (API) manual and prepare answer to the user based on the manual. Level-2 Support Received the escalated ticket from L1 Understand the ticket and able to identify the problem area Perform impact analysys based on the escalated ticket Perform fixing to the problem area Perform unit testing/quality assurance to the fixing Our professionals receive comprehensive training covering business acumen, technical and professional skills development. You’ll also have opportunities to hone your functional skills and expertise in an area of specialization. We offer a variety of formal and informal training programs at every level to help you acquire and build specialized skills faster. Learning takes place both on the job and through formal training conducted online, in the classroom, or in collaboration with teammates. The sheer variety of work we do, and the experience it offers, provide an unbeatable platform from which to build a career. Diversity and Corporate Citizenship  At Accenture, we take the widest possible view of inclusion and diversity, going beyond gender, race, religion, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender identity, and expression to create a work environment that welcomes all forms of backgrounds and differences. Accenture prides itself on being a good Corporate Citizen. We place Corporate Citizenship at the heart of our business and use our skills to create shared value with our stakeholders. We do this in a variety of ways, such as helping communities to build sustainable livelihoods, improving processes at not-for-profit organizations, or working to understand and reduce our own environmental footprint. Requirements: Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Information System or relevant field. Open for various kind of levels from Junior to Senior Levels Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply. knowledge in at least one or some of the following: - Java (Java Enterprise Edition) - Go Language - C# - SQL / MySQL/ PostgreSQL - Node.js - React.js - Flutter - .NET Framework - QA and testing (Automated Testing, Functional Testing) - SAP Techincal (ABAP, BASIS, BPC, BW, etc) - SAP Functional (FI, HR, CRM, SD, etc) - Technical Architecture - Salesforce Development Currently living in or willing to relocate to Semarang if hired

Title: Site Reliability Engineer (Junior)
Description: Deskripsi Pekerjaan : Memahami sistem dan aplikasi yang dioperasikan oleh perusahaan, serta memahami persyaratan bisnis dan teknis dari sistem dan aplikasi tersebut. Membantu dalam memonitor kinerja sistem dan aplikasi, serta memproses data pemantauan untuk mengidentifikasi masalah. Membantu dalam mengembangkan dan mengimplementasikan solusi untuk memperbaiki masalah yang diidentifikasi. Membantu dalam memelihara sistem dan aplikasi, termasuk memperbarui dan mengelola konfigurasi sistem. Membantu dalam mengembangkan dan mengimplementasikan proses dan prosedur operasi yang efisien dan efektif, termasuk dokumentasi operasi dan manajemen perubahan. Belajar dan memahami praktik-praktik Observability Tools Kualifikasi : Lulusan Sarjana (S1) Jurusan T.Informatika/IlmuKomputer/T.Elektro dengan pengalaman di monitoring sistem/aplikasi min. 1 tahun Memiliki pemahaman yang kuat tentang sistem operasi Linux dan konsep jaringan seperti protokol TCP/IP, DNS, dan HTTP. Memiliki pengalaman dalam konfigurasi, pemeliharaan, dan troubleshooting web dan apps server. Memiliki kemampuan untuk mengidentifikasi dan menyelesaikan masalah dengan cepat, efektif, dan efisien. Mampu bekerja secara mandiri maupun dalam tim, serta berkomunikasi dengan jelas dan efektif. Bersedia ditempatkan di client perbankan (Jakarta area) Bersedia bekerja dengan sistem shift dan standby pada waktu tertentu

Title: Junior Data Scientist
Description: In Frontiere rendiamo accessibile l’innovazione eliminando le barriere interne ed esterne alle organizzazioni, riducendo i tempi di accesso alle nuove tecnologie favorendo la scalabilità del business delle Medie e Grandi Aziende. Nuovo umanesimo, sostenibilità e accessibilità sono i nostri elementi fondanti, con attenzione ad una User Experience di valore che combina elementi estetici e di design tipici del Made in Italy. Dallo studio di fattibilità e Analisi di mercato e trends, alla gestione delle Operations, passando per l’innovazione, la Ricerca e lo sviluppo, aiutiamo le aziende a ideare, modellare e scalare il proprio business. Frontiere si occupa di consulenza basata sulle nuove tecnologie. In ogni passo dell’innovazione lavoriamo al fianco dei nostri Clienti integrando le loro competenze sugli aspetti di consulenza o tecnologici, strategici per rendere possibile l’innovazione. www.frontiere.io Chi Stiamo Cercando Stiamo cercando un appassionato e talentuoso "Junior Data Scientist" per essere incluso nel nostro Team di Intelligenza Artificiale. Come Junior Data Scientist, parteciperai a progetti importanti generando ipotesi e creando modelli in grado di migliorare il business dei nostri clienti e delle nostre startup. REQUISITI Laurea in Informatica, Statistica, Informatica, Ingegneria Informatica, Fisica, Matematica; Familiarità con la modellazione statistica e le comuni attività di Machine Learning (classificazione, regressione, clustering) e framework (boosting, deep learning); Conoscenze di base di elaborazione del linguaggio naturale e visione artificiale;  Buona conoscenza di Python;  Mentalità proattiva e disponibilità ad affrontare i problemi aziendali mantenendo l'attenzione sui risultati;  Fluente in inglese.  Competenze Apprezzate Conoscenza di almeno un framework di deep learning (Keras, Tensorflow, Pytorch)  Analisi dei dati distribuiti della conoscenza (PySpark, Databricks)  Conoscenza di restAPI (Flask, FastAP Livello Di Anzianità Junior Soft Skill  Organizzazione;  Problem solving;  Gestione delle scadenze. Benefici Continua crescita professionale attraverso: corsi, eventi di settore, libri, formazione interna; Assistenza sanitaria; Ticket restaurant per le giornate lavorate in sede; Ambiente di lavoro dinamico, progetti innovativi e cultura aziendale attenta alla persona. Sede Modalità ibrida. È possibile lavorare in loco e/o da remoto. Le possibili sedi di reclutamento sono Roma/Napoli. Cultura Nuovo umanesimo, sostenibilità e accessibilità sono i nostri elementi fondanti, con attenzione ad una User Experience di valore che combina elementi estetici e di design tipici del Made in Italy. Nelle azioni di tutti i giorni si rispecchiano i nostri valori fondanti. Innovazione : La spinta verso il futuro è la chiave del nostro agire. Creiamo valore attraverso il cambiamento e la trasformazione sempre pronti a cogliere le nuove opportunità. Spirito di Squadra : Sappiamo che in un team bisogna sentirsi rispettati nella propria individualità e che il valore del team si basa sul contributo di ognuno verso un obiettivo comune. Sostenibilità : Siamo consapevoli che il mondo di domani si costruisce con le azioni di oggi. L'attenzione all'ambiente è uno stile di vita riscontrabile in ogni nostro gesto, fuori e dentro l'azienda. Passione : La curiosità e la voglia di spingersi sempre più in alto sapendo di poter andare sempre oltre i risultati raggiunti sono il motore del nostro lavoro.

Pundi X headquarters operates in compliance with Singapore’s Payment Services Act and the Regulations of the Monetary Authority of Singapore. Pundi X is a founding member of Asosiasi Blockchain Indonesia and also active in other blockchain associations globally. Based in Jakarta Nice to haves Experiences in NFT Up to date to the current Web3 development news. Please send your CV entitled “dApps Developer” to hr@pundix.com. Join us!

The ideal candidate should be able to work independently and collaboratively in a team-oriented environment. Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain SharePoint sites and applications Develop custom solutions using SharePoint Framework (SPFx) and PowerShell Design and implement SharePoint workflows and forms Work with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions Collaborate with other developers and team members to ensure best practices and quality of deliverables Troubleshoot and resolve SharePoint issues Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field At least 3 years of experience in SharePoint development Proficient in SharePoint Framework (SPFx), PowerShell, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery Strong understanding of SharePoint site architecture and design Experience with SharePoint Online and on-premises versions (2013, 2016, 2019) Excellent problem-solving skills Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team-oriented environment Strong written and verbal communication skills Preferred Qualifications: SharePoint certification (e.g., Microsoft Certified: SharePoint Developer) Experience with SharePoint migrations and upgrades Experience with Microsoft Teams and Power Platform

Title: Salesforce Developer - Indonesia
Description: We are looking for an experienced  Salesforce Developer  to own everything related to Salesforce implementation and its integration with other internal systems. As Salesforce Developer you will be working alongside our Salesforce Developer who will support you and help bring you up to speed. Together, you will be responsible for Salesforce.com development, its integration with our Twilio, Hubspot, android app, and other cloud based systems. Responsibilities Design, code and implement a new Salesforce Architecture aiming to optimize it to support our operations, to prime it for upcoming products and to support increasing data gathering. Drive and own documentation on all objects, datafields, triggers, etc.., so we can better manage Salesforce as we grow. Be the final decision maker on how to effectively translate business requirements into Salesforce application and solutions. Engage in a constant dialog with amalan users to understand our processes and how to best support those processes using salesforce. Coach other team members on best practices. Test the stability and functionality of salesforce applications. Coordinate with the IT team to support proper integration between salesforce and other internal tools (incl. our android app, Hubspot, Twilio, QuickBooks, call-center, website, among others). Requirements Willing to relocate to Yogyakarta, our new Headquarters being custom built for us. Experience in designing, building, and implementing business solutions using salesforce. Advanced knowledge of Salesforce CRM platforms. Proficient in MYSQL, Apex, JavaScript, Native, and VisualForce. Train and mentor other team members on using the Salesforce.com platform. Fluency in Bahasa Indonesia and English. This position is open for suitable part-time or full-time candidates. This is an exciting opportunity within a small and dynamic team in a high growth startup led by an international group of experienced finance and start-up veterans. It is a fun job for a highly motivated person that learns quickly and likes a fast moving, challenging environment. Our mission at amalan is to assist people in regaining control of their finances. We advise customers on ways to renegotiate their loans to a level they can afford. We are the first to offer such service in Indonesia using a professional, attentive and customer focused approach, supported by cutting edge technology. We are backed by strong investors and are in a great position to be a star fintech in Southeast Asia. We offer a start-up environment with a flat hierarchy that gives you ample space to develop yourself professionally and to apply your creativity. Starting salary and benefits are competitive with excellent growth perspective.

Title: Cloud Security Engineer
Description: Company Description Devoteam G Cloud  is a dynamically expanding company with strong relationships with Google, a leading partner for innovative workplace and cloud solutions. Currently we are looking to expand our Google Cloud Platform consulting capabilities in  Jakarta . We are constantly innovating not only our client’s businesses but also our own. Our goal is to be one step ahead and to build valuable partnerships with the digital leaders. To be in the forefront we need to have the best talents in our team. That’s why we have a special approach to our employees. We believe in an open company culture and relations built on trust. We support our team members in their development, certifications and additional education to deepen their expertise. The 3 pillars that make us a unique company are: Curiosity  - we are curious about people, technology, and business Trust  - our relationships are built on trust, empowering us to work as a single, cohesive organisation towards our goals Courage  - we have courage to challenge ourselves, our customers, and our partners.     Job Description In this role, you'll provide technical guidance to customers adopting Google Cloud Platform services. You will provide best practices on secure foundational cloud implementations, automated provisioning of infrastructure and applications, cloud-ready application architectures, etc. You'll provide guidance in ensuring customers receive the best of what Google Cloud Platform (GCP) can offer and you will ensure that customers have the best experience in migrating, building, modernizing, and maintaining applications in Google Cloud Platform.  Responsibilities Provide domain expertise in cloud security and compliance and be a trusted technical advisor to customers. Solve cloud security and compliance challenges. Work with customers to design and develop cloud security architectures and solutions to meet and exceed their security requirements. Create and deliver best practices recommendations, tutorials, blog articles, sample code, and technical presentations adapting to different levels of business and technical stakeholders. Manage disparate stakeholders within customer environments to deliver consensus and drive positive customer outcomes on the Google Cloud Platform.     Qualifications Minimum qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience. 4 years of experience working with security products, such as EDR, NDR, IDP/IDS, or SIEM technologies. Experience managing customer projects to completion, working with cross-functional teams. Coding experience in one or more general purpose languages. Preferred qualifications: 7 years of experience in security architecture and/or security engineering. Experience in Cloud Security delivered within the context of customer-facing roles. Experience with cyber attacks and mitigation methods in two or more of the following: Network protocols and secure network design, OS internals and hardening, web application security, security assessments and penetration testing, authentication and access control, applied cryptography and security protocols, security monitoring and intrusion detection, incident response and forensics, development of security tools, automation, or frameworks. Experience securing Google Cloud or other cloud environments. Understanding of security principles.

Understanding of risk assessments and their relationship to governance and compliance frameworks Up-to-date understanding of technical threats and the techniques to defend against them - including tactics, techniques, and procedures.

Title: Data Scientist
Description: About The Position We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our Data, Analytics & Intelligence team. As such you will assist in generating actionable insights as well as provide solutions to key stakeholders. Your main responsibility is to clean and validate the data we generate across all of our assets to ensure accuracy, completeness, and uniformity. Devising and applying models and algorithms to mine the stores of big data. Analyzing the data to identify patterns and trends. Interpreting the data to develop solutions and uncover business opportunities. The ideal candidate is a team player who possesses above all common sense, strong analytical skills, thrives in a fast-paced environment, is comfortable with uncertainty and has the ability to simplify complex information to key stakeholders. Above all the candidate must have excellent presentation skills in both Bahasa and English. Skills & Qualifications Must have: Under the age of 28 At least 2+ years of relevant experience in Data Scientist and related field Strong quantitative and problem-solving skills Strong knowledge of a variety of statistical and machine learning techniques (for example clustering, artificial neural networks, classification, regression, properties of distributions) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks. Advanced knowledge in Python / R in developing Machine Learning (Sklearn, Tensorflow, Keras, Sci-Py, NumPY, Matplotlib) Experience in one or more data warehousing & ETL tools (such as but not limited to: Hadoop, MapReduce, HIVE, PIG, Apache Spark, Kafka, Talend) is a plus. Fluency in written and spoken English Self-starter Note The interview is being  conducted in English  and will also  feature a brain teaser . If you are not comfortable with either, do not apply. Further,  submit your CV in English , other submissions will not be considered. For your consideration: The position requires to work on-site and is  not available for remote or hybrid arrangements .

Title: Junior DevOps Engineer
Description: Beautyhaul is one of the fastest-growing beauty companies in Indonesia that aspires to be the largest vertically integrated beauty ecosystem from supply to retail. Due to its exponential growth, the company has attracted investment from reputable investor, Sequoia Capital. Our first brand ''Somethinc'' was founded in 2019, is currently #1 skincare brand in ecommerce & modern trade with >2M social media followings. Our second brand Glowinc is breaking the boundaries by offering genderless products at affordable prices. Our offline / online commerce Beautyhaul is the core for carrying multiple brands that we have directly to our customers. We are incubating more and more business models in our platform and aim to be a strong regional player in beauty, within South Asia region. We are looking for more people to join us, who are excited to disrupt the traditional beauty industry with product innovation and non-linear growth, who want to build a profitable start-up into a unicorn company, who will always learn and do the right thing.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Are you an early achiever looking to join a team of like-minded individuals and make a difference in the financial technology industry? Indepay | Setara Networks is the place for you! We are a fast-paced start-up, and we're seeking highly skilled Business Analysts who are committed to building a culture of excellence and helping us take our company to the next level. As part of our team, you'll work alongside other early achievers who put in a lot of effort and support each other to become the best versions of themselves. We believe in fostering a work environment that encourages risk-taking, innovation, and collaboration. As a Business Analyst, you'll be responsible for identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, managing existing client accounts, and executing customized account strategies. You'll need to have excellent analytical, written, and verbal communication skills, and be able to work independently while collaborating with cross-functional teams. At Indepay | Setara Networks, we're well ahead of our competitors, and we're looking for individuals who are passionate about economic financial modeling, big picture thinking, and taking Indonesia forward. We're building a team of early achievers who are committed to being unique in our strengths and supporting each other to achieve our goals. If you have experience working in similar startups in Series A stage and beyond, and you're a born leader who enjoys building new things, we invite you to apply to be part of our rocketship. Responsibilities Build and manage relationships with clients and stakeholders Lead the accounts and sales plan for allocated accounts Execute customized account strategy to increase revenue and market share for strategic partner accounts Identify strategic opportunities for the company's capabilities through a strong understanding of segments, customer business needs, and leveraging solutions across all product platforms Develop, negotiate and sign proposals by working closely with internal stakeholders and strategic partner executives Proactively educate strategic partners about Indepay Platform on Partner development and market opportunities Work with cross-functional teams across marketing, product, market research, and technology to achieve business objectives Deliver presentations to key stakeholders Track performance against objectives Requirements Bachelor's degree or equivalent with 2+ years of business development experience Financial services/payments industry experience preferred Team-oriented and collaborative, with the ability to work in a complex and ambiguous environment Must be comfortable working in an early stage to growth stage company and should be able to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced environment. Have a proven track record of success in previous roles and have worked in a similar setting, such as a Pre series A-B company will be a plus A leader who takes fun in taking risks and understands that taking calculated risks is necessary for growth. They should have the ability to balance risk-taking with sound decision-making to build something innovative and groundbreaking Proven ability to partner, communicate, and manage through multiple disciplines and organizational groups Demonstrated track record of implementing strategic initiatives Experience “managing up” building executive-level communications and delivering presentations  Skills: Analytical and data-driven approach in day-to-day work Ability to work well under pressure and deliver on commitments Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, and can think outside the box to proactively provide the right solution Good communication skills and the ability to impact and influence Strategic thinker who understands business opportunities to create a competitive advantage Keen eye for detail and ability to multi-task with excellent time management and prioritization skills Positive attitude and determination to succeed against all odds Hands-on, independent, self-motivated, and a fast learner Patience and perseverance are key attributes Benefits Competitive salaries and generous benefits Opportunity to work alongside passionate and talented individuals Entrepreneurship culture with a focus on creating a budding ground for future entrepreneurs Perks and flexibility of a technology product company

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills High quality professional standards in documentation, presentations, project approach and ways of working. Title: Linux Engineer
Description: Want to be a part of our team? MS Engineer (L2) is responsible for providing a managed service to clients to ensure that their IT infrastructure and systems remain operational. Through the proactive monitoring, identifying, investigating and resolving of technical incidents and problems, the MS Engineer (L2) are able to restore service to clients. Their primary objective is to proactively review client requests or tickets and apply technical/process knowledge to resolve them without breaching service level agreement (SLA). The MS Engineer (L2) focuses on second line support for incidents and requests with medium level of complexity. Radford reference: "Performs IT functions such as design, analysis, evaluation, testing, debugging and implementation of applications programs supporting the company infrastructure business processes and operations and/or network-based (cloud) product systems. Analyzes, installs, acquires, modifies and supports operating systems, database or utilities software. Plans, conducts and directs the analysis of business problems with automated systems solutions. Analyzes, designs, acquires and implements projects for LAN and/or WAN systems. Plans, designs, acquires and implements telecommunications voice/wire systems. At higher job levels, may contribute to the development, testing, evaluation or design of system or infrastructure architecture used throughout the IT solution set." Working at NTT Key Roles and Responsibilities:  Proactively monitors the work queues.  Perform operational tasks to resolve all incidents / requests in a timely manner and within agreed SLA.  Update tickets with resolution tasks performed Identify, Investigate, analyse issues and errors prior to or when they occur and log all such incidents in a timely manner. Capture all required and relevant information for immediate resolution Provide second level support to all incidents, requests and identify the root cause of incidents and problems Communicate with other teams and clients for extending support Execute changes with clear identification of risks and mitigation plans to be captured into the change record Follow the shift hand over process highlighting any key tickets to be focussed along with a handover of upcoming critical tasks to be carried out in the next shift Escalate all tickets to seek right focus from CoE and other teams, if needed continue the escalations to management Work with automation teams for effort optimization and automating routine tasks Coach Service Desk and L1 teams for technical and behavioural skills Establish monitoring for client infrastructure Identify problems and errors before they impact a client’s service Lead and manages all initial client escalation for operational issues.  Contribute to the change management process by logging all change requests with complete details for standard and non-standard including patching and any other changes to Configuration Items. Ensures all changes are carried out with proper change approvals Plan and execute approved maintenance activities Audit and analyse incident and request tickets for quality and recommends improvements with updates to knowledge articles.  Produce trend analysis reports for identifying tasks for automation, leading to reduction in tickets and optimization of effort Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Have Experience in Linux Redhat Family Have Experience in Virtualization and Container Technology (Kubernetes) Having Linux Certification is an advantage Having Certification in VM or container (CKA) is an advantage Ability to communicate and work across different cultures and social groups Ability to maintain a positive outlook at work Ability to work well in a high-pressure environment Ability to work hard and put in longer hours when it is necessary Ability to apply active listening techniques such as paraphrasing the message to confirm understanding, probing for further relevant information and refraining from interrupting Ability to adapt to changing circumstances Ability to place client at the forefront of all interactions, understanding their requirements and creating a positive client experience throughout the total client journey Eager to learn new technologies and developing skills Academic Qualifications: Diploma, degree or relevant qualification in IT/Computing (or demonstrated equivalent work experience) Advantageous Certifications: RHEL, VCP, CKA, MCSA, MCSE Any of the above certifications is a plus. The MS – Services Engineer (L2) is expected to gain certifications relevant to services supported. Certifications carry additional weightage on candidate’s qualification for the role. Required Experience: At least 3 years experience in managing Linux Redhat Systems At least 1 year experience in Kubernetes or any open-source container technology What will make you a good fit for the role? Standard career level descriptor for job level:  Seasoned and experienced professional  Has full understanding of specialisation area  Resolves wide range of issues in creative ways  Fully qualified, career level, career journey-orientated  Uses good judgement in selecting tools and methods to solve problems  Networks with senior internal and external people in own area of expertise  Receives little instruction on day-to-day work, receives general instructions on new assignments  Typically requires demonstrable related experience with a Bachelor’s or equivalent degree; or moderate level experience and a Master’s or equivalent degree; or a PhD or equivalent degree without experience; or equivalent work experience

Title: Data Business Analyst - Big Data

The role is responsible for analyzing and translate the requirements into functional spec and task, communicate and distribute the tasks to related internal teams. Key Responsibilities  Working closely with multiple stakeholders to gather, analyze current business requirements.  Translating business requirements into detailed functional specifications and communicate with technical teams.  Ensuring requirements issues are tracked, reported, and resolved in a timely manner. Effectively communicating plan, status, risks and issues to the stakeholder in a precise and timely manner.  Contributing to and driving continuous process improvement initiatives to meet business needs.  Supporting the Project Manager or technical teams in delivering the project plan on-time and on-budget.  Plan, conduct, and document User Acceptance Tests.  Supporting stakeholders in deployments, implementation, and training activities.   Work closely with technical teams to create and maintain data product, data pipeline, and data processing documentations Requirements 1 - 3 years of work experience as IT Business Analyst, data engineer, data analyst, or data scientist.  Bachelors/Master’s Degree in Computer Science/Statistics/Management Excellent communication with multiple levels of stakeholders and functional disciplines. Excellent analytical thinking, analysis, and problem-solving skills.  Ability to structure problems through a data driven decision-making process.  Familiar with data engineering, data analytics, and data science process.  Familiar with of SQL/PLSQL Proficient with Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, Outlook, and Word applications.  High aptitude to learn quickly and work well under pressure with appropriate attention to detail.  Familiar with data platforms technologies.  Organized, deliberate, and reliable in structuring work, and effective as a problem solver.

The successful candidate will work closely with our sales team to analyze internal sales data, identify opportunities for growth and provide valuable insights to drive revenue growth. The ideal candidate should possess strong analytical skills, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of successful collaboration with sales teams.   Responsibilities Analyze internal sales data and identify growth opportunities Work closely with the sales team to understand their needs and provide them with valuable insights Conduct market research and competitor benchmarking to identify potential areas for growth Develop and maintain sales performance dashboards, reports, and models Use data analysis to recommend strategies to increase sales and revenue growth Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement sales improvement programs Manage multiple projects and deliverables, ensuring timely and high-quality completion Evaluate outcomes and iterate strategies to continuously improve performance Qualifications Bachelor's degree in business, economics, or a related field Minimum of 3 years of experience in business analysis, business planning, or any related field Strong analytical skills with experience in data analysis and modeling Having a background in a top consulting firm or distributor would be a plus Proven track record of working closely with sales teams to drive revenue growth Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Proficiency in using analytical tools, such as Excel, SQL, and Python Strong project management skills Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects and prioritize deadlines Experience in the technology, consulting, or distributor industry is a plus Fluency in English is mandatory Fluency in Mandarin would be a plus

Title: AI Business Analyst
Description: In this role, you will act as a bridge between domain/function and data scientists. Actively participating in the analysis of domain problems/needs and seeking suitable digitalization/ AI solutions. In your new role you will: Gather and translate requirements for functional solutions into clear AI scope and objectives. Develop and evaluate algorithms according to the expected problem solution. Harmonize business process/work method to enable analytics/ AI solutions into implementation. Prove concepts, prototypes, and implementations, mainly pertaining to the solutions and services in Business Analytics encompassing Computer Vision; Natural Language Processing; Reinforcement Learning; Machine learning & Deep Neural Networks; and Predictive & Prescriptive modeling. Collect, analyze, and interpret qualitative & quantitative data with statistical methods (e.g. data sampling/ re-sampling, ANOVA analysis, distributions, etc). Apply standard processes such as CRISP-DM (business understanding, data understanding, data preparation, modeling, evaluation, deployment); Machine Learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, and PyTorch; and Agile Methodologies for Business Analytics projects. Create and review technical design documentation, research and proposals, white papers, presentations, formal recommendations, and reports.  You are best equipped for this task if you have: Master's / Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science / Mathematics / Statistics. >3 years of relevant working experience in the semiconductor or electronics manufacturing industry. Understands complex issues and puts them in context. Hands-on working knowledge using Data Science and Statistical methods for AI / ML including Deep Learning methods (Convolutional Neural Networks, Recurrent Neural Networks, and Generative Adversarial Networks). Working experience in Text Mining and Natural Language Processing. Programming skills with scripting languages & frameworks such as Python, R, Matlab, Scala, Java, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Familiar with microservice and/or big data technologies such as Openshift, Cloudera (CDH), Elasticsearch, and CEPH. Good knowledge of Agile Methodologies. Experienced in best practice adaption and external benchmarking. Strong proficiency in English with excellent communication and presentation skills.   Part of your life. Part of tomorrow. Infineon is a world leader in semiconductor solutions that make life easier, safer, and greener. Our solutions for efficient energy management, smart mobility, and secure, seamless communications link the real and the digital world.

Title: Business Data Analyst - Investment Tech of Big Conglo
Description: Flexible working arrangement|Stability (big conglo company) About Our Client Client is an investment tech under one of the biggest conglo in Indonesia. Uncover hidden sources of value within the client's business, and make recommendations out of it when applicable by proactive approach on ad-hoc/deeper data investigations or trend analysis  Create, maintain, and monitor reliable and scalable reports and dashboards across client's BI tools (i.e. BigQuery, Tableau, etc)  Have an understanding and ability to stitch between behavioral and transactional users' data in doing forecasting & planning The Successful Applicant  Have an Undergraduate degree in related subjects (IT, Mathematics, etc.)  Experienced for at least 3 years in Data Analysis & Insight  Preferably have led or mentor a small team (around 3 headcounts)  Experienced in big data processing with SQL, Python/R, as well as making dashboards and reports  Have deep curiosity and proactively explore more business insights What's On Offer Flexible working arrangement, stability (conglo-backed company), collaborative team member and mentor Contact: Clairine Lonteng Quote job ref: JN-012023-5921314

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Who are we? Amar Bank is one of the most technologically advanced digital banks in Indonesia. Our leading digital lending product, Tunaiku has the distinction of being the first FinTech product in Indonesia. We are also the first digital bank on the cloud. As the first profitable digital bank, we managed to get listed on the Indonesian Stock Exchange. How did we manage to do that? We are changing people’s perception of a bank. We believe we are the innovators who combine customer focus principles with creating technology-based impact. We incorporate freedom and flexibility as part of our startup working culture DNA to encourage innovation in creating better financial solutions for the banking industry. We think of ourselves as, ‘A technology company with a banking license’. For this reason, we ‘Act like a FinTech, and think like a Bank.’ How did it all start? Founded on March 15, 1991, in Surabaya as PT Anglomas International Bank (Amin Bank), the bank was acquired by Tolaram Group and transformed to PT Bank Amar Indonesia (Amar Bank) in 2014. It has then undergone a significant digital transformation to become one of the country's forerunning fintech institutions through its award-winning digital lending platform, Tunaiku. Our philosophy, mission, and vision Technology must impact lives, must improve lives. We exist to provide banking to those who ‘need’ and not only to those who ‘want’. Services when provided to those who need at the time of their need brings smiles. Our vision is to bring 200 million smiles. More about the bank with startup culture environment Consist of 1000+ people, you will meet people who love to grow, dream big, and actually have fun at the workplace! We provide a great working environment that pushes people to grow outside their comfort zone. People with high drive and ambition find us a very attractive place to work as their career growth matches their own drive and not any staid policies. Thus we hold the honor of being awarded “Best Place to Work in Indonesia”. Recently Amar Bank was awarded as Inspirational Brand from APEA (Asia Pacific Enterprise Awards) 2022. Of course, our innovation won't stop here. So if you would love to be a part of it, have a growth mindset, and are constantly hungry for challenges, we invite you to join us in our journey to ‘Impact Lives’. Join us today and create #unlimitedinnovations! Business Analyst staff will be directly reporting to Business Analyst Circle Lead and also EVP Finance. He/She will have a great deal of exposure about the company’s businesses especially its flagship product, Tunaiku and Finance related matters. Will be involved in various stage of business process along with other team members and other functions. Due to the nature of the job, it is also expected that the team member is committed to the position. Responsibilities: Analyze the current processes Assist and coordinate with related parties in designing an effective and efficient workflows Implements and monitors the progress of development projects to ensure the smooth running of business and compliance within the industry environment Collect data and analyze the Bank's performance, including financial reports, in accordance with predetermined deadlines Provide proposed solutions to improve the performance of a business process Establish communication and provide support to other work units in order to achieve effective cross-division cooperation Perform ad-hoc tasks requested by the supervisor Requirements: 2-3 years working experience Experience in working in a team-oriented and collaborative environment Experienced candidates is expected to have experience or exposure in the related field, experience in the fintech industry is a plus Analytics and detail-oriented are must Eagerness to learn and share with others Have good critical thinking and detail-oriented is a must Language proficiency: Bahasa and English Strong in numbers is a plus point Bonus Point: Proficient in excel Familiar with BI tools such as Looker Our keen eye for finance won't go unnoticed at Amar Bank. We do budgeting, investor relations-managing, and assisting executives in making decisions that affect the organization. It's our job to take responsibility for the financial health of the organization. We act as the floodgates when money comes in and goes out. We also collaborate closely with top executives and departments to innovate an idea-friendly organizational financial culture. Our keen eye for finance won't go unnoticed at Amar Bank. We do budgeting, investor relations-managing, and assisting executives in making decisions that affect the organization. It's our job to take responsibility for the financial health of the organization. We act as the floodgates when money comes in and goes out. We also collaborate closely with top executives and departments to innovate an idea-friendly organizational financial culture.
