Title: Business Analyst
Description: PT. Media Digitech Indonesia is a software development company trusted by business in Indonesia is looking for Business Analyst Job Requirements Have 3 years hands on experiences as business analyst. Have the knowledge and experiences on project phases. Experience handle project banking. Familiar with create documentation for project (FSD / TSD / BRD, MOM, etc) Have the knowledge and experience on implementation of Ambit Focus. Title: Business Intelligence & Analyst - Digital Banking Business, SeaBank
Description: The Business Intelligence and Data Analytics team plays a critical role in conducting close-loop data-driven business iterations. As business intelligence specialists and data analysts, our scope of work is not limited to just performance monitoring and reporting, but also in proactively finding actionable insights to help drive high-impact business changes. Our end-to-end data solution reduces the gap between the business teams and technical teams, and achieves real ‘intelligence’ in the iteration cycle. Browse our Business Intelligence and Data Analytics team openings to see how you can make an impact with us. Job Description Generate predictive & prescriptive reports and analyse all workstreams at SeaBank to provide and support data-driven decision-making Generate actionable insights that can be used to support or design new strategies Serving various work units by becoming partners in formulating plans and strategies to drive SeaBank's business growth through data-driven decision-making Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or Information System Technology will be an advantage Experience as Business Intelligence & Analyst, data scientist, data analyst, or data engineer in banking or financial services Experience working with one or more query languages (e.g Structured Query Language) Familiar with the use of analytical languages such as Python Strong communication and analytical skills Comfortable working with large numbers/data sets

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Want to be a part of our team? Analyzes complex business problems to be solved with automated systems. Identifies gaps and provides technical expertise in business requirements for system functional specifications and scales new and current systems, processes and procedures in a cost effective manner. Configures system settings and options; plans and executes unit, integration and acceptance testing to meet business requirements. Designs details of automated systems. May provide consultation to users in the area of automated systems. May lead cross-functional linked teams to address business or systems issues. Working at NTT The Business Analyst’s key function is to work with internal and external clients to determine requirements and to define solutions to address complex business, process and systems problems, and improvements in the organization. They act as a liaison among stakeholders in order to understand the structure, policies, and operations of an organization, and to recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Act as a bridge between the business problems and the technology solutions.  Analyse, transform and ultimately resolve the business problems with the help of technology.  Work with internal clients and apply best practice methodologies to determine business requirements and to define solutions to address business, process, information and system problems, improvements or change.  Deliver business projects in line with sponsor requirements and enterprise architecture.  Proactive development and deployment of enhanced services and platforms, covering all the functional aspects from service/product definition through to build and deployment.  Ensure the identification and documentation of operational gaps including user guides, templates, test cases and related user training.  Assist with the resolution of issues pertaining to the service.  Adhere to and follow the relevant development and support processes.  Communicate and escalate if any issues arise or deliverables cannot be met and request assistance to ensure closure of issues.  Take responsibility for delivery of project elements with minimal supervision Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Broad understanding of business practices and processes Excellent team player who displays good client service orientation with well-developed administrative and organisation skills Deep expertise in specific systems, processes and technologies that they will be required to analyse Meticulous attention to detail whilst working under pressure Excellent verbal and written communication skills Ability to listen empathetically Ability to build rapport and engage effectively with a variety of stakeholders Knowledge of project management methodology Excellent analytical skills with the ability to convert business requirements into operational deliverables (functional requirements) to meet business objectives Excellent documentation skills, in particular, functional requirements, test cases, system user documentation, processes and procedures and presentations Very good working knowledge of Microsoft Exchange, Word, Excel Project, PowerPoint and Visio Understanding of systems generally used in a services organisation e.g. ServiceNow, Siebel, Remedy, SAP, EMS would be advantageous Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Typically requires Bachelor’s degree or equivalent with related demonstrable experience Project management certification would be advantageous IIBA Membership required Relevant technology certification(s) Required Experience: Demonstrable experience as a Business Analyst gained within a technology services environment Experience as a system administrator or developer would be advantageous Demonstrable experience in and with all operational aspects of a Services business, preferably with a Systems Integrator Demonstrable experience in the process of developing and implementing new services and systems Understanding of and experience with ITIL (IT Infrastructure Library) Demonstrable experience in coordinating and managing tasks, and small projects What will make you a good fit for the role?

Title: Business Intelligent Analyst
Description: In this role she/he will be responsible for understanding the industry and competitive environment, establishing the operation system of business and seller growth, exploring opportunities and empowering business development operations. Responsibility Support operation teams to work on different initiatives, and make decisions based on number. Formulate the go-to-market, seller growth strategy for local market; evaluate and evolve the strategy to meet business needs. Build and monitor the operational index, and work closely with the data, project, and product teams to optimize all data and tools. Strong ability to identify risks and streamline business efficiencies. Understanding e-commerce or affiliate field is a plus. Combining business analytics, data mining, and data visualization, to help organizations to make more data-driven decisions. Provide business, insight and trend analysis. Capable of producing regular reporting and monitoring dashboards, and responding to data needs. Requirements Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent practical experience. 5+ years of experience in an eCommerce platform, consulting firm or internet strategy, industry or market research and business analytics with eCommerce relevant experience. Strong analytic, logical and problem solving skills with good attention to detail. Big picture thinking, structured, organized, and experienced in managing projects on different scales (planning, root cause identification, risk mitigation, and process optimization). Adaptable, fast learner, highly motivated, and versatile player with some exposure in ops and commercial. English proficiency is a must

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: The ideal candidate will play a role in the development of multiple parts of the business by analyzing past, current, and future business trends. This individual will establish strategies to achieve desired outcomes and implement these strategies. They will often work cross-functionally with internal business units in order to understand the challenges that these teams are face and provide solutions to these groups. Responsibilities Develop new product and service oriented strategies Communicate and implement strategies alongside technical team Identify and solve weaknesses within the organization Explore new ways to increase customer or client satisfaction Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business or related field Having 3 years experience in Core System Insurance Good knowledge in credit card, loan systems, mortgage, reward or points systems. Good knowledge to translate business requirement to sequence or technical flow, visualize or create UML diagram and communicate with solution architect

Title: Business Analyst
Description: i. Mempunyai pemahaman yang kuat terkait analisa proses bisnis yang dituangkan kedalam sistem ii. Dapat menentukan tujuan operasional dengan mempelajari fungsi bisnis, mengumpulkan informasi, mengevaluasi persyaratan dan format output yang diinginkan iii. Membuat bagan dan diagram alur kerja, mempelajari kemampuan sistem, dan menuliskan spesifikasi yang dibutuhkan iv. Memantau kemajuan proyek dengan melacak aktivitas, menyelesaikan masalah, menerbitkan laporan kemajuan berkala, merekomendasikan tindakan yang perlu dilakukan v. Mempunyai pengalaman pengembangan aplikasi dalam ruang lingkup manajemen proyek baik itu waterfall maupun agile vi. Berkepribadian baik dan dapat bekerja sama dalam team dengan baik

Title: Business Analyst
Description: JOB SUMMARY Position: Business Analyst Division: Analyst RESPONSIBILITIES: You will be working in the business and financial analysis Function reporting to the COO or VP of Finance. Your objectives will be to develop financial models and take over in the future from global consultant to lead financial analysis, including product development and manufacturing finance.   REQUIREMENTS: University Degree in Finance or Business Fluent in English At least 5 years experience in the automotive or consumer electronics industry in a variety of functions Worked as business/finance analyst of a period of at least 2 years Knowledge of 2W or 4W automotive industry Financials in Manufacturing and Launches (Understand Key financial indicators at BU/ Product level (EBIT, ROS, Gross Margin), Manages Project Budget (Capex, production tooling), and track, keep and reports Ramp Up costs and deviation) Strong communication skills with various levels Presentation skills to management Ability to complete tasks with minimal supervision, self driving Capable to liaise with international teams Experience in multi cultural setting

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Job Description Conduct research and carry out data collection to understand the industry, market, user behaviors, and patterns. Identify problems within the business and recommend/implement SMART solutions. Assist departments and be the in-house consultant to understand their goals and build a system to help them make data-driven decisions and achieve goals (ie. tracking system of key metrics). Collect, organize, and interpret statistical information to make it useful to internal and external stakeholders. Perform analysis to assess and improve business performance. Prepare reports (mostly, but not limited to, in the form of presentation deck, email, word doc) based on analysis. Present findings to stakeholders and provide recommendations. Job Requirements Min. 3 years in any of these fields: data analytics/business analytics/statistics/management consulting. Familiarity with programming languages such as SQL, Oracle, Python. Must have a strong market and commercial awareness. Like challenges and have problem-solving skills; are curious to find the root/cause of problems. Ability to analyze, model, and interpret data.

Title: Manager Data Analytics
Description: We are looking for an Analytics Manager to organize our analytics function and manage our team of analysts. You will implement tools and strategies to translate raw data into valuable business insights. In this role, we expect you to have strong logical reasoning skills and business intelligence. The ability to communicate effectively is essential. If you also have solid industry experience, we’d like to meet you. Your goal will be to help our business use data to drive high performance and quality. Provide direction for a team of data analysts Take the lead on developing process for effective data analyst and reporting Develop and monitor project plans, track and follow up on risks, accurately report progress agains milestones to keep project/initiatives on schedule Proactively anticipate ssues and provide a perspective to leaders/teams for how to deliver practical solutions to business unit leaders Requirements Bachelor's Degree in Statistics/Mathematics/Computer Science or another quantitative field Min. 5 years experience in Data field is a must  Data analyst Skills are essential High comfort level working in a fast - paced, result-oriented culture Able to manage competing, high priority demands; prioritizing workload, managing projects and multiple responsibilities agains strict deadlines Benefits Working with the biggest Innovation Public Services in Indonesia Working on the product used by 100 Millions of people in Indonesia from 514 city and district Working hybrid (WHF and WFO) For more about our output, outcome, and impact of Kartu Prakerja here

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Background in CRM Applications and or customer 360 SQL fluency Technical fluency with database, design data model & data mapping experience with customer lifecycle and customer 360 Insurance/Financial/Digital Business

Title: AI Business Analyst
Description: In this role, you will act as a bridge between domain/function and data scientists. Actively participating in the analysis of domain problems/needs and seeking suitable digitalization/ AI solutions. In your new role you will: Gather and translate requirements for functional solutions into clear AI scope and objectives. Develop and evaluate algorithms according to the expected problem solution. Harmonize business process/work method to enable analytics/ AI solutions into implementation. Prove concepts, prototypes, and implementations, mainly pertaining to the solutions and services in Business Analytics encompassing Computer Vision; Natural Language Processing; Reinforcement Learning; Machine learning & Deep Neural Networks; and Predictive & Prescriptive modeling. Collect, analyze, and interpret qualitative & quantitative data with statistical methods (e.g. data sampling/ re-sampling, ANOVA analysis, distributions, etc). Apply standard processes such as CRISP-DM (business understanding, data understanding, data preparation, modeling, evaluation, deployment); Machine Learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, and PyTorch; and Agile Methodologies for Business Analytics projects. Create and review technical design documentation, research and proposals, white papers, presentations, formal recommendations, and reports.  You are best equipped for this task if you have: Master's / Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science / Mathematics / Statistics. >3 years of relevant working experience in the semiconductor or electronics manufacturing industry. Understands complex issues and puts them in context. Hands-on working knowledge using Data Science and Statistical methods for AI / ML including Deep Learning methods (Convolutional Neural Networks, Recurrent Neural Networks, and Generative Adversarial Networks). Working experience in Text Mining and Natural Language Processing. Programming skills with scripting languages & frameworks such as Python, R, Matlab, Scala, Java, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Familiar with microservice and/or big data technologies such as Openshift, Cloudera (CDH), Elasticsearch, and CEPH. Good knowledge of Agile Methodologies. Experienced in best practice adaption and external benchmarking. Strong proficiency in English with excellent communication and presentation skills.   Part of your life. Part of tomorrow. Infineon is a world leader in semiconductor solutions that make life easier, safer, and greener. Our solutions for efficient energy management, smart mobility, and secure, seamless communications link the real and the digital world.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Melakukan desk study atau mengumpulkan data dan informasi terkait pencarian pasar, legal, operasional dan keuangan.  Menghandle serta mengevaluasi secara berkala kepada penerbit.  Melakukan survei lapangan yang dimaksudkan untuk mengumpulkan data teknis dan operasional, menjaring aspirasi manajemen dan survei lingkungan.  Melakukan analisa terhadap beberapa aspek seperti : Analisis Aspek Teknis, Analisis Aspek Ekonomi, Analisis Aspek Ekonomis, Analisis Aspek Ekonomis, Analisis Aspek Risiko dan Mitigasi Risiko.  Memberikan rekomendasi dan saran terkait rencana aplikasi system.  Menjalin relasi yang baik dengan pihak penerbit.  Melakukan diskusi dan persentasi. Kualifikasi khusus   Fresh Graduate (S1 Ekonomi/Bisnis/ Keuangan) / Pengalaman minimal 1 tahun  Memiliki kemampuan analisis bisnis yang kuat  Memahami istilah- istilah dalam dunia bisnis secara umum  Mampu membaca laporan keuangan  Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik  Mampu bekerja dalam tim  Memiliki tingkat ketelitian yang baik

Title: Manufacturing Business Analyst
Description: PERSOLKELLY is one of the largest recruitment companies in Asia Pacific providing comprehensive end-to-end workforce solutions to clients., allowing us to draw upon their connections as one of the largest recruitment companies in Asia Pasific. Equip with good conceptual and analytical thinking, able to implement them on to data analysis using Tableu, Pivot, Phyton or other tools are require.  Fluently communicate with English is necessity with proven experience to presenting ideas to the top management along with the reporting.  Willing be based at Tangerang - West Java, hire as permanent employee

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Want to be a part of our team? Analyzes complex business problems to be solved with automated systems. Identifies gaps and provides technical expertise in business requirements for system functional specifications and scales new and current systems, processes and procedures in a cost effective manner. Configures system settings and options; plans and executes unit, integration and acceptance testing to meet business requirements. Designs details of automated systems. May provide consultation to users in the area of automated systems. May lead cross-functional linked teams to address business or systems issues. Working at NTT The Business Analyst’s key function is to work with internal and external clients to determine requirements and to define solutions to address complex business, process and systems problems, and improvements in the organization. They act as a liaison among stakeholders in order to understand the structure, policies, and operations of an organization, and to recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Act as a bridge between the business problems and the technology solutions.  Analyse, transform and ultimately resolve the business problems with the help of technology.  Work with internal clients and apply best practice methodologies to determine business requirements and to define solutions to address business, process, information and system problems, improvements or change.  Deliver business projects in line with sponsor requirements and enterprise architecture.  Proactive development and deployment of enhanced services and platforms, covering all the functional aspects from service/product definition through to build and deployment.  Ensure the identification and documentation of operational gaps including user guides, templates, test cases and related user training.  Assist with the resolution of issues pertaining to the service.  Adhere to and follow the relevant development and support processes.  Communicate and escalate if any issues arise or deliverables cannot be met and request assistance to ensure closure of issues.  Take responsibility for delivery of project elements with minimal supervision Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Broad understanding of business practices and processes Excellent team player who displays good client service orientation with well-developed administrative and organisation skills Deep expertise in specific systems, processes and technologies that they will be required to analyse Meticulous attention to detail whilst working under pressure Excellent verbal and written communication skills Ability to listen empathetically Ability to build rapport and engage effectively with a variety of stakeholders Knowledge of project management methodology Excellent analytical skills with the ability to convert business requirements into operational deliverables (functional requirements) to meet business objectives Excellent documentation skills, in particular, functional requirements, test cases, system user documentation, processes and procedures and presentations Very good working knowledge of Microsoft Exchange, Word, Excel Project, PowerPoint and Visio Understanding of systems generally used in a services organisation e.g. ServiceNow, Siebel, Remedy, SAP, EMS would be advantageous Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Typically requires Bachelor’s degree or equivalent with related demonstrable experience Project management certification would be as a system administrator or developer would be advantageous Demonstrable experience in and with all operational aspects of a Services business, preferably with a Systems Integrator Demonstrable experience in the process of developing and implementing new services and systems Understanding of and experience with ITIL (IT Infrastructure Library) Demonstrable experience in coordinating and managing tasks, and small projects What will make you a good fit for the role?

Title: Business Analyst
Description: JOB SUMMARY Position: Business Analyst Division: Analyst RESPONSIBILITIES: You will be working in the business and financial analysis Function reporting to the COO or VP of Finance. Your objectives will be to develop financial models and take over in the future from global consultant to lead financial analysis, including product development and manufacturing finance.   REQUIREMENTS: University Degree in Finance or Business Fluent in English At least 5 years experience in the automotive or consumer electronics industry in a variety of functions Worked as business/finance analyst of a period of at least 2 years Knowledge of 2W or 4W automotive industry Financials in Manufacturing and Launches (Understand Key financial indicators at BU/ Product level (EBIT, ROS, Gross Margin), Manages Project Budget (Capex, production tooling), and track, keep and reports Ramp Up costs and deviation) Strong communication skills with various levels Presentation skills to management Ability to complete tasks with minimal supervision, self driving Capable to liaise with international teams Experience in multi cultural setting

Title: Business Development Analyst
Description: Conducting market research to identify new business development opportunities Analyzing consumer behavior and business position in the market to move toward sustainable growth Calculating business strategies and feasibility studies Analyzing business strategies to develop project plans Drafting business plans, project management, presentations, reference material, and filing other documents as required Qualification  Minimum Bachelor’s degree in any major Having 2-3 years work experince in business development/financial/data/marketing analyst in FMCG/Tobacco/Property industry Having experience as a Business Development Specialist in a related industry Advanced knowledge in market research and data analytic Tech savvy Placement : East Jakarta, Pulo Gadung

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Pendidikan min D3 dari jurusan TI/SI/Kom atau bidang yang relevan Memiliki pengalaman sebagai BA pada pelaksanaan IT Project, diutamakan sebagai Business Analyst, untuk level Senior dibutuhkan pengalaman min 5 tahun, sedangkan Middle pengalaman min 3 tahun Memahami konsep SDLC Memiliki pengalaman dalam menyusun dokumen project seperti KAK/RFP, SOW, RD, FSD, UAT Scenario, dll  Memiiki pengetahuan teknis seperti SQL, Webservice, dan pengalaman di asuransi adalah syarat opsional

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: Requirements Memiliki pengalaman dalam project dengan metode Agile Memiliki pengetahuan di bidang channel digital banking (web atau mobile) Memiliki pengetahuan terhadap produk,teknologi, dan trend Mengerti alur pengembangan produk Customer sentris dan detail Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik terutama dengan stakeholder

Title: Business Analyst (Confidential) - Oil & Gas MNC
Description: Exclusive role within the company|Exposure to regional team About Our Client Client is a top player in the industry with presence around the globe. Job Description Working scope includes but is not limited to: Collaborate and coordinate with multiple stakeholders at different seniority levels, within the organization and beyond, in answering business questions effectively and efficiently. Collect, Consolidate, Analyze and models the data to develop business insights and dashboards that add value to the business. Assessing business trends and developing root causes of business issues Complying with accounting practices and identifying opportunities for reduced costs and improved productivity/efficiency The Successful Applicant Experienced in similar or related roles with 5+ years of experience; Preferred previous roles could be around but not limited to: data analyst from telco/consultancy, financial analyst, business development & project analyst Exceptional communication and presentation skills using English Proven track record in performance analysis, competitor analysis, and implementing successful business actions based on data A firm grasp of economics, financial analysis, market research, and data analysis. Experienced in Microsoft Office tools, big data processing with SQL, Python/R, as well as making dashboards and reports (Tableau, Power BI, etc) What's on Offer Chance to work with a top player in Oil & Gas industry worldwide, with career opportunities around the globe (internal promotion/movement are very likely). Contact: Clairine Lonteng Quote job ref: JN-022023-5951068

Title: Senior Business Analyst - Big Player in Fintech
Description: Interesting employee benefits|Remote working option About Our Client Client have just closed another round of funding and is now tapping into several financial territories, to provide a 360 financial solution to all Indonesians. Job Description Engage broadly with stakeholder teams to structure and prioritize business problems where insights can have the biggest impact. Partner with business team leaders to frame, shape, and execute critical insights for business decisions. Act as a consultant to the internal team to deliver a recommendation or insight to the internal team based on data (business team, collection, product etc) Develop a deep understanding of the company's loan products Use past loan data to optimize our approval criteria, loan limit size, interest rate, and other relevant metrics Use past collections data to find opportunities to optimize our collections strategy Design, implement, and monitor marketing, operations, and collections experiments Make data-driven recommendations and monitor performance based on recommendations Work closely with stakeholders and help with the creation of reports, dashboards, and monitoring tools The Successful Applicant 2-4 years of professional experience in an analytical role at a technology company Bachelor's degree in any field which requires logically creative thinking Strong analytical and problem-solving skills including the ability to independently drive analysis concluding with rationalized recommendations Ability to see metrics in the context of the business as a whole Highly organized and able to manage multiple requests/projects simultaneously Logical and capable of structuring and hypothesising problems, and able to provide solutions and validate with data-driven approaches. Critical and system thinker, able to manage a high degree of complexity and to distill information into simple messages, able to think both strategically as well as to effectively develop key business processes Passion for using data and analytics to drive business value Proficiency in Excel * Having knowledge of SQL is a plus Experience with R or Python is a plus Strong communications skills Interest in fintech and high level of curiosity What's on Offer  Remote working option Interesting employee benefit Competitive salary package Contact: Clairine Lonteng Quote job ref: JN-092022-5755020

Title: Tech Business Analyst (Contract Based)
Description: Business Analyst main tasks will include performing detailed requirements analysis, documenting processes, and performing some user acceptance testing. To succeed in this role, one is expected to have a natural analytical way of thinking and be able to explain difficult concepts to non-technical users. Key Responsibilities Evaluating business processes, anticipating requirements, uncovering areas for improvement, and developing and implementing solutions. Leading ongoing reviews of business processes and developing optimization strategies. Conducting meetings and presentations to share ideas and findings. Performing requirements analysis. Effectively communicating the insights and plans to cross-functional team members and management. Gathering critical information related to business from meetings with various stakeholders and producing useful reports. Working closely with clients, developer & creative team, and managerial staff. Ensuring solutions meet business needs and requirements. Involve in user acceptance testing and planning. Helping to prioritize initiatives based on business needs and requirements. Minimum Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in information technology, software engineering, computer science, or related field. Have 5+ years of experience in business analyst and related areas. Exceptional analytical, conceptual and critical thinking skills. The ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine acceptable solutions. Excellent documentation skills. Fundamental analytical and conceptual thinking skills. Experience creating detailed reports and giving presentations. A track record of following through on commitments.

Title: Expression of Interest: Business Analyst
Description: Fingerprint for Success  helps the world’s best workplaces, including Canva, Athena and Baraja find, hire and nurture talent. Companies  that hire through us include: Canva Baraja Athena R3i Ventures & more In preparation for our hiring partners’ current and future hiring needs, we are taking expressions of interest for the  Business Analyst  role to help them find the right people! About you Possess the following attributes: Grit, Desire to Learn, Collaboration, Passion, Thrive in Ambiguity Previous experience working in a startup/scaleup environment is preferred but not required Ability to wear multiple hats - jump, flex and pivot at the drop of a hat A great attitude. The right attitude towards a sense of urgency, risk, and uncertainty about the future that comes with working at a startup Application To register your interest fill in your details and  complete the work-style assessment  that will be emailed to you. If your motivations and traits match our hiring partners’ needs, they’ll get in touch directly. About F4S F4S helps companies discover talent, beyond just their resumes. Through our motivations and traits assessment, we help people find roles that they enjoy and excel in and help companies find great candidates. “We’ve been using F4S since Oct 2017, and have implemented it across our entire organization in onboarding, as well as when forming new teams to help us understand our team and dynamic between them” - Melanie Perkins,  CEO Canva

Title: Assistant Manager - Business Analyst
Description: Prudential's purpose is to help people get the most out of life. We will deliver our purpose by creating a culture in which diversity is celebrated and inclusion assured, for our colleagues, customers, and partners. We provide a platform for our people to do their best work and make an impact to the business, and in exchange, we support our people's career ambitions. We pledge to make Prudential a place where you can Connect, Grow and Succeed. Principle Duties & Responsibilities Procedure & Compliance Manage dev team to follow scrum framework Lead every scrum meeting Maintain sprint backlog Effectively communicate with Product Owner and Business Owner Work with IT Governance to ensure compliance to security policy Work with IT Architect to discuss solution design Quality Assurance and Control Ensure dev team doing peer review Establish a good testing process User Support Manage user complaint Manage dev team to do incident resolution Documentation Build a wiki about Platform Others Passion to learn and adaptive to new technology Prudential is an equal opportunity employer.  We provide equality of opportunity of benefits for all who apply and who perform work for our organisation irrespective of sex, race, age, ethnic origin, educational, social and cultural background, marital status, pregnancy and maternity, religion or belief, disability or part-time / fixed-term work, or any other status protected by applicable law. We encourage the same standards from our recruitment and third-party suppliers taking into account the context of grade, job and location. We also allow for reasonable adjustments to support people with special requirements.

Title: Business Analyst
Company: PT Bank Multiarta Sentosa Tbk (Bank MAS)
Description: Job Descriptions Communication with management/business teams to gain in-depth understanding of critical business requirements Gather critical information from active listening/engagement with various stakeholders involved with the business Determine and understand business objectives and break down complex problems through a combination of studying both qualitative and quantitative data Analyzing data models to deliver logical conclusions Developing innovative solutions for operational and strategic changes Understand how to prioritize initiatives and solutions based on business needs and constraints Communication with stakeholders regarding the implementation changes Conducting test, surveys, and workshops Qualifications At least 2 years of experience in Data Analytics or Project Management Strong logical thinking and problem-solving skills Fundamental analytical and conceptual thinking skills Experience in SQL Programming Experience with data visualization and dashboard creation with Tableau (or similar tools) Communication skills to interact with developers, clients, end-user, and management

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: The ideal candidate will play a role in the development of multiple parts of the business by analyzing past, current, and future business trends. This individual will establish strategies to achieve desired outcomes and implement these strategies. They will often work cross-functionally with internal business units in order to understand the challenges that these teams are face and provide solutions to these groups. Responsibilities Develop new product and service oriented strategies Communicate and implement strategies alongside technical team Identify and solve weaknesses within the organization Explore new ways to increase customer or client satisfaction Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business or related field Having 3 years experience in Core System Insurance Good knowledge in credit card, loan systems, mortgage, reward or points systems. Good knowledge to translate business requirement to sequence or technical flow, visualize or create UML diagram and communicate with solution architect

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: Project Tasks Conduct Project Management process according to applied BSI Project Methodology based on the determined role. Proactively learn new technologies to enrich the knowledge of related unit. Conduct requirement analysis, with discussion, create mock up, etc, and create appropriate to-be design document, and testing scenarios. Operation Tasks Provide periodic report based on the needs of related organizations requirement. Support to realize improvement resumed in SII document. Resolve incident to ensure the SLA achievement. Minimum Qualifications Minimum graduated from reputable university, Bachelor Degree in Information Technology, Engineering, Business or Science. Minimum 5 years experience as Business Analyst/System Analyst/Consultant Have a strong experience in a project at least 3 full cycle. Intensive experience in exercising IT Project Management and Business Process Improvement Have a basic SQL skill and Querry. Understand of IT Services Market & Business will prefered Have good communication, interpersonal skill, and english proficient (written and oral)

Title: Business Analyst / ERP Implementer (Timika - Onsite)
Description: About Impact Impact is a technology and consulting company specializing in digital transformation with the vision to grow Indonesia's economy by helping businesses and the workforce through software, data, education, and community. We are a lean company (and will continue to be) with a flat organizational structure, yet we wish to maximize our impact for our nation and eventually the world. Therefore our philosophy is to be (and we are looking for people who are) data-driven, able to identify the real pain points (which is surprisingly hard), and can come up with out-of-the-box yet practical permanent solutions. Data, brainstorming, and research are essential to live what we preach, so people who are open-minded, goal-oriented, independent yet good team players, humble, and have clear vision and tenacity tend to fit us better. Somehow, people who care about social impact also tend to fit us better, although we still don’t know why. About The Role As a Business Analyst, you will be helping businesses with ERP consultation, implementation, and support. You will be involved in the initial requirement gathering, preparing documentation for software engineers, testing, training, and providing support for businesses. You will be helping businesses identify their business pain points, analyze data and provide data-driven suggestions on how they can move their businesses forward. The job may need you to work onsite at Timika - Papua province to provide training to clients. As our Business Analyst, you will be an integral part of our Business Consulting Team. You will help our clients transform their businesses by automating their business processes and helping them make data-driven business decisions. You will be in charge of analyzing their requirements and data, reporting metrics, suggesting operation improvements, and building proposal evaluations in a cross-functional environment to support business change and optimization. This role is suitable for you if you are looking to develop your skills both in business process optimization and business software. You will learn practical, hands-on experience (not just theories) since you will be exposed to business owners of small to medium-sized businesses. You will work in cross-functional teams and meet great people regularly from diverse backgrounds. We work in an open environment where there are no boundaries or power distance. Everyone is encouraged to speak their mind, propose ideas, influence others, and continuously grow themselves. Responsibilities Identify the requirement and propose a good alternative solution to client requirement Collaborate with cross-functional team to design and develop ERP/Odoo apps (new module development, customization) Develop new features and app that users care about Define features scope, bring a real value to the product Will be hands-on in ERP project integration, implementation and development Qualifications Min. Bachelor Graduate from Accounting or equivalent with min GPA of 3.5 Min. 1-2 years of experience in B2B tech market (for exp only) Willing to work onsite from Timika - Papua province Special interest in accounting and finance, business process optimization, and business software Detail oriented, curious, and proactive personality Strong sense of product ownership Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment What's Great About the Job? Diverse team - your team consist of people from across the country Interesting projects and people. Startup culture with direct coordination with C-level for objective and follow-ups. Large tech product and chances to learn large scope of knowledge. Support of a real usability and testing team. Great team of smart people, in a supportive, casual, and open working environment. Learn More About Us Visit our website impactfirst.co

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: The ideal candidate will play a role in the development of multiple parts of the business by analyzing past, current, and future business trends. This individual will establish strategies to achieve desired outcomes and implement these strategies. They will often work cross-functionally with internal business units in order to understand the challenges that these teams are face and provide solutions to these groups. Responsibilities Develop new product and service oriented strategies Communicate and implement strategies alongside technical team Identify and solve weaknesses within the organization Explore new ways to increase customer or client satisfaction Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business or related field Having 3 years experience in Core System Insurance Good knowledge in credit card, loan systems, mortgage, reward or points systems. Good knowledge to translate business requirement to sequence or technical flow, visualize or create UML diagram and communicate with solution architect

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Melakukan desk study atau mengumpulkan data dan informasi terkait pencarian pasar, legal, operasional dan keuangan.  Menghandle serta mengevaluasi secara berkala kepada penerbit.  Melakukan survei lapangan yang dimaksudkan untuk mengumpulkan data teknis dan operasional, menjaring aspirasi manajemen dan survei lingkungan.  Melakukan analisa terhadap beberapa aspek seperti : Analisis Aspek Teknis, Analisis Aspek Ekonomi, Analisis Aspek Ekonomis, Analisis Aspek Ekonomis, Analisis Aspek Risiko dan Mitigasi Risiko.  Memberikan rekomendasi dan saran terkait rencana aplikasi system.  Menjalin relasi yang baik dengan pihak penerbit.  Melakukan diskusi dan persentasi. Kualifikasi khusus   Fresh Graduate (S1 Ekonomi/Bisnis/ Keuangan) / Pengalaman minimal 1 tahun  Memiliki kemampuan analisis bisnis yang kuat  Memahami istilah- istilah dalam dunia bisnis secara umum  Mampu membaca laporan keuangan  Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik  Mampu bekerja dalam tim  Memiliki tingkat ketelitian yang baik

Title: Business Intelligence Senior Analyst
Description: Ninja Van is a tech-enabled logistics company on a mission to provide hassle-free delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region's largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries. At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimisation, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers. But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry. Job Descriptions Performing raw data withdrawal or data that has been processed from the database needed for internal and external team analysis through BI tools or queries, such as Redash or Periscope. Making an analysis or report based on data that has been processed for the purposes of improvement in the form of presentations or e-mail Designing automation / reporting tools outside of BI tools needed for integration with other projects, such as: email automation using google script Perform software development, production support and provides overall expertise in the area of Data Warehouse and Reporting Application, which include report design, trigger and alerts, data processing, report automation, visualization and dashboards for operational improvements Provide insights, recommendations, and strategies to enhance the operational delivery of BI solutions, and technical directions Job Requirements Min. Bachelor Degree majoring Computer Science, IT, Statistics. or Engineering Preferably 3 years of experience as BI developer/analyst or related position. Understand and experience in SQL Server, Oracle, BI and Data Warehousing Principles. Qlik View or Power BI is an advantage. Passion in data analytics, mathematics, statistics and modeling Excellent problem solving, critical thinking and conceptual skill Highly flexible, easy to adapt with new environment, project management, teamwork, customer-centric and eager to self-learn under minimal direction Submit a job application By applying to the job, you acknowledge that you have read, understood and agreed to our Privacy Policy Notice (the “Notice”) and consent to the collection, use and/or disclosure of your personal data by Ninja Logistics Pte Ltd (the “Company”) for the purposes set out in the Notice. In the event that your job application or personal data was received from any third party pursuant to the purposes set out in the Notice, you warrant that such third party has been duly authorised by you to disclose your personal data to us for the purposes set out in the the Notice.

Title: Digital Marketing Analyst
Description: Job Descriptions Planning & running digital marketing campaigns, including web, email, social media and display advertising Create online activation program Analyze media channels including influencers or communities to serve as a media for campaigns based on target audiences Analyze clicks and conversion data, ad expenses and ROI Design and implement A/B tests to optimize lead flow that result in measurable improvements to campaigns Make recommendations for optimization and enhancements based on test segment learning. Measuring and reporting on the performance of all digital marketing campaigns Requirements Candidate at least bachelor degree from Design / Multimedia / Marketing / Computer Science / Mass Communication min GPA 3.00 of 4.00 Having at least 2 years experience handling segmentation, test design, reporting and analysis design. Capable in media planning, media buying, Adword, Socmed, Programatic campaign. Solid knowledge in digital marketing tools, such as social media, hootsuite, google analytics, etc. Placement in IBID Head Office

Title: SAP Business Analyst (for Indirect Procurement)
Description: Responsibility Maintaining and improving Indirect Procurement system, master data management, processing receiving activities to ensure record accuracy while creating data reporting to improve Indirect Procurement performance. Requirements Bachelor undergraduate S1 from any field preferably from Accounting or Information System Minimum 2 years’ experience in procurement or supply chain management Excellent problem solving, attention to detail, data and result oriented Have experience with SAP process (FICO/MM preferably) Capable to work base on priority basis to comply the company target achievement Strong in administration and reporting Capable to work independently or in a team Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Want to be a part of our team? Analyzes complex business problems to be solved with automated systems. Identifies gaps and provides technical expertise in business requirements for system functional specifications and scales new and current systems, processes and procedures in a cost effective manner. Configures system settings and options; plans and executes unit, integration and acceptance testing to meet business requirements. Designs details of automated systems. May provide consultation to users in the area of automated systems. May lead cross-functional linked teams to address business or systems issues. Working at NTT The Business Analyst’s key function is to work with internal and external clients to determine requirements and to define solutions to address complex business, process and systems problems, and improvements in the organization. They act as a liaison among stakeholders in order to understand the structure, policies, and operations of an organization, and to recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Act as a bridge between the business problems and the technology solutions.  Analyse, transform and ultimately resolve the business problems with the help of technology.  Work with internal clients and apply best practice methodologies to determine business requirements and to define solutions to address business, process, information and system problems, improvements or change.  Deliver business projects in line with sponsor requirements and enterprise architecture.  Proactive development and deployment of enhanced services and platforms, covering all the functional aspects from service/product definition through to build and deployment.  Ensure the identification and documentation of operational gaps including user guides, templates, test cases and related user training.  Assist with the resolution of issues pertaining to the service.  Adhere to and follow the relevant development and support processes.  Communicate and escalate if any issues arise or deliverables cannot be met and request assistance to ensure closure of issues.  Take responsibility for delivery of project elements with minimal supervision Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Broad understanding of business practices and processes Excellent team player who displays good client service orientation with well-developed administrative and organisation skills Deep expertise in specific systems, processes and technologies that they will be required to analyse Meticulous attention to detail whilst working under pressure Excellent verbal and written communication skills Ability to listen empathetically Ability to build rapport and engage effectively with a variety of stakeholders Knowledge of project management methodology Excellent analytical skills with the ability to convert business requirements into operational deliverables (functional requirements) to meet business objectives Excellent documentation skills, in particular, functional requirements, test cases, system user documentation, processes and procedures and presentations Very good working knowledge of Microsoft Exchange, Word, Excel Project, PowerPoint and Visio Understanding of systems generally used in a services organisation e.g. ServiceNow, Siebel, Remedy, SAP, EMS would be advantageous Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Typically requires Bachelor’s degree or equivalent with related demonstrable experience Project management certification would be advantageous IIBA Membership required Relevant technology certification(s) Required Experience: Demonstrable experience as a Business Analyst gained within a technology services environment Experience as a system administrator or developer would be advantageous Demonstrable experience in and with all operational aspects of a Services business, preferably with a Systems Integrator Demonstrable experience in the process of developing and implementing new services and systems Understanding of and experience with ITIL (IT Infrastructure Library) Demonstrable experience in coordinating and managing tasks, and small projects What will make you a good fit for the role?

Title: Business Analyst
Description: i. Mempunyai pemahaman yang kuat terkait analisa proses bisnis yang dituangkan kedalam sistem ii. Dapat menentukan tujuan operasional dengan mempelajari fungsi bisnis, mengumpulkan informasi, mengevaluasi persyaratan dan format output yang diinginkan iii. Membuat bagan dan diagram alur kerja, mempelajari kemampuan sistem, dan menuliskan spesifikasi yang dibutuhkan iv. Memantau kemajuan proyek dengan melacak aktivitas, menyelesaikan masalah, menerbitkan laporan kemajuan berkala, merekomendasikan tindakan yang perlu dilakukan v. Mempunyai pengalaman pengembangan aplikasi dalam ruang lingkup manajemen proyek baik itu waterfall maupun agile vi. Berkepribadian baik dan dapat bekerja sama dalam team dengan baik

Title: Corporate IT Business Analyst
Description: It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing! Job Description General Responsibilities Manage transformational IT projects such as organizational process and system improvement, multi-country implementation, cost optimization, company-wide IT service, etc. Maintain effective communication and working relationships with various stakeholders and peers on the project performance. Collect feedback from stakeholders to identify potential improvements in the Information Technology context. Provide recommendations to the development of processes & tools across departments. Prepare and implement monthly PDCA/ improvement ideas Deliver effective presentations of assessment findings & recommendations to high-level management. Specialized Responsibilities Manage IT Service Management (ITSM), IT Asset Management (ITAM), and IT Operation Management (ITOM) projects, such as Incident, Problem, Change, Release, Deployment, Access, Service Request and Service Level Management initiatives as a Project Manager and create documentation relevant to their scope. Identify the current state of ITSM, ITAM, ITOM processes & procedures (such as invoicing process and reports alignment with the product team), and facilitate the implementation of all necessary improvements. Identify and collect inefficiency and cost-saving opportunities, and provide recommendations. Coordinate the creation and review of IT related guidelines and relevant documentation and the rollout, including the socialization. Lead the development of documentation templates (weekly/ monthly reports, announcement, postmortem, project review, etc) in the IT Service Management context. Coordinate and plan the regular reviews or audits or assessments on the current IT processes and technologies. Lead the IT Work Intake process as an IT Portfolio Manager and ensure that all new project request processed via the defined process and preliminary scopes or budget identified Design and maintain the technology business case/ work intake template. Requirements General Requirements Strong educational background with a minimum of Bachelor’s degree from a well-known and accredited university. 5 years of experience as an IT Business Analyst, IT Strategy, IT Portfolio, or IT Governance (for the senior role). 2 years of experience as an IT Business Analyst, IT Strategy, IT Portfolio, or IT Governance (for the junior role). Must have a mix of technical IT knowledge and general business knowledge to locate business problems and potential solutions. Excellent command of spoken and written English and Bahasa Indonesia and the ability to work across multiple countries. Strong presentation and communication skills to deliver findings and recommendations. Willingness to travel extensively to all Traveloka offices. Specialized Requirements Experience in Project Management or Program Management roles with demonstrated knowledge of both traditional Waterfall and Agile methodologies. Strong knowledge of ITSM/ITIL frameworks, ITGC, ITELC, or other relevant frameworks/ standards. Must be familiar with the technology and the business implication of technology. Strong experience in reviewing and optimizing the business & IT operational processes. Understanding of general business concepts such as TCO, timeline, cost & expense, etc, including apply these skills to practical business decision-making. Experience in creating Business Cases with a structured and factual approach. Exceptional documentation skills and attention to detail for documentation (document versioning & storage, processes/procedures/ policy documentation, cash flow documentation, etc.) Experience in designing and implementing ITSM initiatives, not only on the process but also on the tools. If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Title: Market Intelligence Analyst (Industrial)
Description: A Market Intelligence Analyst (Industrial) job has become available at one of the leading engineering companies in Indonesia. About The Market Intelligence Analyst (Industrial) Role You will be responsible for gathering and analysing market data and present them accordingly to support the business Key Responsibilities Collect industry, market, competition, technical and business information of market segments in a systematic and timely way via various sources Structure and analyse information of potential market and product gaps across the company's new and existing portfolio along with value added products in collaboration with the sales marketing and operations department Gather information on competitors, and conduct analysis on their sales, prices and methods of distribution and marketing to thoroughly learn about the competition Work with the aim of automating and/or developing self-service reporting for the leadership teams by consistently managing the data flow from various sources, including internal/external data sets Demonstrate the ability to articulate and present key actionable market and competitor insights to the management team using modern visualisation tools Monitor costs and key material fluctuations inclusive of internal/external factors and logistics Build strong working relationships with a diverse range of stakeholders internally and externally Support customer surveys as needed Support marketing communication as needed To succeed in this role, you must be able to process data and understand the market landscape of the business Key Requirements BSc in Business, Marketing, Statistics, Economics, or a related field Five or more years of relevant work experience across market and business intelligence covering relevant topics such as financial structuring, pricing, and competitive analysis This company places a high degree of importance on numeric ability, initiative, and the willingness to take ownership of work and projects Strong articulator with the proven ability to interact, consult with and professionally influence senior management Excellent communication and presentation skills in Bahasa and English This leading engineering company offers the benefits of a work environment that is stimulating, challenging and balanced, where personal and professional accomplishment, growth and excellence are key drivers. If you are looking to work with an established organisation and be part of an employee-centric business that provides a large degree of autonomy to their management team and encourages creativity and development of new ideas, this role is right for you. Great career progression opportunities await the right person in this Market Intelligence Analyst (Industrial) role. Apply now or contact me to learn more.   Due to the high volume of applications we are experiencing, our team will only be in touch with you if your application is shortlisted.

Title: Information Technology Business Analyst
Description: Job Description: Bridge the gap between business users, solution architects, and IT developers by conducting business analysis Deliver appropriate documented business analysis results to meet project requirements Work on medium to big project of medium to high complexity to meet project objectives on time and agreed quality standards Requirements: University graduate preferably in Business, Finance, IT or related disciplines 3 years proven experience in business requirement gathering or application functional design More than 3 years solid experience of application system development/implementation in banking or insurance industry Have solid understanding about software development methodology (waterfall-based, agile-based, or hybrid) Experience at Fiber Optic Application will be an advantage Proficient in using MS Office (excel, word, and powerpoint) Moderate familiarity with project management tools (Microsoft project or others) Having professional certificate(s) in Business Analysis domain is preferred

Title: Information Technology Business Analyst
Description: Responsibilities define scope of projects in collaboration with Program Manager and clients maintain project document PRD, FSD, BRD, etc requirement gathering and analysis conduct meeting with client to share result and idea make sure the requirement meet the business needs Working closely with the dev team and clients Can create mockup is a plus Requirements has experience in define business problems and gathering of technical and non technical information for digital product, has experience in maintaining productive relationships with clients and stakeholders, has experience in writing project document, user scenarios and user story based on the requirement, has attention to detail, deeply interest in creative product development, passionate to be involved in the development of high quality creative digital application, and wants to work in a studio with fun and positive atmosphere together with friendly and passionate people

Title: Business Analyst for Financial Industry
Description: Bachelor Degree with minimum GPA of 3.0 (scale of 4.0) More than 2 years of experience as business analyst in financial industry Good understanding of financial industry business processes (banking, insurance and multi finance) Experience in conducting requirements gathering Familiar with Business Requirement and Functional Specification Design document Good understanding of SDLC (System Development Life Cycle) including Waterfall and Agile concept Familiar with Business Analyst tools and techniques Having knowledge in Database (for query purpose) is a plus Thorough and detail-oriented person Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Strong communication and presentation skills Good interpersonal and leadership skills Ability to independently learn new concepts/technology Fluent in English

Title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst
Description: Job Description Collecting and interpreting data into meaningful reports or dashboards Analyzing results to provide impactful business insights Reporting the results back to the relevant members of the business Identifying patterns and trends in data sets Working alongside teams within the business or the management team to establish business needs Defining new data collection and analysis processes Requirements Minimum has 6-7 years of data analytics experience. Outstanding analytical and logical skill Bachelor’s degree in System Information, Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or related (Mandatory) Experience in SQL is a must. Experience in BI tools such as GSD / Looker / Metabase is a plus. Strong comprehension of the English language

Title: Business Intelligence Developer, Product Team (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
Business Analyst Executive (CEO's Office)
Description: Company Description Are you someone who loves to practice your skills and enjoys getting results? Do you have an entrepreneurial mindset and a passion for making a direct impact on a business? YOBO (Your Own Business Online) is looking for motivated and driven individuals to join our team. We offer a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in a dynamic and collaborative environment and to make a meaningful impact in the industry. As a part of our team, you'll have the chance to work on a variety of projects, gaining valuable skills in areas such as marketing, finance, and operations. You'll work alongside a team of experienced professionals who are dedicated to mentoring and supporting team members to help them develop their skills and grow their careers. Whether you're a business school student or just someone who enjoys getting results through practice, we invite you to apply today and be part of a dynamic and innovative team that is disrupting the industry with fresh ideas and bold moves. Don't miss out on this unique opportunity to make a real difference in the industry and develop your skills in a supportive and dynamic environment. Apply now to join the YOBO team! Job Description We are seeking a dynamic and driven individual to join our team as a Business Analyst Executive for our CEO's office. As a Business Analyst Executive, you will work alongside the CEO and other departments to provide comprehensive analysis and business insights. Responsibilities: Conduct research and gather data on industry trends, benchmarking, and customer behavior Analyze data using statistical techniques and provide insights to the CEO and other departments Collaborate with other departments to develop business strategies and action plans Create reports and presentations for the CEO and executive team Manage projects related to business analysis and research Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business, Math, Statistics, Economics, Marketing or a related field Strong analytical skills and ability to work with large amounts of data Excellent communication and presentation skills Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and other data analysis tools Ability to work independently and as part of a team  Additional Information This is an entry-level position, and fresh graduates are welcome to apply. We are looking for someone who is passionate about data analysis and can provide valuable insights to the CEO and other departments. If you are interested in this opportunity, please submit your resume and cover letter. We look forward to hearing from you!

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: Project Tasks Conduct Project Management process according to applied BSI Project Methodology based on the determined role. Proactively learn new technologies to enrich the knowledge of related unit. Intensive experience in exercising IT Project Management and Business Process Improvement Have a basic SQL skill and Querry. Understand of IT Services Market & Business will prefered Have good communication, interpersonal skill, and english proficient (written and oral)

Project, Agile, Scrum

Title: Technical Business Analyst
Description: As a Weaver Technology Consultant, you will participate in Digital Collaboration Platform implementation & rollout projects. Based on user requirements analysis, you will prepare functional designs and system configuration, perform relevant testing and deployment the designed business solution ********************************************* Responsibilities ********************************************* Implement Weaver’s Enterprise Digital Collaboration platform based on user requirements analysis with Kaptech delivery standards. Lead business requirements gathering sessions and design workshops with customers. Drive design workshops through use of consulting techniques and seek to understand customer’s business requirements. Ensure that system configuration and deliverables are accurate, complete, and signed off by client. Configure the test and production environments based on agreed solution design; manage data uploads and conduct key user training. Participate in user acceptance testing/unit testing/system integration testing at client site where required. Identify gaps in quality or quantity of customer data and ensure data fits the formats required; complete test uploads, review error logs and resolve accordingly. Input into test to production cutover activity planning or system migration planning. Actively contribute to product knowledge through self-study, meeting attendance, and project participation. Take accountability and responsibility for deliverables and milestones within the project and provide proactive updates to the project manager. Build professional relationships with clients, management, and team members to ensure the delivery of proposed solutions. support for the development of business possibilities and personal development Contribute to high productivity and motivation of working team with the use of communication skills and cooperation; reach and realise project objectives and outputs ********************************************* Qualifications ********************************************* Degree holders, and fresh graduates are welcome 1 to 2 years of relevant working experience preferred SQL and JavaScript relevant experiences preferred Meticulous, well organised, with the ability to analyse and solve problems Highly organised with the ability to multitask and prioritise in a fast-paced culture Since we are an international team, we require fluent English language skills to communicate with our global teams and clients (Chinese language skills would be advantageous). Strong analytical and problem-solving skills High quality professional standards in documentation, presentations, project approach and ways of working. Strong communication skills with the ability to communicate at all levels of the business stakeholders Creative and focused who is willing to embrace challenges and meet delivery deadlines Has initiative, perseveres, and stays curious Team player attitude

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: For this role you will be placed in the CBO office to provide support to the Chief Business Officer/ VP of Business for doing financial modeling, investment analysis, and corporate development projects. Additionally, you will be in charge of driving selected project initiatives that are assigned by CBO / VP Business. Min. 3 years of relevant experience as an Investment Analyst and/or Corporate Development is also essential that you are comfortable working in a fast-paced and ambiguous environment in driving the initiatives. Job Description Corporate Development project such as Investment analysis, M&A and fundraising projects, etc Gain understanding on detailed financial aspects of our BU; able to determine commercial implications for any initiatives within and beyond our BU Be accountable for team's analysis and decision in response to business performance (i.e. course-correct actions proposed) Obtain buy-in from other divisions in providing elements identified as specified in rigorous business requirements Lead coordination with over division team, response and counter move on competitor's strategy Use judgment to balance between enjoying immediate business results vs. investing for future growth in business prioritization Design and decide short-term solution as workaround in order not to burden the current business environment and priorities Manage multiple projects; manage dependencies & influence stakeholders; develop action plan Provide recommendation on improvement & operational guideline Drive and execute new initiatives that are still at incubation stage, with close supervision of CBO/ VP Business. Requirements Min. bachelor degree in Business Management, Finance, or STEM fields from top local or overseas universities with strong record of academic results, Master’s Degree or MBA is a plus Minimum 3 years of working experience as analyst at Investment Banking or corporate development at Management Consulting. Experience as corporate strategy/development in a fast-growing tech startup is a plus Financially sound, with proven ability to develop complex financial models and projection with sensitivity analysis Excellent analytical and problem solving skills, with proven ability to identify root causes and potential remedies for corrective or preventive actions Good communication skill in Bahasa and English is required A quick and passionate learner to absorb new knowledge in the dynamic industry and take the learnings to the next level, bringing tangible business impacts Possess a strong drive to make things happen and making the world better through technology Based in Jakarta Connect with Us Make yourself updated with Cakap & Cakap Squad activities by follow our social media at:  Instagram: @lifeatcakap @cakapcom  Twitter : @cakapcom  Tiktok : @cakapcom  LinkedIn: Cakap
