Title: Business Analyst
Description: Fincons Group  è una multinazionale che opera nell’ambito della consulenza aziendale e integrazione di sistemi IT e che da oltre 38 anni  progetta il futuro digitale di aziende leader sui mercati internazionali . Il Gruppo Fincons ha costruito la propria reputazione prevedendo e interpretando nuovi modelli di business ed anticipando la rapida evoluzione dei sistemi informatici costruendo una gamma completa di servizi:  dalla ricerca e consulenza alla progettazione e sviluppo IT , dai  servizi di system integration  delle principali soluzioni software dei vendor di cui è partener, fino alla  gestione delle applicazioni , supportando la trasformazione digitale di imprese di qualsiasi dimensione. Fincons è un'azienda familiare con  oltre 2000 risorse , dove la proprietà svolge un ruolo strategico con impegno e passione, fondando l'azienda sugli stessi principi di una famiglia unita e premurosa. Crediamo fermamente nel valore della collaborazione e nel contributo che ogni idea e intuizione può portare. Crediamo che lo sforzo di tutti possa fare la differenza, trasformando la conoscenza in una risorsa strategica. Questa è la nostra mission aziendale e la perseguiamo con l'ausilio del nostro asset più strategico: le nostre risorse umane. Nell’ottica di un potenziamento dell’organico, il Gruppo è alla ricerca di un: BUSINESS ANALYST La risorsa verrà inserita all'interno di un team progettuale internazionale e si occuperà di progetti di integrazione di soluzioni aziendali. Il/la candidato deve essere in possesso di una laurea di indirizzo informatico e avere almeno 2 anni di esperienza nel ruolo. In generale la persona deve possedere significative capacità di problem solving e di analisi, doti relazionali e di gestione del rapporto con il cliente. Competenze e requisiti: - Raccolta e analisi delle richieste - Gap analysis - Disegno di dettaglio - Supporto in fase di UAT/Script test - Partecipazione a meeting internazionali. - Capacità di conduzione dei System Test - Conoscenza delle Basi dati relazionali (Oracle) e del linguaggio SQL NICE TO HAVE Gradita conoscenza delle seguenti tecnologie: - Java e Spring; - Java Script; - JQUERY. Cosa offriamo Un percorso di  carriera strutturato , volto alla valorizzazione e al potenziamento delle competenze. Accesso ai  programmi di formazione e certificazione aziendali . Accesso ai corporate  benefits aziendali . Sede di lavoro: Smart Working/   Roma E’ richiesta la disponibilità ad effettuare trasferte. La ricerca è rivolta a candidati di entrambi i sessi. Saranno prese in considerazione, altresì, candidature di risorse che risultino appartenenti alle Categorie Protette con percentuale di invalidità superiore al 46%. I dati saranno trattati e conservati esclusivamente ai fini della presente o di future selezioni, garantendo i diritti di cui all’art. 13 Dlgs 196/03 e del GDPR (Regolamento UE 2016/679).

Title: Corporate IT Business Analyst
Description: It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing! Job Description General Responsibilities Manage transformational IT projects such as organizational process and system improvement, multi-country implementation, cost optimization, company-wide IT service, etc. Maintain effective communication and working relationships with various stakeholders and peers on the project performance. Collect feedback from stakeholders to identify potential improvements in the Information Technology context. Provide recommendations to the development of processes & tools across departments. Prepare and implement monthly PDCA/ improvement ideas Deliver effective presentations of assessment findings & recommendations to high-level management. Specialized Responsibilities Manage IT Service Management (ITSM), IT Asset Management (ITAM), and IT Operation Management (ITOM) projects, such as Incident, Problem, Change, Release, Deployment, Access, Service Request and Service Level Management initiatives as a Project Manager and create documentation relevant to their scope. Identify the current state of ITSM, ITAM, ITOM processes & procedures (such as invoicing process and reports alignment with the product team), and facilitate the implementation of all necessary improvements. Identify and collect inefficiency and cost-saving opportunities, and provide recommendations. Coordinate the creation and review of IT related guidelines and relevant documentation and the rollout, including the socialization. Lead the development of documentation templates (weekly/ monthly reports, announcement, postmortem, project review, etc) in the IT Service Management context. Coordinate and plan the regular reviews or audits or assessments on the current IT processes and technologies. Lead the IT Work Intake process as an IT Portfolio Manager and ensure that all new project request processed via the defined process and preliminary scopes or budget identified Design and maintain the technology business case/ work intake template. Requirements General Requirements Strong educational background with a minimum of Bachelor’s degree from a well-known and accredited university. 5 years of experience as an IT Business Analyst, IT Strategy, IT Portfolio, or IT Governance (for the senior role). 2 years of experience as an IT Business Analyst, IT Strategy, IT Portfolio, or IT Governance (for the junior role). Must have a mix of technical IT knowledge and general business knowledge to locate business problems and potential solutions. Excellent command of spoken and written English and Bahasa Indonesia and the ability to work across multiple countries. Strong presentation and communication skills to deliver findings and recommendations. Willingness to travel extensively to all Traveloka offices. Specialized Requirements Experience in Project Management or Program Management roles with demonstrated knowledge of both traditional Waterfall and Agile methodologies. Strong knowledge of ITSM/ITIL frameworks, ITGC, ITELC, or other relevant frameworks/ standards. Must be familiar with the technology and the business implication of technology. Strong experience in reviewing and optimizing the business & IT operational processes. Understanding of general business concepts such as TCO, timeline, cost & expense, etc, including apply these skills to practical business decision-making. Experience in creating Business Cases with a structured and factual approach. Exceptional documentation skills and attention to detail for documentation (document versioning & storage, processes/procedures/ policy documentation, cash flow documentation, etc.) Experience in designing and implementing ITSM initiatives, not only on the process but also on the tools. If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Title: Business Analyst / ERP Implementer (Timika - Onsite)
Description: About Impact Impact is a technology and consulting company specializing in digital transformation with the vision to grow Indonesia's economy by helping businesses and the workforce through software, data, education, and community. We are a lean company (and will continue to be) with a flat organizational structure, yet we wish to maximize our impact for our nation and eventually the world. Therefore our philosophy is to be (and we are looking for people who are) data-driven, able to identify the real pain points (which is surprisingly hard), and can come up with out-of-the-box yet practical permanent solutions. Data, brainstorming, and research are essential to live what we preach, so people who are open-minded, goal-oriented, independent yet good team players, humble, and have clear vision and tenacity tend to fit us better. Somehow, people who care about social impact also tend to fit us better, although we still don’t know why. About The Role As a Business Analyst, you will be helping businesses with ERP consultation, implementation, and support. You will be involved in the initial requirement gathering, preparing documentation for software engineers, testing, training, and providing support for businesses. You will be helping businesses identify their business pain points, analyze data and provide data-driven suggestions on how they can move their businesses forward. The job may need you to work onsite at Timika - Papua province to provide training to clients. As our Business Analyst, you will be an integral part of our Business Consulting Team. You will help our clients transform their businesses by automating their business processes and helping them make data-driven business decisions. You will be in charge of analyzing their requirements and data, reporting metrics, suggesting operation improvements, and building proposal evaluations in a cross-functional environment to support business change and optimization. This role is suitable for you if you are looking to develop your skills both in business process optimization and business software. You will learn practical, hands-on experience (not just theories) since you will be exposed to business owners of small to medium-sized businesses. You will work in cross-functional teams and meet great people regularly from diverse backgrounds. We work in an open environment where there are no boundaries or power distance. Everyone is encouraged to speak their mind, propose ideas, influence others, and continuously grow themselves. Responsibilities Identify the requirement and propose a good alternative solution to client requirement Collaborate with cross-functional team to design and develop ERP/Odoo apps (new module development, customization) Develop new features and app that users care about Define features scope, bring a real value to the product Will be hands-on in ERP project integration, implementation and development Qualifications Min. Bachelor Graduate from Accounting or equivalent with min GPA of 3.5 Min. 1-2 years of experience in B2B tech market (for exp only) Willing to work onsite from Timika - Papua province Special interest in accounting and finance, business process optimization, and business software Detail oriented, curious, and proactive personality Strong sense of product ownership Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment What's Great About the Job? Diverse team - your team consist of people from across the country Interesting projects and people. Startup culture with direct coordination with C-level for objective and follow-ups. Large tech product and chances to learn large scope of knowledge. Support of a real usability and testing team. Great team of smart people, in a supportive, casual, and open working environment. Learn More About Us Visit our website impactfirst.co

You will be accountable for : Designing, analyzing, measuring performance, and optimizing domain models and business processes across divisions to ensure a smooth, efficient company operation Identifying pain points in existing business processes and providing effective, reliable and scalable solutions Gathering requirements from relevant stakeholders to understand user needs Managing various stakeholders’ interests, timelines, and expectations in order to ensure projects are delivered on-time, within scope and within budget Providing and updating detailed projects action plans, timelines and comprehensive documentation Resolving problems related to project execution by defining escalation plans for issue resolution and correction plans in the event of deviation from project plan. Title: IT Business Analyst
Description: Responsibilities: Act as point of contact for Customer Service users in country and Regional offices with regards to any system changes and new implementations for CRM (Customer Relationship Management).  Act as a bridge between users and the IT Infrastructure team, translate business requirements into technical spec requirements.  Assist the business owner to outline the target business operating model, and deliver its processes/SOP, resources estimation and requirement, governance structure, reporting requirement, environment requirement, IT systems requirement.  Design and document processes, SOP and SLA (e.g. define requirements of ACD/IVR, call flows, knowledge of customer experience requirements in terms of call flow).  Deliver business and functional requirement documents.  Define the test scenarios (positive and negative) for UAT.  Coordinate users to conduct UAT.  Organize UAT, track and document testing results and coordinate with RO and IT teams for required fixes.  Obtain UAT signoffs from relevant stakeholders and arrange for go-live execution.  Qualifications Qualifications: Bachelor of Arts (S1) degree from reputable colleges & universities, preferably in Informatics/Computer Science or Mathematics.  Have experience minimum 3 years as Business Analyst/System Analyst with experience in supporting Customer Service department and call centers.  Familiar with SDLC, Agile methodology and able to document user’s requirements well.  Skillful project manager with experience in delivering system development/enhancement projects. Title: Safety Reporting & Data Analyst
Description: Main purpose of the position The Safety Reporting & Data Analyst ensures the collect, the registration, the analysis of all relevant data related to the Health & Safety Department (Health, Industrial Hygiene, Safety, Process Safety and Emergency Response). The Safety Reporting & Data Analyst is responsible of the correct data report from the field into the System and of the development of the trends observed based on the figures for a proper understanding. Scope of the position (key dimensions) Key element of the H&S Team to ensure accuracy of the data collected for an exhaustive interpretation and use. Major challenges faced / points of complexity The consistent focus on the H&S risk identification, elimination and mitigation, regular updating and maintain of the overall risk register and continuous approaches to occupational risk owners and stakeholders for alignment and approaches to promote the PDCA cycling on H&S risk control. Major Responsibilities / Outputs  Participates to the definition of the data collection and reporting system  Gives orientation on the reporting development with a permanent objective of simplifying the process  Structure, and update the collect and reporting system  Ensures compliance with the Corporate reporting requirements  Raises alerts on uncontrolled and or emerging collect or reporting issues  Uses all relevant tools to facilitate data collection and analysis of trends  Develop user friendly tools for data collection and analysis of trends  Prepare regular presentations for the periodic meetings, with fit for purpose material  Collaborate with all the relevant functions: Field safety, Safety risk, HR, Environment, CSR  Transform data into visible management tools  Perfectly understand the procedures, rules, standards of the project  As needed, perform any task agreed upon with the reporting Manager Requirements Min. post graduate degree in HSE, Engineering, Technical Science or other related background Have experienced as data analyst Very strong skills in data management IT tools More than 5 years of diverse international experience, specifically in working in large projects Ability to work in a multi‐cultural environment Excellent communication skills, both oral and written Strong Problem‐Solving Skills Fluent in English Strong organizational and analytical skills. Able to work independently and in a multi‐disciplinary team environment. Enthusiastic learner committed to maintaining expertise through practice and continuing professional development. Keen to understand the root causes of incidents/accidents & to use that understanding to help the project avoid them

Collaborate with the development team to ensure that the technical solution aligns with the business requirements. To work closely with the Application Tester to ensure that the result complies with the designed solution.  Responsible for functional Specification Document and Technical Specification Document including ERD. Skills and Qualifications: Minimum of 3 years of experience. Must be experienced in FSD (Functional Specification Design) and TSD (Technical Specification Design) document.  Must be experienced in various diagram design, e.g.: UML (Unified Model Language), ArchiMate, BPM (Business Process Model), etc.  Must be experienced in data flow design & database design (ERD) to provide dynamic and scalable system  Experienced in system integration and API design related  To have knowledge in K8s To have knowledge in Apigee (preferably) To have knowledge in Google Cloud Platform To have knowledge in API description, mocking and testing related, e.g.: Swagger, Apiary, etc. To have knowledge in Open API Specification (preferably) To have knowledge in Middleware, e.g.: EAI, ESB, OSB (preferably)  Practical experienced in Scrum or other agile methodology (preferably)  To have background as Developer (plus value)  To Have knowledge in MSSQL DB, PostGre DB To have previous working industry in FSI (Financial Services Institution), e.g.: Bank, Insurance, Consumer Financing, etc.  Able to communicate in English

Title: BI Developer
Description: Want to be a part of our team? Analyzes, designs, programs, debugs, and modifies software enhancements and/or new products used in local, networked, cloud-based, or Internet-related computer programs. Code may be used in commercial or end-user applications, such as materials management, financial management, HRIS, mobile apps, or desktop applications products. Using current programming language and technologies, writes code, completes programming, and performs testing and debugging of applications. Completes documentation and procedures for installation and maintenance. May interact with users to define system requirements and/or necessary modifications. Working at NTT The primary responsibility of the Software Applications Development Engineer is to develop new applications and improve upon existing ones that will our client and business needs. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Develop applications that effectively accomplish client objectives and user needs. Design and write code for applications and maintain applications databases. Analyze and edit existing software applications to improve and optimize functionality, fix problems, and enable their use on new hardware platforms. Remodel and adapt applications as needed to optimize performance. Identify specific customer and client needs and preferences related to the application. Test applications extensively to ensure they are error and bug-free. Install applications and act as technical advisor. Communicate with relevant internal technical stakeholders to obtain information on project limitations, performance requirements, and interfaces. Consult with clients in the design phase to determine client needs. Produce software documentation following company software process and templates. Participates in software product review meetings and team meetings. Knowledge, Skills, and Attributes: Broad understanding of computer science, with specific knowledge of computer programming, application design, and user-focused features Creative problem solvers Good interpersonal, communication, and organizational skills Good team players and maintain the integrity and display good attention to detail Ability to understand and analyze complex systems Proficient in writing software using the Java Programming Language and a standard object library Sound knowledge of software development process Familiarity with agile development such as Scrum Knowledge of software integrated development environments Extensive knowledge in various programming languages (Java, Perl, Python, C++, etc.) Demonstrated analytical, organizational, and project management skills, using relevant information to make timely and critical decisions that affect cross-functional teams Ability to handle client and customer issues tactfully and professionally Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Bachelor's degree in computer science or software engineering Relevant certifications Required Experience: Software Applications Engineering, Software Development experience, or related work experience Experience with Programming Languages such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc.  Experienced with Linux or Unix and Windows operating systems Experience working with SQL Project management experience and/or experience working in an Agile environment What will make you a good fit for the role?

Title: Technical Business Analyst - Projects (Remote)
Description: Job Description We are looking for a Technical Business Analyst to join our team - we will work together to design, implement and deliver mission-critical web and mobile applications for our clients. It is imperative that our software applications are designed to be robust, secure and future proof, especially given our portfolio of customers. We would like to tap on your experience, technical knowledge and resourcefulness to deliver world-class solutions for our clients. Responsibilities Work as a key member of the project management team to drive the project forward and ensure smooth and successful project delivery Collaborate with client stakeholders (IT team and System owners) and internal stakeholders (Project Management, Development and DevOps team) Work closely with the project’s Solution Architects (both external and internal) to understand technical requirements in the realm of Cloud Architecture, DevSecOps, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) Analyze and synthesize business requirements; and build suitable business cases and generate client/business needs through human-centric, visual methods Develop user stories, functional/technical specifications and acceptance criteria Analyze the impacts of requested changes, and conceptualise and recommend appropriate solutions that continuously address changing business needs Conceptualize business processes and present it visually using workflow diagrams and slide decks to effectively communicate complex ideas and concepts Analyze technical requirements; factor in dependencies and critical path, and deliver technical deliverables on a timely basis Deliverables may include the following: Architecture Diagrams, Cloud Hosting and Set-up (AWS or Azure cloud), Technical integrations with 3rd party systems, Performance and Load Testing, Solution Design / Technical Specifications, Data Extraction, Transformation and Migration, User stories/ functional specifications, Workflow diagrams to demonstrate business processes Manage the project’s technical track, in relation to overall project timeline; plan and prioritise tasks in a constantly changing environment Create informative, actionable and repeatable reporting that effectively presents progress and status of different aspects of the project to different stakeholders. Support the full software development cycle to ensure project readiness for smooth deployment, adoption and operations Be open to learning and exploring new technologies, and more importantly, love getting your hands dirty Requirements Degree in Computer Science, Infocomm Technology, Computer Engineering with excellent academic records or outstanding professional or personal achievement. Minimum 3 years of relevant experience e.g. Software Development, Cloud Architecture, Technical Analyst / System Analyst etc Participated in a full software or product development cycle, preferably using Agile Methodology Excellent analytical, conceptualisation and problem-solving skills Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to pitch ideas Strong influencing and people management skills Ability to understand and translate technical requirements into digital mediums e.g. Word, PowerPoint, and Excel Meticulous and detailed oriented with excellent documentation skills A driven and motivated personality with aptitude for analysis Being a pro-active, self-motivated and resourceful team member who can guide and mentor others The following would be considered a “plus”: Relevant certifications e.g. Cloud Certificates, Project Management Certificates Prior experience in a product development firm or consulting experience (IT consultancy, IT service delivery etc) Knowledge or experience in one or more of the following areas: Database designs, Cloud architecture, CI/CD pipelines

Title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
Description: About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to Know Our Team The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward. The Opportunity In this role as  Business Intelligence Analyst , you will be  working alongside of Data Architects and business stakeholders to enable the Customer Experience Group (CEG) department  of Agoda with actionable data to drive better decision making. You will be integral in the design and implementation of reliable, performant and scale-able data intelligence solution to overall improve our data warehouse architecture, business intelligence reporting, data automation solutions and data product developments. In This Role, You’ll Get to  Understand business requirements, analyze large data sets for patterns, visualize results in dashboards and presentations, develop data mart solutions, improve efficiency by automating business processes and become subject matter expert for CEG department Support Product Owners across all experimentation stages to assist in the ideation of new product ideas, implement A/B monitoring and define statistical success criteria Drive self-service business intelligence by empowering users to adopt existing BI tools (Tableau, Metabase, Superset, ThoughtSpot) by improving the data landscape and educating users Become a data business partner for Business and Product stakeholders by guiding them through all data related topics Design and build Data Products to automate manual business processes or embed data metrics into business applications to improve user experience and real-time analytics What You’ll Need To Succeed At least 5 years of experience in Business Intelligence or Analyst related roles Strong education background with degrees in Business Administration, Engineering or Information Systems (preferred) Strong knowledge of visualization tools such as Tableau and Power BI or other platforms Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with non-relational databases Good working knowledge of statistical computer languages to perform advanced analytics (Python, R, Java, Javascript) A self-motivated, driven, flexible, quick learning, high achieving, “can do” mentality A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques An ability to work well independently and as part of a team It’s Great If You Have Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks Knowledge of front-end languages and frameworks (e.g. JS, React) Knowledge of big data tools, such as Spark, Kafka, etc Knowledge of A/B testing and experimentation frameworks Experience with large scale data platforms (GCP, S3, Hadoop, etc.) and modern data warehouse technologies (e.g. Redshift, Snowflake, etc.) Experience with software development processes for Agile/Scrum and CI/CD utilizing technologies (e.g. GIT) #sydney #melbourne #moscow #london #tokyo #dhaka #edinburgh #amsterdam #munich #moscow #dublin #seoul #hcmc #telaviv #kyiv #bangkok #Phuket #hongkong #kualalumpur #singapore #capetown #johannesburg #seoul #taipei #tainan #taichung #istanbul #kaohsiung #riyadh #jeddah #mecca #medina #newdelhi #bangalore #bandung #hcmc #hanoi #yokohama #nagoya #okinawa #fukuoka #ENG #IT Equal Opportunity Employer  At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics. Title: Analyst - Business Investigation & Compliance
Description: Integrity Indonesia  is a foreign investment company that has operated for 21 years in Indonesia, and with established affiliates in Malaysia and Thailand. Our business is to provide services related to the Prevention, Detection, and Investigation of risk. Our services include brand protection services such as anti-counterfeiting, trademark investigation, and market surveys. For more information, please see our website: www.integrity-asia.com As a rapidly expanding company with a robust business plan, Integrity Indonesia is looking for self-motivated and results-oriented individuals with strong qualifications who enjoy the challenge to grow and succeeding. * * * In this position, You will be responsible for carrying out reputational due diligence, background checks, and investigative research by conducting desktop searches and source inquiries as well as coordinating with field researchers and other specialists. The position requires good analytical skills, attention to detail, proficient written English skills as well as good coordination and communication abilities. Candidates should agree to embrace our core values: integrity, reliability, going the extra mile, excellence, and innovation. Key Responsibilities Complete the assignment from A to Z to meet the objectives of the case Define keywords and conduct comprehensive media and directory searches Prepare detailed Task Briefs Prepare budget if necessary and manage budget Allocation and coordination of fieldwork Find potential sources and interview them by phone and/or by meeting Analyze all data collected from the field and request further explanations Analyze all data collected from media searches and sources Write report according to requirements Draft a well-crafted executive summary with insightful analysis Report developments to the supervisor Participate in research and development projects for capacity building Requirements: High level of integrity and professionalism Minimum Bachelor Degree with any major Strong analytical skills and attention to detail Comfortable working within deadlines Excellent English writing skills If you meet these requirements and if you are looking for a new, exciting opportunity within a successful, growing company, then this role is for you! PT Integrity Indonesia is an equal-opportunity employer.

Title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst (Supply Analytics) (Bangkok-based role, Relocation provided)
Senior Business Intelligence Analyst (Supply Analytics) (Bangkok-based role, Relocation provided)
Marketing Analyst
Description: JULO (www.julo.co.id) is a digital lending company that is revolutionizing access to financial products for millions of emerging consumers in Indonesia. As a champion of financial inclusion, JULO is committed to improving the livelihood of Indonesians across the country. We want the best for our customers, and believe strongly in responsible and ethical lending. JULO is officially licensed by OJK, based in Jakarta and is backed by leading venture capital firms in Indonesia and Singapore. The company is now processing applications from all over Indonesia and is about to enter a hyper-growth period.We are looking for a highly motivated Marketing Analyst to achieve our growth ambition. Title: SAP IT Business Analyst
Description: About the Company The Company was established in Indonesia as PT Branta Mulia in 1981 as a major supplier for the premium tire reinforcement material in Southeast Asia. The Company not only has a good image, qualified products, high professionalism, and strong commitment to provide excellent service to the customers, but also qualified human resources (HR) with great desire to do the best which have brought success to the Company up to these days. In 2006, Kordsa Global AS, which is a company part of Turki Sabanci Holding Group, bought 51.3% of the Company's shares. As of 2018, Kordsa Global has increased its shares to 61.59% and changed the name to PT Indo Kordsa Tbk. Share ownership of the Company in PT Indo Kordsa Teijin was increased to 99.90% by purchasing Teijin Fibers Limited's shares. PT Indo Kordsa Teijin changed its name into PT Indo Kordsa Polyester (IKP) in 2009.   Job Description     Assessing business needs via business process analysis, collaboration, and observation.   Determines operational feasibility by evaluating analysis, problem definition, requirements, solution development, and proposed solutions.   Prepares and installs solutions by determining and designing system specifications, standards, and programming.   Determining how to integrate SAP solution(s)(Cloud / On-prem) with both SAP and Non-SAP products to enhance targeted business processes.   Evaluating IT infrastructure and capabilities, as well as facilitating cost-effective improvements.   Collaborating with both IT team and process owners to offer technical solutions and resolve issues.   Requirements     Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related technical discipline.   Having 3+ years of professional software development experience.   Experienced serving as technical lead throughout the full software development lifecycle, from conception, architecture definition, detailed design, scoping, planning, implementation, testing to documentation, delivery and maintenance is preferred.   Experienced in at least one of the SAP Platform/Services (IBP, Central Procurement, BW4Hana, BPC, S4HANA, SAP Analytics Cloud Reporting).   Having minimum of 2 years of SAP Product experience as consultant, IT support or key-user.

through ambiguity to identify core issues Strong understanding of enterprise software and enterprise software implementation projects Strong experience with business process definition and design Title: Commercial Finance Analyst NC - Business Partner
Description: BAT is evolving at pace - truly like no other organization. To achieve the ambition, we have set for ourselves, we are looking for colleagues who are ready to live our ethos every day. Come be a part of this journey! Global Top Employer with 53,000 BAT people across more than 180 markets Brands sold in over 200 markets, made in 44 factories in 42 countries Newly established Tech Hubs building world-class capabilities for innovation in 4 strategic locations Diversity leader in the Financial Times and International Women’s Day Best Practice winner Seal Award winner – one of 50 most sustainable companies BELONGING, ACHIEVING, TOGETHER Collaboration, diversity and teamwork underpin everything we do here at BAT. Key Responsibilities Build creative and strategic social media and digital media plans to enhance brand awareness and positioning in the market Provide clear and concise direction for the offline and online campaign preparation to achieve brand objectives Engage with various stakeholders (internally and externally) to produce marketing materials for online advertising and POSM such as brochures and catalogues  To succeed in this Assistant Marketing Manager role, you must be comfortable in creating online and offline marketing initiatives, managing a lot of projects, and engaging with various stakeholders. Title: Assistant Marketing Manager, Indonesia Hotels
Description: We Put the World on Vacation At Travel + Leisure Co., our mission is simple: to put the world on vacation. Our vacation ownership brands, Club Wyndham, Worldmark, Margaritaville Vacation Club, and Shell Vacations Club, include more than 245 vacation club resort locations across the globe. Innovation and growth keep our work interesting and fun. Every day is a chance to learn something new and turn vacation inspiration into exceptional experiences for millions of travelers worldwide. Principal Responsibilities (Include but not limited to) Providing support in the development and implementation of both internal and external marketing plans and strategies for Wyndham Destinations and its properties, with the objective of improving the organization's reputation and achieving business objectives. Identifying and actively seeking out key international and domestic partnerships, collaborating with the Creative team to creating marketing materials and other assets, and producing relevant content. Drives and secures long term vision for marketing strategy building upon, and paid advertising planning and activation. Measures the effectiveness of all regional marketing tactical campaigns as well as local loyalty and partnerships to accurately determine top line impact and ROI. Creates and spots opportunities for key calendar/topical moments working with credible, brand-relevant partners that drive brand positioning and commercial objectives. Collaborating with the Public Relations to develop messaging and design an outreach program aimed at securing effective media coverage for the organization in both local and international markets. The responsibilities also include executing influencer hosting programs and engagement strategies. Assisting in the content property audits of websites to ensure that best practices are followed, and that all information is accurate. Display a HEART service to all internal and external parties. Demonstrate integrity in all facets of the job by displaying accountability, fulfilling promises, and making sound decisions, while also aiming to enhance communication, exhibiting respect towards peers and managers, offering assistance to colleagues within the organization, and fostering empowerment wherever possible. Key Position Criteria 2-3 years of previous marketing experience, both traditional and digital channels. Preferably with a Bachelors degree in marketing or communications Creative thinker with excellent written and spoken communication skills Experience in content marketing strategies and a strong comprehension of digital trends. Strong decision-making skills and the ability to work effectively in a matrix organization. Sound analysis, research evaluation and advisory skills, combined with creative problem-solving skills and conceptual skills for developing successful solutions and making recommendations. Must be highly motivated and pro-active. A strong eye for detail and accuracy with a good concept of the overall bigger scope. Where Memories Start with You Hospitality is at the heart of all we do at Travel + Leisure Co. Here, you’ll find an inclusive environment where we deliver excellence and take time to have fun, celebrate together, and support one another. We're always looking ahead to what’s next and how we can strengthen our business, its neighboring communities, and the customer experience. Join our global team and build a career where memories start with you. We are an equal opportunity employer, and all applications will be considered for employment without attention to their membership in any protected class. If you require any reasonable accommodation to complete your application or any part of the recruiting process, please email your request to MyCareer@travelandleisure.com , including the title and location of the position for which you are applying.

Title: Associate Director, Marketing
Description: Who are we? Together, we’re on a mission to make good health more affordable and accessible, to help millions around the world enjoy healthier lives. It’s a mission that bonds our people across nearly 60 countries and a rich, diverse variety of nationalities and backgrounds.  Working here means working with the world’s leading manufacturer of generic medicines, and the proud producer of many of the products on the World Health Organization’s Essential Medicines List. Today, at least 200 million people around the world take one of our medicines every single day. An amazing number, but we’re always looking for new ways to continue making a difference, and new people to make a difference with.  The Opportunity Designs, develops and implements marketing programs and/or pricing strategies to support the organization's products, services or market sector. Uses specific marketing strategies and media (e.g., Internet, press, television, radio) to launch and position products and services in a sector. Identifies and implements marketing strategies and programs in collaboration with sales and technical teams. Train and monitor marketing team, achievement, and evaluate the result regularly,  with the objective of  business continuity and expansion on organization objectives. How You'll Spend Your Day To Analyze Market conditions, trend and performance of all portfolio, Analyze market demand, Product Portfolio and product sales historical data To Adapt global brand strategy to the proposed port folio strategy, sales target and market positioning of each Actavis product to establish the appropriate executions of the marketing plans and ensure growth in market share To consolidate budget and promotion budget for each product port folio; To monitor and control expenses against budget and provide periodical report in order to ensure effectiveness and utilization of budget To maintain high motivation of the team and ensure the continuous development of Product Managers through Performance Dialog and Coaching , propose suitable trainings in order to ensure the productivity and high quality of Product Managers To provide new products feasibility studies; proposing new products launching strategies; recommend customized market intelligence activities in order to ensure successful launch and on time delivery of new products To ensure, control, evaluate synchronization and integrated-focus of marketing strategies’ implementation with sales department, and continuously monitor of product inventory in the Plant warehouse and distributor warehouse. In coordination with sales, distributor and production, ensuring the product availability in order to ensure achievement of sales revenue To monitor programs which are provided for medical professionals; participate in medical symposiums and congresses; maintain contacts and regular visits to key prescribers in order to build strong relations with customers and ensure their contributions to the company To coordinate with Sales managers and Product Manager to Promote brand image to distributors; to provide distributors with product and disease training for a more aggressive product distributions in order to get feedback on market and ensure product area coverage To build good relations with related departments; actively provide information to all department regarding special promotional events, sales achievements, to get strong alignment and support from all stake holders, provide guidance and continuously support to sales department on marketing strategies’ implementation in order to promote solid team-work and ensure sales target achievement To ensure the QEHS implementation in his/her job area Your Experience and Qualifications Bachelor degree from a reputable university, preferable majoring in management, marketing, pharmacy, medical doctor, or other related field 5-7 years in Sales & Marketing, 2 years as Marketing Manager, in branded generic pharmaceutical company Analytical skill and Marketing strategy Good communication and execution, strong leadership, team building, managerial skill, negotiation skills and presentation skills, interpersonal relationship skill Computer literacy and English proficiency Make A Difference With Teva Pharmaceuticals Please submit your update CV. Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Function Marketing

Our second brand Glowinc is breaking the boundaries by offering genderless products at affordable prices. Our offline/online commerce BeautyHaul is the core for carrying multiple brands that we have directly to our customers. We are incubating more and more business models in our platform and aim to be a strong regional player in the beauty, within the South Asia region. Job Description: Monitor Livestreaming effort and help to consult livestreamer if needed Livestream Scheduling Livestream Monitoring on each session Help to do Livestreaming on Shopee (Campaign Date) Scouting Mid-Mega Influencer  Help to Recap Insight KOL / influencer Work with enabler partner for store operation and promotion Requirements: Bachelor degree from reputable university Have a big interest towards ecommerce and beauty industry Able to communicate in English both verbal and nonverbal Willing to explore new things, have a can do mentality Strong team player, able to work with multiple divisions and streamers We have a 'CREATE' culture (Collaborative, Responsible, Eccentric, Agile, Tough, Effective). We are looking for more people to join us, who are excited to disrupt the traditional beauty industry with product innovation and non-linear growth, who want to build a profitable start-up into a unicorn company, who will always learn and do the right thing.

Title: Sr. Strategist (SAC Indonesia)
Description: Job Descriptions Develop digital strategist based on trends, consumer behavior and business objective for the clients Research and monitoring market trends Collect data that will inspire creative concept Prepare presentations of the digital strategies that well suited for the clients Analyse and control the executions Requirement Bachelor’s Degree, majoring Advertising/ Media, Mass Communications, Marketing, Business Analyst or other related major At Least minimal 3 year(s) of working experience as a Digital Strategist Preferably specializing in digital strategies/market research or equivalent Have a broad knowledge about advertising and market research Able to create a good presentation Have a good communication skill Creative, passionate and fast learner

Title: Associate Director, Marketing
Description: Who are we? Together, we’re on a mission to make good health more affordable and accessible, to help millions around the world enjoy healthier lives. It’s a mission that bonds our people across nearly 60 countries and a rich, diverse variety of nationalities and backgrounds. Working here means working with the world’s leading manufacturer of generic medicines, and the proud producer of many of the products on the World Health Organization’s Essential Medicines List. Today, at least 200 million people around the world take one of our medicines every single day. An amazing number, but we’re always looking for new ways to continue making a difference, and new people to make a difference with. The Opportunity Designs, develops and implements marketing programs and/or pricing strategies to support the organization's products, services or market sector. Uses specific marketing strategies and media (e.g., Internet, press, television, radio) to launch and position products and services in a sector. Identifies and implements marketing strategies and programs in collaboration with sales and technical teams. Train and monitor marketing team, achievement, and evaluate the result regularly,  with the objective of  business continuity and expansion on organization objectives. How You'll Spend Your Day To Analyze Market conditions, trend and performance of all portfolio, Analyze market demand, Product Portfolio and product sales historical data To Adapt global brand strategy to the proposed port folio strategy, sales target and market positioning of each Actavis product to establish the appropriate executions of the marketing plans and ensure growth in market share To consolidate budget and promotion budget for each product port folio; To monitor and control expenses against budget and provide periodical report in order to ensure effectiveness and utilization of budget To maintain high motivation of the team and ensure the continuous development of Product Managers through Performance Dialog and Coaching , propose suitable trainings in order to ensure the productivity and high quality of Product Managers To provide new products feasibility studies; proposing new products launching strategies; recommend customized market intelligence activities in order to ensure successful launch and on time delivery of new products  To ensure, control, evaluate synchronization and integrated-focus of marketing strategies’ implementation with sales department, and continuously monitor of product inventory in the Plant warehouse and distributor warehouse. In coordination with sales, distributor and production, ensuring the product availability in order to ensure achievement of sales revenue  To monitor programs which are provided for medical professionals; participate in medical symposiums and congresses; maintain contacts and regular visits to key prescribers in order to build strong relations with customers and ensure their contributions to the company To coordinate with Sales managers and Product Manager to Promote brand image to distributors; to provide distributors with product and disease training for a more aggressive product distributions in order to get feedback on market and ensure product area coverage  To build good relations with related departments; actively provide information to all department regarding special promotional events, sales achievements, to get strong alignment and support from all stake holders, provide guidance and continuously support to sales department on marketing strategies’ implementation in order to promote solid team-work and ensure sales target achievement  To ensure the QEHS implementation in his/her job area  Your Experience And Qualifications Bachelor degree from a reputable university, preferable majoring in management, marketing, pharmacy, medical doctor, or other related field  5-7 years in Sales & Marketing, 2 years as Marketing Manager, in branded generic pharmaceutical company Analytical skill and Marketing strategy Good communication and execution, strong leadership, team building, managerial skill, negotiation skills and presentation skills, interpersonal relationship skill Computer literacy and English proficiency Make A Difference With Teva Pharmaceuticals Please submit your update CV. Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Function Marketing Reports To Country GM Competencies  Functional - Key functional requirements set by hiring manager Already Working @TEVA? If you are a current Teva employee, please apply using the internal career site available on "Employee Central". By doing so, your application will be treated with priority. You will also be able to see opportunities that are open exclusively to Teva employees. Use the following link to search and apply: Internal Career Site The internal career site is available from your home network as well. If you have trouble accessing your EC account, please contact your local HR/IT partner. Teva’s Equal Employment Opportunity Commitment Teva Pharmaceuticals is committed to equal opportunity in employment. It is Teva's global policy that equal employment opportunity be provided without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, disability, pregnancy, medical condition, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, ancestry, veteran status, national or ethnic origin or any other legally recognized status entitled to protection under applicable laws. Teva Pharmaceuticals is committed to equal opportunity in employment. It is Teva's policy that equal employment opportunity be provided without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, disability, pregnancy, medical condition, genetic information, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, ancestry, national or ethnic origin, citizenship status, military status or status as a disabled or protected veteran, or any legally recognized status entitled to protection under applicable federal, state, or local laws.

Title: Assistant Marketing Manager, Indonesia Hotels
Description: We Put the World on Vacation At Travel + Leisure Co., our mission is simple: to put the world on vacation. Our vacation ownership brands, Club Wyndham, Worldmark, Margaritaville Vacation Club, and Shell Vacations Club, include more than 245 vacation club resort locations across the globe. Innovation and growth keep our work interesting and fun. Every day is a chance to learn something new and turn vacation inspiration into exceptional experiences for millions of travelers worldwide.  Principal Responsibilities  (Include but not limited to) Providing support in the development and implementation of both internal and external marketing plans and strategies for Wyndham Destinations and its properties, with the objective of improving the organization's reputation and achieving business objectives. Identifying and actively seeking out key international and domestic partnerships, collaborating with the Creative team to creating marketing materials and other assets, and producing relevant content. Drives and secures long term vision for marketing strategy building upon, and paid advertising planning and activation. Measures the effectiveness of all regional marketing tactical campaigns as well as local loyalty and partnerships to accurately determine top line impact and ROI. Creates and spots opportunities for key calendar/topical moments working with credible, brand-relevant partners that drive brand positioning and commercial objectives. Collaborating with the Public Relations to develop messaging and design an outreach program aimed at securing effective media coverage for the organization in both local and international markets. The responsibilities also include executing influencer hosting programs and engagement strategies. Assisting in the content property audits of websites to ensure that best practices are followed, and that all information is accurate. Display a HEART service to all internal and external parties. Demonstrate integrity in all facets of the job by displaying accountability, fulfilling promises, and making sound decisions, while also aiming to enhance communication, exhibiting respect towards peers and managers, offering assistance to colleagues within the organization, and fostering empowerment wherever possible.  Key Position Criteria  2-3 years of previous marketing experience, both traditional and digital channels. Preferably with a Bachelors degree in marketing or communications Creative thinker with excellent written and spoken communication skills Experience in content marketing strategies and a strong comprehension of digital trends. Strong decision-making skills and the ability to work effectively in a matrix organization. Sound analysis, research evaluation and advisory skills, combined with creative problem-solving skills and conceptual skills for developing successful solutions and making recommendations. Must be highly motivated and pro-active. A strong eye for detail and accuracy with a good concept of the overall bigger scope. Where Memories Start with You Hospitality is at the heart of all we do at Travel + Leisure Co. Here, you’ll find an inclusive environment where we deliver excellence and take time to have fun, celebrate together, and support one another. We're always looking ahead to what’s next and how we can strengthen our business, its neighboring communities, and the customer experience. Join our global team and build a career where memories start with you. We are an equal opportunity employer, and all applications will be considered for employment without attention to their membership in any protected class. If you require any reasonable accommodation to complete your application or any part of the recruiting process, please email your request to MyCareer@travelandleisure.com, including the title and location of the position for which you are applying.

Title: Assistant Category Trade Marketing Manager
Description: Description Want to provide insights that make a difference? As Assistant Category Trade Marketing Manager, you’ll have the freedom to influence decisions driving sales and market share across a global customer portfolio. Working with a wealth of customer and market data, you’ll make our marketing initiatives more effective than ever. You’ll provide clarity about customer and consumer behaviours. You’ll understand our current performance – and see how it could be improved. Your insight and analysis will ensure we make fact-based decisions to improve our market share and position. And you’ll help us create and develop new business opportunities. You’ll succeed because… …you love working with data and using it to influence decisions. You know the challenges of the consumer goods sector. You’re able to translate raw statistics into compelling sales stories. With a close attention to detail, you’re highly analytical and excel in a fast-paced environment. Crucially, you’re also a great communicator, able to get your ideas across to a wider audience. You’ll love it because… …you’ll get to make an impact like never before. You’ll be responsible for your own projects - we can’t wait to listen to your ideas. The products you help us get out there will make people’s lives better. Our iconic brands will provide an incredible platform for you. And our dynamic, ownership-driven culture will help bring the very best out of you, every day. Equality All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, disability or medical condition; colour, ethnicity, race, citizenship, and national origin; religion; pregnancy, family status and caring responsibilities; sexual orientation; sex, gender identity, gender expression, and transgender identity; protected veteran status; size or any other basis protected by appropriate law.

Title: Associate Digital Marketing Manager (Metasearch & Affiliates) - Transport
Description: It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing! Job Description Managing Flight Metasearch partnerships and Affiliate marketing partnerships Work closely with Transport/Flight Digital Marketing Lead, supporting and defining our strategy across Affiliate Marketing & Flight Metasearch, providing strategic thinking and technical knowledge. Responsible for managing Affiliate Marketing and Flight Metasearch budget across markets, through forecasting using historical data to achieve optimum results and internally agreed targets Track and measure all business & marketing metrics including, but not limited to, actual spend, conversion volumes, ROI, CAC, to support the overall Digital Marketing strategy and business goals Work alongside multiple different stakeholders such as but not limited to: Product Marketing, Digital Channels, Revenue Team, Product Managers, and Engineers to support Traveloka Transport’s objectives through Affiliate Marketing & Metasearch initiatives, with the ability to initiate and lead high impact projects. Analyze and assess the performance of Affiliate Marketing & Flight Metasearch and translate quantitative and qualitative data into insights and recommendations. This includes research and competitive analysis. Report to Traveloka Transport executives periodically on Affiliate Marketing and Flight Metasearch performance, providing analysis, opinion and counsel on strategy Understand how to assess technical implementation related to Metasearch and Affiliate enhancement and able to collaborate with tech/product team to identify and troubleshoot the issue as well as provide potential solutions based on judgment and experience Coordinates with internal stakeholders to enhance tracking and analyze data to develop a better understanding of market demand, supply, consumer behavior and identify new opportunities.  Coordinates with external Affiliate and Metasearch partners to gather insights and leverage them for Flight business improvement Requirements Bachelor’s Degree or higher. Any major is welcome, but quantitative/analytical discipline is preferred 4-5 years experience in digital marketing. Experience in partnering with or managing Metasearch Platforms such as Skyscanner, Kayak, Wego, etc is a big plus point Ability to conduct critical analysis, structured thinking, diving into the data and identify key insights, to produce immediate value while still keeping an eye on long-term strategy and scalability Project management skills with high level of accuracy and attention to detail. Numbers driven. Excellent analytical thinking and good numerical reasoning skills for data-driven decision making. Strong business acumen combined with an uncanny ability to extract and analyze data Proficiency in Excel, Google Sheet or similar data processing tool for Data Analysis and Reporting purposes. Experienced in dashboard tools like Tableau, Google Data Studio is a plus Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with ability to manage multiple stakeholders, both internal and external. English proficiency is mandatory. Pro-active, self-driven and having growth mindset, able to maneuver and perform alongside business ambiguity Ability to execute and achieve goals in a fast-paced environment.  Familiar with analytics tools such as Google Analytics. Experience in mobile app tracking and attribution tool (or MMP) such as Adjust, Appsflyer, Branch is a plus If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Title: Performance Marketing Analyst
Description: We provide C-suite executives and start-up Founders with industry-leading digital marketing and data analytics solutions. We Are One with clients - aligning their priorities and goals with ours One with data - providing management with actionable insights One with results - ensuring quantifiable and measurable performance is delivered The Role Your Responsibilities Will Include Explore client data to gather accurate insights relevant to the client’s business goals Communicate insights from the data to clients with your presentation, writing, and data visualization skills Develop and maintain client analytics reports, presentations, and data. Develop KPI dashboards. Actively participate in discussions with clients, ranging from executors to C-levels, to ensure that insights become data-driven action plans Develop and maintain SOPs to ensure scalability of your work Ideal Profile Skills Required You are a goal-driven problem-solver You are persistent and/or a quick learner You are a team player; you do not think that compromising is a sign of weakness or selfishness You are able to independently perform self-reflection and you always welcome criticism Willing to take initiatives to assist your team Able to work with minimal supervision and keep supervisors informed Preferably have 1-2 years of experience in performance marketing optimization, analytics, business intelligence, or similar fields You have sufficient Domain Knowledge Understanding of using analytics tools (Google Analytics, Appsflyer) Understanding of performance marketing and its platforms (Facebook Ads, Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Programmatic) Understanding of statistical concepts Data visualization and relevant tools (Tableau, Google Datastudio, Microsoft Power BI) SQL, preferably BigQuery SQL What's on Offer? Great Opportunity

Title: Digital Marketing Assistant Manager
Description: IT Solution Contents Management Lead Marketing Campaign and manage the schedule. Manage and oversee the creative content and marketing messages distribution on digital marketing channels. Lead Digital Marketing strategies (SEM, SMM, and SEO) with the digital marketing team, including product marketing for systemever . Coordinate with cross-functional departments (Sales, Operation, Design, Community teams) to plan out key goals and outcomes. Develop, structure, and nurture relationships with all relevant and external partners, to achieve the company’s target key metrics. Research and forecast future sales and performance trends Achieve company’s Objective Key Results and monitor Marketing KPIs Required Abilities Knowledge of the B2B and have vast connections with influencers and key opinion leaders (KOL) Good knowledge and experience with online marketing tools(Google Analytics) and best practices Good knowledge of all different digital marketing channels Experience with SEO, Google Analytics Good interpersonal, written, and communication skills (English and Indonesia) Creative Sence Positive Attitude Time management with Planning Analysis skills Documentation skills

Travel Percent Less than 10% Functions Marketing Known Requirements More than 6 years' experience leading product marketing efforts required Strong stakeholder management skills required Exceptional communication skills required
