Impressions, Engagement Rate, CPM, CPPM, etc)

Title: Growth Analyst
Description: Qualification Candidate at least Bachelor Degree in quantitive field, Economic, Business Management or similar Having min 2 years of experience in consulting, reseacrh, corporate strategy, marketing Strong analystic and quantitative skills Proficiency in standart business software applications Willing to be place in IBID Head Office Job Description Monitoring, optimizing, and reporting on marketing and growth metrics and split-test result. Make recommendation based on sound analystics, experimentation, and test findings. Drive continual learning, optimization, and outcome across the company

Title: Employer Branding Analyst
Description: Job Description Menjalin kerja sama dengan karyawan, perusahaan, dan seluruh unit bisnis Kompas Gramedia, serta mengembangkan dan menjalankan seluruh inisiatif yang berkaitan dengan employee. Menjalankan program kerja sama dengan stakeholder eksternal (seperti universitas, komunitas, mahasiswa, pemerintah, lembaga, dan sebagainya), serta terlibat dalam operasional dan administrasi tiap program. Mengimplementasikan program terkait, namun tidak terbatas pada: program karir, internship, event kerja sama, dan sebagainya. Bertanggung jawab atas komunitas rekrutmen dan employer branding yang ada pada setiap unit bisnis. Minimum Qualifications Minimal mahasiswa semester akhir atau sarjana dari semua jurusan. Memiliki pemahaman dan awareness mengenai employer branding (baik aktivasi secara internal maupun eksternal perusahaan/organisasi). Memiliki pengalaman mengelola komunitas dan berpengalaman secara aktif dalam kegiatan universitas dan organisasi. Memiliki kemampuan multitasking dan detail oriented. Bersedia bekerja full time - contractual Diutamakan domisili Jabodetabek. Komunikasi efektif untuk bekerja sama dengan berbagai pemangku kepentingan internal dan eksternal. Memiliki kemampuan berbahasa Inggris dan Indonesia yang baik. About Kompas Gramedia Kompas Gramedia, through its more than 50 years of history, is striving for one goal: enlightening and empowering Indonesia. To ensure that we are able to serve the nation for another 50 years, we are undergoing a digital transformation; strengthening and expanding our solid business pillars by developing new digital business initiatives. Our vision is to enlight all the people in Indonesia with all the knowledge we have.

Title: EII | Assistant, Marketing Communications
Description: Eastspring is a global asset manager with Asia at its core. We create a culture in which diversity is celebrated and inclusion assured, for our colleagues, customers, and partners. We provide a platform for our people to do their best work and make an impact to the business, and in exchange, we support our people's career ambitions. We pledge to make Eastspring a place where you can Connect, Grow and Succeed. Roles This role will support the team to create and develop visual asset for all marketing purposes and maintain visual consistency across marketing material. Requirement Fresh graduate, or student at the last semester/have no less than two years completed toward their degree. Able to use editing software; Adobe Illustrator/Photoshop/In design. Able/willing to lead by example and ensure projects are completed with high quality, visually appealing, on brand and on schedule. Eastspring is an equal opportunity employer.  We provide equality of opportunity of benefits for all who apply and who perform work for our organisation irrespective of sex, race, age, ethnic origin, educational, social and cultural background, marital status, pregnancy and maternity, religion or belief, disability or part-time / fixed-term work, or any other status protected by applicable law. We encourage the same standards from our recruitment and third-party suppliers taking into account the context of grade, job and location. We also allow for reasonable adjustments to support people with special requirements.

Title: E-mail Marketing Analyst (Yogyakarta)
Description: Are you an experienced E-mail Marketing Analyst? Apply now to join the Marketing team of one of Southeast Asia's leading fintech companies. As our E-mail Marketing Analyst you have direct impact on the growth and profitability of amalan.com and CekAja.com across Indonesia, Malaysia, plus soon Thailand and the Philippines. amalan's and CekAja's goal is to provide consumers with the best financial solutions for all types of situations, from standard products like unsecured loans, insurance, credit cards and mortgages to custom tailored restructuring and refinancing solutions. Job Description Measure email, social media, blog, and paid ads campaign performance and utilize data to recommend optimizations. Present weekly/monthly (or as needed) findings to internal teams and leadership. Assist in executing and evangelizing email marketing program strategies including determining testing strategies, communicating business requirements, measuring results and managing overall process to drive and achieve incremental conversion. Communicate critical performance metrics including weekly, monthly and quarterly program performance as well as testing, subject line and heat map analysis to drive program optimization. Recommend new ideas and innovations to grow conversion while optimizing not only email Marketing but also overall existing Marketing campaigns (email, social media, blog, and paid ads campaign). Contribute strategic ideas to grow and personalize the Email program. Keep current with digital marketing industry trends and best practices. Requirements 1-2 years of experience in an analytical role; prior email marketing experience is a plus. Applied analytics: proven business analytics skills and ability to translate data insights into actionable steps. Must have strong attention to details. Good understanding of Marketing email platforms such as Pardot, Mailchimps, and SendInBlue. Strong ability to collaborate and partner with cross-functional departments to execute strategy and influence change. Independence and proactivity: self-starter with demonstrated experience in leading and delivering impactful solutions to large business problems. Interpersonal and presentation skills: you are able to confidently communicate and present insights and recommendations to the Head of Marketing or senior management. Google Analytics, Power BI, Metabase and Salesforce Understanding of reporting benchmarks and digital best practices. Ability to work both independently and in a team structure; have sound judgment and analysis acumen. This is an exciting opportunity within a small and dynamic team in a high growth startup led by an international group of experienced finance and start-up veterans. It is a fun job for a highly motivated person that learns quickly and likes a fast moving, challenging environment. We offer a start-up environment with flat hierarchy that gives you ample space to develop yourself professionally and to apply your creativity. Starting salary and benefits are competitive with excellent growth perspective.

Title: Sr. Brand & Marketing Associate
Description: Who We Are Desty's mission is to make digital commerce available for everyone. Founded in September 2020, in the midst of the unprecedented Covid-19 pandemic, we see the urgent needs of a great tool for a fast-growing community of people who want to start their own business. Our solution is a digital platform that serves as a single online destination for creators, influencers, and merchants to promote and sell their products. Desty currently offers two products, a landing page generator called Desty Page and Desty Store, a service that allows users to create an online store complimentary to marketplaces. Our founding team members are all Internet and e-commerce veterans, with extensive experience from well-known Chinese, SEA & US tech companies such as Alibaba, Google, Facebook, Gojek, Lazada, etc. We currently operate HQ offices in both Jakarta and Hangzhou, China. At Desty, we welcome people of/from all colors, cultures, sexes, beliefs, religions and ages. We depend on the unique approaches of our team members to help us solve complex problems. We are committed to increasing diversity across our team and ensuring that Desty is a place where people from all backgrounds can make an impact. As a Sr. Marketing & Campaign Associate, you'll be an instrumental cog in Desty line of products communication. At Desty our main mission is to help our users grow their business more efficiently and Desty will continue to grow its service offerings to become #1 in Indonesia & SEA. Your main goal is to shape the brand of Desty and create positive brand imagery in the customer's mind. Your efforts will further position Desty, as the most preferred technology solutions for business owners and content creators. Responsibilities Come up with compelling Marketing Campaign ideas that suit the target audience and is on brand  Overseeing 360 marketing programs in order to ensure proper and consistent communication and embodiment of the brand’s identity and reach the audience. Collaborate with Brand and Campaign Marketing Manager in creating and implementing strategic approaches for branding programs that are in support of key brand growth areas. Design brand narrative & strategy, identify marketing channels, and lead the go-to-market plans that align with company voice, values, and mission on social impact. Collaborate with external party (i.e. agency, vendor), cross-functional teams; creative, communications, analytics, research, product managers, and growth strategy team for the purpose of conceptualizing, designing, and building cross-platform media. Plan, execute, manage day-to-day campaigns and events on Desty Commerce products. Work with cross-division members to ensure communication alignment across the company. Able to track, analyze, report campaign performance, and suggest improvements to the marketing programs. Conduct market research and assist in strategizing Desty Commerce business position in the market. Qualifications Bachelor's degree from a reputable university. 3+ years experience in brand, marketing, and/or product marketing required from any fast-paced businesses, e.g. creative agency preferred Demonstrated ability to take ownership and responsibility for projects. Anticipates problems, marshals resources, and does what it takes to get the job done. Good knowledge in brand building & full marketing mix. Demonstrates an ability to adjust to changes in market dynamics and competitive landscapes. Comfortable using data to generate insights for designing marketing campaigns Not afraid to try new things. Can come up with creative ideas and/or elicit creative ideas from others. Solid leadership and comfortable working individually or leading a small team Strong project management, organized person, and have strong attention to detail Strong collaborative and communication traits, able to work with internal and external stakeholders Proficiency in using spreadsheet (Google Sheet, Microsoft Excel) and presentation tools (Google Slide, Microsoft Powerpoint)

Title: Marketing Associate
Description: Allianz Group adalah perusahaan asuransi dan manajer asset terkemuka di dunia dengan lebih dari 126 juta nasabah personal dan perusahaan. Allianz memulai bisnis di Indonesia dengan membuka kantor perwakilan di tahun 1981. Asia adalah salah satu dari tiga wilayah pertumbuhan utama kami, Allianz telah hadir di wilayah ini sejak tahun 1910 Nasabah Allianz mendapatkan manfaat dari berbagai layanan asuransi personal dan perusahaan, mulai dari asuransi properti, jiwa dan Kesehatan sampai layanan bantuan asuransi kredit dan asuransi bisnis secara global, memiliki keberagaman produk dan aman secara financial di seluruh dunia. Setelah berhasil selama empat tahun berturut-turut, Allianz tahun ini Kembali dinobatkan sebagai brand asuransi terbaik peringkat pertama di dunia versi Interbrand’s Best Global Brands Rangking, dan kami selalu siap bermitra dengan anda sehingga dapat mewujudkan kesuksesan yang lebih besar Bersama. Job Description : - Marketing Associate : Memberikan saran finansial pada klien baik individu maupun perusahaan, merupakan program percepatan internal promotion dari marketing untuk menjadi seorang leader. - Memahami Kebutuhan nasabah sehingga mampu memberikan solusi terbaik dari rangkaian produk Allianz. - Membangun relationship yang baik dengan nasabah - Mampu mengedukasi & memasarkan produk Allianz dengan baik dan benar Persyaratan : - Sedang kuliah / S1 semua jurusan - Memiliki motivasi yang tinggi - Memiliki jaringan yang luas - Komitmen untuk memberikan layanan purna jual - Memiliki kemampuan dalam berkomunikasi dengan baik - Hubungan baik dengan klien - Memiliki Jiwa kepemimpinan Benefit : Penghasilan 5jt – 35jt/bulan Cash & Trip Reward Pelatihan dan sertifikasi Jenjang karir yang pasti

Title: Digital Marketing Project Analyst/Associate
Description: The Digital Marketing Project Analyst/Associate will be working in for the Interactive Solutions Division of YCP Solidiance, an Asia-focused global management and consulting firm, through working with a regional team on firmwide marketing activities and digital marketing projects. The Analyst/Associate will be reporting to a Manager based in Jakarta, Indonesia, and working with a regional team based in the Philippines and Singapore. Responsibilities Manage day-to-day firmwide marketing activities and CRM database Coordinate with a global team on end-to-end project management, from kickoff to launch Develop reports and analyses on key marketing metrics based on known KPIs Work on projects in SEO, SEM, social media, and other digital marketing activities Requirements At minimum of 2 years of experience in a digital marketing and/or project management role Solid knowledge of web and apps analytics Excellent English proficiency, both written and spoken Willingness to work in a multicultural setting Ability to draft low-fidelity wireframe on Figma or other similar platforms is a plus

Title: Marketing Assistant, Indonesia
Description: Why working at Eurofragance? In Eurofragance you will be part of the exciting world of smells and fragrances. You will grow and learn in a company in constant growth and expansion. You will have the opportunity to develop your career working with top professionals. You will be part of a Global Company with Headquarters in Spain and subsidiaries in Dubai, Singapore, Mexico, Turkey, India and China. You will practice your language skills in a global and multicultural environment. You will feel you play a role in society thanks to our Corporate Social Responsibility policy and our commitment to the Environment, which we demonstrate on a day-to-day basis with actions such as the Volunteer Day. We are Passion, Performance & Entrepreneurship, we are Eurofragance! JOB MISSION: To contribute towards growing the business and profitability of the respective category by leveraging Indonesia consumer & market insights Assist in implementing the global marketing strategy for Indonesia MAIN JOB FUNCTIONS : To support the regional marketing team in analyzing local trends and to design related presentations for clients and by category. To analyze and to design data reports coming from the following sources: Euromonitor, Mintel and WGSN. To create olfactive and poetic descriptions of fragrances. Assist to drive the proactive category tools with internal partners and contribute actively in client briefs to define the strategy to win the brief in collaboration with Account Managers & FDMs. Ensure that global category tools contain relevant insights coming from the regional marketing teams and that global category guidelines are applied for the respective category at a regional level by regularly keeping in touch with the regional marketing responsible. Collaborate with commercial team on assessing opportunities and develop on-target winner fragrance offerings and presentations.  Requirements: Educational, Years Of Experience And Areas Of Expertise Degree in Marketing, Economics, Business and Administration or related studies 2-3 or more years relevant work experience B2B Marketing knowledge with strong know-how of B2C Marketing in a multi-national environment. Good understanding of marketing strategy and principles including branding, new product development, creative promotions, packaging, digital marketing. Proficient in operating Microsoft environment programs (PowerPoint, Word, Excel, Outlook) and interested in developing creative skills to manage Adobe Photoshop basic Creativity and passion for fragrances and for consumers with strong interest in product, concept, olfactive development. Language Skills Bahasa Indonesia and English are required. Other languages will be an asset

Title: Marketing Communication Associate
Description: Responsibilities Initiate and deliver marketing and communication strategies to help 3MONGKIS known more widely and achieve the desired brand image. Title: Senior SEO Analyst
Description: It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing! Job Description Daily execution of high performing keywords and execution of hygiene activity across multiple channels to achieve customer acquisition goals and maximize returns on the provided budget Spearhead the importance of SEO and adhering to SEO best practices within the organization, provide recommendations for improvement of our sites and oversee the implementation of those recommendations Develop and formulate search engine optimization marketing strategy for formulate Traveloka hotel, alternative accommodation, and Flight+Hotel products SEO roadmap both on page and off page to ensure the highest level of discoverability, engagement and action Analyze organic search performance and identify improvement opportunities Conduct SEO-related research: search intent and keyword research, website audit, competitive analysis (identify organic traffic-building activities of competitors), link profile analysis Keep pace with search engine’s update, algorithm changes, industry practices, trends, and report changes (and subsequent strategy updates) as needed Work with multiple different stakeholders to implement SEO initiatives, with ability to initiate and lead high impact projects and actions across different teams at once  Build excellent relationships with teammates, and stakeholders across projects and provide guidance, coaching, knowledge sharing, and present solutions Has the critical judgment on addressing complexity in organization - including the design of structures, processes, cultures, programs, habits that can function well within the dynamic organization  Anticipate future direction and plan and changes by continuous examining situation, opportunity, resource, sequence of development, implications to the company, and independently / able to lead his/her team to reliably answer "what we should do" questions Able to integrate multiple ambiguous system and optimize it  Partner with our analytics team to launch dashboards and workflow tools that help track and report against the appropriate key performance indicators that demonstrate the effectiveness of the organization's SEO efforts. Engage with both internal Traveloka SEO COE and outside vendors, agencies and consultants as necessary to bolster the capacity and skills required for world class SEO performance. Requirements Minimum 3 years of SEO experience working on apps and websites, demonstrating ability to execute and achieve goals in a fast-paced environment Experience in leading e-commerce will be an advantage Deep knowledge of search engine algorithms, ranking strategies, and best practices for websites in different languages (re: URL structure, hreflang tags, Search Console indexing, etc) Deep technical expertise of HTML/CSS Experience with SEO reporting Familiarity with relevant tools (e.g. Ahrefs, Botify, GetStat, etc) and web analytics tools (e.g. Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Google Data Studio) Excellent communication skills with ability to manage multiple stakeholders, both internal and external Analytical mindset with numerical aptitude Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills with previous experience structuring and performing complex analysis in the digital marketing space to drive efficient growth Self starter with exceptional creativity,business acumen, data driven, and growth-minded with the ability to influence parties across a matrixed organization Experience navigating business organizations, managing multiple cross-functional stakeholders, and negotiating optimal solutions across all parties If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Title: Marketing Operations Associate
Description: Description Touchten Games is an award-winning mobile games company based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Played by millions worldwide and consistently featured by app stores, their games cater to the underserved women gamers market in the US and Europe. Touchten is the Winner of Google Play Indonesia Games Contest, and is the recipient of the Forbes Indonesia Rising Global Stars Award. About the Role We are looking for a Marketing Operations Associate to join our Jakarta Office. This role will work closely with our world class Marketing team (based in London) to grow our mobile game apps. We’re looking for an extremely careful and detail oriented person who is able to administer significant amounts of data entry at a 100% accuracy, and who is also able to support the Product and Marketing teams in improving our games’ monetisation. Main responsibilities: Entering marketing entry data for the company’s mobile apps Optimising to grow marketing revenue in the millions, and impressions in the hundreds of millions Identifying and producing lists of competitor ads for the marketing team Constantly improving and growing the team’s operational capabilities Requirements Strong data entry skills Detail oriented and extremely organized / careful Good communication skills in English (required to communicate in) Ability to work in a collaborative, fast-paced environment Analytical and metric-driven Strong passion to learn about the mobile gaming / adtech industries Benefits Free lunch Medical benefit (inpatient/outpatient/dental/glasses) Net Salary Cool office located at the heart of Jakarta At Tripledot we believe different perspectives aren’t optional, so if you don’t meet every single requirement, we get that! We’ve found studies have shown that women and people of colour are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single qualification. If you’re excited about this role but your past experience doesn’t align perfectly with every part of the job description, we encourage you to apply anyway. You still might be a great fit for this role or other roles here! Tripledot Studios is an equal opportunity employer and our employment decisions are made without regard to race, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, religion, pregnancy, marital status or veteran status

Title: Senior Associate, Affiliate Marketing
Description: What we do Founded in 2011, Coda Payments (“Coda”) is the leading provider of secure, cross-border monetisation solutions for digital products and services in more than 60 markets. Through our three services: Codashop, xShop, and Codapay, we help top digital content publishers worldwide such as Activision Blizzard (Call of Duty: Mobile, Diablo Immortal), Riot Games (VALORANT, League of Legends: Wild Rift), Moonton (Mobile Legends: Bang Bang), Garena (Free Fire), Tencent (PUBG Mobile), beIN, Bigo Live, Tinder, and Viu to monetise their content and unlock new revenue streams. Headquartered in Singapore, Coda has 11+ offices and 35+ remote locations worldwide. To date, we have over 500 employees of 42 nationalities working together towards the same mission: to offer our customers the best value, experience and entertainment every day, without fail. In 2022, we have also been named the 5th fastest growing fintech company in the APAC by the Financial Times, the 13th fastest growing company in Singapore by the Straits Times, and a Technology Pioneer by the World Economic Forum.Responsibilities Identify, recruit and review new affiliates through various channels including affiliate marketplace, search engine, social networks, online advertising, conferences, etc Respond to affiliates’ inquiries and troubleshoot issues Execute the day-to-day operations of the affiliate program including managing affiliate applications, deployment of creative assets, monitoring affiliates’ performances, etc Prepare end-of-month reports and share with various regional and global marketing teams Create newsletters to inform affiliates on program updates and promotions Work closely with affiliate lead to identify opportunities, plan and execute activation and optimization efforts to effectively grow the program Work cross-functionally with different teams from business development, design, brand marketing, finance, regional and global marketing team to continue growing the affiliate channel and ensure the program runs smoothly Requirements Bachelor’s degree 1-2 years of affiliate marketing experience Experience with affiliate marketing platforms such as Impact, Rakuten, etc Excellent written and verbal English communication skills and presentation skills Data driven, well-organized and detail-oriented Strong problem-solving skills, proactive and self-driven Advanced Excel capabilities and comfortable with formatting, formulas, customizing reports, etc Ability to travel when needed to conferences or partnership related events Fluency in Korean, Thai or Portuguese is a plus Working at Coda Life at Coda is fast-paced, challenging, and fun. As a rapidly growing global company, we’re always looking to step up and adapt to changes quickly; there is never a dull day at Coda. Nonetheless, we value work-life balance as much as you do. At Coda, remote and flexible working arrangements take centre stage for Codans to work smartly and have autonomy in how they work. We make things happen in the most impactful and effective manner. We are looking for someone eager to initiate new ideas, hungry to contribute more, derives satisfaction from team wins rather than individual ones, and values integrity. If this sounds like you, you will fit perfectly into our Coda team! We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate based on gender, race, age, religion, disability, or other local protected class. We are committed to cultivating an inclusive environment for all employees, and we welcome the diversity that you will bring! We are sorry to inform you that only shortlisted candidates will be notified as we may be overwhelmed by the number of applicants coming into our system; hence if you do not get a reply from us - don’t give up on us just yet! We encourage you also to check out our career site at https://www.codapayments.com/careers - we may have other suitable openings for you.

Title: Digital Analyst
Description: Yuk #SuksesBarengMega! Prepare all tracking in place for all digital marketing campaign (technical) Work hand in hand with Digital Ad Operations for daily campaign management Give frequent feedback, advice and recommendation based on campaign performance. Title: Marketing and Communications Coordinator â€“ Indonesia
Description: Are you a ‘can do’ person? Someone who can juggle marketing tasks with ease? Do you have a growth mindset and are keen to learn? Beca Digital Beca Digital is moving into a significant stage of growth, working with our clients to solve real world and unique problems. We develop and deliver exciting and cost-effective software solutions to leading local and international organisations to help them overcome their challenges. CAPEXinsights, one of our flag-ship software solutions, supports capital project and portfolio management teams to optimise their capital investment. Designed to take the pain out of managing a capital portfolio, it supports business leaders, finance teams, and project engineers to manage both small and large projects. Although wholly owned by Beca, in many ways CAPEXinsights runs as a separate business, with teams in New Zealand, Australia, Indonesia, Singapore and the Netherlands. From here we support our existing and potential customers headquartered in Europe, America and Australia. The Opportunity Reporting to the Marketing Manager for CAPEXinsights, you’ll coordinate the marketing and communication activities, in collaboration with stakeholders, to raise the brand internationally. Responsibilities Include Social Media Marketing  Maintain, coordinate and schedule content for the CAPEXinsights LinkedIn Page   Work with our copywriter to generate content   Research industry news and identify cross-promotional opportunities   Conduct content marketing analysis  Event Management  Coordinate online events in collaboration with stakeholders   Oversee the event planning process   Manage cross-channel communication to promote events   Collate attendee data for insights  Lead Generation  Support and coordinate digital marketing campaigns   Oversee and schedule Industry Insights newsletter using ActiveCampaign   Assist with event planning   Assist in generating automated digital touchpoints in prospect buying journey  Asset Maintenance  Work with design team to create graphics, infographics and images to support content   Create social media assets using Canva   Maintain and update CAPEXinsights sales assets   Maintain consistency of messaging and sustain SEO keywords in content  Initially this will be a 6-month contract, with the possibility to extend or become a permanent position for the right candidate. This is a full-time role, commencing immediately. As we are a team across geographies, flexible working hours will be required. About You You are self-driven with excellent communication skills and sound knowledge of marketing principles. You will have experience with marketing technology and an affinity for digital marketing. Ideally you would have some understanding of the B2B sales cycle in the technology sector. You Will Have  Excellent communication skills and be fluent in English   Minimum 2 years of marketing experience   Knowledge of LinkedIn   A love of learning and able to work independently   Can run projects and coordinate with different stakeholders   Flexible hours required  Ideally You Would Have  Some understanding of the B2B buyers journey   Experience working in technology sector   Basic technical understanding of digital marketing   Knowledge of ActiveCampaign, Canva, Looker Studio, Tag Manager, Google Analytics or similar   A love of capital projects and portfolios!  This is an exciting opportunity to work within a dynamic and evolving part of our business and will suit someone who is motivated to learn about marketing a global software product and supporting the team with the coordination of our marketing strategy. About Beca Beca is one of the largest employee-owned professional services consultancies in the Asia-Pacific region. Our team of 3000-plus is diverse enough to bring a wide range of perspectives and expertise to every client and challenge, creating resourceful, smart solutions from our collective experience and insights. The CAPEXinsights team are fun and friendly, with an approach of high trust and support. We encourage everyone to have a voice, while creating opportunities to grow and develop. Enjoy assisting to pioneer the growth strategy of a global software solution, while also being part of a leading professional services consultancy in Asia Pacific. Ready to make the move? / Apply now If you want to make everyday better, apply online today! To find out more about Beca visit beca.com To find out more about CAPEXinsights visit CAPEXinsights.com Beca prides itself on supporting a diverse and inclusive culture – open to inputs from creative people of all genders, ethnicity, identity, thought and experiences

Description: It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing! Job Description Responsibilities: Lead SEM and Display campaign management to do daily execution of high-performing campaign management and execution of hygiene campaigns across multiple channels to achieve customer acquisition goals and maximize return on ad spend Responsible for managing big scale digital marketing campaigns that have high technical complexity due to very large numbers of ads entities that need to be managed Able to detect any technical issues, proactively raise and follow up this issue to be fixed Identify optimization opportunities / growth, and analyzing the impact and effort required Execute and prioritize all the tasks / activities within the managed campaigns Mature enough to manage external marketing vendors independently, and ensure all the expected deliverables or service are delivered Collaborate closely with the Product Marketing Manager in achieving marketing objectives including but not limited to providing guidelines and requirements for campaign strategy pre and post execution, and best-in-class execution Proactively provide market insights or performance marketing insights that’s helpful for the stakeholders to gain insights or make decisions Capable of leading and managing big projects that can potentially create value for the whole team Make sure accrual and all the process of paid invoices in a timely manner The above will be delivered by: Working very closely with Performance Marketing Manager as supervisor to develop paid media strategies for specific local markets which need to be tailored & personalized Develop execution to achieve paid media objectives (CAC, CVR, ROAS) Manage Traveloka advertising accounts on all platforms, maintain online advertising campaigns, from SEM, display targeting, and display retargeting channels Manage spending vs. KPIs balancing to have dynamic optimization based on needs, markets & real-time performance  Stay informed of new betas, tactics, and data trends within the paid search industry Ensure all online advertising best practices have been implemented Provide bi/weekly performance reports on each digital channels and funnels, and circulate to relevant stakeholders Being proactive and giving ideas on performance marketing or any other marketing improvement with the right context, good market knowledge understanding, and business acumen Being a business partner to drive growth and able to see opportunities (improving ROAS vs scaling up on customer acquisition vs measuring impact from awareness to overall performance) beyond performance marketing, manage channels not only as touch points for customers and lever for growth. Requirements minimum 3-4 years experience in Performance Marketing, especially SEM (Experience in Display will be a plus) Possess exceptional critical and structured thinking and a willingness to dive into the data, to produce immediate value while still keeping an eye on long-term strategy and scalability Possess a sharp eye for detail coupled with the ability to see how small details make up the bigger picture Excellent analytical skills for data-driven decision making, deriving and disseminating actionable insights resulting from such analysis Good communication skill, self-driven, proactive, love challenges, and enthusiasm to pursue excellence Proficiency in Excel or similar data processing tool English is mandatory If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Title: Associate Manager or Manager, China Marketing (Bangkok Based, Relocation Provided)
Senior Marketing Analyst (Bangkok Based, Relocation Provided)
Marketing Coordinator
Description: Kualifikasi Bersedia bekerja onsite di Kantor Malang Penddikan minimal S1 diutamakan jurusan Marketing Communication & Advertising, Ilmu Komunikasi, Statistika, Manajemen Marketing Berpengalaman di bidang yang relevan minimal 3 tahun Mampu berbahasa inggris aktif/pasif Pengalaman kerja yang relevan digital marketing, marketing coordinator, social media advertiser, google advertiser

Title: Marketing Analytics Associate
Description: Mekari is Indonesia's no. 1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company. Our mission is to empower businesses and professionals to progress effortlessly. Our products (Mekari Talenta, Mekari Jurnal, Mekari KlikPajak, & Mekari Qontak) have been used by tens of thousands of businesses in Indonesia. To reach millions, we need more people like you: entrepreneurs, builders, owners inside the company who are eager to grow at scale. Join us to empower more businesses with technology. Job Descriptions  Produce marketing KPI dashboards and deliver daily-weekly-monthly cross-channel performance reports with actionable insights   Come up with conversion optimization strategies with the aim of improving efficiency in digital marketing and increasing ROI   Implement tracking into various marketing initiatives using Google Tag Manager or other tools   Benchmark performance across all digital channels and advice on KPIs based on performance analysis   Analyze end-to-end user behavior, conversion data, customer journeys, funnel analysis, and multi-channel attribution   Identify risks & opportunities to try innovative new methodologies and improve the analytical procedure   Work daily with analytical software including but not limited to Google Adwords, Google Analytics, Zoho Analytics, Tableau, and more  Requirements/Qualifications  Bachelors degree with related major   2+ years of proven working experience in a related position.   Detail-oriented, analytic problem-solving, critical thinking, effective communication   Fluent in data mining, data visualization, business intelligence, and reporting software   Have successfully built predictive models to recommend impactful next steps for a business   Proficient in SQL  What You Will Get  Competitive salary + daily allowance.  Premium private health insurance (outpatient, inpatient, maternity, dental).  Early access to salary + flex installment (employee loan) via Mekari Flex.  Allowance for glasses/contact lenses.  Annual and unpaid leaves from day 1 of join date + unlimited sick leave with doctor note.  Notebook Ownership Program.  Strategic office location, accessible by MRT.  Friendly and dynamic work environment.  Opportunity to take part in growing Indonesia's no. 1 SaaS company Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application is shortlisted to the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up. Don't forget to check our Recruitment FAQ at  bit.ly/RecruitmentFAQ-Mekari  [ENG] or  bit.ly/RekrutmenMekari-FAQ  [INA] to find the answers to commonly-asked questions regarding our recruitment process. We wish you the best. Hope to see you around soon!

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Job Description Conduct research and carry out data collection to understand the industry, market, user behaviors, and patterns. Identify problems within the business and recommend/implement SMART solutions. Assist departments and be the in-house consultant to understand their goals and build a system to help them make data-driven decisions and achieve goals (ie. tracking system of key metrics). Collect, organize, and interpret statistical information to make it useful to internal and external stakeholders. Perform analysis to assess and improve business performance. Prepare reports (mostly, but not limited to, in the form of presentation deck, email, word doc) based on analysis. Present findings to stakeholders and provide recommendations. Job Requirements Min. 3 years in any of these fields: data analytics/business analytics/statistics/management consulting. Familiarity with programming languages such as SQL, Oracle, Python. Must have a strong market and commercial awareness. Like challenges and have problem-solving skills; are curious to find the root/cause of problems. Ability to analyze, model, and interpret data.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Engage broadly with stakeholder teams to structure and prioritize business problems where insights can have the biggest impact. Leverage data to understand our customers and our funnel in depth, identify areas of opportunity and execute projects to drive customer growth, retention, engagement, and/or revenue. Brainstorm on growth initiatives and assess their impact, efficacy and complexity. Utilize both non-technical tools and methods to implement growth initatives. Collaborate with Product, Marketing and Sales Operations teams to implement growth initiatives. Track and monitor metrics and KPIs of existing product and growth initiatives Self-organize under scrum methodology to collaborate and deliver features to customers﻿ Minimum Qualifications At least 3 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. At least 1 year experience in Financial Services industry Excellent in presentation skills Experience in analysing data to draw business-relevant conclusions and in data visualization techniques and tools Fluent in Excel / Google sheets, with a strong understanding of pivot tables, vlookups Complex project management work that has required you to work cross-functionally Ability to break down high level business problems into concrete analytical solutions Excellent communication skills with both technical and non-technical audiences Growth mindset, humility, and the burning desire to own your domain and your work Demonstrated focus on continuous improvement of code, systems, and processes through analysis and metrics Willing to work at Sunter, North Jakarta

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Want to be a part of our team? Analyzes complex business problems to be solved with automated systems. Identifies gaps and provides technical expertise in business requirements for system functional specifications and scales new and current systems, processes and procedures in a cost effective manner. Configures system settings and options; plans and executes unit, integration and acceptance testing to meet business requirements. Designs details of automated systems. May provide consultation to users in the area of automated systems. May lead cross-functional linked teams to address business or systems issues. Working at NTT The Business Analyst’s key function is to work with internal and external clients to determine requirements and to define solutions to address complex business, process and systems problems, and improvements in the organization. They act as a liaison among stakeholders in order to understand the structure, policies, and operations of an organization, and to recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Act as a bridge between the business problems and the technology solutions.  Analyse, transform and ultimately resolve the business problems with the help of technology.  Work with internal clients and apply best practice methodologies to determine business requirements and to define solutions to address business, process, information and system problems, improvements or change.  Deliver business projects in line with sponsor requirements and enterprise architecture.  Proactive development and deployment of enhanced services and platforms, covering all the functional aspects from service/product definition through to build and deployment.  Ensure the identification and documentation of operational gaps including user guides, templates, test cases and related user training.  Assist with the resolution of issues pertaining to the service.  Adhere to and follow the relevant development and support processes.  Communicate and escalate if any issues arise or deliverables cannot be met and request assistance to ensure closure of issues.  Take responsibility for delivery of project elements with minimal supervision Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Broad understanding of business practices and processes Excellent team player who displays good client service orientation with well-developed administrative and organisation skills Deep expertise in specific systems, processes and technologies that they will be required to analyse Meticulous attention to detail whilst working under pressure Excellent verbal and written communication skills Ability to listen empathetically Ability to build rapport and engage effectively with a variety of stakeholders Knowledge of project management methodology Excellent analytical skills with the ability to convert business requirements into operational deliverables (functional requirements) to meet business objectives Excellent documentation skills, in particular, functional requirements, test cases, system user documentation, processes and procedures and presentations Very good working knowledge of Microsoft Exchange, Word, Excel Project, PowerPoint and Visio Understanding of systems generally used in a services organisation e.g. ServiceNow, Siebel, Remedy, SAP, EMS would be advantageous Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Typically requires Bachelor’s degree or equivalent with related demonstrable experience Project management certification would be advantageous IIBA Membership required Relevant technology certification(s) Required Experience: Demonstrable experience as a Business Analyst gained within a technology services environment Experience as a system administrator or developer would be advantageous Demonstrable experience in and with all operational aspects of a Services business, preferably with a Systems Integrator Demonstrable experience in the process of developing and implementing new services and systems Understanding of and experience with ITIL (IT Infrastructure Library) Demonstrable experience in coordinating and managing tasks, and small projects What will make you a good fit for the role? Standard career level descriptor for job level:  Seasoned and experienced professional  Has full understanding of specialisation area  Resolves wide range of issues in creative ways  Fully qualified, career level, career journey-orientated  Uses good judgement in selecting tools and methods to solve problems  Networks with senior internal and external people in own area of expertise  Receives little instruction on day-to-day work, receives general instructions on new assignments  Typically requires demonstrable related experience with a Bachelor’s or equivalent degree; or moderate level experience and a Master’s or equivalent degree; or a PhD or equivalent degree without experience; or equivalent work experience

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Job responsibilities:  Operate as a business generalist, working with the founders on several priority initiatives across planning, product, go-to-market and operations  Gather and analyze business requirements to identify solutions for capturing new opportunities, addressing business challenges or improving operational processes and procedures  Develop financial models to evaluate the financial impact of proposed solutions  Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure that solutions are aligned with company objectives  Develop and maintain business processes, procedures, and workflows  Conduct market research to identify trends and opportunities in the financial technology industry.  Communicate project status and results to stakeholders  Identify areas for process improvement and provide recommendations to management  Work with product and technology teams to develop and implement new solutions Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Economics, or a related field  Minimum 2 years of experience in consulting or in-house strategy/ CEO office team of startups or corporates  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills  Strong business acumen  Experience in developing financial models and conducting market research  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills  Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment  Knowledge of financial technology or banking is a plus  Strong project management skills and ability to work with cross-functional teams

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Pendidikan min D3 dari jurusan TI/SI/Kom atau bidang yang relevan Memiliki pengalaman sebagai BA pada pelaksanaan IT Project, diutamakan sebagai Business Analyst, untuk level Senior dibutuhkan pengalaman min 5 tahun, sedangkan Middle pengalaman min 3 tahun Memahami konsep SDLC Memiliki pengalaman dalam menyusun dokumen project seperti KAK/RFP, SOW, RD, FSD, UAT Scenario, dll  Memiiki pengetahuan teknis seperti SQL, Webservice, dan pengalaman di asuransi adalah syarat opsional

Title: Mill Business Analyst Manager
Description: Key responsibilities: Basic Control & reporting To finalize month-end closing for distribution and mill cost and present result to management team. To prepare monthly mill variance analysis. To prepared weekly & monthly report which related to mill e.g. Waste report, maintenance report, energy report, production output, write off report & Mill performance matrix with KPIs. To drive strong control over inventory, expenses and balance sheet. Adherence to all Corporate Financial Instruction (CFI). To support Cost Benefits Analysis which related to distribution and mill cost. To highlight and manage potential financial risk and opportunity to top management. Writeoff control and setting right process to identify well in advance specially during changes Analytics and Business Partnering Working closely with Mill team to identify cost saving project ( ECS), track delivery and work to build pipeline. Drive strong review mechanism with Supply Chain leadership so there is clear assessment of variance of budget and develop corrective plan. Analysis of distribution and mill cost and drive efficiency Benchmarking of cost with other KC countries and with companies in Indonesia ( basis public available data). Capital investment justifications, e.g., Payback, Net Present Value (NPV) & Internal Rate of Return (IRR). To prepare annual & quarter budgeting and forecasting for manufacturing accounts (COGS level) & distribution cost. Inventory analysis and optimization Key Requirements: Min. Bachelor of Accounting/Finance/Business Management with an excellent academic report Min. 4 years of experiences in the same field (Manufacture Company/FMCG) Excellent analytical skill Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal Excellent in Ms. Excel (advanced formulas, pivot tables, and charts) Hands-on experience with accounting software and statistical

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: Requirements Memiliki pengalaman dalam project dengan metode Agile Memiliki pengetahuan di bidang channel digital banking (web atau mobile) Memiliki pengetahuan terhadap produk,teknologi, dan trend Mengerti alur pengembangan produk Customer sentris dan detail Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik terutama dengan stakeholder

Title: Business Analyst
Description: JOB SUMMARY Position: Business Analyst Division: Analyst RESPONSIBILITIES: You will be working in the business and financial analysis Function reporting to the COO or VP of Finance. Your objectives will be to develop financial models and take over in the future from global consultant to lead financial analysis, including product development and manufacturing finance.   REQUIREMENTS: University Degree in Finance or Business Fluent in English At least 5 years experience in the automotive or consumer electronics industry in a variety of functions Worked as business/finance analyst of a period of at least 2 years Knowledge of 2W or 4W automotive industry Financials in Manufacturing and Launches (Understand Key financial indicators at BU/ Product level (EBIT, ROS, Gross Margin), Manages Project Budget (Capex, production tooling), and track, keep and reports Ramp Up costs and deviation) Strong communication skills with various levels Presentation skills to management Ability to complete tasks with minimal supervision, self driving Capable to liaise with international teams Experience in multi cultural setting

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: We are seeking an experienced Senior Business Analyst to join our team. The successful candidate will work closely with our sales team to analyze internal sales data, identify opportunities for growth and provide valuable insights to drive revenue growth. The ideal candidate should possess strong analytical skills, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of successful collaboration with sales teams.   Responsibilities Analyze internal sales data and identify growth opportunities Work closely with the sales team to understand their needs and provide them with valuable insights Conduct market research and competitor benchmarking to identify potential areas for growth Develop and maintain sales performance dashboards, reports, and models Use data analysis to recommend strategies to increase sales and revenue growth Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement sales improvement programs Manage multiple projects and deliverables, ensuring timely and high-quality completion Evaluate outcomes and iterate strategies to continuously improve performance Qualifications Bachelor's degree in business, economics, or a related field Minimum of 3 years of experience in business analysis, business planning, or any related field Strong analytical skills with experience in data analysis and modeling Having a background in a top consulting firm or distributor would be a plus Proven track record of working closely with sales teams to drive revenue growth Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Proficiency in using analytical tools, such as Excel, SQL, and Python Strong project management skills Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects and prioritize deadlines Experience in the technology, consulting, or distributor industry is a plus Fluency in English is mandatory Fluency in Mandarin would be a plus

Title: Business Analyst
Company: PT Bank Multiarta Sentosa Tbk (Bank MAS)
Description: Job Descriptions Communication with management/business teams to gain in-depth understanding of critical business requirements Gather critical information from active listening/engagement with various stakeholders involved with the business Determine and understand business objectives and break down complex problems through a combination of studying both qualitative and quantitative data Analyzing data models to deliver logical conclusions Developing innovative solutions for operational and strategic changes Understand how to prioritize initiatives and solutions based on business needs and constraints Communication with stakeholders regarding the implementation changes Conducting test, surveys, and workshops Qualifications At least 2 years of experience in Data Analytics or Project Management Strong logical thinking and problem-solving skills Fundamental analytical and conceptual thinking skills Experience in SQL Programming Experience with data visualization and dashboard creation with Tableau (or similar tools) Communication skills to interact with developers, clients, end-user, and management

Title: Functional / Business Analyst Consultant
Description: Familiar with ERP system ( Microsoft Dynamics/SAP/Acumatica,etc) is a plus  Familiar Common and Best Practice of Business Process  Good in documentation and time management  Develop functionality to meet defined business requirements  Conduct unit testing of functionality to ensure compliance with business requirements  Analyze problems and implement appropriate technical solutions  Conduct internal walkthrough of analysis or design documents or code

Title: Business Analyst
Description: The ideal candidate is a team player who will be responsible for working with company data in various business areas. Specific responsibilities include reporting metrics, analyzing methodologies, suggesting operation improvements, and building proposal evaluations in a cross-functional environment.    Responsibilities Evaluating business processes, anticipating requirements, uncovering areas for improvement, and developing and implementing solutions Leading ongoing reviews of business processes and developing optimization strategies Performing requirements analysis Documenting and communicating Requirements, Analysis & User Acceptance Test Effectively communicating insights and plans to cross-functional team members and management Gathering critical information from meetings with various stakeholders and producing useful reports Ensuring solutions meet business needs and requirements. Performing user acceptance testing Prioritizing initiatives based on business needs and requirements Maintain a competitive market knowledge Qualifications A bachelor’s degree in business or related field or an MBA. A minimum of 5 years’ experience in Business Analysis in Multi-Finance Industries (Other financial industries such as Banking, BPR are also welcome) Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills. The ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine acceptable solutions. Excellent documentation skills. Fundamental analytical and conceptual thinking skills. Experience creating detailed reports and giving presentations. Fluency in Microsoft Office suite (Outlook, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, etc.) Strong written, verbal and collaboration skills

Title: Commercial Assistant Manager
Description: We are seeking an experienced and qualified  Commercial Assistant Manager  to join our team, passionate in building partnership, getting deal and achieving target, understanding in marketing and analytics, and able to craft strategy for business exploration. Job Descriptions Conducting regular research on market insights, business opportunities, industry trends, competitive landscape, customer demographics, and new technologies in order to identify any potential threats or opportunities for Wiraraja Indonesia Exploring and reaching out to prospective B2B partners as well as actively communicating with them on their needs and expectations Analyzing the needs, conceptualizing, and providing design solutions for potential B2B Partners Collaborate with internal teams to ensure smooth on-boarding and clients’ growth Devise partnership plan for the potential B2B partners Devise workaround on potential blockers/challenges Preparing B2B partnership requirements and/or other BD-related documentation (including legal, financial documents, and business opportunities/market landscape information) Manage partners data into a database based on deal stage and lifecycle Manage end-to-end B2B product integration process for new B2B Partners Communicating and coordinating with the relevant internal stakeholders related to B2B product & partnership Supporting Business Lead on data extraction and analysis to understand better B2B partner’s performance, key figures, and potential improvement points Monitoring B2B Partnership performance and preparing regular reporting Support Commercial Leads and Director. Job Requirement Bachelor degrees in Business, Finance, Accounting, Marketing, or other related majors Have a minimum of 3 years of experience working as a Business Development/Business Analyst/Marketing Ability to conceptualize and structure B2B partnership Proven experience working with a tight deadline in a fast-paced working environment A creative problem solver with strong quantitative and analytical skills Ability to read, write, and speak fluently in both English and Bahasa Indonesia Ability to read, write, and speak in Chinese is an advantage Strong commercial acumen, communication and presentation skills Team player, proactive, and highly motivated Strong Ms. Excel and PowerPoint skills Have interest and preferably some experience working in a manufacturing industry is a plus Wiling to be placed in Batam

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: Job Responsibilities:  Support implementation and maintenance of computer application, software or system by analysis and defining technical details based on business requirement; support testing standards and solutions. Job Duties : Responsible for the software development lifecycle.  Provide best solution by conferring with Product manager and both foreign and local developers.  Collaborate with the development team to ensure that the technical solution aligns with the business requirements. To work closely with the Application Tester to ensure that the result complies with the designed solution.  Responsible for functional Specification Document and Technical Specification Document including ERD. Skills and Qualifications: Minimum of 3 years of experience. Must be experienced in Software Development, at least 3 cycles (or more than 3 years) of Software Development to support analytical thinking and problem solving.  Must be experienced in FSD (Functional Specification Design) and TSD (Technical Specification Design) document.  Must be experienced in various diagram design, e.g.: UML (Unified Model Language), ArchiMate, BPM (Business Process Model), etc.  Must be experienced in data flow design & database design (ERD) to provide dynamic and scalable system  Experienced in system integration and API design related  To have knowledge in K8s To have knowledge in Apigee (preferably) To have knowledge in Google Cloud Platform To have knowledge in API description, mocking and testing related, e.g.: Swagger, Apiary, etc. To have knowledge in Open API Specification (preferably) To have knowledge in Middleware, e.g.: EAI, ESB, OSB (preferably)  Practical experienced in Scrum or other agile methodology (preferably)  To have background as Developer (plus value)  To Have knowledge in MSSQL DB, PostGre DB To have previous working industry in FSI (Financial Services Institution), e.g.: Bank, Insurance, Consumer Financing, etc.  Able to communicate in English

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Core Responsibilities : To conduct and understand requirements studies with prospects and customers To propose suitable and specifications that address customers' and prospects' needs To present, explain, and up sell our products and solutions to customers/prospects To propose proper scope of work to install and implement the proposed products and solutions to customers/prospects, principals, and suppliers Work closely with sales team to ensure deals are closed Must Have Criterias : Bachelors degree from IT/Computer Science Experience in query & regulatory reporting is a must Understanding and experience developing ETL tools or ETL concepts Capable to work under pressure Able to work as a team and independently Will be placed in Jakarta/Tangerang Others : Can source the candidates from Operations Regulatory in Bank Personality wise Soft skills/personality - culture fit: can work under pressure, down to earth, good attitude, good communication, challenges oriented and always want to learn more.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Job Details: - Experienced in using Office, SQL, SQL Server; - Accustomed to doing queries, making reports and presentations - Management capabilities and requirements analysis; - Business Process Modeling; - Communication and negotiation;

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Core Responsibilities : Build from scratch and maintain a data warehouse system Interpretation, preparation and mapping of complex financial data and explaining complex technical information Data Warehouse concept from many approach Designing and developing code, scripts, and data pipelines that leverage structured and unstructured data integration from multiple sources Active involvement in the development of functional/industry practices;  Provide solution implementation assistance as required;  Provide solutions and options where business requirements misalign with systems operations and functionality; Design and implement governance, process improvements, automated processes, optimized data delivery and revamp infrastructure for larger scalability Support on-time, error-free, delivery of projects through the optimal design and configuration of relevant MIS Data Warehouse functionalities. Ensure appropriate support and new development documentation for the team is followed (i.e. scope, design, test plans, issues and cutover lists, project plans etc.) Must Have Criterias : Have experience min 2 years prior as MIS Datawarehouse in Banking or Financial Industry Environment Having good knowledge about Data Warehouse concept, Business Intelligence Concept, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, and Java technologies Understanding and experience with ETL methodologies, Business Intelligence and data warehousing principles, approaches, technologies Possesses good oral and written communication skills as well as good interpersonal skills Solid experience in managing cloud services (preferable GCP or other cloud solution providers such as AWS, Azure, or AliCloud) Understanding of SQL Server, PostgreSQL, BigQuery, or NoSQL databases and good knowledge for SQL command and other manipulation tools Self-starter person, continuous improvement, and a team player member Others : Personality wise Soft skills/personality - culture fit: can work under pressure, down to earth, good attitude, good communication, challenges oriented and always want to learn more.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: PT. Media Digitech Indonesia is a software development company trusted by business in Indonesia is looking for Business Analyst Job Requirements Have 3 years hands on experiences as business analyst. Have the knowledge and experiences on project phases. Experience handle project banking. Familiar with create documentation for project (FSD / TSD / BRD, MOM, etc) Have the knowledge and experience on implementation of Ambit Focus. Bridge communication between business, IT and ALM system implementers.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Are you an early achiever looking to join a team of like-minded individuals and make a difference in the financial technology industry? Indepay | Setara Networks is the place for you! We are a fast-paced start-up, and we're seeking highly skilled Business Analysts who are committed to building a culture of excellence and helping us take our company to the next level. As part of our team, you'll work alongside other early achievers who put in a lot of effort and support each other to become the best versions of themselves. We believe in fostering a work environment that encourages risk-taking, innovation, and collaboration. As a Business Analyst, you'll be responsible for identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, managing existing client accounts, and executing customized account strategies. You'll need to have excellent analytical, written, and verbal communication skills, and be able to work independently while collaborating with cross-functional teams. At Indepay | Setara Networks, we're well ahead of our competitors, and we're looking for individuals who are passionate about economic financial modeling, big picture thinking, and taking Indonesia forward. We're building a team of early achievers who are committed to being unique in our strengths and supporting each other to achieve our goals. If you have experience working in similar startups in Series A stage and beyond, and you're a born leader who enjoys building new things, we invite you to apply to be part of our rocketship. Responsibilities Build and manage relationships with clients and stakeholders Lead the accounts and sales plan for allocated accounts Execute customized account strategy to increase revenue and market share for strategic partner accounts Identify strategic opportunities for the company's capabilities through a strong understanding of segments, customer business needs, and leveraging solutions across all product platforms Develop, negotiate and sign proposals by working closely with internal stakeholders and strategic partner executives Proactively educate strategic partners about Indepay Platform on Partner development and market opportunities Work with cross-functional teams across marketing, product, market research, and technology to achieve business objectives Deliver presentations to key stakeholders Track performance against objectives Requirements Bachelor's degree or equivalent with 2+ years of business development experience Financial services/payments industry experience preferred Team-oriented and collaborative, with the ability to work in a complex and ambiguous environment Must be comfortable working in an early stage to growth stage company and should be able to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced environment. Have a proven track record of success in previous roles and have worked in a similar setting, such as a Pre series A-B company will be a plus A leader who takes fun in taking risks and understands that taking calculated risks is necessary for growth. They should have the ability to balance risk-taking with sound decision-making to build something innovative and groundbreaking Proven ability to partner, communicate, and manage through multiple disciplines and organizational groups Demonstrated track record of implementing strategic initiatives Experience “managing up” building executive-level communications and delivering presentations  Skills: Analytical and data-driven approach in day-to-day work Ability to work well under pressure and deliver on commitments Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, and can think outside the box to proactively provide the right solution Good communication skills and the ability to impact and influence Strategic thinker who understands business opportunities to create a competitive advantage Keen eye for detail and ability to multi-task with excellent time management and prioritization skills Positive attitude and determination to succeed against all odds Hands-on, independent, self-motivated, and a fast learner Patience and perseverance are key attributes Benefits Competitive salaries and generous benefits Opportunity to work alongside passionate and talented individuals Entrepreneurship culture with a focus on creating a budding ground for future entrepreneurs Perks and flexibility of a technology product company

Title: Analytical roles â€“ Analyst/ Senior Analyst/ Associate Manager (Bangkok Based, Relocation Provided)
Budget Planning and Control Senior Analyst
Description: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced  Budget Planning and Control Senior Analyst  to join our team. The successful candidate will play a key role in  developing and monitoring our annual budget plans, analyzing department costs, and generating budget reports . If you are a detail-oriented financial professional with a proven track record of success in budget planning and control, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity Ideal Candidate Profile: Bachelor's or Master's degree in finance, accounting, economics, or a related field Typically 2+ years of experience in budget planning and control, financial analysis, or related roles Experience with budgeting systems and software (e.g. SAP, Netsuite, Hyperion) Experience with financial modeling and forecasting Strong analytical skills and attention to detail Strong communication and ability to present learnings and outcomes to leadership Responsibilities: Develop annual budget plans by analyzing data, coordinating with relevant departments, and consolidating requests. Monitor and control budget consumption, transactions, and costs to ensure alignment with the planned budget. Analyze department costs and forecast budget to align with company-wide budget planning and maintain budgeting systems. Generate budget reports including actual vs budget financial reports and performance forecasting. Provide suggestions for improvement to increase effectiveness of budget control. Analyze operational efficiency and cost-effectiveness of related departments. Interested candidate please send updated resume to  apac.jobs@kopikenangan.com We will not be sponsoring visa. Applicants preferably are country national.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Want to be a part of our team? Analyzes complex business problems to be solved with automated systems. Identifies gaps and provides technical expertise in business requirements for system functional specifications and scales new and current systems, processes and procedures in a cost effective manner. Configures system settings and options; plans and executes unit, integration and acceptance testing to meet business requirements. Designs details of automated systems. May provide consultation to users in the area of automated systems. May lead cross-functional linked teams to address business or systems issues. Working at NTT The Business Analyst’s key function is to work with internal and external clients to determine requirements and to define solutions to address complex business, process and systems problems, and improvements in the organization. They act as a liaison among stakeholders in order to understand the structure, policies, and operations of an organization, and to recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Act as a bridge between the business problems and the technology solutions.  Analyse, transform and ultimately resolve the business problems with the help of technology.  Work with internal clients and apply best practice methodologies to determine business requirements and to define solutions to address business, process, information and system problems, improvements or change.  Deliver business projects in line with sponsor requirements and enterprise architecture.  Proactive development and deployment of enhanced services and platforms, covering all the functional aspects from service/product definition through to build and deployment.  Ensure the identification and documentation of operational gaps including user guides, templates, test cases and related user training.  Assist with the resolution of issues pertaining to the service.  Adhere to and follow the relevant development and support processes.  Communicate and escalate if any issues arise or deliverables cannot be met and request assistance to ensure closure of issues.  Take responsibility for delivery of project elements with minimal supervision Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Broad understanding of business practices and processes Excellent team player who displays good client service orientation with well-developed administrative and organisation skills Deep expertise in specific systems, processes and technologies that they will be required to analyse Meticulous attention to detail whilst working under pressure Excellent verbal and written communication skills Ability to listen empathetically Ability to build rapport and engage effectively with a variety of stakeholders Knowledge of project management methodology Excellent analytical skills with the ability to convert business requirements into operational deliverables (functional requirements) to meet business objectives Excellent documentation skills, in particular, functional requirements, test cases, system user documentation, processes and procedures and presentations Very good working knowledge of Microsoft Exchange, Word, Excel Project, PowerPoint and Visio Understanding of systems generally used in a services organisation e.g. ServiceNow, Siebel, Remedy, SAP, EMS would be advantageous Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Typically requires Bachelor’s degree or equivalent with related demonstrable experience Project management certification would be advantageous IIBA Membership required Relevant technology certification(s) Required Experience: Demonstrable experience as a Business Analyst gained within a technology services environment Experience as a system administrator or developer would be advantageous Demonstrable experience in and with all operational aspects of a Services business, preferably with a Systems Integrator Demonstrable experience in the process of developing and implementing new services and systems Understanding of and experience with ITIL (IT Infrastructure Library) Demonstrable experience in coordinating and managing tasks, and small projects What will make you a good fit for the role? Analyzes complex business problems to be solved with automated systems. Identifies gaps and provides technical expertise in business requirements for system functional specifications and scales new and current systems, processes and procedures in a cost effective manner. Configures system settings and options; plans and executes unit, integration and acceptance testing to meet business requirements. Designs details of automated systems. May provide consultation to users in the area of automated systems. May lead cross-functional linked teams to address business or systems issues. Survey Tip: May be client-focused, working in conjunction with Professional Services and Outsourcing functions. May include company-wide, web-enabled solutions.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: 1. Experiences as Business System Analyst / Business Analyst for >= 5 Years 2. Have good analytical, problem solver / able to have tshoot capability during Business Case / Project initiation / Production Support after Project Go live 3. Hands on with SQL Data Manipulation Language (DML); Data Definition Language (DDL); Structure of an SQL Command (execute / Read).  4. Have experience with end to end application in Insurance or Banking. 5. Have deep Knowledge with Insurance Business Process and integration with multiple process flows / Systems ; added value if understand Financial and point of sales area. 6. Have knowledge and experience in Core System enhancement or projects i.e Life Asia/AS400, system table setup, compensation system, lettering system, SMS & Email sending system, etc. 7. Have knowledge and experience in using SSIS. 8. Have deep explore requirements or business needs and challenge the needs in order to get an effective and efficient process 9. Familiar with Agile Development Lifecycle / Waterfall Development Lifecycle Processes: reflecting on previous projects cycles and involvement Requirement Gathering Process, Analysis and Design, Support Testing/Testing, review testcase, Production Support. Deliverables/Output: produce and review Business Requirements Document (BRD) / Function Technical Document (FTD) Daily stand-up meeting, sprint planning, backlog grooming, sprint retrospective, and all activities that related to Agile way of works. Perform data mapping for integration requirement. 10. Communication and Leadership Proactive and target driven and yet communicative with manner to the teams Daily update to appointed PIC 11. Have good team management, monitor, and support the team to achieve the same goal in project / task 12. Can work and manage more than one activity with proper timeline, output, and documented 13. Able and fluent in English speaking and writing. 14. "Familiar with JIRA software development projects and confluence" 15. Collaborating with prospective users and clients to understand and anticipate their needs and translate them into product requirements 16. Managing the product backlog based on changing requirements 17. Developing user stories 18. Liaising with the team member and product owner to deliver updates 19. Participating in Scrum meetings and product sprints
