Title: Business Analyst, Strategic Partnerships( Bangkok based)
Senior Business Analyst
Description: We are seeking an experienced Senior Business Analyst to join our team. The successful candidate will work closely with our sales team to analyze internal sales data, identify opportunities for growth and provide valuable insights to drive revenue growth. The ideal candidate should possess strong analytical skills, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of successful collaboration with sales teams.   Responsibilities Analyze internal sales data and identify growth opportunities Work closely with the sales team to understand their needs and provide them with valuable insights Conduct market research and competitor benchmarking to identify potential areas for growth Develop and maintain sales performance dashboards, reports, and models Use data analysis to recommend strategies to increase sales and revenue growth Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement sales improvement programs Manage multiple projects and deliverables, ensuring timely and high-quality completion Evaluate outcomes and iterate strategies to continuously improve performance Qualifications Bachelor's degree in business, economics, or a related field Minimum of 3 years of experience in business analysis, business planning, or any related field Strong analytical skills with experience in data analysis and modeling Having a background in a top consulting firm or distributor would be a plus Proven track record of working closely with sales teams to drive revenue growth Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Proficiency in using analytical tools, such as Excel, SQL, and Python Strong project management skills Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects and prioritize deadlines Experience in the technology, consulting, or distributor industry is a plus Fluency in English is mandatory Fluency in Mandarin would be a plus

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Melakukan desk study atau mengumpulkan data dan informasi terkait pencarian pasar, legal, operasional dan keuangan.  Menghandle serta mengevaluasi secara berkala kepada penerbit.  Melakukan survei lapangan yang dimaksudkan untuk mengumpulkan data teknis dan operasional, menjaring aspirasi manajemen dan survei lingkungan.  Melakukan analisa terhadap beberapa aspek seperti : Analisis Aspek Teknis, Analisis Aspek Ekonomi, Analisis Aspek Ekonomis, Analisis Aspek Ekonomis, Analisis Aspek Risiko dan Mitigasi Risiko.  Memberikan rekomendasi dan saran terkait rencana aplikasi system.  Menjalin relasi yang baik dengan pihak penerbit.  Melakukan diskusi dan persentasi. Kualifikasi khusus   Fresh Graduate (S1 Ekonomi/Bisnis/ Keuangan) / Pengalaman minimal 1 tahun  Memiliki kemampuan analisis bisnis yang kuat  Memahami istilah- istilah dalam dunia bisnis secara umum  Mampu membaca laporan keuangan  Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik  Mampu bekerja dalam tim  Memiliki tingkat ketelitian yang baik

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Job Description Conduct research and carry out data collection to understand the industry, market, user behaviors, and patterns. Identify problems within the business and recommend/implement SMART solutions. Assist departments and be the in-house consultant to understand their goals and build a system to help them make data-driven decisions and achieve goals (ie. tracking system of key metrics). Collect, organize, and interpret statistical information to make it useful to internal and external stakeholders. Perform analysis to assess and improve business performance. Prepare reports (mostly, but not limited to, in the form of presentation deck, email, word doc) based on analysis. Present findings to stakeholders and provide recommendations. Job Requirements Min. 3 years in any of these fields: data analytics/business analytics/statistics/management consulting. Familiarity with programming languages such as SQL, Oracle, Python. Must have a strong market and commercial awareness. Like challenges and have problem-solving skills; are curious to find the root/cause of problems. Ability to analyze, model, and interpret data.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: The ideal candidate is a team player who will be responsible for working with company data in various business areas. Specific responsibilities include reporting metrics, analyzing methodologies, suggesting operation improvements, and building proposal evaluations in a cross-functional environment.    Responsibilities Evaluating business processes, anticipating requirements, uncovering areas for improvement, and developing and implementing solutions Leading ongoing reviews of business processes and developing optimization strategies Performing requirements analysis Documenting and communicating Requirements, Analysis & User Acceptance Test Effectively communicating insights and plans to cross-functional team members and management Gathering critical information from meetings with various stakeholders and producing useful reports Ensuring solutions meet business needs and requirements. Performing user acceptance testing Prioritizing initiatives based on business needs and requirements Maintain a competitive market knowledge Qualifications A bachelor’s degree in business or related field or an MBA. A minimum of 5 years’ experience in Business Analysis in Multi-Finance Industries (Other financial industries such as Banking, BPR are also welcome) Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills. The ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine acceptable solutions. Excellent documentation skills. Fundamental analytical and conceptual thinking skills. Experience creating detailed reports and giving presentations. Fluency in Microsoft Office suite (Outlook, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, etc.) Strong written, verbal and collaboration skills

Title: Business Intelligence & Analyst - Digital Banking Business, SeaBank
Description: The Business Intelligence and Data Analytics team plays a critical role in conducting close-loop data-driven business iterations. As business intelligence specialists and data analysts, our scope of work is not limited to just performance monitoring and reporting, but also in proactively finding actionable insights to help drive high-impact business changes. Our end-to-end data solution reduces the gap between the business teams and technical teams, and achieves real ‘intelligence’ in the iteration cycle. Browse our Business Intelligence and Data Analytics team openings to see how you can make an impact with us. Job Description Generate predictive & prescriptive reports and analyse all workstreams at SeaBank to provide and support data-driven decision-making Generate actionable insights that can be used to support or design new strategies Serving various work units by becoming partners in formulating plans and strategies to drive SeaBank's business growth through data-driven decision-making Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or Information System Technology will be an advantage Experience as Business Intelligence & Analyst, data scientist, data analyst, or data engineer in banking or financial services Experience working with one or more query languages (e.g Structured Query Language) Familiar with the use of analytical languages such as Python Strong communication and analytical skills Comfortable working with large numbers/data sets

Title: Junior Business Analyst
Description: Core Responsibilities : Writing instruction manuals for systems Consulting with managers to determine what role the systems play in the business Testing the system on a regular basis to ensure quality and function Training users on how to appropriately utilize their systems Must Have Criterias : Bachelors degree from IT/Computer Science Have experience in PSAK/IFRS is a must Understanding and experience developing ETL tools or ETL concepts Capable to work under pressure Able to work as a team and independently Others : Personality wise Soft skills/personality - culture fit: can work under pressure, down to earth, good attitude, good communication, challenges oriented and always want to learn more.

Title: Marketing and Business Development Coordinator
Description: Are you a ‘can do’ person? Someone who can juggle marketing and business development tasks with ease? Do you have a growth mindset and are keen to learn?    Beca Digital  Beca Digital is moving into a significant stage of growth, working with our clients to solve real world and unique problems. We develop and deliver exciting and cost-effective software solutions to leading local and international organisations to help them overcome their challenges.    CAPEXinsights, one of our flag-ship software solutions, supports capital project and portfolio management teams to optimise their capital investment. Designed to take the pain out of managing a capital portfolio, it supports business leaders, finance teams, and project engineers to manage both small and large projects. Although wholly owned by Beca, in many ways CAPEXinsights runs as a separate business, with teams in New Zealand, Australia, Indonesia, Singapore and the Netherlands. From here we support our existing and potential customers headquartered in Europe, America and Australia.  ​ The Opportunity ​Reporting to the Marketing Manager for CAPEXinsights, you’ll coordinate the marketing and business development activities, in collaboration with stakeholders, to raise the brand internationally.    Responsibilities include:   Social Media Marketing  -Maintain, coordinate and schedule content for the CAPEXinsights LinkedIn Page  -Work with our copywriter to generate content  -Research industry news and identify cross-promotional opportunities  -Conduct content marketing analysis   Business Development -Work with Account Director to qualify leads on LinkedIn -Conduct market research to identify target companies and contacts for outreach -Business development support in LinkedIn[DG1] Sales Navigator -Build a total addressable market list and collate customer data for insights   Lead Generation -Support and coordinate digital marketing campaigns -Oversee and schedule Industry Insights newsletter using ActiveCampaign -Assist with event planning -Assist in generating automated digital touchpoints in prospect buying journey Asset Maintenance -Work with design team to create graphics, infographics and images to support content  -Create social media assets using Canva -Maintain and update CAPEXinsights sales assets  -Maintain consistency of messaging and sustain SEO keywords in content   Initially this will be a  6-month contract, with the possibility to extend or become a permanent position for the right candidate . This is a full-time role, commencing immediately. As we are a team across geographies, flexible working hours will be required. About you You are self-driven with excellent communication skills and sound knowledge of marketing principles. You will have experience with marketing technology and an affinity for digital marketing. Ideally you would have some understanding of business development and the sales process in the technology sector.    You will have: Excellent communication skills and be fluent in English Minimum 2 years of marketing experience Knowledge of LinkedIn A love of learning and able to work independently Can run projects and coordinate with different stakeholders Flexible hours required Ideally you would have: Some understanding of the B2B buyers journey Experience working in technology sector Business development or sales experience Knowledge of ActiveCampaign, Canva, Sales Navigator, Google Analytics or similar A love of capital projects and portfolios!   This is an exciting opportunity to work within a dynamic and evolving part of our business and will suit someone who is motivated to learn about marketing a global software product and supporting the team with the coordination of our sales and marketing strategy.  About Beca  Beca is one of the largest employee-owned professional services consultancies in the Asia-Pacific region. Our team of 3000-plus is diverse enough to bring a wide range of perspectives and expertise to every client and challenge, creating resourceful, smart solutions from our collective experience and insights.    The CAPEXinsights team are fun and friendly, with an approach of high trust and support. We encourage everyone to have a voice, while creating opportunities to grow and develop. Enjoy assisting to pioneer the growth strategy of a global software solution, while also being part of a leading professional services consultancy in Asia Pacific.    Ready to make the move? / Apply now If you want to make everyday better, apply online today!    To find out more about Beca visit beca.com  To find out more about CAPEXinsights visit CAPEXinsights.com   Beca prides itself on supporting a diverse and inclusive culture – open to inputs from creative people of all genders, ethnicity, identity, thought and experiences

Title: Assistant Manager - Business Analyst
Description: Prudential's purpose is to help people get the most out of life. We will deliver our purpose by creating a culture in which diversity is celebrated and inclusion assured, for our colleagues, customers, and partners. We provide a platform for our people to do their best work and make an impact to the business, and in exchange, we support our people's career ambitions. We pledge to make Prudential a place where you can Connect, Grow and Succeed. Business Analyst is responsible to business needs, identify solution and delivery the solution Principle Duties & Responsibilities  Manage product Represent business Responsible for maximizing the business value of the product Responsible for creating the product backlog items and prioritization Ensuring that the product backlog is visible and clear to all Ability to take decision Effectively communicate with all related parties to: Achieve business needs request & Define user story/business requirement Understand the business flows Build the business case Design solution To work closely with business segments to ensure consultation processes are carried out correctly and in a timely manner To work strategically and operationally with business segments in a business partnering capacity to ensure IT support is provided to enable them to meet their needs and objectives Managing, monitoring and tracking of the deliveries  Value Delivery Business Process enhancement Security Risk Management Quality Management Integrated Change and Configuration Management Performance and capacity planning with IT Infrastructure Project consulting: solutions, Six Sigma, etc.  Monitor and Control Project Budget SLA Fulfillment Reporting weekly and monthly updates Maintenance of IT Users List Request Quality of deliveries  Reporting Weekly progress report At least monthly report to PIC of department Support Regional report (if needed)  Team Management Knowledge to manage team Managing Manager Monitor and track team’s work (internal or external resources) Performance Management Coaching the team Qualification Job Specification: Degree in Computer Science or equivalent Strong analytical skill Ability to understand business needs match with the utilization of existing system capability Able to speak English Able to write reports in English Experience Minimum 7 years experiences Knowledge & Skill Life cycle framework Business case development Project Management Good knowledge of insurance business Good knowledge of all systems used in the company Good knowledge of business process Prudential is an equal opportunity employer.  We provide equality of opportunity of benefits for all who apply and who perform work for our organisation irrespective of sex, race, age, ethnic origin, educational, social and cultural background, marital status, pregnancy and maternity, religion or belief, disability or part-time / fixed-term work, or any other status protected by applicable law. We encourage the same standards from our recruitment and third-party suppliers taking into account the context of grade, job and location. We also allow for reasonable adjustments to support people with special requirements.

Title: Category Management Senior Analyst
Description: Roles Descriptions This role is responsible to support Category Management Lead on the strategic initiatives and transformation opportunities within the external talent management. The role will collaborate with stakeholders and Accenture’s strategic suppliers to explore new innovative ideas and technology staffing solutions. And will work closely with the Category Management Team in SEA markets, to achieve business objectives and deliverables. Key Responsibilities Gather market intelligence to support SOW labour service and contingent labour services Build knowledge bank of SOW/contingent labour suppliers and services that comply with Accenture process and policies  Developing supplier strategies to support business teams including market landscapes of roles/skills, different engagement models, diversity focus, innovative plans and etc. Understand and establish category requirements, development of sourcing strategy that meet the needs of the organization, while providing synergy in process and savings. Handling all sourcing activities such as the request for proposal process, negotiating with suppliers, vendor selection, contract creation, baseline and cost savings validation, and strategy execution aligned to Accenture process and policies Execute SRM activities, including issues management., supplier performance management business review preparation and actions  Handle suppliers’ escalation issues and seek resolutions aligned with stakeholders, including Cx team Work closely with Cx teams to drive supplier chain excellence. Skills Excellent communication skills, problem solving, analytical and organisation skills Strong negotiation skills with the ability to articulate complex concepts and influence stakeholders at all levels. Familiar with procurement and sourcing technical terminology  Data analytics, with the ability to draw conclusions and determine trends to present recommendations on actions  Adaptable and comfortable working with ambiguity in a global matrix organisation  Possess the desire and drive to succeed in fast pace and highly competitive environment.  Qualifications And Experience Bachelor’s degree in human resource with project management experience or other related graduate degree Has experience in working on contracts – being able to negotiate contracts with suppliers, work with legal to go through contract amendments, and finalise for signing Supplier relationship management – familiar with managing SLAs, delivering an SRM program Reporting – able to interpret and analyse spend reports, assess trends, tell a story from the data Communication skills – strong verbal and written communication skills, being able to deal with stakeholders of various levels Project management – this person will need to be comfortable multi-tasking and managing multiple requirements on the go Ideally someone with experience in labour/HR/professional services

Title: Content Strategist
Description: We’re looking for a team member in our fast-growing company as a  Creative Digital Strategist  that will deliver distinctive and customer-centric brand campaigns and digital content - leveraging the brand's identity and unique positioning in the spectacles market. You will be working with account and creative teams to strategize and create appealing and high-quality creative outputs. Job Descriptions Achieve brand awareness amongst the core target audience, new customer acquisition, best-in-class campaign execution, and consistent creative identity across all touchpoints. Lead and set creative standards, directions, strategies, and goals for the creative team (marketing communications, copywriter, graphic designers & animators). Keeping pace with the competition, website, and app trends especially in copywriting and creative writing trends to innovate new creative ideas. Venture time in broadening your industry knowledge by consuming award-winning creative output, case studies, advertising journals, and past executions of campaigns. Provide strategic direction on the communications initiatives, identifying the key value proposition, consumer needs, and value to the business. Provide insightful, creative executions, and well-crafted copy which positively impacts a client’s business & growth. Deepen research and understanding of new trends, creative innovation, and marketing inspiration - share monthly with the wider marketing team. Create publishing components across client-facing channels (e.g., mobile ads, social media, email, & web). Manage localization, production process, and creative approvals of campaign materials. Working closely with the Chief Creative Officer and collaborating with respective stakeholders such as the creative team, marketing team, and digital analyst team, to explore the creative angle and deliver the proper execution of the successful marketing campaign to maximize value for the team’s clients. Deliver regular reports of internal campaign performance results. Job Requirements Bachelor's degree in English literature, communications, or a related field. 4+ years of experience working in advertising and marketing campaigns company background, with a focus on creative writing and/or copywriting. Preferably equipped with leading team experiences. Big picture thinker with excellent storytelling skills and attention to detail. Ability to generate and sell original and innovative ideas that can travel across multiple platforms. Proven ability in copywriting, designing, and executing research for creative campaigns. Proficient written and verbal communication skills (especially in English). Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Has a collaborative mindset, strong bias for action, and solutions-oriented approach. Willing to work hybrid at Bintaro, Tangerang Selatan.

Title: Business Analyst

Title: Business Analyst, Strategic Partnerships( Bangkok based)
Business Analyst
Description: Job responsibilities:  Operate as a business generalist, working with the founders on several priority initiatives across planning, product, go-to-market and operations  Gather and analyze business requirements to identify solutions for capturing new opportunities, addressing business challenges or improving operational processes and procedures  Develop financial models to evaluate the financial impact of proposed solutions  Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure that solutions are aligned with company objectives  Develop and maintain business processes, procedures, and workflows  Conduct market research to identify trends and opportunities in the financial technology industry.  Communicate project status and results to stakeholders  Identify areas for process improvement and provide recommendations to management  Work with product and technology teams to develop and implement new solutions Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Economics, or a related field  Minimum 2 years of experience in consulting or in-house strategy/ CEO office team of startups or corporates  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills  Strong business acumen  Experience in developing financial models and conducting market research  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills  Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment  Knowledge of financial technology or banking is a plus  Strong project management skills and ability to work with cross-functional teams

Project, Agile, Scrum

Responsibilities Include  Social Media Marketing  Maintain, coordinate and schedule content for the CAPEXinsights LinkedIn Page  Work with our copywriter to generate content  Research industry news and identify cross-promotional opportunities  Conduct content marketing analysis   Business Development  Work with Account Director to qualify leads on LinkedIn  Conduct market research to identify target companies and contacts for outreach  Business development support in LinkedIn Sales Navigator  Build a total addressable market list and collate customer data for insights  Lead Generation  Support and coordinate digital marketing campaigns  Oversee and schedule Industry Insights newsletter using ActiveCampaign  Assist with event planning  Assist in generating automated digital touchpoints in prospect buying journey  Asset Maintenance  Work with design team to create graphics, infographics and images to support content  Create social media assets using Canva  Maintain and update CAPEXinsights sales assets  Maintain consistency of messaging and sustain SEO keywords in content Initially this will be a  6-month contract ,  with the possibility to extend or become a permanent position for the right candidate . This is a full-time role, commencing immediately. As we are a team across geographies, flexible working hours will be required. About You You are self-driven with excellent communication skills and sound knowledge of marketing principles. You will have experience with marketing technology and an affinity for digital marketing. Ideally you would have some understanding of business development and the sales process in the technology sector. You Will Have  Excellent communication skills and be fluent in English   Minimum 2 years of marketing experience   Knowledge of LinkedIn   A love of learning and able to work independently   Can run projects and coordinate with different stakeholders   Flexible hours required   Ideally you would have:   Some understanding of the B2B buyers journey   Experience working in technology sector   Business development or sales experience   Knowledge of ActiveCampaign, Canva, Sales Navigator, Google Analytics or similar  A love of capital projects and portfolios! This is an exciting opportunity to work within a dynamic and evolving part of our business and will suit someone who is motivated to learn about marketing a global software product and supporting the team with the coordination of our sales and marketing strategy. About Beca Beca is one of the largest employee-owned professional services consultancies in the Asia-Pacific region. Our team of 3000-plus is diverse enough to bring a wide range of perspectives and expertise to every client and challenge, creating resourceful, smart solutions from our collective experience and insights. The CAPEXinsights team are fun and friendly, with an approach of high trust and support. We encourage everyone to have a voice, while creating opportunities to grow and develop. Enjoy assisting to pioneer the growth strategy of a global software solution, while also being part of a leading professional services consultancy in Asia Pacific. Ready to make the move? / Apply now If you want to make everyday better, apply online today! To find out more about Beca visit beca.com To find out more about CAPEXinsights visit CAPEXinsights.com Beca prides itself on supporting a diverse and inclusive culture – open to inputs from creative people of all genders, ethnicity, identity, thought and experiences.

Title: Business Intelligent Analyst
Description: In this role she/he will be responsible for understanding the industry and competitive environment, establishing the operation system of business and seller growth, exploring opportunities and empowering business development operations. Responsibility Support operation teams to work on different initiatives, and make decisions based on number. Formulate the go-to-market, seller growth strategy for local market; evaluate and evolve the strategy to meet business needs. Build and monitor the operational index, and work closely with the data, project, and product teams to optimize all data and tools. Strong ability to identify risks and streamline business efficiencies. Understanding e-commerce or affiliate field is a plus. Combining business analytics, data mining, and data visualization, to help organizations to make more data-driven decisions. Provide business, insight and trend analysis. Capable of producing regular reporting and monitoring dashboards, and responding to data needs. Requirements Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent practical experience. 5+ years of experience in an eCommerce platform, consulting firm or internet strategy, industry or market research and business analytics with eCommerce relevant experience. Strong analytic, logical and problem solving skills with good attention to detail. Big picture thinking, structured, organized, and experienced in managing projects on different scales (planning, root cause identification, risk mitigation, and process optimization). Adaptable, fast learner, highly motivated, and versatile player with some exposure in ops and commercial. English proficiency is a must

Title: Business Operations Analyst
Description: It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing! Job Description Job Summary:   You’ll be a part of the Business Operations team, where our mission is to ensure that the business is running smoothly at scale and drive our business unit (BU) to reach a new frontier. Your role as a Business Operation Analyst is pivotal to ensure achievement of the business objectives. While delivering projects and optimizing our operations, you’ll be part of the team driving our Experience business to be the most reliable provider for international products. You’ll work alongside a highly talented product team in the technology industry to deliver high-leveraged solutions by creating new systems and features. Job Description Work with various teams (Product, Marketing, and Market and Partnership teams) to build a scalable supply system to serve international markets. This entails a deep understanding of existing standard operating procedures (‘SOP’) and system as well as continuous work to improve business processes to realize scalability. Ensure that the developed SOP for a scalable supply system is implemented across different teams. Support the integration between Traveloka and various international partners. Troubleshoot any issues/problems that may arise with our integration system. This involves finding root causes and implementing solutions. You’ll also be responsible for the smooth operations of the business unit. This includes ensuring timely delivery of any operational tasks. Develop a budget control system for the BU alongside with the Revenue as well as Market & Partnership Team to achieve business objectives. Create workflows and conduct continuous improvements on products that require operational support. Requirements Minimum bachelor’s degree from a reputable university with at least 1 year of experience. Must be an analytical thinker and a problem solver. Can think, effectively operate, showcase can-do attitude under pressure. Strong communication skills (written and verbal). Able to communicate with internal and external stakeholders. Candidate must be able to read, write, and speak in English. Familiar using Microsoft Office and Google Office Suite. Able to prioritize and work on several projects / initiatives simultaneously. Able to think creatively to come up with new solutions. Willingness to learn technical systems. If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Title: Expression of Interest: Business Analyst
Description: Fingerprint for Success  helps the world’s best workplaces, including Canva, Athena and Baraja find, hire and nurture talent. Companies  that hire through us include: Canva Baraja Athena R3i Ventures & more In preparation for our hiring partners’ current and future hiring needs, we are taking expressions of interest for the  Business Analyst  role to help them find the right people! About you Possess the following attributes: Grit, Desire to Learn, Collaboration, Passion, Thrive in Ambiguity Previous experience working in a startup/scaleup environment is preferred but not required Ability to wear multiple hats - jump, flex and pivot at the drop of a hat A great attitude. The right attitude towards a sense of urgency, risk, and uncertainty about the future that comes with working at a startup Application To register your interest fill in your details and  complete the work-style assessment  that will be emailed to you. If your motivations and traits match our hiring partners’ needs, they’ll get in touch directly. About F4S F4S helps companies discover talent, beyond just their resumes. Through our motivations and traits assessment, we help people find roles that they enjoy and excel in and help companies find great candidates. “We’ve been using F4S since Oct 2017, and have implemented it across our entire organization in onboarding, as well as when forming new teams to help us understand our team and dynamic between them” - Melanie Perkins,  CEO Canva

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: For this role you will be placed in the CBO office to provide support to the Chief Business Officer/ VP of Business for doing financial modeling, investment analysis, and corporate development projects. Additionally, you will be in charge of driving selected project initiatives that are assigned by CBO / VP Business. Min. 3 years of relevant experience as an Investment Analyst and/or Corporate Development is also essential that you are comfortable working in a fast-paced and ambiguous environment in driving the initiatives. Job Description Corporate Development project such as Investment analysis, M&A and fundraising projects, etc Gain understanding on detailed financial aspects of our BU; able to determine commercial implications for any initiatives within and beyond our BU Be accountable for team's analysis and decision in response to business performance (i.e. course-correct actions proposed) Obtain buy-in from other divisions in providing elements identified as specified in rigorous business requirements Lead coordination with over division team, response and counter move on competitor's strategy Use judgment to balance between enjoying immediate business results vs. investing for future growth in business prioritization Design and decide short-term solution as workaround in order not to burden the current business environment and priorities Manage multiple projects; manage dependencies & influence stakeholders; develop action plan Provide recommendation on improvement & operational guideline Drive and execute new initiatives that are still at incubation stage, with close supervision of CBO/ VP Business. Requirements Min. bachelor degree in Business Management, Finance, or STEM fields from top local or overseas universities with strong record of academic results, Master’s Degree or MBA is a plus Minimum 3 years of working experience as analyst at Investment Banking or corporate development at Management Consulting. Experience as corporate strategy/development in a fast-growing tech startup is a plus Financially sound, with proven ability to develop complex financial models and projection with sensitivity analysis Excellent analytical and problem solving skills, with proven ability to identify root causes and potential remedies for corrective or preventive actions Good communication skill in Bahasa and English is required A quick and passionate learner to absorb new knowledge in the dynamic industry and take the learnings to the next level, bringing tangible business impacts Possess a strong drive to make things happen and making the world better through technology Based in Jakarta Connect with Us Make yourself updated with Cakap & Cakap Squad activities by follow our social media at:  Instagram: @lifeatcakap @cakapcom  Twitter : @cakapcom  Tiktok : @cakapcom  LinkedIn: Cakap

Description: To identify client needs and business process to be able to provide excellent solution and consultancy services Responsible for transforming business requirements into functional specifications and for ensuring that requirements are complete and well understood Will assist his/her senior in conducting SIT and UAT Must be able to create project documentation Intiate and participate in pro-active support activities with the aim of increasing customer satisfaction levels and reducing re-occuring incidents

Title: Sr. Product Analyst, Risk
Description: Our Sr. Product Analyst - Risk will be responsible to support the Risk team by researching and providing a clear analysis of product initiatives. You will be our strongest advocate for making data-first decisions. The perfect candidate should have a strong background in team work and using data to drive the decision-making process. About the job: Research and analysis of the landscape, customers, product metrics, and latest internet trends to identify and fill product gaps Generate new ideas that grow market share, improve customer experience and drive growth and conversion Write product specs, evaluate pros and cons and conduct what-if scenario analysis Translate product strategy into detailed requirements and prototypes. Scope and prioritize activities based on business and customer impact Work closely with engineering, marketing and operations to scope and implement new features Leadership ability to manage a team of analysts About you: At least 3 years of experience as a data analyst or product manager or programmer in a startup environment Solid technical background  (SQL is a must)  with understanding and/or hands-on experience in software development Extremely strong communication skills and comfortable to communicate in English Strong intuition for user behavior Ability to develop product and marketing strategies Excellent analytical and problem solving skills Self-starter with strong project management skills to follow through on execution

Description: Experienced using Office, SQL, SQL Server Accustomed to querying, making reports and presentations Requirements management and analysis capabilities Business Process Modeling Communication and negotiation

Title: Assistant Finance Manager â€“ Marketing & Sales
Description: CORE WORK ACTIVITIES Maintaining Marketing & Sales Finance Goals Accounting and Reporting Assists Director of Finance (DOF) with Period, Quarter and Year-end closing procedures. Review balance sheet accounts for M&S units. Responsible for period-end variance analysis for the assigned M&S Units. Prepare BUVAR reports for the assigned M&S Units. Prepare management incentive & commission calculations Planning and Analysis Prepare and manage forecast/budget/LRP for the assigned M&S Units. Assist in developing/improving planning model/tool. Review the periodic compensation plans. Prepare ad hoc analysis as per business needs on specific projects. Manage cross-functional projects. Internal Controls Assist in streamlining and improving processes to improve control and efficiency Assist in aligning accounting policies, SOPs and practices across Sites Marketing & Sales Support Monitor and control project budgets, commitments and final costs Respond to and where applicable, solve issues on business requests People Management Provides direction, guidance and coaching to business partners Be an Ambassador for the Finance (M&S) Performance Management and Associate Relations Share relevant, timely information to help others understand and support business objectives. Clearly state expectations and provide necessary guidance and resources when assigning responsibilities. Leverage on the unique talents of associates. Work with associates to identify barriers to success and develop action plans to overcome them; introduce new perspectives to associates to stimulate positive performance. Sustain a work environment that focuses on fair and equitable treatment of associates. Maintain effective associate communication channels; Speak clearly and articulately with individuals and groups; adopt an open-door policy to acknowledge associate problems or concerns in a timely manner. Recognise and celebrate team successes. Encourage others to share their points of view. Actively listen and respond to associates. Deliver constructive feedback with sensitivity to others’ feelings. Share knowledge, innovations and best practices with associates. Serve as a personal role model of the change expected of other associates. Additional Responsibilities Perform analysis on an ad hoc basis as required by the business. It is foreseeable that this job could take on more duties as the company grows, in the area of analysis or general accounting. Provides information to supervisors, co-workers, and subordinates by telephone, in written form, e-mail, or in person. Informs and/or updates the executives, the peers and the subordinates on relevant information in a timely manner. Provide direction and assistance to other organizational units regarding accounting and budgeting policies and procedures, and efficient control and utilization of financial resources. Creates written and verbal presentations effectively. Listens and responds to associate's needs. Demonstrates a high level of professionalism at all times. CANDIDATE PROFILE The education, experience, skills and attributes important for this position are: Degree in Accounting or Finance with at least 5 years of relevant working experience. Financial Analyst or FP&A experience preferred. Experience with US Multi-National Corporation preferred. Strong Excel skill is required (Advanced Level). Able to build and maintain excellent rapport with all levels of associates. A team player with ability to collaborate with senior management, functional departments and external partners. Motivated self-starter, resourceful and independent. Strong analytical, problem-solving and decision-making skills. Effective conflict management skills. Well-organised and capable of managing multiple priorities effectively. Strong business integrity and holds sensitive information in confidence. Understands and possesses the ability to work in a multi-cultural environment. Proficient in Microsoft Office applications. MANAGEMENT COMPETENCIES Leadership Professional Demeanor - Exhibiting behavioral styles that convey confidence and command respect from others; making a good first impression and representing Marriott in alignment with its values. Problem Solving and Decision Making - Identifying and understanding issues, problems, and opportunities; obtaining and comparing information from different sources to draw conclusions, develop and evaluate alternatives and solutions, solve problems, and choose a course of action. Adaptability - Maintaining performance level under pressure or when experiencing changes or challenges in the workplace.  Managing Execution Driving for Results - Setting high standards of performance for self and/or others; assuming responsibility for work objectives; initiating, focusing, and monitoring the efforts of self and/or others toward the accomplishment goals; proactively taking action and going beyond what is required Building and Contributing to Teams - Leading and participating as a member of a team to move toward the completion of common goals while fostering cohesion and collaboration among team members. Building Relationships Coworker Relationships - Interacting with others in a way that builds openness, trust, and confidence in the pursuit of organizational goals and lasting relationships.  Customer Relationships - Developing and sustaining relationships based on an understanding of customer needs and actions consistent with Marriott's Spirit to Serve. Fostering Inclusion - Supporting associates with diverse styles, abilities, motivations, and/or cultural perspectives; leveraging personal differences to achieve objectives; and promoting a work environment where all associates are given the opportunity to contribute to their full potential. Generating Talent and Organizational Capability Talent Management - Providing guidance and feedback to help individuals develop and strengthen skills and abilities needed to accomplish work objectives. Learning and Applying Personal Expertise Technical Acumen - Understanding and utilizing professional skills and knowledge in a specific functional area to conduct and manage everyday business operations and generate innovative solutions to approach function-specific work challenges. Auditing and Reconciliation - The ability to recognize, research, and resolve discrepancies in financial data, and create flow charts on main accounting and control cycles (A/R, AP, Cash) to facilitate understanding of key control points. General Finance and Accounting - The ability to perform bookkeeping procedures, proficiently use financial systems technology, and accurately complete general ledger entries; knowledge of database structures in order to obtain financial queries; establish Cash flow statements and cash flow forecast with a good understanding the financials flows and the working capital needs. Analysis - The ability to create and maintain spreadsheets as well as analyze and summarize financial data using appropriate financial software. Accounting Knowledge - Knowledge of general accounting principles and current company accounting policies and procedures. This includes general accounting and financial reporting, auditing, accounts payable, and accounts receivable. Accounting and Internal Control Knowledge - Knowledge of local Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (local GAAP), Marriott International Policies (MIP), and International Standard Operating Procedures (ISOPs). Auditing Skills - The ability to perform auditing procedures, including the ability to recognize, research, and resolve discrepancies in financial data. Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable - Knowledge of Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable processes, including knowledge of subledger reconciliation and controls. Basic Competencies - Fundamental competencies required for accomplishing basic work activities. Basic Computer Skills - Using basic computer hardware and software (e.g., personal computers, word processing software, Internet browsers, etc.). Mathematical Reasoning - The ability to add, subtract, multiply, or divide quickly, correctly, and in a way that allows one to solve work-related issues. Oral Comprehension - The ability to listen to and understand information and ideas presented through spoken words and sentences. Reading Comprehension - Understanding written sentences and paragraphs in work related documents. Writing - Communicating effectively in writing as appropriate for the needs of the audience. Marriott Vacations Worldwide is an equal opportunity employer committed to hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive culture.

Title: Commercial Finance Analyst NC - Business Partner
Description: BAT is evolving at pace - truly like no other organization. To achieve the ambition, we have set for ourselves, we are looking for colleagues who are ready to live our ethos every day. Come be a part of this journey! Job Title Commercial Finance Analyst – NC  Function Finance Reports to Assistant Manager Commercial Finance – NC Geographic Scope  Local What You Will Be Accountable For Supporting forecast and actualization tracker for review on Marketing Investment Budget and utilization for New Category Supporting periodic closing exercise (monthly, biannually, annually), including but not limited to raising journal, prepare PL closing report, and reconciliation on the reporting submission Collaborate with e-Commerce team on Consumer Phasing Promo monitoring Collaborate with Trade team on validation for trade operational cost Supporting day-to-day operational processes and collaboration with relevant marketing business partners Collaborate with relevant finance & shared service stakeholder on forecast and closing purposes Ensuring compliance with all relevant internal and SOX controls WORKING RELATIONSHIP Internal Finance Business partners collaborate to provide end to end finance delivery for end markets Develop effective relationships with Finance, Marketing and other internal peers/colleagues, external stakeholders  Improve working relationship and performance with Shared Services Finance Internal Auditors – to respond to queries and requests for information. External External Auditors – to respond to queries and requests for information Essential Experience, Skills And Knowledge Candidate must possess a bachelor’s degree in Accounting/Finance (minimum 2 years working experience in audit, accounting, or commercial finance are favourable, but fresh graduates are welcome) Strong analytical and interpersonal skills and the ability to influence Rational decision making / problem solving Continuous improvement and able to challenge the status quo. Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint Professional qualification such as ACCA, CFA, CPA, CIMA are favourable Fluency and advanced oral & written communication ability in English and Indonesia WE ARE BAT At BAT we are committed to our Purpose of creating A Better Tomorrow. This is what drives our people and our passion for innovation.  See what is possible for you at BAT. Global Top Employer with 53,000 BAT people across more than 180 markets Brands sold in over 200 markets, made in 44 factories in 42 countries Newly established Tech Hubs building world-class capabilities for innovation in 4 strategic locations Diversity leader in the Financial Times and International Women’s Day Best Practice winner Seal Award winner – one of 50 most sustainable companies BELONGING, ACHIEVING, TOGETHER Collaboration, diversity and teamwork underpin everything we do here at BAT. We know that collaborating with colleagues from different backgrounds is what makes us stronger and best prepared to meet our business goals.  Come bring your difference!

Title: Mill Business Analyst Manager
Description: Key responsibilities: Basic Control & reporting To finalize month-end closing for distribution and mill cost and present result to management team. To prepare monthly mill variance analysis. To prepared weekly & monthly report which related to mill e.g. Waste report, maintenance report, energy report, production output, write off report & Mill performance matrix with KPIs. To drive strong control over inventory, expenses and balance sheet. Adherence to all Corporate Financial Instruction (CFI). To support Cost Benefits Analysis which related to distribution and mill cost. To highlight and manage potential financial risk and opportunity to top management. Writeoff control and setting right process to identify well in advance specially during changes Analytics and Business Partnering Working closely with Mill team to identify cost saving project ( ECS), track delivery and work to build pipeline. Drive strong review mechanism with Supply Chain leadership so there is clear assessment of variance of budget and develop corrective plan. Analysis of distribution and mill cost and drive efficiency Benchmarking of cost with other KC countries and with companies in Indonesia ( basis public available data). Capital investment justifications, e.g., Payback, Net Present Value (NPV) & Internal Rate of Return (IRR). To prepare annual & quarter budgeting and forecasting for manufacturing accounts (COGS level) & distribution cost. Inventory analysis and optimization Key Requirements: Min. Bachelor of Accounting/Finance/Business Management with an excellent academic report Min. 4 years of experiences in the same field (Manufacture Company/FMCG) Excellent analytical skill Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal Excellent in Ms. Excel (advanced formulas, pivot tables, and charts) Hands-on experience with accounting software and statistical

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Core Responsibilities : Build from scratch and maintain a data warehouse system Interpretation, preparation and mapping of complex financial data and explaining complex technical information Data Warehouse concept from many approach Designing and developing code, scripts, and data pipelines that leverage structured and unstructured data integration from multiple sources Active involvement in the development of functional/industry practices;  Provide solution implementation assistance as required;  Provide solutions and options where business requirements misalign with systems operations and functionality; Design and implement governance, process improvements, automated processes, optimized data delivery and revamp infrastructure for larger scalability Support on-time, error-free, delivery of projects through the optimal design and configuration of relevant MIS Data Warehouse functionalities. Ensure appropriate support and new development documentation for the team is followed (i.e. scope, design, test plans, issues and cutover lists, project plans etc.) Must Have Criterias : Have experience min 2 years prior as MIS Datawarehouse in Banking or Financial Industry Environment Having good knowledge about Data Warehouse concept, Business Intelligence Concept, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, and Java technologies Understanding and experience with ETL methodologies, Business Intelligence and data warehousing principles, approaches, technologies Possesses good oral and written communication skills as well as good interpersonal skills Solid experience in managing cloud services (preferable GCP or other cloud solution providers such as AWS, Azure, or AliCloud) Understanding of SQL Server, PostgreSQL, BigQuery, or NoSQL databases and good knowledge for SQL command and other manipulation tools Self-starter person, continuous improvement, and a team player member Others : Personality wise Soft skills/personality - culture fit: can work under pressure, down to earth, good attitude, good communication, challenges oriented and always want to learn more.

Title: Senior Analyst (Flights team, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
Description: About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED) About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to Know our Team: Agoda first started selling air tickets in late 2019; we are currently looking to grow the commercial team in North Asia to help grow our young Flights business into a market leader in APAC. As part of the Flights Team, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day to day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met. We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business. The Opportunity:  As a Senior Analyst, you will report directly to the Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Flight Commercial Team members within Agoda. You will have the opportunity to be part of an exciting and brand new team and new business vertical for Agoda and have the rare opportunity of joining a ‘start-up’ within an established company. In this Role, you’ll get to : Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‘right questions’, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output) Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations What you’ll Need to Succeed : 5+ years of experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy Bachelor’s degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance) Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, SQL, Tableau (preferably), Python, R, or similar A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.) Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business A hacker’s mindset – the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources Experience utilizing Python for Automation Knowledge of Pandas and other associated analytical packages An advanced level of SQL including parallel computation approaches (i.e. Spark) Tableau/other BI visualization experience It’s Great if you Have:  MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance) Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment interesting stories to government institutions and related industrial stakeholders, and national and local media to achieve strong visibility in print, broadcast, TV and online media outlets Ensure compliance for all acts towards company and government regulation Manage and settle all industrial issues Updating company regulation to assure compliance Conduct regular global survey/EES to measure engagement Identify and exploit media trends, hypes, news cycles and opportunities Analyze and measure results of external Government Relations and Public Relations activity Comprehension for compliance policy in OJK and Bank Indonesia Requirements Bachelor Degree in marketing communications, public relations, journalism or equivalent relevant experience Minimum 4 years of experience working in the journalism and finance technology industry Experience in managing Government/PR events, Press Releases, Government and Media Events/Gathering, and Media visits Working knowledge of compliance policy in OJK and Bank Indonesia Strong network and relationship with general business, media contacts, entertainment trade press/analyst/blogger communities, and particularly with business media houses Proven success in both traditional and interactive PR channel Strong-sense of teamwork and ability to both manage and execute programs Fluent in English & Bahasa along with solid writing skills (writing samples will be required upon receipt of resume) If this sounds like you, please apply!

Title: Coordinator - Sales/Marketing Support
Description: Position Summary The Sales/Marketing Support Coordinator is a flexible resource that is charged with performing support activities to the selling process, pricing administration and product marketing tool development and maintenance. Sales support includes distribution of selling plans to outside sales team, consumables contract facilitation and specific market analysis. Plans, coordinates, and manages the execution of various projects related to pricing support with the product management team, including the active management of the Contact and Indenting (C&I) portfolio. Job Responsibilities  Holds responsibility for parts and consumable pricing – all products (excluding Equipment & Accessories).  Analyze market pricing strategies to determine best practices in terms of management and maintenance.  Enter pricing for all parts and consumables in SAP, including Customer Specials, retain process documentation and approvals.  Administer new part number requests for all parts and consumables.  Coordinate product and pricing updates to external resources.  Provide sales support and general product management for (C & I) products.  Drive customer satisfaction and retention through emails, surveys, phone calls.  Coordinate product launches for small items, or changed items, including publication of product bulletins.  Help P/M create sales tools, such as data pages and calculators.  Work with P/M on cost management in SAP.  Help P/M communicate end of life products and wean obsolete products from product line and inventory.  Backup customer service as required (cover phones, enter orders, resolve issues). Qualifications / Requirements  High degree of proficiency in MS Office Suite, Outlook & Internet applications.  Strong analytical, prioritizing, interpersonal, problem-solving, presentation, budgeting, project management (from conception to completion), & planning skills.  Strong verbal and written communication skills (including analysis, interpretation, & reasoning).  Solid understanding and application of mathematical concepts.  Ability to develop and maintain collaborative relationships with peers and colleagues across the organization, as well as, internal and external clients.  Ability to work well autonomously and within a team in a fast-paced and deadline-oriented environment.  Ability to work with and influence peers and management.  Self-motivated with critical attention to detail, deadlines and reporting. PHYSICAL ASPECTS / WORK ENVIRONMENT  Regularly required to stand; walk; sit; and talk, hear and see.  Regularly/Occasionally lift and/or move up to 10 pounds  Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals to perform the essential functions. Saueressig is a provider of premium rotogravure solutions and part of SGK. SGK is a global leader in the design of high performance marketing ecosystems, the creation of content that scales consumer experiences with brands, and the integration of technologies to enable collaborative digital networks. SGK is a Matthews International company. http://saueressig.com/en/ At Matthews International, what makes us different is what makes us great. We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need.

Senior Business Intelligence Analyst (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
Description: About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to Know Our Team The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward. The Opportunity In this role as  Business Intelligence Analyst , you will be  working alongside of Data Architects and business stakeholders to enable the Customer Experience Group (CEG) department  of Agoda with actionable data to drive better decision making. You will be integral in the design and implementation of reliable, performant and scale-able data intelligence solution to overall improve our data warehouse architecture, business intelligence reporting, data automation solutions and data product developments. In This Role, You’ll Get to  Understand business requirements, analyze large data sets for patterns, visualize results in dashboards and presentations, develop data mart solutions, improve efficiency by automating business processes and become subject matter expert for CEG department Support Product Owners across all experimentation stages to assist in the ideation of new product ideas, implement Title: Marketing and Communications Coordinator â€“ Indonesia
Description: Are you a ‘can do’ person? Someone who can juggle marketing tasks with ease? Do you have a growth mindset and are keen to learn? Beca Digital Beca Digital is moving into a significant stage of growth, working with our clients to solve real world and unique problems. We develop and deliver exciting and cost-effective software solutions to leading local and international organisations to help them overcome their challenges. CAPEXinsights, one of our flag-ship software solutions, supports capital project and portfolio management teams to optimise their capital investment. Designed to take the pain out of managing a capital portfolio, it supports business leaders, finance teams, and project engineers to manage both small and large projects. Although wholly owned by Beca, in many ways CAPEXinsights runs as a separate business, with teams in New Zealand, Australia, Indonesia, Singapore and the Netherlands. From here we support our existing and potential customers headquartered in Europe, America and Australia. The Opportunity Reporting to the Marketing Manager for CAPEXinsights, you’ll coordinate the marketing and communication activities, in collaboration with stakeholders, to raise the brand internationally. Responsibilities Include Social Media Marketing  Maintain, coordinate and schedule content for the CAPEXinsights LinkedIn Page   Work with our copywriter to generate content   Research industry news and identify cross-promotional opportunities   Conduct content marketing analysis  Event Management  Coordinate online events in collaboration with stakeholders   Oversee the event planning process   Manage cross-channel communication to promote events   Collate attendee data for insights  Lead Generation  Support and coordinate digital marketing campaigns   Oversee and schedule Industry Insights newsletter using ActiveCampaign   Assist with event planning   Assist in generating automated digital touchpoints in prospect buying journey  Asset Maintenance  Work with design team to create graphics, infographics and images to support content   Create social media assets using Canva   Maintain and update CAPEXinsights sales assets   Maintain consistency of messaging and sustain SEO keywords in content  Initially this will be a 6-month contract, with the possibility to extend or become a permanent position for the right candidate. This is a full-time role, commencing immediately. As we are a team across geographies, flexible working hours will be required. About You You are self-driven with excellent communication skills and sound knowledge of marketing principles. You will have experience with marketing technology and an affinity for digital marketing. Ideally you would have some understanding of the B2B sales cycle in the technology sector. You Will Have  Excellent communication skills and be fluent in English   Minimum 2 years of marketing experience   Knowledge of LinkedIn   A love of learning and able to work independently   Can run projects and coordinate with different stakeholders   Flexible hours required  Ideally You Would Have  Some understanding of the B2B buyers journey   Experience working in technology sector   Basic technical understanding of digital marketing   Knowledge of ActiveCampaign, Canva, Looker Studio, Tag Manager, Google Analytics or similar   A love of capital projects and portfolios!  This is an exciting opportunity to work within a dynamic and evolving part of our business and will suit someone who is motivated to learn about marketing a global software product and supporting the team with the coordination of our marketing strategy. About Beca Beca is one of the largest employee-owned professional services consultancies in the Asia-Pacific region. Our team of 3000-plus is diverse enough to bring a wide range of perspectives and expertise to every client and challenge, creating resourceful, smart solutions from our collective experience and insights. The CAPEXinsights team are fun and friendly, with an approach of high trust and support. We encourage everyone to have a voice, while creating opportunities to grow and develop. Enjoy assisting to pioneer the growth strategy of a global software solution, while also being part of a leading professional services consultancy in Asia Pacific. Ready to make the move? / Apply now If you want to make everyday better, apply online today! To find out more about Beca visit beca.com To find out more about CAPEXinsights visit CAPEXinsights.com Beca prides itself on supporting a diverse and inclusive culture – open to inputs from creative people of all genders, ethnicity, identity, thought and experiences

Description: About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED) About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to Know our Team: Agoda first started selling air tickets in late 2019; we are currently looking to grow the commercial team in North Asia to help grow our young Flights business into a market leader in APAC. As part of the Flights Team, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day to day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met. We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business. The Opportunity:  As a Senior Analyst, you will report directly to the Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Flight Commercial Team members within Agoda. You will have the opportunity to be part of an exciting and brand new team and new business vertical for Agoda and have the rare opportunity of joining a ‘start-up’ within an established company. In this Role, you’ll get to : Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‘right questions’, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output) Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations What you’ll Need to Succeed : 5+ years of experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy Bachelor’s degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance) Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, SQL, Tableau (preferably), Python, R, or similar A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.) Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business A hacker’s mindset – the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources Experience utilizing Python for Automation Knowledge of Pandas and other associated analytical packages An advanced level of SQL including parallel computation approaches (i.e. Spark) Tableau/other BI visualization experience It’s Great if you
