Specific responsibilities include reporting metrics, analyzing methodologies, suggesting operation improvements, and building proposal evaluations in a cross-functional environment.    Responsibilities Evaluating business processes, anticipating requirements, uncovering areas for improvement, and developing and implementing solutions Leading ongoing reviews of business processes and developing optimization strategies Performing requirements analysis Documenting and communicating Requirements, Analysis & User Acceptance Test Effectively communicating insights and plans to cross-functional team members and management Gathering critical information from meetings with various stakeholders and producing useful reports Ensuring solutions meet business needs and requirements. Performing user acceptance testing Prioritizing initiatives based on business needs and requirements Maintain a competitive market knowledge Qualifications A bachelor’s degree in business or related field or an MBA. A minimum of 5 years’ experience in Business Analysis in Multi-Finance Industries (Other financial industries such as Banking, BPR are also welcome) Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills. The ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine acceptable solutions. Excellent documentation skills. Fundamental analytical and conceptual thinking skills. Experience creating detailed reports and giving presentations. Fluency in Microsoft Office suite (Outlook, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, etc.) Strong written, verbal and collaboration skills

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Job responsibilities:  Operate as a business generalist, working with the founders on several priority initiatives across planning, product, go-to-market and operations  Gather and analyze business requirements to identify solutions for capturing new opportunities, addressing business challenges or improving operational processes and procedures  Develop financial models to evaluate the financial impact of proposed solutions  Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure that solutions are aligned with company objectives  Develop and maintain business processes, procedures, and workflows  Conduct market research to identify trends and opportunities in the financial technology industry.  Communicate project status and results to stakeholders  Identify areas for process improvement and provide recommendations to management  Work with product and technology teams to develop and implement new solutions Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Economics, or a related field  Minimum 2 years of experience in consulting or in-house strategy/ CEO office team of startups or corporates  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills  Strong business acumen  Experience in developing financial models and conducting market research  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills  Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment  Knowledge of financial technology or banking is a plus  Strong project management skills and ability to work with cross-functional teams

Title: Trade Compliance Operations Senior Analyst
Description: Want to build a stronger, more sustainable future and cultivate your career? Join Cargill's global team of 155,000 employees who use new technologies, dynamic insights and over 154 years of experience to connect farmers with markets, customers with ingredients, and people and animals with the food they need to thrive. Job Purpose and Impact The Trade Compliance Operations Senior Analyst will perform a range of moderate-to-complex activities using comprehensive trade compliance operations knowledge. Using independent, critical problem-solving skills, you'll collaborate with internal and external business partners to drive continuous improvement. Key Accountabilities Coordinate and process the execution of global trade compliance operations activities, and pre/post transactional audits and trade data to ensure data integrity, adherence to processes, control effectiveness and compliant performance.  Manage and ensure Customs Clearance process / activities as per SLA, KPI designed.  Ensures pre-transaction regulatory requirements are fulfilled, using a substantial knowledge and understanding of global trade compliance operations practices and procedures.  Applies substantial understanding of global trade compliance operations practices and procedures to ensure compliant execution of cross border transactions.  Ensures that global trade operations procedures are supported by proper due diligence demonstrating reasonable care.  Utilizing a thorough understanding of trade compliance laws, regulations, practices and procedures, and work with country Manager / Area Lead and Compliance excellence team to resolve issues.  Apply and maintain trade compliance operations strategy, implement and maintain trade compliance standards and best practice processes to operationalize corporate policies and risk control frameworks to comply with Government laws and regulations including those administered by the participating government agencies.  Implements and monitor on day today activity global trade operations and compliance processes, “SOP”, and other compliance-related activities.  Collaborates with the different teams and functions to facilitate the execution the businesses global trade activities, focusing on compliance with both the foreign trade regulations and operational efficiencies.  Develop a relationship with local governmental agencies in the respective country, in cooperation with appropriate functional areas and our brokers, facilitating a free flow of our goods through the borders, including the use of Key Performance Indicators (KPI) and regular internal report.  To monitor Customs Broker Key Performance Indicators (KPI) and compliance through regular interaction and running customs broker evaluation program as per designed.  Monitor and provide quarterly, bi-weekly and/or monthly metrics and reports.  Support Continuous Improvement initiatives.  Other duties as assigned.  Qualifications Minimum Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience Minimum 5 years’ experience in the areas of customs, import/export, operations Demonstrated ability to excel in ambiguous situations Proficient in Microsoft Office with expertise in Microsoft Excel Fluent English and local language in both written and verbal Highly collaborative – ability to excel in a team environment Self-starter – highly motivated with demonstrated initiative Preferred Qualifications Certified as Customs Declarant / Customs Broker License Experience with SAP and GTS (Global Trade Services) module Experience executing and ensuring trade compliance operations of Free Trade Agreement (FTA), Duty Draw Back and Free Trade Zone operations is a plus

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Job Description Conduct research and carry out data collection to understand the industry, market, user behaviors, and patterns. Identify problems within the business and recommend/implement SMART solutions. Assist departments and be the in-house consultant to understand their goals and build a system to help them make data-driven decisions and achieve goals (ie. tracking system of key metrics). Collect, organize, and interpret statistical information to make it useful to internal and external stakeholders. Perform analysis to assess and improve business performance. Prepare reports (mostly, but not limited to, in the form of presentation deck, email, word doc) based on analysis. Present findings to stakeholders and provide recommendations. Job Requirements Min. 3 years in any of these fields: data analytics/business analytics/statistics/management consulting. Familiarity with programming languages such as SQL, Oracle, Python. Must have a strong market and commercial awareness. Like challenges and have problem-solving skills; are curious to find the root/cause of problems. Ability to analyze, model, and interpret data.

Title: Business Analyst / ERP Implementer (Timika - Onsite)
Description: About Impact Impact is a technology and consulting company specializing in digital transformation with the vision to grow Indonesia's economy by helping businesses and the workforce through software, data, education, and community. We are a lean company (and will continue to be) with a flat organizational structure, yet we wish to maximize our impact for our nation and eventually the world. Therefore our philosophy is to be (and we are looking for people who are) data-driven, able to identify the real pain points (which is surprisingly hard), and can come up with out-of-the-box yet practical permanent solutions. Data, brainstorming, and research are essential to live what we preach, so people who are open-minded, goal-oriented, independent yet good team players, humble, and have clear vision and tenacity tend to fit us better. Somehow, people who care about social impact also tend to fit us better, although we still don’t know why. About The Role As a Business Analyst, you will be helping businesses with ERP consultation, implementation, and support. You will be involved in the initial requirement gathering, preparing documentation for software engineers, testing, training, and providing support for businesses. You will be helping businesses identify their business pain points, analyze data and provide data-driven suggestions on how they can move their businesses forward. The job may need you to work onsite at Timika - Papua province to provide training to clients. As our Business Analyst, you will be an integral part of our Business Consulting Team. You will help our clients transform their businesses by automating their business processes and helping them make data-driven business decisions. You will be in charge of analyzing their requirements and data, reporting metrics, suggesting operation improvements, and building proposal evaluations in a cross-functional environment to support business change and optimization. This role is suitable for you if you are looking to develop your skills both in business process optimization and business software. You will learn practical, hands-on experience (not just theories) since you will be exposed to business owners of small to medium-sized businesses. You will work in cross-functional teams and meet great people regularly from diverse backgrounds. We work in an open environment where there are no boundaries or power distance. Everyone is encouraged to speak their mind, propose ideas, influence others, and continuously grow themselves. Responsibilities Identify the requirement and propose a good alternative solution to client requirement Collaborate with cross-functional team to design and develop ERP/Odoo apps (new module development, customization) Develop new features and app that users care about Define features scope, bring a real value to the product Will be hands-on in ERP project integration, implementation and development Qualifications Min. Bachelor Graduate from Accounting or equivalent with min GPA of 3.5 Min. 1-2 years of experience in B2B tech market (for exp only) Willing to work onsite from Timika - Papua province Special interest in accounting and finance, business process optimization, and business software Detail oriented, curious, and proactive personality Strong sense of product ownership Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment What's Great About the Job? Diverse team - your team consist of people from across the country Interesting projects and people. Startup culture with direct coordination with C-level for objective and follow-ups. Large tech product and chances to learn large scope of knowledge. Support of a real usability and testing team. Great team of smart people, in a supportive, casual, and open working environment. Learn More About Us Visit our website impactfirst.co

Title: Talent Operations Analyst
Description: Key Responsibilities: Processes regular payroll information every week, as well as bonuses and off-cycle checks when necessary Keeps abreast of the payroll processing system and changes in wage/tax laws, and applies changes as appropriate Prepares follow-up for Stop Payment requests, manual check requests, and associated system updates Responds to questions regarding pay policies/procedures Enter and extract data from HRIS for reporting, compliance, and metrics purposes Requirements: 1-2 years of experience in Payroll, Accounting or related field Strong analytical skills and ability to interpret and present data Excellent communication and collaboration skills Proficiency with HRIS and other talent management systems.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Want to be a part of our team? Analyzes complex business problems to be solved with automated systems. Identifies gaps and provides technical expertise in business requirements for system functional specifications and scales new and current systems, processes and procedures in a cost effective manner. Configures system settings and options; plans and executes unit, integration and acceptance testing to meet business requirements. Designs details of automated systems. May provide consultation to users in the area of automated systems. May lead cross-functional linked teams to address business or systems issues. Working at NTT The Business Analyst’s key function is to work with internal and external clients to determine requirements and to define solutions to address complex business, process and systems problems, and improvements in the organization. They act as a liaison among stakeholders in order to understand the structure, policies, and operations of an organization, and to recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Act as a bridge between the business problems and the technology solutions.  Analyse, transform and ultimately resolve the business problems with the help of technology.  Work with internal clients and apply best practice methodologies to determine business requirements and to define solutions to address business, process, information and system problems, improvements or change.  Deliver business projects in line with sponsor requirements and enterprise architecture.  Proactive development and deployment of enhanced services and platforms, covering all the functional aspects from service/product definition through to build and deployment.  Ensure the identification and documentation of operational gaps including user guides, templates, test cases and related user training.  Assist with the resolution of issues pertaining to the service.  Adhere to and follow the relevant development and support processes.  Communicate and escalate if any issues arise or deliverables cannot be met and request assistance to ensure closure of issues.  Take responsibility for delivery of project elements with minimal supervision Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Broad understanding of business practices and processes Excellent team player who displays good client service orientation with well-developed administrative and organisation skills Deep expertise in specific systems, processes and technologies that they will be required to analyse Meticulous attention to detail whilst working under pressure Excellent verbal and written communication skills Ability to listen empathetically Ability to build rapport and engage effectively with a variety of stakeholders Knowledge of project management methodology Excellent analytical skills with the ability to convert business requirements into operational deliverables (functional requirements) to meet business objectives Excellent documentation skills, in particular, functional requirements, test cases, system user documentation, processes and procedures and presentations Very good working knowledge of Microsoft Exchange, Word, Excel Project, PowerPoint and Visio Understanding of systems generally used in a services organisation e.g. ServiceNow, Siebel, Remedy, SAP, EMS Title: Business Analyst
Description: JOB SUMMARY Position: Business Analyst Division: Analyst RESPONSIBILITIES: You will be working in the business and financial analysis Function reporting to the COO or VP of Finance. Your objectives will be to develop financial models and take over in the future from global consultant to lead financial analysis, including product development and manufacturing finance.   REQUIREMENTS: University Degree in Finance or Business Fluent in English At least 5 years experience in the automotive or consumer electronics industry in a variety of functions Worked as business/finance analyst of a period of at least 2 years Knowledge of 2W or 4W automotive industry Financials in Manufacturing and Launches (Understand Key financial indicators at BU/ Product level (EBIT, ROS, Gross Margin), Manages Project Budget (Capex, production tooling), and track, keep and reports Ramp Up costs and deviation) Strong communication skills with various levels Presentation skills to management Ability to complete tasks with minimal supervision, self driving Capable to liaise with international teams Experience in multi cultural setting

Title: Business Analyst
Description: This person will be directly reporting to Business Analyst Circle lead and also EVP Finance. He/She will have a great deal of exposure about the company’s businesses especially its flagship product, Tunaiku and Finance related matters. Will be involved in various stage of business process along with other team members and other functions. Due to the nature of the job, it is also expected that the team member is committed to the position Responsibilities Analyze the current processes Assist and coordinate with related parties in designing an effective and efficient workflow Implements and monitors the progress of development projects to ensure the smooth running of business and compliance within the industry environment. Collect data and analyze the Bank's performance, including financial reports, in accordance with predetermined deadlines Provide proposed solutions to improve the performance of a business process Establish communication and provide support to other work units in order to achieve effective cross-division cooperation Perform ad-hoc tasks requested by the supervisor Requirements 2-3 years working experience.  Experience in working in a team-oriented and collaborative environment. Experienced candidates is expected to have experience or exposure in the related field, experience in the fintech industry is a plus Analytics and detail-oriented are must. Eagerness to learn and share with others. Have good critical thinking and detail-oriented is a must Language proficiency: Bahasa and English. Strong in numbers is a plus point Bonus Point If Proficient in excel Familiar with BI tools such as Looker

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Core Responsibilities : Build from scratch and maintain a data warehouse system Interpretation, preparation and mapping of complex financial data and explaining complex technical information Data Warehouse concept from many approach Designing and developing code, scripts, and data pipelines that leverage structured and unstructured data integration from multiple sources Active involvement in the development of functional/industry practices;  Provide solution implementation assistance as required;  Provide solutions and options where business requirements misalign with systems operations and functionality; Design and implement governance, process improvements, automated processes, optimized data delivery and revamp infrastructure for larger scalability Support on-time, error-free, delivery of projects through the optimal design and configuration of relevant MIS Data Warehouse functionalities. Ensure appropriate support and new development documentation for the team is followed (i.e. scope, design, test plans, issues and cutover lists, project plans etc.) Must Have Criterias : Have experience min 2 years prior as MIS Datawarehouse in Banking or Financial Industry Environment Having good knowledge about Data Warehouse concept, Business Intelligence Concept, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, and Java technologies Understanding and experience with ETL methodologies, Business Intelligence and data warehousing principles, approaches, technologies Possesses good oral and written communication skills as well as good interpersonal skills Solid experience in managing cloud services (preferable GCP or other cloud solution providers such as AWS, Azure, or AliCloud) Understanding of SQL Server, PostgreSQL, BigQuery, or NoSQL databases and good knowledge for SQL command and other manipulation tools Self-starter person, continuous improvement, and a team player member Others : Personality wise Soft skills/personality - culture fit: can work under pressure, down to earth, good attitude, good communication, challenges oriented and always want to learn more.

Business Analyst
Description: Requirements Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology/System, Computer Science, Industrial Engineering, Accounting Have experience handle Implementation ERP system minimum for 1-2 years (Odoo or SAP system will be plus) Required skills: ERP Functional Knowledge and Business Process Having strong analytical, good documentation, writing skills, and knowledge of project management Have experience in managing multi-department implementation Willing to be placed at our Head Office, Jakarta Selatan Job Description Mapping user’s requirement with IT Team Work together with IT Developer to ensure smooth implementation both internal and external project  Create a detailed business analysis, outlining problems, opportunities and recommendations/ solutions for business users Analyze as-is and to-be processes to define system/technology/business requirements

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Engage broadly with stakeholder teams to structure and prioritize business problems where insights can have the biggest impact. Leverage data to understand our customers and our funnel in depth, identify areas of opportunity and execute projects to drive customer growth, retention, engagement, and/or revenue. Brainstorm on growth initiatives and assess their impact, efficacy and complexity. Utilize both non-technical tools and methods to implement growth initatives. Collaborate with Product, Marketing and Sales Operations teams to implement growth initiatives. Track and monitor metrics and KPIs of existing product and growth initiatives Self-organize under scrum methodology to collaborate and deliver features to customers﻿ Minimum Qualifications At least 3 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. At least 1 year experience in Financial Services industry Excellent in presentation skills Experience in analysing data to draw business-relevant conclusions and in data visualization techniques and tools Fluent in Excel / Google sheets, with a strong understanding of pivot tables, vlookups Complex project management work that has required you to work cross-functionally Ability to break down high level business problems into concrete analytical solutions Excellent communication skills with both technical and non-technical audiences Growth mindset, humility, and the burning desire to own your domain and your work Demonstrated focus on continuous improvement of code, systems, and processes through analysis and metrics Willing to work at Sunter, North Jakarta

Title: Mill Business Analyst Manager
Description: Key responsibilities: Basic Control & reporting To finalize month-end closing for distribution and mill cost and present result to management team. To prepare monthly mill variance analysis. To prepared weekly & monthly report which related to mill e.g. Waste report, maintenance report, energy report, production output, write off report & Mill performance matrix with KPIs. To drive strong control over inventory, expenses and balance sheet. Adherence to all Corporate Financial Instruction (CFI). To support Cost Benefits Analysis which related to distribution and mill cost. To highlight and manage potential financial risk and opportunity to top management. Writeoff control and setting right process to identify well in advance specially during changes Analytics and Business Partnering Working closely with Mill team to identify cost saving project ( ECS), track delivery and work to build pipeline. Drive strong review mechanism with Supply Chain leadership so there is clear assessment of variance of budget and develop corrective plan. Analysis of distribution and mill cost and drive efficiency Benchmarking of cost with other KC countries and with companies in Indonesia ( basis public available data). Capital investment justifications, e.g., Payback, Net Present Value (NPV) & Internal Rate of Return (IRR). To prepare annual & quarter budgeting and forecasting for manufacturing accounts (COGS level) & distribution cost. Inventory analysis and optimization Key Requirements: Min. Bachelor of Accounting/Finance/Business Management with an excellent academic report Min. 4 years of experiences in the same field (Manufacture Company/FMCG) Excellent analytical skill Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal Excellent in Ms. Excel (advanced formulas, pivot tables, and charts) Hands-on experience with accounting software and statistical

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Core Responsibilities : To conduct and understand requirements studies with prospects and customers To propose suitable and specifications that address customers' and prospects' needs To present, explain, and up sell our products and solutions to customers/prospects To propose proper scope of work to install and implement the proposed products and solutions to customers/prospects, principals, and suppliers Work closely with sales team to ensure deals are closed Must Have Criterias : Bachelors degree from IT/Computer Science Experience in query & regulatory reporting is a must Understanding and experience developing ETL tools or ETL concepts Capable to work under pressure Able to work as a team and independently Will be placed in Jakarta/Tangerang Others : Can source the candidates from Operations Regulatory in Bank Personality wise Soft skills/personality - culture fit: can work under pressure, down to earth, good attitude, good communication, challenges oriented and always want to learn more.

Title: ITSM Business Analyst (Support)
Description: iZeno was founded in 2003 to provide enterprises with custom-built technology solutions they need to keep their business running seamlessly. Logicalis Asia, part of the Logicalis Group, a leading international IT solutions and managed services provider, has acquired a majority stake in iZeno, a company specializing in digital transformation, application modernisation, DevOps, customer experience and hybrid cloud solutions. With a team of 120+ in-house innovators, we have delivered over 500 Enterprise Solutions, implemented, and optimized to enable smarter insights. Our team draws on industry experiences in accomplishing a portfolio of mission-critical applications, integrating Cloud, CRM, Data Analytics, and other leading technologies with our clients' existing IT frameworks. With a leading presence in the region, headquartered in Singapore and operations in Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Philippines, no project is too complex for us, and our team is always ready for a new challenge.  Job Responsibilities Collaboratively work with customers, project team members, and partners in defining and documenting business requirements Work with the delivery team on Quality Assurance activities Work with customers and the project team to troubleshoot and resolve issues Provide managed support to customers Work on 24×7 support (non-shift), weekly rotational basis Job Requirements Bachelor Degree in Business Studies/Business Analysis or equivalent Minimum 5 years of experience in Business Analysis in a software professional services organization Ability to cut through ambiguity to identify core issues Strong understanding of enterprise software and enterprise software implementation projects Strong experience with business process definition and design History of successful project completion for projects where you have worked on the requirements Familiar with project management and/or other tracking tools Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines Excellent communicator (written and verbal) with the ability to facilitate and lead requirements sessions with business users, IT, and management Goal-driven, self-starter, able to thrive in a fast-paced environment ITIL v4 certification preferred ITSM system (e.g. Jira Service Management) implementation experience is beneficial What We Have To Offer An exciting job with latest technology Continuous training & development of soft and hard skills A competitive salary, inline with your profile A package of benefits including healthcare insurance Hybrid working arrangement with opportunity to work from home 9 days per month An awesome team of colleagues & regular team building activities The ability to work with the world’s leading companies in technology and innovation An environment where we embrace openness, transparency and grab every opportunity to have fun, while always doing what is right for our customers and partners.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Are you an early achiever looking to join a team of like-minded individuals and make a difference in the financial technology industry? Indepay | Setara Networks is the place for you! We are a fast-paced start-up, and we're seeking highly skilled Business Analysts who are committed to building a culture of excellence and helping us take our company to the next level. As part of our team, you'll work alongside other early achievers who put in a lot of effort and support each other to become the best versions of themselves. We believe in fostering a work environment that encourages risk-taking, innovation, and collaboration. As a Business Analyst, you'll be responsible for identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, managing existing client accounts, and executing customized account strategies. You'll need to have excellent analytical, written, and verbal communication skills, and be able to work independently while collaborating with cross-functional teams. At Indepay | Setara Networks, we're well ahead of our competitors, and we're looking for individuals who are passionate about economic financial modeling, big picture thinking, and taking Indonesia forward. We're building a team of early achievers who are committed to being unique in our strengths and supporting each other to achieve our goals. If you have experience working in similar startups in Series A stage and beyond, and you're a born leader who enjoys building new things, we invite you to apply to be part of our rocketship. Responsibilities Build and manage relationships with clients and stakeholders Lead the accounts and sales plan for allocated accounts Execute customized account strategy to increase revenue and market share for strategic partner accounts Identify strategic opportunities for the company's capabilities through a strong understanding of segments, customer business needs, and leveraging solutions across all product platforms Develop, negotiate and sign proposals by working closely with internal stakeholders and strategic partner executives Proactively educate strategic partners about Indepay Platform on Partner development and market opportunities Work with cross-functional teams across marketing, product, market research, and technology to achieve business objectives Deliver presentations to key stakeholders Track performance against objectives Requirements Bachelor's degree or equivalent with 2+ years of business development experience Financial services/payments industry experience preferred Team-oriented and collaborative, with the ability to work in a complex and ambiguous environment Must be comfortable working in an early stage to growth stage company and should be able to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced environment. Have a proven track record of success in previous roles and have worked in a similar setting, such as a Pre series A-B company will be a plus A leader who takes fun in taking risks and understands that taking calculated risks is necessary for growth. They should have the ability to balance risk-taking with sound decision-making to build something innovative and groundbreaking Proven ability to partner, communicate, and manage through multiple disciplines and organizational groups Demonstrated track record of implementing strategic initiatives Experience “managing up” building executive-level communications and delivering presentations  Skills: Analytical and data-driven approach in day-to-day work Ability to work well under pressure and deliver on commitments Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, and can think outside the box to proactively provide the right solution Good communication skills and the ability to impact and influence Strategic thinker who understands business opportunities to create a competitive advantage Keen eye for detail and ability to multi-task with excellent time management and prioritization skills Positive attitude and determination to succeed against all odds Hands-on, independent, self-motivated, and a fast learner Patience and perseverance are key attributes Benefits Competitive salaries and generous benefits Opportunity to work alongside passionate and talented individuals Entrepreneurship culture with a focus on creating a budding ground for future entrepreneurs Perks and flexibility of a technology product company

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Job Description;  Initial Gathering during Pre sales  Analyze and compile option solution  Estimating effort and listing other items required  Lead the project or become as BA (end to end project management included handover to operation support)  Creative giving solutions to user Requrement Skill; Min. Bachelor Degree  Min 4 Full cycle Project As Senior BA or PM  Experience in Custom Apps and System  Experienced and familiar with Agile, Waterfall Project Management  Have experience on manufacture business case  English Spoken and Written is a MUST  Willing to work onsite  Technical competencies: SDLC, Office, Project Management, Blueprint, Function Spec, Testing, Training, Data Migration, Familiar infrastructure, On-prem, Cloud, Database.

Title: Business Analyst Executive (CEO's Office)
Description: Company Description Are you someone who loves to practice your skills and enjoys getting results? Do you have an entrepreneurial mindset and a passion for making a direct impact on a business? YOBO (Your Own Business Online) is looking for motivated and driven individuals to join our team. We offer a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in a dynamic and collaborative environment and to make a meaningful impact in the industry. As a part of our team, you'll have the chance to work on a variety of projects, gaining valuable skills in areas such as marketing, finance, and operations. You'll work alongside a team of experienced professionals who are dedicated to mentoring and supporting team members to help them develop their skills and grow their careers. Whether you're a business school student or just someone who enjoys getting results through practice, we invite you to apply today and be part of a dynamic and innovative team that is disrupting the industry with fresh ideas and bold moves. Don't miss out on this unique opportunity to make a real difference in the industry and develop your skills in a supportive and dynamic environment. Apply now to join the YOBO team! Job Description We are seeking a dynamic and driven individual to join our team as a Business Analyst Executive for our CEO's office. As a Business Analyst Executive, you will work alongside the CEO and other departments to provide comprehensive analysis and business insights. Responsibilities: Conduct research and gather data on industry trends, benchmarking, and customer behavior Analyze data using statistical techniques and provide insights to the CEO and other departments Collaborate with other departments to develop business strategies and action plans Create reports and presentations for the CEO and executive team Manage projects related to business analysis and research Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business, Math, Statistics, Economics, Marketing or a related field Strong analytical skills and ability to work with large amounts of data Excellent communication and presentation skills Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and other data analysis tools Ability to work independently and as part of a team  Additional Information This is an entry-level position, and fresh graduates are welcome to apply. We are looking for someone who is passionate about data analysis and can provide valuable insights to the CEO and other departments. If you are interested in this opportunity, please submit your resume and cover letter. We look forward to hearing from you!

They act as a liaison among stakeholders in order to understand the structure, policies, and operations of an organization, and to recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Act as a bridge between the business problems and the technology solutions. Analyse, transform and ultimately resolve the business problems with the help of technology. Work with internal clients and apply best practice methodologies to determine business requirements and to define solutions to address business, process, information and system problems, improvements or change. Deliver business projects in line with sponsor requirements and enterprise architecture. Proactive development and deployment of enhanced services and platforms, covering all the functional aspects from service/product definition through to build and deployment. Ensure the identification and documentation of operational gaps including user guides, templates, test cases and related user training. Assist with the resolution of issues pertaining to the service. Adhere to and follow the relevant development and support processes. Communicate and escalate if any issues arise or deliverables cannot be met and request assistance to ensure closure of issues. Take responsibility for delivery of project elements with minimal supervision Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Broad understanding of business practices and processes Excellent team player who displays good client service orientation with well-developed administrative and organization skills Deep expertise in specific systems, processes and technologies that they will be required to analyze Meticulous attention to detail whilst working under pressure Excellent verbal and written communication skills Ability to listen empathetically Ability to build rapport and engage effectively with a variety of stakeholders Knowledge of project management methodology Excellent analytical skills with the ability to convert business requirements into operational deliverables (functional requirements) to meet business objectives Excellent documentation skills, in particular, functional requirements, test cases, system user documentation, processes and procedures and presentations Very good working knowledge of Microsoft Exchange, Word, Excel Project, PowerPoint and Visio Understanding of systems generally used in a services organization e.g., ServiceNow, Siebel, Remedy, SAP, EMS would be advantageous Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Typically requires bachelor’s degree or equivalent with related demonstrable experience Project management certification would be advantageous Relevant technology certification(s) Required Experience: Demonstrable experience as a Business Analyst gained within a technology services environment Experience as a system administrator or developer would be advantageous Demonstrable experience in and with all operational aspects of a Services business, preferably with a Systems Integrator Demonstrable experience in the process of developing and implementing new services and systems Understanding of and experience with ITIL (IT Infrastructure Library) Demonstrable experience in coordinating and managing tasks, and small projects

Title: Business Analyst
Description: PT. Media Digitech Indonesia is a software development company trusted by business in Indonesia is looking for Business Analyst Job Requirements Have 3 years hands on experiences as business analyst. Have the knowledge and experiences on project phases. Experience handle project banking. Familiar with create documentation for project (FSD / TSD / BRD, MOM, etc) Have the knowledge and experience on implementation of Ambit Focus. Job Responsibilites Analyze business requirements and prepare project deliverables (BRD, MoM, etc). Conduct discussion and requirement analysis with the business and implementers. Bridge communication between business, IT and ALM system implementers.

Title: Business Analyst (Confidential) - Oil & Gas MNC
Description: Exclusive role within the company|Exposure to regional team About Our Client Client is a top player in the industry with presence around the globe. Job Description Working scope includes but is not limited to: Collaborate and coordinate with multiple stakeholders at different seniority levels, within the organization and beyond, in answering business questions effectively and efficiently. Collect, Consolidate, Analyze and models the data to develop business insights and dashboards that add value to the business. Assessing business trends and developing root causes of business issues Complying with accounting practices and identifying opportunities for reduced costs and improved productivity/efficiency The Successful Applicant Experienced in similar or related roles with 5+ years of experience; Preferred previous roles could be around but not limited to: data analyst from telco/consultancy, financial analyst, business development & project analyst Exceptional communication and presentation skills using English Proven track record in performance analysis, competitor analysis, and implementing successful business actions based on data A firm grasp of economics, financial analysis, market research, and data analysis. Experienced in Microsoft Office tools, big data processing with SQL, Python/R, as well as making dashboards and reports (Tableau, Power BI, etc) What's on Offer Chance to work with a top player in Oil & Gas industry worldwide, with career opportunities around the globe (internal promotion/movement are very likely). Contact: Clairine Lonteng Quote job ref: JN-022023-5951068

Title: Research Analyst
Description: PintarSaham.id media yang menyediakan konten edukasi dan analisis investasi dengan jumlah total pengunjung,  followers  maupun  subscriber  di seluruh channel kami mencapai 100k saat ini dan bertumbuh konsisten tiap bulan sedang mencari kandidat untuk menjadi bagian dari tim riset dalam hal analisis fundamental. Kandidat yang ideal akan bertanggung jawab dalam mengubah data yang ada menjadi insight yang berguna dalam pengambilan keputusan investasi. Jika kamu ingin menjadi bagian dari perusahaan kecil yang sedang bertumbuh dan ingin meningkatkan literasi keuangan di Indonesia serta menghargai fleksibilitas dan senang dalam membantu kehidupan orang lain agar menjadi lebih baik secara keuangan, maka PintarSaham.id merupakan tempat yang ideal untuk kamu.   Job Desc Melakukan riset dan analisis berdasarkan data Menyiapkan bahan/materi yang meringkas suatu data dan dapat mengambil kesimpulan yang digunakan untuk membeirkan insight yang bernilai untuk stakeholder Kualifikasi  Fresh graduate are welcome Dapat menggunakan Microsoft Excel, SPSS dan PowerPoint Menyukai dunia pasar modal (lebih disukai yang sudah berinvestasi saham) Tekun, informatif dan komunikatif Domisili di Bali

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Who are we? Amar Bank is one of the most technologically advanced digital banks in Indonesia. Our leading digital lending product, Tunaiku has the distinction of being the first FinTech product in Indonesia. We are also the first digital bank on the cloud. As the first profitable digital bank, we managed to get listed on the Indonesian Stock Exchange. How did we manage to do that? We are changing people’s perception of a bank. We believe we are the innovators who combine customer focus principles with creating technology-based impact. We incorporate freedom and flexibility as part of our startup working culture DNA to encourage innovation in creating better financial solutions for the banking industry. We think of ourselves as, ‘A technology company with a banking license’. For this reason, we ‘Act like a FinTech, and think like a Bank.’ How did it all start? Founded on March 15, 1991, in Surabaya as PT Anglomas International Bank (Amin Bank), the bank was acquired by Tolaram Group and transformed to PT Bank Amar Indonesia (Amar Bank) in 2014. It has then undergone a significant digital transformation to become one of the country's forerunning fintech institutions through its award-winning digital lending platform, Tunaiku. Our philosophy, mission, and vision Technology must impact lives, must improve lives. We exist to provide banking to those who ‘need’ and not only to those who ‘want’. Services when provided to those who need at the time of their need brings smiles. Our vision is to bring 200 million smiles. More about the bank with startup culture environment Consist of 1000+ people, you will meet people who love to grow, dream big, and actually have fun at the workplace! We provide a great working environment that pushes people to grow outside their comfort zone. People with high drive and ambition find us a very attractive place to work as their career growth matches their own drive and not any staid policies. Thus we hold the honor of being awarded “Best Place to Work in Indonesia”. Recently Amar Bank was awarded as Inspirational Brand from APEA (Asia Pacific Enterprise Awards) 2022. Of course, our innovation won't stop here. So if you would love to be a part of it, have a growth mindset, and are constantly hungry for challenges, we invite you to join us in our journey to ‘Impact Lives’. Join us today and create #unlimitedinnovations! Business Analyst staff will be directly reporting to Business Analyst Circle Lead and also EVP Finance. He/She will have a great deal of exposure about the company’s businesses especially its flagship product, Tunaiku and Finance related matters. Will be involved in various stage of business process along with other team members and other functions. Due to the nature of the job, it is also expected that the team member is committed to the position. Responsibilities: Analyze the current processes Assist and coordinate with related parties in designing an effective and efficient workflows Implements and monitors the progress of development projects to ensure the smooth running of business and compliance within the industry environment Collect data and analyze the Bank's performance, including financial reports, in accordance with predetermined deadlines Provide proposed solutions to improve the performance of a business process Establish communication and provide support to other work units in order to achieve effective cross-division cooperation Perform ad-hoc tasks requested by the supervisor Requirements: 2-3 years working experience Experience in working in a team-oriented and collaborative environment Experienced candidates is expected to have experience or exposure in the related field, experience in the fintech industry is a plus Analytics and detail-oriented are must Eagerness to learn and share with others Have good critical thinking and detail-oriented is a must Language proficiency: Bahasa and English Strong in numbers is a plus point Bonus Point: Proficient in excel Familiar with BI tools such as Looker Our keen eye for finance won't go unnoticed at Amar Bank. We do budgeting, investor relations-managing, and assisting executives in making decisions that affect the organization. It's our job to take responsibility for the financial health of the organization. We act as the floodgates when money comes in and goes out. We also collaborate closely with top executives and departments to innovate an idea-friendly organizational financial culture. Our keen eye for finance won't go unnoticed at Amar Bank. We do budgeting, investor relations-managing, and assisting executives in making decisions that affect the organization. It's our job to take responsibility for the financial health of the organization. We act as the floodgates when money comes in and goes out. We also collaborate closely with top executives and departments to innovate an idea-friendly organizational financial culture.

Title: Safety Reporting & Data Analyst
Description: Main purpose of the position The Safety Reporting & Data Analyst ensures the collect, the registration, the analysis of all relevant data related to the Health & Safety Department (Health, Industrial Hygiene, Safety, Process Safety and Emergency Response). The Safety Reporting & Data Analyst is responsible of the correct data report from the field into the System and of the development of the trends observed based on the figures for a proper understanding. Scope of the position (key dimensions) Key element of the H&S Team to ensure accuracy of the data collected for an exhaustive interpretation and use. Major challenges faced / points of complexity The consistent focus on the H&S risk identification, elimination and mitigation, regular updating and maintain of the overall risk register and continuous approaches to occupational risk owners and stakeholders for alignment and approaches to promote the PDCA cycling on H&S risk control. Major Responsibilities / Outputs  Participates to the definition of the data collection and reporting system  Gives orientation on the reporting development with a permanent objective of simplifying the process  Structure, and update the collect and reporting system  Ensures compliance with the Corporate reporting requirements  Raises alerts on uncontrolled and or emerging collect or reporting issues  Uses all relevant tools to facilitate data collection and analysis of trends  Develop user friendly tools for data collection and analysis of trends  Prepare regular presentations for the periodic meetings, with fit for purpose material  Collaborate with all the relevant functions: Field safety, Safety risk, HR, Environment, CSR  Transform data into visible management tools  Perfectly understand the procedures, rules, standards of the project  As needed, perform any task agreed upon with the reporting Manager Requirements Min. post graduate degree in HSE, Engineering, Technical Science or other related background Have experienced as data analyst Very strong skills in data management IT tools More than 5 years of diverse international experience, specifically in working in large projects Ability to work in a multi‐cultural environment Excellent communication skills, both oral and written Strong Problem‐Solving Skills Fluent in English Strong organizational and analytical skills. Able to work independently and in a multi‐disciplinary team environment. Enthusiastic learner committed to maintaining expertise through practice and continuing professional development. Keen to understand the root causes of incidents/accidents & to use that understanding to help the project avoid them

Title: Business Analyst
Company: PT Bank Multiarta Sentosa Tbk (Bank MAS)
Description: Job Descriptions Communication with management/business teams to gain in-depth understanding of critical business requirements Gather critical information from active listening/engagement with various stakeholders involved with the business Determine and understand business objectives and break down complex problems through a combination of studying both qualitative and quantitative data Analyzing data models to deliver logical conclusions Developing innovative solutions for operational and strategic changes Understand how to prioritize initiatives and solutions based on business needs and constraints Communication with stakeholders regarding the implementation changes Conducting test, surveys, and workshops Qualifications At least 2 years of experience in Data Analytics or Project Management Strong logical thinking and problem-solving skills Fundamental analytical and conceptual thinking skills Experience in SQL Programming Experience with data visualization and dashboard creation with Tableau (or similar tools) Communication skills to interact with developers, clients, end-user, and management

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Pendidikan min D3 dari jurusan TI/SI/Kom atau bidang yang relevan Memiliki pengalaman sebagai BA pada pelaksanaan IT Project, diutamakan sebagai Business Analyst, untuk level Senior dibutuhkan pengalaman min 5 tahun, sedangkan Middle pengalaman min 3 tahun Memahami konsep SDLC Memiliki pengalaman dalam menyusun dokumen project seperti KAK/RFP, SOW, RD, FSD, UAT Scenario, dll  Memiiki pengetahuan teknis seperti SQL, Webservice, dan pengalaman di asuransi adalah syarat opsional

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Background in CRM Applications and or customer 360 SQL fluency Technical fluency with database, design data model & data mapping experience with customer lifecycle and customer 360 Insurance/Financial/Digital Business

Title: Data Business Analyst - Big Data
Description: The Data Business Analyst shall be responsible to work closely with business stakeholders, project managers, gathering business requirements from across various verticals of GTech including retail, banking, pharma, public sector, manufacturing etc. Converting business requirements into technology solutions and overseeing their documentation and deployment. The role is responsible for analyzing and translate the requirements into functional spec and task, communicate and distribute the tasks to related internal teams. Key Responsibilities  Working closely with multiple stakeholders to gather, analyze current business requirements.  Translating business requirements into detailed functional specifications and communicate with technical teams.  Ensuring requirements issues are tracked, reported, and resolved in a timely manner. Effectively communicating plan, status, risks and issues to the stakeholder in a precise and timely manner.  Contributing to and driving continuous process improvement initiatives to meet business needs.  Supporting the Project Manager or technical teams in delivering the project plan on-time and on-budget.  Plan, conduct, and document User Acceptance Tests.  Supporting stakeholders in deployments, implementation, and training activities.   Work closely with technical teams to create and maintain data product, data pipeline, and data processing documentations Requirements 1 - 3 years of work experience as IT Business Analyst, data engineer, data analyst, or data scientist.  Bachelors/Master’s Degree in Computer Science/Statistics/Management Excellent communication with multiple levels of stakeholders and functional disciplines. Excellent analytical thinking, analysis, and problem-solving skills.  Ability to structure problems through a data driven decision-making process.  Familiar with data engineering, data analytics, and data science process.  Familiar with of SQL/PLSQL Proficient with Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, Outlook, and Word applications.  High aptitude to learn quickly and work well under pressure with appropriate attention to detail.  Familiar with data platforms technologies.  Organized, deliberate, and reliable in structuring work, and effective as a problem solver.

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Melakukan desk study atau mengumpulkan data dan informasi terkait pencarian pasar, legal, operasional dan keuangan.  Menghandle serta mengevaluasi secara berkala kepada penerbit.  Melakukan survei lapangan yang dimaksudkan untuk mengumpulkan data teknis dan operasional, menjaring aspirasi manajemen dan survei lingkungan.  Melakukan analisa terhadap beberapa aspek seperti : Analisis Aspek Teknis, Analisis Aspek Ekonomi, Analisis Aspek Ekonomis, Analisis Aspek Ekonomis, Analisis Aspek Risiko dan Mitigasi Risiko.  Memberikan rekomendasi dan saran terkait rencana aplikasi system.  Menjalin relasi yang baik dengan pihak penerbit.  Melakukan diskusi dan persentasi. Kualifikasi khusus   Fresh Graduate (S1 Ekonomi/Bisnis/ Keuangan) / Pengalaman minimal 1 tahun  Memiliki kemampuan analisis bisnis yang kuat  Memahami istilah- istilah dalam dunia bisnis secara umum  Mampu membaca laporan keuangan  Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik  Mampu bekerja dalam tim  Memiliki tingkat ketelitian yang baik

Title: Business Intelligent Analyst
Description: In this role she/he will be responsible for understanding the industry and competitive environment, establishing the operation system of business and seller growth, exploring opportunities and empowering business development operations. Responsibility Support operation teams to work on different initiatives, and make decisions based on number. Formulate the go-to-market, seller growth strategy for local market; evaluate and evolve the strategy to meet business needs. Build and monitor the operational index, and work closely with the data, project, and product teams to optimize all data and tools. Strong ability to identify risks and streamline business efficiencies. Understanding e-commerce or affiliate field is a plus. Combining business analytics, data mining, and data visualization, to help organizations to make more data-driven decisions. Provide business, insight and trend analysis. Capable of producing regular reporting and monitoring dashboards, and responding to data needs. Requirements Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent practical experience. 5+ years of experience in an eCommerce platform, consulting firm or internet strategy, industry or market research and business analytics with eCommerce relevant experience. Strong analytic, logical and problem solving skills with good attention to detail. Big picture thinking, structured, organized, and experienced in managing projects on different scales (planning, root cause identification, risk mitigation, and process optimization). Adaptable, fast learner, highly motivated, and versatile player with some exposure in ops and commercial. English proficiency is a must

Title: Business Analyst
Description: Fincons Group  è una multinazionale che opera nell’ambito della consulenza aziendale e integrazione di sistemi IT e che da oltre 38 anni  progetta il futuro digitale di aziende leader sui mercati internazionali . Il Gruppo Fincons ha costruito la propria reputazione prevedendo e interpretando nuovi modelli di business ed anticipando la rapida evoluzione dei sistemi informatici costruendo una gamma completa di servizi:  dalla ricerca e consulenza alla progettazione e sviluppo IT , dai  servizi di system integration  delle principali soluzioni software dei vendor di cui è partener, fino alla  gestione delle applicazioni , supportando la trasformazione digitale di imprese di qualsiasi dimensione. Fincons è un'azienda familiare con  oltre 2000 risorse , dove la proprietà svolge un ruolo strategico con impegno e passione, fondando l'azienda sugli stessi principi di una famiglia unita e premurosa. Crediamo fermamente nel valore della collaborazione e nel contributo che ogni idea e intuizione può portare. Crediamo che lo sforzo di tutti possa fare la differenza, trasformando la conoscenza in una risorsa strategica. Questa è la nostra mission aziendale e la perseguiamo con l'ausilio del nostro asset più strategico: le nostre risorse umane. Nell’ottica di un potenziamento dell’organico, il Gruppo è alla ricerca di un: BUSINESS ANALYST La risorsa verrà inserita all'interno di un team progettuale internazionale e si occuperà di progetti di integrazione di soluzioni aziendali. Il/la candidato deve essere in possesso di una laurea di indirizzo informatico e avere almeno 2 anni di esperienza nel ruolo. In generale la persona deve possedere significative capacità di problem solving e di analisi, doti relazionali e di gestione del rapporto con il cliente. Competenze e requisiti: - Raccolta e analisi delle richieste - Gap analysis - Disegno di dettaglio - Supporto in fase di UAT/Script test - Partecipazione a meeting internazionali. - Capacità di conduzione dei System Test - Conoscenza delle Basi dati relazionali (Oracle) e del linguaggio SQL NICE TO HAVE Gradita conoscenza delle seguenti tecnologie: - Java e Spring; - Java Script; - JQUERY. Cosa offriamo Un percorso di  carriera strutturato , volto alla valorizzazione e al potenziamento delle competenze. Accesso ai  programmi di formazione e certificazione aziendali . Accesso ai corporate  benefits aziendali . Sede di lavoro: Smart Working/   Roma E’ richiesta la disponibilità ad effettuare trasferte. La ricerca è rivolta a candidati di entrambi i sessi. Saranno prese in considerazione, altresì, candidature di risorse che risultino appartenenti alle Categorie Protette con percentuale di invalidità superiore al 46%. I dati saranno trattati e conservati esclusivamente ai fini della presente o di future selezioni, garantendo i diritti di cui all’art. 13 Dlgs 196/03 e del GDPR (Regolamento UE 2016/679).

Title: Business Analyst
Description: i. Mempunyai pemahaman yang kuat terkait analisa proses bisnis yang dituangkan kedalam sistem ii. Dapat menentukan tujuan operasional dengan mempelajari fungsi bisnis, mengumpulkan informasi, mengevaluasi persyaratan dan format output yang diinginkan iii. Membuat bagan dan diagram alur kerja, mempelajari kemampuan sistem, dan menuliskan spesifikasi yang dibutuhkan iv. Memantau kemajuan proyek dengan melacak aktivitas, menyelesaikan masalah, menerbitkan laporan kemajuan berkala, merekomendasikan tindakan yang perlu dilakukan v. Mempunyai pengalaman pengembangan aplikasi dalam ruang lingkup manajemen proyek baik itu waterfall maupun agile vi. Berkepribadian baik dan dapat bekerja sama dalam team dengan baik

So if you would love to be a part of it, have a growth mindset, and are constantly hungry for challenges, we invite you to join us in our journey to ‘Impact Lives’. Join us today and create #unlimitedinnovations! Cyber Security Operation is part of the cyber security team, and reporting to the cyber security operation team lead. You will operate and manage defensive and monitoring security technology, and make sure the security of our product by doing security assessment regularly. Communicate and collaborate with Engineers and Product Owners to maintain security level resilience of the products and assets. This role will handle most of our process improvement, handling requests from other teams regarding process, handling various communication regarding fixing and patching, and being involved in internal processes like pentest and incident response. Responsibilities Performing Pentest and Vulnerability Assessment Manage, operate and optimize security operation tools alert and vulnerability assessment tools result Analyze potential incident and vulnerability from various incoming channel Being part of security incident and response team, to respond, analyze and process incidents according to the SLA Conduct, Analyze and Enhance any of existing cybersecurity operation related process, documentation and report Manage VAPT and Cyber Security related engagement process with various parties Achieving personal/team KPI with minimum supervision Requirements At least 5 years of Cyber Security career related experience, preferable in security operations and analyst Passionate about Cyber Security trends and technology Experienced in using security monitoring and protection technology (SIEM, Scanner tools, Cloud and Container security tools) Experienced in analyzing security scanner results, giving recommendation, and do a followup process for vulnerability mitigation Experienced in analyzing potential incident log to determine course of actions on how to handle them Have strong analytical skill, creative and critical thinking is a must Having solid communication and presentation skill is a must Bonus point if Experienced in Financial or Startup industry Hold any Cyber Security related certification Familiar with cloud and container environment Familiar with Prisma Cloud, Wazuh, SOCRadar, Burp Suite, Defectdojo We exist to innovate and maintain the architecture of Amar Bank's products. As part of our main focus to create through technology we ensure the process and technology we use helps maintain and build human connection at scale. It’s our job to plan, monitor, and control the technology growth so we can provide a faster, more convenient, and more efficient way of performing business transactions.

Title: Senior Business Analyst
Description: Project Tasks Conduct Project Management process according to applied BSI Project Methodology based on the determined role. Proactively learn new technologies to enrich the knowledge of related unit. Conduct requirement analysis, with discussion, create mock up, etc, and create appropriate to-be design document, and testing scenarios. Operation Tasks Provide periodic report based on the needs of related organizations requirement. Support to realize improvement resumed in SII document. Resolve incident to ensure the SLA achievement. Minimum Qualifications Minimum graduated from reputable university, Bachelor Degree in Information Technology, Engineering, Business or Science. Minimum 5 years experience as Business Analyst/System Analyst/Consultant Have a strong experience in a project at least 3 full cycle. Intensive experience in exercising IT Project Management and Business Process Improvement Have a basic SQL skill and Querry. Understand of IT Services Market & Business will prefered Have good communication, interpersonal skill, and english proficient (written and oral)

Title: Business Analyst (IT)
Description: Duties and Responsibilities  Act as a point of contact for Finance users in the country and Regional offices with regard to any system changes and new implementations for Finance.  Conduct requirements gathering for system enhancement and new implementation with Finance users.  Document user requirements in a Business Requirements Document and obtain signoffs from relevant stakeholders.  Act as a bridge between users and the IT application team, translating business requirements into technical spec requirements.  Liaise with the local IT team and Regional Office for IT security and compliance requirements needed to roll out the system implementation.  Coordinate with users to conduct UAT.  Organize UAT, track and document testing results and coordinate with the IT development team for required fixes  Obtain UAT signoffs from relevant stakeholders and arrange for go-live execution.

Title: Business Analyst - Life Insurance
Description: Requirements  Minimum Bachelor Degree  Minimal 3 years experiences in Business Analyst position  Prefer to have knowledge in AS400, SMART/400, Life Asia or Group Asia  Ability to work independently and with others (team work)  Experiences in Banking, Insurance Projects  Excellent documentation skill  Having knowledge in: Jira, Visio, MS. Project, Agile, Scrum

Title: Analyst - Business Investigation & Compliance
Description: Integrity Indonesia  is a foreign investment company that has operated for 21 years in Indonesia, and with established affiliates in Malaysia and Thailand. Our business is to provide services related to the Prevention, Detection, and Investigation of risk. Our services include brand protection services such as anti-counterfeiting, trademark investigation, and market surveys. For more information, please see our website: www.integrity-asia.com As a rapidly expanding company with a robust business plan, Integrity Indonesia is looking for self-motivated and results-oriented individuals with strong qualifications who enjoy the challenge to grow and succeeding. * * * In this position, You will be responsible for carrying out reputational due diligence, background checks, and investigative research by conducting desktop searches and source inquiries as well as coordinating with field researchers and other specialists. The position requires good analytical skills, attention to detail, proficient written English skills as well as good coordination and communication abilities. Candidates should agree to embrace our core values: integrity, reliability, going the extra mile, excellence, and innovation. Key Responsibilities Complete the assignment from A to Z to meet the objectives of the case Define keywords and conduct comprehensive media and directory searches Prepare detailed Task Briefs Prepare budget if necessary and manage budget Allocation and coordination of fieldwork Find potential sources and interview them by phone and/or by meeting Analyze all data collected from the field and request further explanations Analyze all data collected from media searches and sources Write report according to requirements Draft a well-crafted executive summary with insightful analysis Report developments to the supervisor Participate in research and development projects for capacity building Requirements: High level of integrity and professionalism Minimum Bachelor Degree with any major Strong analytical skills and attention to detail Comfortable working within deadlines Excellent English writing skills If you meet these requirements and if you are looking for a new, exciting opportunity within a successful, growing company, then this role is for you! PT Integrity Indonesia is an equal-opportunity employer.

Title: R2R Reporting Analyst
Description: Job Descriptions: Perform day-to-day posting, allocations, and accrual recording of General Ledger for the assigned business unit Perform intercompany reconciliation and clearing for other account in regular basis, including to identify and resolve unreconciled issues Perform pre month-end activity (e.g. balance sheet account review, bank reconciliation, check AP/AR) correctly and in timely manner Perform month-end/year-end closing activities for the assigned business unit correctly and in timely manner Maintain the reporting templates and prepare financial reporting for statutory and management reporting Perform inventory journals adjustment posting and perform reversal (if needed) for assigned business unit Perform deferred tax journals posting and perform reversal (if needed) for assigned business unit Ensure current processes, operations, systems, databases and information security are up to date and comply with proper accounting and legal principles/policies/procedures, including GAAP and others Deliver service excellence and maximize customer service and satisfaction Job Requirements: Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree in Accounting. At least 1 year of working experience as accounting. Fresh graduate are welcome to apply Must be detail and numerical proficiency Fast learner “Our company has never levied any fees for recruitment process nor has it required to order tickets and accommodation through a certain travel agent or certain person”
